It was more about the flow of curling it. I tried wrapping my hair around the barrel, but found it was a little too loose for the look I wanted. All in all, would definitely buy this again.

product_title: HOT TOOLS Professional 24K Gold Curling Iron, 2 inch
review_header: You will have to pry this iron out of my cold, dead hands
review_text: I’ve been through a dozen curling irons, and this is The One. I literally get stopped by passers by to ask how I get my hair to look the way it does. Heats quickly, curls last all day, no damage.

product_title: HOT TOOLS Professional 24K Gold Curling Iron, 2 inch
review_header: 1-1/4 size created the Perfect wave for fine and long hair
review_text: First of all, the price is amazing but so is the quality! My hair is typically very straight and it holds a curl when I use this iron! It's lightweight and gets hot quickly! The 1-1/4 size created the Perfect wave for my long hair!

product_title: HOT TOOLS Professional 24K Gold Curling Iron, 2 inch
review_header: This is the perfect size and price point for my needs
review_text: This is the perfect size and price point for my needs. I wanted a curling wand, but couldn’t find one in this price range/width that had temperature control, so I bought this and removed the clamp (fairly easily with pliers and a screwdriver), and it’s perfect. I actually had people ask if the curls I created with this were natural, or if I got a perm. Being able to keep the heat below 350°F is super important to me, and this iron makes it very easy.

product_title: HOT TOOLS Professional 24K Gold Curling Iron, 2 inch
review_text: I wanted a new curling iron since the old one I loved for so many years finally died; it was a 2" iron, with a dull metal & was AMAZING at getting those gorgeous Victoria's Secret model waves. Well, since I didn't have that miracle iron anymore, I'd been using a tiny 1" iron that gave me small, tighter curls & made me miss the big, loose curls I was used to. After searching high & low for a great iron, my choice came down to this & the other 2" barrel iron. Since it would be my first time trying this brand, I decided to go for this slightly more inexpensive, slightly smaller barrel & I couldn't be happier! My hair is about 4 inches past my shoulders and VERY thick, so I turned the heating dial between 330-380 degrees and it's perfect. I think I could even go to a lower temperature next time to achieve loose waves. This is the perfect iron for me & it will definitely be a great replacement as my go-to curling hair tool. I've attached a photo to show how great it worked for me! Hopefully, I could help those of you out there who are unsure of purchasing this iron.

product_title: HOT TOOLS Professional 24K Gold Curling Iron, 2 inch
review_text: I bought this 2 inch curling iron and have used it almost every day for about 2 weeks now. I have been nothing but satisfied with the curling iron. It heats up quickly and holds the heat very well during heavy use. The spring on the iron is hold very well so far. The box had a spare spring in it, which is nice to have just in case. Not sure why some of the reviews were complaining about the spring. If your looking for a good quality curling iron then this one is what you are looking for. I will definitely recommend this to anyone looking for one.

product_title: HOT TOOLS Professional 24K Gold Curling Iron, 2 inch
review_header: The best. This one goes to 11.
review_text: Excellent quality and value. You won't find a better curling iron for the price. These out perform many higher priced curling irons. I have the 3/4, 1.25, and 1.5 inch barrels, and work very well. I love the long flexible swivel cord, the strong but not too strong springs (and replacement springs included). Be sure to read up on appropriate temperatures for hair styling, and maybe purchase a heat protectant along with these irons because they go to 430 F (aka this one goes to 11). A good entry level product is the Tresemme Thermal Creations Heat Tamer.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Its a really good toaster! Has a stop button to push if you gave your food too much time. I would buy again.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Bought this for father In law and he uses it every day sometimes more than once. He really likes it. Very easy to use. Easy to clean too.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This is a great toaster. I bought this for my wife for our wedding anniversary! What a nice gift! She loves it! On our next wedding anniversary I plan on buying my wife a new Dyson vacuum cleaner! I know she’ll love that too. I know how to treat a lady!!!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I bought this exact toaster when I got divorced 10 years ago and went out on my own with a low budget. It is inexpensive but works great. 10 years later, I threw the toaster out because I thought it was broke. I found out later I had tripped the plug, and the toaster was fine!! It was one of those stupid moments I will remember. Anyway, I looked all around for a new toaster, with most being in the over $50 range and not black. My kitchen has black appliances. I finally decided to search Amazon, and there was my toaster I bought 10 years ago. The only change is it now has a bagel button. It lasted for 10 years before, and probably would have lasted longer. So, I bought it again. I think I paid $20 10 years ago, so the price did not go up much. My kids and I love this as bagels don't get stuck and the darkness of the toast is easily adjusted... never any problems.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Great toaster for a great price.
review_text: I love this toaster!! It toasts great. Outside doesn’t get hot. Some people seem to have a problem with the handles, but they work fine as long as you don’t slam them hard. It’s a great value.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I love my new 4 slice toaster. A much needed kitchen addition. I bought my friend one for a house gift and now I have my own.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Very nice toaster; Well built; Huge slots; It is longer than a standard toaster though - so check the length if space is an issue; Great price for this quality - Definitely Recommend!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: My partner and I have different taste in toast. The thing I love about this, and it saves me ending up with burnt toast I’d that you can set 2 slots to regular and two slots to very very dark!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Great toaster. Have big family so very convenient..so great my parents stole it from my mom for theirs lol! Thanks

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: That it is easy to clean and to work.
review_text: Love the toaster and it is great and it is very easy to clean with an easy tray to get the crumbs. There is no dislike with this toaster 😀

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: My family really enjoys this toaster the four slice toaster helps a lot in the morning at my house. And bring able to toast bagel in the same toaster at the same time is even better.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This is a great toaster for the price. My old one that was the same model was wearing out, as I use it every day, so I bought another one. The only thing is that sometimes you have to press down the knob 2-3 times, if you try to press it down too quickly.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I love this toaster. I only wish it had a longer cord or had the option of plug port on the left or right side. (Does that even exist?). Other than that a top quality toaster.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Toaster works great so far. Works for bagels and English muffins. But may need to UNPLUG and dig out breads.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Extra wide slots for bagels Toasts bread perfectlyN
review_text: No complaints its a great 4 way toaster the power cords a little short but doable

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Disadvantage is that there is NO panic button to stop toasting. Must turn sail way back for it to stop. Toasts Great thou. I can toast 2 loaves of bread rather quickly without it over heating

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Quick delivery, good quality, lightweight, heats up quick, cools down quick, easy use fits bagels
review_text: Quick delivery, good quality, lightweight, heats up quick, cools down quick, easy use fits bagels

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Best toaster ever!!!!!! Love it!!! Looks great, cooks great and easy to clean!!!!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Good value those sometimes lovers need to be pushed down multiple times
review_text: Though I really like this sometimes you have to press down the lovers three or four times before they stay down. Not sure why this is. Still have it and still use it. It does take up counter space but it is a 4 slice toaster. Good value

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This works great for us and we would recommend it for the ease of use and easy to clean. Very reliable.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Exactly what I wanted! Even for my small family of 3, I woukd have to wait soooo long just to toast some bread for everyone with my old toaster, 2 at a time. Now I can do 4 and that's perfect to get my husbands and daughters toast done together so they can eat their breakfast together!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Love this for the two sides with separate settings. Works great when making different desiref doness. We have found it works well with all types of bread.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This toaster is bigger then I expected but not enough to take up space, I cannot complain lol. Toasts bangles excellent! Quiet, easy and when toast time adjusted to your licking....perfectly toasted.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This toaster has a Bagel feature; Stop feature, and all the usual features as well. It does what it is supposed to do without any fuss. It is easy to clean as well.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: The first thing I did was toast bagels and they were great
review_text: The toaster is aesthetically appealing and toasts a nice bagel and slices of toast. I see lots of one star reviews of people saying it didn't toast their bread enough, and I'm just not understanding that from my own experience. Maybe it's because I like my bread lightly toasted, but then again I only had it on setting '2'. Great toaster and value for money.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I recently moved and needed a toaster. This one seems to be working out just fine and dandy. Little bagel button seems to work out and my bagels are just how I like them!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I bought this despite the bad reviews and I haven’t had any issues with this toaster at all. The cord coming from the front does look a little funny.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I needed a 4 slot toaster for easier meal preparation when I had numerous mouths to feed...so I replaced my 2 slot toaster with this this one...I have found that this toaster has helpful features I did not realize when I bought it. It has a stop feature, a lift to safely remove smaller items from the toasting chamber, sides work independently, fairly comprehensive dials for light to dark toasting, and fits well in the space provided. I am quite pleased with my purchase and would happily recommend it to others!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: If u go past 3 the toast will/may burn. The darkness selector goes up to 7! The spring/lever release is powerful. Note picture I posted. This only had happened once so far. The cord is NOT in a good location. It is on the front right corne.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Ever since I was a little girl I dreamt of buying myself a four slot sunbeam toaster. And behold today my dream came true. The second it came I opened the box like a child on Christmas morning and plugged in my new best friend. I slapped some waffles in that b*tch and you could tell she was having a good time. She heated up with a little bit of that new toaster smell and cooked my waffles-hold on to your socks-TO PERFECTION!! I love my toaster named Tina. Don’t get it twisted dog. 10/10 I wanna stick more things inside

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Meets all of our requirements. I can’t understand why people are breaking this thing, unless they’re manhandling it.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Loved it. Fast shipping. Product as described. Two thumbs up all the way.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Convenient, now I can eat my toast warm. Cleaning it is a breeze. It’s worth the money on this one.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Finally a wide slot and not a "wide slot"
review_text: My household likes bagels. We've bought so called wide slot toasters before and we're still stuffing the bagels in after we've split them apart. Sometimes the bagels we get are wider on one side than the other and it's a real stuffer. We have yet to have an issue with this one. If this one breaks in a few years, I'll be sure to get this exact same one. Granted, we haven't actually seen that the Bagel setting does anything different, but it's fine. Sometimes we forget to enable it and don't really see any difference. But who cares! This baby has WIDE SLOTS!!!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I like the style, and the extra features for bagels, temperature, and quick release. Works great so far! '-D

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: My only very small complaint would be that the slots could be a bit longer. Some of the bread we like doesn't quite fit. Plenty wide for bagels

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This toaster performs very well and has 2 special features that I really like: a STOP button that lets you pop the toast up at any time (instead of having to force the lever back up), and it has a BAGEL BUTTON to toast fat bagels just right. The toasting slots are plenty wide, though I will say that they're not quite long enough for some breads to fit well. Hey, for the price, I'll deal with it.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Appreciate the extra wide slots for bagels and fat bread
review_text: another easy to use appliance for my mother who is 80. As we get older, we seem to like the simpler, less button approach to life!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This is my new favorite kitchen appliance!!!!! It is nice and wide for bagels and also toasts bread well...big fan of the darkness control.. I'm very happy!!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Its a toaster, it works and looks good in my kitchen.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Very easy to use, inexpensive toaster. This is a replacement for the same one we had for a few years. Only reason it need to be replaced was because my youngest broke it - which was not a fault of the quality of the toaster itself.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This toaster is great! It warms up very fast and is easy to use. I did notice that you have to put the top and bottom of the bagless in backwards. The top seeded part of the bagle (everything bagels) needs to face towards the metal bar. It doesnt toast right if you dont do it that way.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This is the first toaster I've owned in 5 years. And I am really impressed by this model. It works great. Easy to use. Super easy to clean. I really like the Bagel Button! The 4 slots come in handy when I'm cooking breakfast for my friends when they are around when I cook breakfast. It toasts Breakfast pastries perfectly. I've recommended this brand and model to friends. Love this Sunbeam 4 slot Toaster!!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I've always believed in Sunbeam products. They have an excellent track record it's toaster is easier clean from the bottom. Evenly distributes the Browning of the toast or product you put in it. And has wide faces for bagels. Excellent product. Better product than the price suggest 👍😎

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This is a great toaster! The toast comes out of this toaster perfect, in my opinion. My previous toaster was a very expensive unit but this toaster put it down flat. Worth every penny!!!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Works good , don't understand the bagel button , but don't eat bagels , so pleased with the product otherwise , plus the price was good for a 4 slice toaster

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: User be warn: this produces a lot of heat (to the point I was afraid of my cupboard was going to catch on fire) so remember simple common sense: heat rises and give it extra space hehe but it works as Described

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Keeps my buns nice and crunchy.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Needed a new toaster after twenty five years, so i ordered this unit. I like it and it appears to be well built and makes great toast. You have to adjust each side independently but work great. Happy with purchase and hope it lasts just as long as my old unit, but time will tell.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Nice so far so good after couple of months
review_text: Nice and feels better than previous different brand toaster that didn’t last 2 years. I like the body is plastic rather than metal for my own reasons

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Not sure about all the negative reviews of this toaster. This is our second one of these. The previous one lasted for several years before it started toasting unevenly. I’ve had this new one for a few months now. It is just as durable as the previous model, if not better. With any toaster you should not be too forceful with the levers or they’re not going to last. I press down gently and there’s no problem. This was the only toaster in the $25-30 price range when I bought it. Sorry, but I’m not willing to pay $50 plus for a toaster— this isn’t rocket science. I grew up with a mom who used a Sunbeam stand mixer that lasted forever. I trust the brand.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: After using a cheap Dollar store toaster for years I finally decided to get a good toaster. The four slice toaster is a great option for a family. One of my favorite things about this toaster is the fact that the bread pops up good and high and I don't have to dig in the toaster to get my bread out. There's also a way that you push the lever up a little bit and it will bring the bread up to a level that you can pick it up. I can't say enough good things about this toaster is pretty as well as works great!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Great Toaster if you are careful
review_text: Excellent operating toaster = my only fault would be the chintzy thin plastic lever used to lower the toast. I know it will eventually break as it is the weakest point on an otherwise excellent toaster.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This is the 2nd Sunbeam toaster I've purchased. My first one lasted a Very long time! I would definitely say it is a quality toaster! I'm sure I will continue to enjoy this one. I have only one complaint - the cord is in a different location. The new one has the cord on the side towards the front of the toaster. This keeps the toaster too close to the wall. I still Love it!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Works with lots of bread sizes and 4 slices at once
review_text: At first (like with any plastic outer shelled toaster) there is a strong plastic burning smell. But it doesn't affect the food taste or anything like that and only is strong at the first 5 or so cycles. I wanted to replace my 2 piece toaster for a 4 piece one and this one works for what I need. It toasts one side of the bread pretty evenly between the 4 slices and the other side is slightly less toasted but that's the way I like it anyway. The stop toast knob works great and is pretty accurate. I set both knobs to about the same level and I'm pleased with the result: 4 pieces of toast at once. A quick efficient way to eat toast.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I bought this toaster from Amazon in 2009, but I did not remember that. It has been great. The finish has lost it's gloss so I went looking on Amazon at toasters. I saw one and thought it looked just like the one I had and clicked on it. That is when Amazon reminded me that I had purchased that same toaster in 2009. Sure can't complain about a toaster that still works great after 11 years..

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: This is our second one of these. Our first one was setting next to where a glass dish got dropped. The glass shattered all over and into the toaster. We could not clean all of the glass out. It’s a Great Toaster!

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_header: Sunbeam Toaster- 4 slice with wide slots
review_text: I Love this Toaster.It has 4 wide slots and it also has a Bagel option.Its exactly what I wanted it for...Toasted Bagel for me, Toast for the Husband..Bagels fit perfectly, and expels Bagel easily..No more digging them out with the knife,lol..Sunbeam is a good reliable, sturdy product and I hope it last 40 yrs like my last Sunbeam Toaster had.. When I saw it was a Sunbeam product, I bought it..I replaced the Sunbeam 2 slice toaster with it that finally gave out after 40 yrs of use..The Sunbeam 2 beater hand mixer that I have is still going strong..I inherited from my Mom 30 yrs ago.She got it for a wedding present.They make long lasting products.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: I absolutely love... Love... Love this toaster! It's easy to use, wide enough for my bagels and doesn't take in temp to get them nice and warm and just the right toasting. Also, my husband and I are able to toast or individual breads, even if they're not the same! Reach toasting section as it's own temp control. How cool is that!? I recommend this product.

product_title: Sunbeam Wide Slot 4-Slice Toaster, Black (003911-100-000)
review_text: Since the day this toaster arrived on my doorstep, my life has not been the same. Not only does it deliver the perfect shade and crunch to my bread but it seems to almost know my soul. I can’t explain it but once I began regularly using this toaster I noticed my hair became thicker and my nails stronger. I thought it coincidence until one morning I was cleaning out the crumb tray. I took the fluffy crust particles and jokingly made a wish while tossing them in the air. Immediately afterwards, my doorbell rang. It was my father. I had not seen him since I was 7 years old, he had been lost at sea for 32 years. I know it sounds silly but that’s not all. The very day I plugged in this toaster, I got a huge promotion at work, my acne cleared up, and my irritable bowel syndrome vanished. I realize people might not believe me but the timing of this toaster coming into my life and all these miraculous occurrences is undeniable. Yesterday I put my two frosted cherry pop tarts in the slots and when the timer popped up, it gave me an unexpected startled. I dropped to the floor where I noticed something sparkly under the oven door. It was my great grandmothers sapphire and diamond ring her mother had gifted to her on her wedding day. I cried tears of joy that day while enjoying my perfectly toasted extra gooey pop tart. I once was a skeptic, but this toaster has made me a believer.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I have thick, naturally stick straight hair above my shoulders and wanted more “casual” texture rather than curls. This is weird because the results look loose at first, but after 10 minutes seem to tighten up. It’s a little hard to maneuver being so large but practice makes perfect. The size makes it just so it doesn’t look like you just slept in braids imo.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I used to have that same one, till it stopped heating up one day. I think I bought it from target. But I really loved it so I decided after a few years to repurchase the same one. The first time I used it, it made a weird noise. I was kind of worried it was going to stop working. But so far so good! I honestly am glad I repurchased it, I will say that it is a little heavy so my hand gets tired after I press down so many times lol. I've only had for like a month. So I'll update if any issues.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I've had this hair waver since I was in high school from a recommendation from a friend so I was devastated when I accidentally stepped on it and broke it. However it was probably for the better since I used it so much it wasn't in the best condition presentation wise but worked just fine still after years of use. None the less I rushed to amazon for a new one and found the exact one for a great price. I think the first time I bought it it was more expensive from Ulta. From years of use I know this hair waver is great and will last forever if I hadn't stepped on my original one I'm sure it would have kept working for years to come. I love the big waves I get from it its very natural and it is very easy to use and beginner friendly. I would highly recommend this item it came just fine in the mail. Pro tip after you finish crimping your hair with this flip your head upside down and hair spray for extra volume.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Had extremely short hair that I hated and curling it was a disaster. This thing is the holy grail for super short hair. If you have short hair that is tough to curl properly, get this. You won’t regret it.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I bought this particular product because I happen to notice how great my friends hair looked one day. I asked her how she did it and she told me that she used this crimper. I was actually very surprised that her hair turned out the way it did with a crimper. So I found the product on here and when I received it I was like holy crap this thing is huge!!! I really wanted my hair to look like hers so i decided to try it out right away. Unfortunately i had just washed my hair that morning. I have the type of hair that does not hold curl unless i use tons of product. I was pressed for time so i didnt use any product and so my hair didnt turn out very nice. Not going to lie I was kinda sad. I was even thinking of returning it. My husband was like it doesnt seem to do anything for your hair. I decided that i would try again the next day when my hair had time to get a little greasy. This time i used lots of moose and hairspray and my hair turned out FANTASTIC! It looked amazing! After i got done with it my husband saw it and said, "Wow babe your hair looks great! Like really good, you look hot!" I have a smaller crimper but i really love how this one makes my hair look more wavy. I would definitely recommend this. I wish i could post a picture on here so you all can see!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Does exactly what I wanted. The waves are perfect and everyone thinks it’s my natural hair LOL. My hair is straight as a board so those comments always make me laugh. I should’ve bought this a long time ago.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: This is my favorite crimper ever. I’ve had it since I was 18 and it JUST broke and I’m 27. Only the handle broke and most likely bc I’ve moved often and am not the most careful packer.... I looked everywhere in the stores but nowhere had it. Finally found it on Amazon and ordered it instantly. I love the beautiful big beach waves you get from this crimper. It’s much better looking in my opinion than the smaller wavers that are in store. 10/10 is my honest opinion after using this gorgeous wave goddess of a machine 😍

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: This beach waiver gives amazing curls....whether you do a heavy all over curl, or a soft curl at the ends. The only complaint I have is that I have a hard time opening and closing the barrel because I have small hands.... I am unable to completely open the barrel with the handle because it expands wider than my hand. Therefore it’s kinda difficult to manage. It’s kinda heavy as well, as expected. Despite these issues I will suck it up for the pretty waves it makes!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I love the results of the waves!! Looks effortless once the waves drop a little bit. Recommend you to do your hair before makeup, etc. so you don't leave the house looking like a giant poof. It works well once you have a strategy on how to maneuver the device. At first it's horrible... but now it's not so bad!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: Best hair appliance I’ve ever bought!
review_text: I am so impressed with this product after my very first use that I immediately am writing this review! I have several hair appliances and although this one takes a little getting used to because it’s so big to handle, it is totally worth the results!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Fun product. Easy to use. I’m hair challenged and often cannot get products like this to work. But this gave me cute waves with minimal effort! And for less than $20 totally worth it.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I had this many years ago. It lasted me probably 15 years. Finally it broke and I purchased another brand that was awful. I’m so glad I was able to fine this same one online! It’s so easy to use for wavy hair.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I ordered this one because I left my other one in florida at disney world. And i love it. It's literally my favorite hair tool to use. It makes my hair nice and wavy and my cleaves last a minimum of 2 days every time I crimp it. Of a crimper is what your looking for, this one is golden.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: It was easy to use but it was kinda heavy for me. It did make my hair look amazing! Everybody complimented me on it. It lasted longer than if I were to curl my hair and my hair is very long. It’s down to my waist. I did watch multiple videos of how other girls used it before I bought it so I kinda already knew how to use it. I would definitely recommend doing that. Once you get the hang of it, it is very easy to use, just kinda heavy. I had to take a couple of breaks but I may just be weak in the upper body strength department. I would definitely recommend this to my friends and buy it again if I need to.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Good for the price to be able to try it out. I had been wanting to try this out for a while but wasn’t willing to pay an arm and a leg to do it, so I purchased this one. I’m glad I tried it and use it sometimes when I want a little something different but am glad it didn’t pay a lot for it.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I love this Revlon iron! Some may find it kind of heavy but it makes beautiful waves. I was able to crimp my entire head in under an hour.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: Please work perfectly so I can not have to deal with my wife in the morning
review_text: I can not give a review yet as I am the husband of the wife who is getting this I am hoping that this will make our mornings much quicker much easier and much less frustrating and that my wife will love the way her hair looks afterwards after reading the reviews I'm sure it will stand true. I will update in 1 to 2 weeks a review to let you know

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Love it!!! I have thin long hair and I love how much volume it give my hair. Easy to use took about 20 minutes!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Love this! I have kinky curly hair and this smooths out the kinks and looks fab! Has several different heat settings and is easy to use, a bit large, but awesome. highly recommend!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I love this! It took me about 35 mins to do all my hair since it was my first time using it and it's pretty heavy- but the waves have stayed in all day.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_author: So The Wind Wont Blow It All Away
review_text: Love this product. Works on my thin hair which is a rarity. I purchased as a replacement as I loved my old one so much. Makes my lifeless scraggly hair look almost lively. Regular curling irons dont work for me, but this wierd looking thing does. Dont drop it on the floor, it is more breakable than a curling wand.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: As much as I would add a photo to show how amazing it is unfortunately I don’t have a picture to show how my hair looked like. But honestly when I kept seeing the reviews over & over again bad and good reviews I was doubting myself if I should buy it or not. But I decided why not and honestly I’m not mad it came with perfect condition it does take a while for it to heat I highly recommend if you want your hair really beach wavy vibe to go into small section it does take a while but I love it. !!!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I love this curling iron, it makes it so easy to get beach waves. It has adjustable heat which is nice. It gets really hot, but it works so well that I’ve never had to put it up to the maximum setting. My hair is usually hard to curl, but it’s so quick and easy with this curling iron. I like it so much better than the single barrel. I used my daughter’s while on vacation and loved it so much that I ended up ordering one for myself before I got home.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Why didn't I hear of this sooner! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! It heats up quickly and it's easy to use. I'm not a professional hairstylist or anything but it turns out very nice. It is a little heavy tho, but no pain no gain, right? My hair is fine and straight so sometimes it looks thin. I've always wanted volume. I set this REVLON on number 6, and about 15 seconds per section. I don't really use a lot of hair products, just shine drops, and the waves stays pretty long. I still had the waves the next day and even after the gym where it got sweaty. And it's inexpensive! Totally worth it!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Excelente articulo soy estilista y es espectacular, estaba nerviosa porque ci algunos comentarios que decían que viene quebrada o algo así pero me di cuenta que pesa tanto que hay que tener cuidado de tirarla al piso, es muy buena trabej con cuidado posible piso de alfombra por si la tiran al piso así no se romperá

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I was just looking for something else easy to do with my hair that wasn't basic curls, and I am not one that spends time doing my hair everyday. This is reminiscent of the ol crimper from the 80's but updated and not as tight waves - it gives you volume and a simple easy look! Kind of like you just took your hair down from a braid, very easy style you could dress up or just wear to the beach. It is a little bulky but I like that so you can stick a long row of hair in - If I am going fast I can do it all in 5 minutes or 10 if I am really getting a good wave. Works really good on day 2 hair with a little bumble and bumble dry shampoo for hold. So glad I bought this!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: OMG, I love this thing!!! So fun!! Highly recommend! I initially bought the pink one, from a different seller, and returned it and took a chance on this one. So glad I did! So if you're debating which to get, get this one!! I have super thick hair, and look at the pic... speaks for itself! Love it!! :D

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: I'm all thumbs with hair but it works great
review_text: I've never been able to tame my hair which is fine and straight with just enough curl to be annoying in humidity. This thing works great if you are, like me, clueless about how to style your hair. Love the volume-boosting wave. It does seem to get quite hot but you can regulate this with a dial. It's easy to handle. I'm not going to do it too often because I'm not sure it's good for my hair but it's a lot of fun for now and then.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: While I love how this makes my hair look, it’s super heavy. By the time I’m done with my hair, it takes way longer than it should because I have to take breaks for my hands to come back to life. I wish it wasn’t so heavy, I use it every once in a while.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: Perfect for creating soft mermaid waves
review_text: I have dry, thick hair. It's naturally super curly, but sometimes I want a tamer, smoother look. This waver did a great job of toning my hair down and giving me those soft, mermaid waves that are so pretty. I will say that it seems to work best on two- or three-day hair—like the more product you already have in your hair (hairspray, mousse, etc.), the better the waves seem to turn out. The waves weren't as pronounced when it did it right after washing my hair, so I'm thinking that this tool would be a good one to throw into your hair regime on day two, three or four when you don't feel like washing your hair but need to style it somewhat. I love the results!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: So to start...I was only able to use this product once. I thought I was in love as I was waving my hair. The waves were turning out fabulous and the waver itself was fairly easy to use. But...As I got down to my last two pieces of hair the handle and spring underneath it popped out. I was not able to complete my new look that I was so excited about. I am now waiting on my new Hot Tools deap waver to arrive, and I can't be more excited to try it out! Sorry Revlon Perfect Heat Jumbo 3 Barrel Waver I am going to have to give you two thumbs down! UPDATE...after buying another Revlon Perfect Heat Jumbo 3 Barrel Waver from Ulta I realized the first one I bought must have been a dud, because the second works great and has for over a year. Two thumbs up!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I used to have longer (bra strap length) hair and it held the wave. Now my hair is a little past collar bone length and it’s just as great! Super easy to use and faster than curling (for me). It does get HOT so use a heat protectant spray and you’ll be good to go! For someone who struggles with doing anything other than a pony tail, I love this item. Side note: my sisters hair is super long and never holds a curl. I used this on her and the waves lasted through the night. When she woke up the next morning her hair still had a wave in it to where she didn’t have to do anything to it!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: OBSESSED. This is the only product that's ever turned my stick-straight hair into beachy waves!
review_text: Full disclosure–I've never written an Amazon review before but I'm absolutely OBSESSED with this product, so I came straight here after only 10 mins of using it today. A social media influencer I follow briefly mentioned this product in one of her videos and said she'd had it for six years, and that it was far better than any other product she had used to achieve the same wavy look. I went ahead and ordered it without much thought because it was so affordable, relative to other products I had seen. It arrived in a day and a half (2 days max?) and I ran straight to plug it in. Without so much as reading any instructions, as it was pretty self-explanatory, I was able to curl my entire head of hair, and without any hairspray or product, they still look like I just put them in six hours later. This is unheard of for me, as my straight hair refuses to hold curl...ever. This was arguably the quickest I've ever been able to curl all of my hair too, and with minimal effort since there's no spinning of the wand or wrapping hair around a barrel. It's as simple as it looks. I will seriously be using this every single day from here out!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: Hands down the BEST waver for creating beautiful beachy waves! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
review_text: I’ve been searching for the perfect waver to create that beachy wave look and I’ve FINALLY found it! 😍🙌🏽 This jumbo waver from Revlon is seriously EVERYTHING! I have long, thicker hair (down to my waist) and it gives me the most perfect sized waves that last. All the other wavers I tried gave me a smaller crimped look which just wasn’t what I was going for. The only complaints I have with this waver, which doesn’t take away from how AMAZING it is, is that it doesn’t have an automatic shutoff & the tips of it do get pretty hot. The heat is nothing unbearable or so hot that it will burn you, but I think adding a silicon, or other heat resistant tip would be a great addition along with a timer. I’ll update with a picture later. I hope my review helped. If so, please hit the like 👍🏽 button. Thank you!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I have semi thick hair. It used to be curly but has straightened out alot hence the purchase of this product. It works perfectly. It is a bit uncomfortable at first when using cause it's so big but once you get the hang of it its golden.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Wonderful product. It has a chart to let you know what heat setting you will get best results with based on your hair type and thickness. It was quick and easy to use and produced really pretty waves. You can do big and wide chunks at a time or small. If you have short hair I would say this would be a pain to use though. My hair feels really nice, had no smoking or anything from the style and my hair still feels wonderful.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: Thankfully Another Option For My Hair!
review_text: I love this waver! My daughter has one and when I saw how awesome her hair looked after using it I had to have one! I don't use it very often but the next time I do I will take a picture and post it. My hair is sorta frizzy and partially wavy so I either have to straighten it or spray stuff on it so it isn't frizzy. It used to be very thick but a couple of years ago it started getting really thin which made it look even worse. The Waver gives me another option to make my hair look nice!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: Para un look arreglado-relajado esta súper bien
review_text: Esta bien, pero si le falta calentar un poco más, la tienes que dejar alrededor de 10 segundos en tu cabello para que se logre formar, no se ve marcado, si quieres algo súper súper arreglado y definido no te funciona, pero algo que se vea estilizado siiii y la verdad si esta padre también el precio esta bien, si la recomiendo.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I’m obsessed with this waver, I use it almost every day to get ready for work. It’s super quick and easy, it also heats up super fast which helps a lot when I’m in a rush for work. Takes me about 30 minutes to finish my hair. This waver has multiple heat levels which makes it great for all hair types.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: The best waver you can buy, seriously!
review_text: I bought this is 2009 and it broke this year (2019). I ordered the same one again and it’s my favorite hair product. Makes your hair perfectly waved. I cannot live without this. So easy to use. I have very long hair down to my lower back and I can wave my hair with this in 10 minutes or less. It’s my absolute favorite thing.

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I've recently gotten into crimping my hair and tried it with a hair straightener, but it just didn't work for me. After borrowing this from a friend, I decided to buy one for myself since it was so easy to use. It's a little heavy since it has 3 barrels and is just larger than a regular curling iron or hair straightener in general, but it's still easy to use and gets the job done. Would recommend to anyone looking to get the crimped look

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: This is a great curling iron. I can literally do my hair in 5-7 minutes. The first time I did it I go so many compliments on my hair! Great product and great way to switch up your look! It gives you directions on what temp you should have it on for your particular type of hair! Great price also!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: Will buy again for a friend! 10/10 Love!
review_text: Due to the reviews I waited to write a review! For starters this crimping tool is very fragile BUT I have yet to break it. Arrived in perfect condition, never burnt or sizzled any hair during use like other buyers. I am in love with the barrel size and it works for most hair lengths (from ear to shoulder and longer).

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I lost my first one that I bought at Ulta years ago. So, I came on Amazon to find the same one. It works just as expected! I'm not disappointed at all. Love it! @ellexxandra

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: At first I didn’t like it because it didn’t work but then I cranked up the hear and got the best results! I was scared to use it on high since I have highlights and didn’t want my hair melting off. But being that it’s not a professional styling tool the higher heat was necessary to achieve the wavy hair results. The plus side my hair will stay like this for a few days after lightly hairspraying after styling!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: love this, it give nice deep waves, I have long fine hair that hates to curl but it will hold a wave! the only downfall like any waver is how long it takes to do it because I have such long hair. I like that it has a locking mechanism

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: This contraption works wonders on my flat and limp hair. It turns my flat hair into attractive beachy waves in under 40 minutes. My only dislike about this product is that it does take me some time to get through my whole head of hair, but that is the price to pay for lovely locks!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: Muy fácil de utilizar me gusta porque es una temperatura normal porque hay algunas que son muy calientes para el pelo, realmente la recomiendo porque el pelo use muy bonito 😍 después de utilizarla. Estoy feliz de aver encontrado algo así para mi pelo !

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_text: I never write reviews and I’ve tried a lot of hair “contraptions” but let me tell you! This thing works amazing! Super easy to use and The wave stays in all day! (It is a little heavy after awhile but it’s totally worth it!

product_title: REVLON 3 Barrel JUMBO Hair Waver, Grey
review_header: I'll be ordering another if this one ever dies....LOVE IT!
review_text: I adore this crimper/curler for putting waves in my hair. In fact, I bought my first one at Target and when it died several years later and my local Target didn't have it anymore, I turned to Amazon cuz they have everything! I was so glad I found it here and was able to get another. It works great! I use it all the time so when this one conks out, I'll be ordering another. :)

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Lighted Tent | Size: 8-Person | Color: Blue
review_header: Great tent, and you can power the lights without the CPX 6 system!
review_text: I bought this tent primarily for family camping, starting with back yard camping and then more remote camp sites. Transporting it to places like those is not an issue, but I wouldn't try to take this hiking. The hinged door, auto roll windows, and LED lighting system are all very nice features. This is easily best tent I have ever owned. I read plenty of negative reviews of the Coleman CPX power pack and did not want to deal with additional batteries for this thing. I already take my Milwaukee power tools and their batteries along on camping trips, so I wondered if maybe I would be able to use them instead of the CPX system. Turns out, it is possible! The CPX 6 system is rated for 6 volts and 2.6 amps. Milwaukee, DeWalt, Makita, and probably other popular power tool manufacturers all have adapters for their Lithium Ion batteries that provide a USB (5 volt, 2.1 amp) output. Knowing that a 6 volt system would be considered dead around 4.7 volts, it seemed like 5 volts might work. For $1.09 I bought a male USB to female 3.5mm x 1.35mm DC power jack, which plugs right in to the existing tent wiring, and powers the LED system perfectly. Power tool Li-Ion batteries are far superior to the NiMH batteries in the CPX 6 system. Might be the best $1.09 I ever spent.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_header: Easy setup. Just the right size for family of 4.
review_text: It was the perfect size for our family of four (two adults, two small children). We only used one large air mattress but its big enough for us to add a second mattress next time. It seemed easy enough to set up. Didn't take too long. I liked the door flap opening like a regular door versus the hinge being along the ground. Although, I wish the fabric from the ground to the opening was a bit shorter as we kept tripping over it. But overall we enjoyed it.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Lighted Tent | Size: 8-Person | Color: Blue
review_text: Best Tent I have ever owned! We used this tent in Garner State park area (Texas). When we arrived there were 15 mph winds with gusts over 30 and minimal trees to block wind. Assembly would have been much easier had the wind not been such a factor. I needed extra hands to help secure while I placed stakes. (Purchase the Coleman Stake kit additionally!) Once the tent was raised and staked with about 10-12 stakes the wind would not affect it. The tent looks amazing and functions equally as amazing. The features such as the hinged door, tool up windows and center LED light were well worth the money. The first evening the wind continued to blow in excess of 20 mph and we had a pretty decent rain added to the mix. We kept all the (3) windows fully opened and although it sounded like the wind was going to take us away... we stayed 100% dry. I was blown away by this tents ability to keep the rain out in those contortions. Granted, a harder downpour might have warranted putting windows up. Overall, this tent is incredible. If I was forced to make a single complaint or suggested to Coleman; I would say mark the rain fly better as it is very confusing how to put it on when you’re fighting the wind. We had to turn it 3 times while it tried to make like a parachute.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_header: Strong, but not as strong as gravity.
review_text: Amazing tent, will hold up to just about anything. Just about anything. I would not recommend letting a 200+ lb man get completely drunk and fall against the wall of the tent because you will almost certainly break one of the rods and your 200+ lb drunk fiancé will be very very sad about it in the morning. The good news is tho that the sidewall is completely secure, and we stayed completely dry in downpour without even sealing the tent ourselves. Roomy tent, very lovely, just be sure to get a big tarp because it is pretty odd shaped. Definitely worth the buy.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_text: We bought this tent for our small family of three that we hope to grow. It easily fit a queen Blow up mattress on one end, a handful of large waterproof storage boxes and our bags in the middle and our sons twin blow up on the other side. As our family grows we can easily rotate the twins to go along the “door wall” and back wall with a bucket in-between them. It rained for 18 hours our first usage. We did get a little bit of water in the tent but only where the mattress was touching the green part of the wall (user error) our tent was the only tent that did not have a stream running through it. The bathtub style walls did their job. The door was a little wonky and I wish the “door mat” was larger but the tent itself is great. Highly recommend.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
review_header: Great tent for a Family of 5 with lots of gear!
review_text: Good Tent. Used it 3 weeks ago. I slept 5. Me, my wife and my 3 boys during a cub scout campout. I had a Queen size air bed and a full size airbed on either end of the tent and still had what seemed like 6 feet of space in between, which I used to set up a 3'x3' roll table and store my gear. The door is very convenient. It can be tricky to get the velcro to lineup, but not a big deal at all. What I really like about the door is the design. I had zipper issues with a previous tent, because of the tension put on the door. This tent zips very easily, and I can see it lasting much longer!! I got a lot of compliments from the other dads too, which is always a plus ;)

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_text: I bought this tent for a cross country trip. After looking at the size, it now is obvious that we will have to have a large campsite, where the ground is soft enough to drive stakes. The stakes need to be driven to set this tent up, it does not support itself, nor can you set up without the stakes. It measure approx 10' long x 6-7' wide. So once up, it is big. Definitely at least a two man operation to set this up, and I would think maybe 20-30 minutes, once you've figured it out.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_header: Loved it. Took it on our camping trip to ...
review_text: Loved it. Took it on our camping trip to Arkansas, in mid July. Needless to say, it was HOT and humid. Let me get the bad out of the way, as there really wasn't much to complain about. CON- Not a lot of ventilation. That was most noticeable in the hot and sticky weather we camped in. The roof is complety netted, and the sides have about 18" domed windows, but it just wasnt enough to allow a cross breeze. I highly recommend bringing a fan to offset that issue. Note- the tent has a power cord access hole by the door. What I loved- the space. The tent is very good size. The left and right ends of the tent fit one queen size, double thick, blow up matress on each side PERFECTLY. I slept on one side and 4 children slept on the other (vertically). We had a little over 5 feet of room in the middle, between mattresses. I am 5'8" and could stand upright very comfortably. Also, kids can reek havoc on a tent zipper so I loved the easy access door. The set up- took me about 30 mins, in the dark, all by myself. I was HOT and irritated, and probably wasn't the best scenario to put the tent up for the first time. I highly recommend staking it down before starting. A standard 2-4 person tent you can get away with not doing so, this one is defiantly not one of those. I cannot speak to how well/easy the tent fly works, as it was too hot to put on. I like how the directions are attached to the inside of the tent bag itself, so you do not have to worry about losing them for the next go around. In all, loved the tent. Poor ventilation would be my only complaint. Relatively easy set up, lots of space and an overall kid friendly design. Very much recommend!

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Lighted Tent | Size: 8-Person | Color: Blue
review_header: Waterproof in a hurricane on top of a mountain
review_text: So this review is from a long time ago. I bought this tent in 2012 and after reading several of the bad reviews on it thought I would put in my two cents. Some background- I am an Eagle Scout and have done a lot of camping. If this tent leaks its because you did not put it up properly. every thing should be tight, the rain fly should not touch the tent wall and you should have a tarp on the ground that is slightly larger than the tent with the extra curled under toward the ground so that when water runs off your tent it rolls around the tarp and to the ground. So on to the review. I bought this tent to go camping with some friends in northern Alabama. we were going camping and rock climbing on top of a mountain. while we had check the weather and saw a hurricane developing in the gulf it was supposed to head for Texas so we decided to go and have some fun. the next day we spent all day rock climbing and forgot to check the weather again. that night we noticed a storm rolling in and pulled up the weather . A cat 3 Hurricane was headed right at us. we didn't have time to leave so we prepped the best we could. that night my friends tent was leaking all over the place so they stayed in mine. There was a 12" river running under the middle of this tent. you didn't need an air mattress it was like sleeping on a waterbed. at some point in the middle of the night a small 6 in tree fell on the tent and it just brushed it off almost like nothing happened. It only broke one pole. If you put this tent up properly it is a beast. and worth the money. All tents are only limited by how good you are at setting them up. Research, Practice, Fail, and try again! Good luck and happy camping!

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_text: I was hesitant to order this after reading some negative reviews, but I’m so glad I did! We camp in the Rocky Mountains for a full month every summer. This tent endured high winds, heavy rains, hail, flooding, extreme temperatures, two border collies and two children. I used waterproofing spray on the tent (i would highly recommend this for ANY tent) before we left for the trip, and I had no problem at all with leaks. I would never recommend using the tent stakes that come with any tent, I didn’t even open the bag that came with this tent - do yourself a favor and get some heavy duty stakes. I loved being able to stand up, lots of room in this tent. I’ve been camping for 32 years, this is my favorite tent so far and cost about 1/8th of what I paid for my rei tent. Easy to set up, my 6 year old son helped me and we had it up in 15ish minutes. The door frame is genius, keeps bugs out when kids are constantly in and out. I will say that I wish Coleman made this tent in the blackout material.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_header: I am 5'11" and I can stand in the centre without bending
review_text: I love this tent. I was thinking of given it 4 stars because it had a little leak during the rain on day 1 while camping. Many persons complain about tent leaking but understand this. Which tent is really truly fully waterproof? They are water resistant up to a point. Get some water repellent spray or solution and you are good to go. After the rain I applied some Dry Guy Waterproofing Spray and voila, no more leaking when it rained again every day for the next 3 days spent camping. Since it was just me and two boys sharing the tent, it is pretty roomy so I can't really comment about accommodating 8 people. I love the extended awning at the entrance way. I can store my shoes outside without worrying about them getting wet in the event of a downpour of rain. Love the fact that I don't have to zip up the door, that swinging door worked like a charm. All in all great tent. Will be doing some more camping n December, and hopefully it stands the test yet again.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Lighted Tent | Size: 8-Person | Color: Blue
review_text: WOW, we just had a 2 week camping trip by the ocean. We go every year, but this year it rained soooo much, as in sheets of rain, absolute downpours. We had 2 nights where the site was so flooded, it felt like a water bed under the tent. And guess what, not a bit of water inside the tent! I am so happy with the floor of this tent, I am giving it 5 stars even though the door is annoying as the velcro doesn't match up and gets the zipper caught. Oh well, we were dry, that's what I care about! Also, the roll-down windows were way more helpful than I thought they would be, and the light was great! There was also plenty of room for a family of 4 with all of our crap (plus all the games we brought in since it was pouring outside!)

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Lighted Tent | Size: 8-Person | Color: Blue
review_header: The tent is easy to to set up
review_text: The tent is easy to to set up. I really only need another person for a couple of minutes to help put the poles in on the opposite side of me at the same time. Other than that, I could install myself in about 15 minutes. I love the light, doors, and retractable windows. However the best quality of this tent is that is indeed waterproof! We went camping and the forecast was possible light rain. It was a downpour with thunder. The campsite was completely drenched, however not a single rain drop got inside the tent. The bad thing is when I opened the door, we were basically in a lake! See picture. Everyone commented how amazed they were with my tent!

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_text: While this tent is quite large for our current family size (2 kids under 5 with 2 adults and 1 large dog), it is a great size to grow into. Can easily fit 3 queen size air mattresses plus gear. The downside of the tent is that it does require two knowledgeable adults to set up but it is fairly easy to do so. We have used it to camp in Denali National Park (Alaska) in the summer and it holds against the winds very well. If it weren't for the actual movement of the tent we would not have known there was wind outside. Also experienced heavy rains during the night and while our neighbors were flooded out we woke up to a nice dry and cozy tent. The actual rain fly does have condensation that can drip into the interior of the tent but it is one of the downsides of the vent. We have sprayed ours with water repellent to help the water flow down the rain fly faster and not pool at the top. Another downside is if you have a toddler the door is quite difficult for them to step over as it is higher. Not a big deal since you will most likely be assisting with taking off shoes anyway. The cover is AMAZING for keeping shoes dry; would not recommend sitting with camp chair as legs would most likely get soaked. Overall, would highly recommend this tent to others.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_header: Great Tent. Spacious and well-made. Stays dry.
review_text: I've had this tent for 8 years. We go on an annual camping trip for a week with other families and usually experience 2-3 days of rain. Several of the others have REI tents. Which always end up wet inside. (So now they set up tarps over them). This tent has NEVER leaked. The only time anything was ever wet, was when a sleeping bag it was pushed up against the side, and the water seeped in that way from touching it. A family of four with air mattresses (2 twins and a queen or 4 twins) can fit comfortably with space for luggage as well. There is a hook on top for hanging a tent light, and two hanging storage pockets (to hold your water bottles and flashlights for easy reach). The unique door flap is great. My only complaint is that it takes longer to set up than the dome style tents and only works if you stake it. It's not suitable for places where you can't stake it into the ground.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_header: Huge and Roomy, Kept the rain out
review_text: This tent served its purpose well for a week long camping trip, and I expect many more. We did get rained on twice, but not a drop inside. It is super larger. My daughter slept on one side on a twin air mattress and I slept on the other on a queen air mattress. Definitely enough rooms for mom/dad and 3 young kids...or maybe 3 - 4 friends. There was still a nice area in the middle for clothes, food, and a place we played games while it rained. Because of everything between us it felt like we each had our own bedroom in there. I suggest setting up once before its needed and used. This is also when I sprayed water sealant and gave it time to dry/air out. Partially stake the 4 corners before putting the poles in and trying to erect it. We did fumble a tad on the 1st setup, but for the 2nd, my 8 yr old daughter and I quickly set up and it was getting dark when we started/completely dark by the time the poles started going in. We did it with only flashlights, and it still only took 20 minutes including staking the ropes etc., and remember, with an 8 yr old! It's a bit on the heavy side, but that doesn't matter for campgrounds. My biggest complaint is that there are only 2 pockets on the inside. Also, the unzipping and zipping of the door every time you go in and out gets old fast, but that is true for most tents. I thought I may regret only having 2 windows + door/door window for a breeze, but it was fine and allowed the breeze in. Overall, I'm happy with the tent for my specific needs. Note: I did spray the tent with a rain sealant before it got actual use. I plan on spraying one more coat to be safe.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_text: I was shopping around for a good tent, for a good deal. I came across the Coleman Montana 8 Tent, and as I always do before I purchase an item, I read the lowest rated reviews to see what could be potentially wrong with this item. it seemed that the biggest complaint is that the rain fly doesn't keep rain off and that the floor of the tent ripped easily. Other than that, there were great reviews for this tent, notably, that it was roomie on the inside, which was a feature I was really looking for- as I hate being crammed into a little tent and waking up with my sleeping bag feeling damp from the morning dew. Anyway, it was 50% off so i figured, what the heck? so i bought it. I must say I was very impressed. i had read a review that said it could fit 3 queen size air mattresses inside, which was not a lie. The width of the tent is litterally 3 queen size air mattresses long. the middle of the tent is tall as well, both myself at 6'0 and my boyfriend at 6'5 are able to stand up in the middle of the tent. The rain fly is pretty cool, because it gives you coverage when you first walk out of the tent and adds an overall asthetic look to the tent. however, as every seasoned camper knows, you will need to add a tarp over the tent if you happen to get caught camping in heavy rain. This brings me to the floor. The reviews were that the floor can easily rip. Yes it can-just like any other tent's floor can rip if you don't lay a tarp down before you pitch a tent. Every seasoned camper knows to do this. So overall, I have to say I am very pleased with this tent and would defiantly recommend it to anyone.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
review_header: It's BIG and nice, but no separate area for taking shoes off and on...
review_text: So, we have 4 kids (10, 7, two 4 year olds), my husband and myself. They were able to comfortably camp in there w/ 3-4 cots. I do think that 3 queen blow up mattresses could fit, but you would not have much room to walk around. It was bigger than expected, and if you have 6 people, an 8 man, or even 10 person tent is the way to go. There is no front porch area to place your shoes out of the weather. It is pretty easy set up, just follow the steps attached in the tent bag, and it has good ventilation. I can't speak to if it is weather proof, but has good water resistance, and did well in the Nevada wind (albeit it was not high winds that they camped in).

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_header: This is a good value tent
review_text: This is a good value tent. This tent is easy to setup, light for car camping, and works well as a 3-season tent. I tested this tend in the Sequoias and beach camping. In both tests, I was able to proper ventilation for warm days and cold night in the mountains. It also handled 20-30 mile an hour (constant) gusts on the beach where I was able to keep things cool in the days and warm and dry at night. After utilizing the tie downs properly, this tent really held it's own in the wind, which I have not ben able to test often. I was impressed. Overall, the cost and quality you get, you can't beat. I would highly recommend this product.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_text: This tent is lightweight and goes up in just 20 minutes with 2 people. It's spacious inside. It's advertised as an 8 person tent, but it's just me and my husband. We fit a queen size air mattress on one side and it takes up just a little less than half of the inside area. I would say you could comfortably fit two queen air mattresses with a little space in between. The air ventilation worked well and helped keep it cool at night. The door is a nice feature. I like that the door is rigid and doesn't just flop open, but the velcro closures didn't match up so we have to zip and unzip every time, but at least that really helps cut down on the bugs inside the tent. We got a little rain one night and everything held up just fine and there were no leaks.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Lighted Tent | Size: 8-Person | Color: Blue
review_header: Perfect for our family of 4 and dog
review_text: Very spacious tent for a family of 4, plus a dog. The overhead light and the self rollup window flaps are both great. It came a pretty good downpour the first night we camped in it and we didn't have any leaks. However, like most normal individuals we did have a tarp covering the top of the tent and one on the ground under the tent to prevent any possible leaks that could have occurred. My only complaint is that the zipper compartment that houses the pole for door frame is directly beside the actual zipper that opens and closes the door. I found myself unzipping the pole for the door frame twice in the dark while unzipping/opening the door. I'll probably just put some tape or something over zipper to prevent this in the future.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
review_text: Had our 1st experience with our tent this last weekend. We were at the North Shore of MN. Temps in the 40’s overnight and 60 during the day. We set up in the dark, so we were thankful we had done a “trial run” the week before. Took us about 30 min to set up and get our stuff in it. Woke up to rain. Not a drop inside after a pretty good storm went through. It was windy for both days and it handled it like a champ! We had 2 XL cots, 2 toddler cots and and old style fold up cot with mat. With plenty of space to still move around and get dressed! For a family of 5, it worked great. As the kids get bigger we may need an upgrade, but it will be great for quite awhile! Take down wasn’t too bad, especially since on our trial run we marked the folds with a black permanent marker as we unfolded it. It’s on the bottom, so never seen, but a huge help in putting it all back!!! It was still windy at take down, so it took 2 of us. One to hold and one to fold. Very happy with this tent. In the sunlight it warmed up nicely with the fly on and windows shut. It was easy to wipe down when my son threw up in it, curse our luck! Only suggestion, don’t actually stake it down right away. Hard to get all the poles attached if you do.

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: Tent | Size: 16 x 7 | Color: Green
review_text: This tent is beyond water resistant. It has been up for over 5 weeks in Florida summer weather. Daily rain and wind and not any damage or wetness inside the tent. The rain cover has done its job. The only reason we are taking it down is because of the tropical storm Elsa hitting our area tomorrow. The ease of putting it up and the rain cover with 2 people was very easy. More than enough room for our family of four (sleeping only). It is light weight and obviously weatherproof. The only thing we did differ this bought heavy duty stakes for securing it into the ground. We didn’t even utilize the strings on the rain cover!

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
review_header: Survived a major thunderstorm and stayed perfectly dry!
review_text: I bought this tent for my family of four. My wife and I used it for the first time this weekend for a tubing trip without the kids. The two of us set it up in about 10 minutes for the first time and we didn't even fight once! The instructions were written well. I did buy some 10" metal tent stakes to replace the stakes that came with the tent based on other reviews. The temps were in the 90s and I was worried about ventilation because there are small windows in this tent, but the mesh roof seemed to allow adequate ventilation, and we slept fine with our battery operated fans. Our second night we had major thunderstorms. The tent performed exceptionally well under high winds and sideways rain! We did have to close the side windows, but we were able to keep the screen on the door open because the overhang on the rain fly kept rain out. We got 2.5" of rain in a couple of hours and not a drop inside. I did lay a tarp under the tent and I had water between the tarp and the tent floor, but absolutely no water on the tent floor. We used a queen air mattress and it fit perfectly with room to spare on the sides. When we camp with the kids we will put another queen mattress on the other side and still have room for bags and gear in the center. I uploaded a pic of the tent without the rain fly because most stock photos on the web don't show the tent without the fly. I love this tent!

product_title: Coleman 8-Person Tent for Camping | Elite Montana Tent with Easy Setup
review_text: As an adult who has just recently returned to the world of camping (I am a leader in my son's cub scout pack), I looked at LOTS of tent options before choosing the Coleman Montana 8 person tent. I checked out reviews on Amazon and CampMor, and talked to as many camping enthusiast friends as I could. My first year in scouting, I borrowed a Eureka 2-person tent from our local boy scout troop, which came up to (maybe) my waist, and just barely fit my full-sized air mattress.
