This simply means people were complaining about the same issues with the Japanese as with the current white logo models from China. 2) Items like this are mass produced on a production line in the tens of thousands. Occasionally defects find their way into an item, even products from leading manufacturers made in the US. It doesn’t mean the product is junk. It can simply mean you were unlucky enough to get one with a manufacturing defect. 3) Most factual - at any point in time there are typically 4 or more third party sellers on Amazon selling this very same item. Some of the sellers are selling fake products. You can get ripped off. Your best bet is to only buy products like this when the item says “Sold and Shipped by Amazon” If you buy something Sold and Shipped by Amazon, returns and refunds are easy and painless. If you buy a knockoff from a third party vendoryou have to work with them, not Amazon, and may have to pay return shipping and or restocking fees and if lucky get your money back FACT: The genuine current production models from Bushnell are manufactured in China and ship with the Logo printed in White/Silver paint. The logo has a “slightly” raised finish you can feel. Do yourself a favor and look at all the other photos in the Amazon listing, as well as all the images in the advertisement below the listing. You will see ALL the photos show the Bushnell Logo in white/silver. Its only the top photo in the Amazon listing that is incorrect since it shows the old original yellow/gold version. FAIR WARNING: This Red Dot Sight has been around for a long time and is very is popular. As a result there are plenty of fake knockoffs on both Amazon and eBay. Further confusing the matter, the crooks making the fake knockoffs are smart and are aware of the lottery rumors and the hopes people have on finding “new old stock” with the Yellow/Gold logo. As a result the crooks are making fakes units with the yellow gold logo. Today you can buy fake knockoffs with the yellow/gold logo just like the original Japanese model. Don’t fall for it. Today's genuine TRS-25 made under license by Bushnell have the larger Bushnell in white/silver. (see attached photo) TIP: Check out the YouTube video with the Title: REAL VS FAKE Bushnell TRS-25 Trophy Red Dot Sights In addition to the Real vs Fake video , upon inspection of the lenses... one end should appear to be clear glass and the other lens should have a vivid red/orange tint. Lenses on “some” of the knockoffs have green finish or tint. Its a pretty iridescent green , but fake nonetheless. Also be aware some fakes have the red/orange lens so don't use that for an indicator alone. Shop carefully. Better yet ,only buy if it says Sold and Shipped by Amazon Two suggestions to ease your anxiety and pain: 1) Accept the fact you will be getting the white log Chinese version. Buy the TRS-25 when the price is down. How? If you bother to watch the TRS-25 over an extended period of time you will see the price fluctuates anywhere from $45 to $145 (hint: check the website camelcamelcamel) If you wait and watch the TRS-25 on a regular basis you can get lucky and buy it when the price is closer to the $50 range. 2) Be vigilant. Avoid Amazon third party sellers you are unfamiliar with. Read the sellers storefront reviews. Again, your best bet if you decide to and purchase one of these… verify the one you selected and placed in your cart shows: “Sold and Shipped by Amazon”. Granted it may be a few dollars more that one being offered by a third party seller but you know it will be the genuine article Last, some owners have complained the red dot appears distorted or a blurry. This will happen if you have an astigmatism. It’s a very common eye disorder that can be corrected by Lasik or eyeglasses. If you wear prescription glasses put them on, then you will see a perfect dot. Unfortunately, as a rule, contacts typically do not correct astigmatism and the image may still look distorted. Be aware Bushnells "One year limited warranty”. Not a deal breaker, but if you ever need to send it in under warranty you will need to also include $10 to cover their return shipping back to you.

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_text: I've purchased several red dot sights below $100 and none have been able to withstand the recoil of my AK47. Once they reach the 500 round mark all have failed, even the ones that look cool and say made by veterans. None have survived! This is the ONLY sight under $100 that has survived and maintained its accuracy. I now use it on all my rifle platforms. Let's begin with the mirror finish on the lense that not only provide excellent light but reduce glare. The water proof gaskets inside every knob are made thick and very durable. The windage adjustments are tight enough so that you can use a dime and make your adjustments and never have to worry about the recoil to loosen them up. It uses the CR2032 battery and I personally have had them go much longer than a year before having to replace them. Just don't use cheap batteries, purchase a reputable brand and you will never find yourself in the woods with your red dot dead. After testing this sight on my AK47 and shooting a few thousand rounds, I have never had to make any adjustments to them. They are made extremely well and durable. Not to mention they won't fog up in adverse weather nor will they rust, the coating on these is very good. If you find my review to be of help, please click the "helpful" button below. Thanks and always be safe :)

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_header: What's not to like about this red dot.
review_text: I "discovered" this red dot sight 5 more years back when I started to shoot in the local steel competitions. I really am a casual shooter and didn't want to spend a ton of money on one of the big boys so I started to research inexpensive red dots and the best reviews kept coming up for the Bushnell Trophy Red Dot. I figured with all the great reviews where could I go wrong. When I pulled the sight from the box I really liked that it was so small. This way I could add it to my S&W 22A and it really wouldn't change the weight or balance of the gun. Sighting the dot in was a piece of cake, the adjustment knobs are tight and give a positive click when adjusting. You know when you moved it 10 "clicks". The On/Off and brightness control are also quite stiff to turn, but it does loosen up a little with use. Lets just say that any of the adjustment knobs are staying where you put them. There is no way to accidentally change any setting on this thing. Once zeroed, this dot never moves. Even after 10000 rounds, this dot has stayed zero and not needed adjustment unless I'm changing the default distance to zero (I usually keep it at 15 yrds). But of course this is a 22 and there really isn't any recoil so it shouldn't move. Let me say that I was so impressed with the sighting ability of this dot I purchased more. In addition to the 22A, I also have one attached to my S&W 15-12, Olympic Arms 9mm sporting carbine, Colt Competition 5.56 and Mossberg 500 12 ga.. That's 5 guns, thousands and thousands of rounds of various caliber and recoil and not one of these TRS-25 red dots has lost zero. They simply stay on target every time. Of course an optical sight is only as good as the optic. I haven't had any of the noted issues with distortion of the dot. Some of my sights have the emitter at the 5 o'clock position and some at the 6. I see no meaningful difference between the two. The dot is crisp and bright indoor or out, bright sun or cloudy day the when set to the proper illumination you will see the dot. The coating on the lense helps to reduce glare and the water proof/fog proof construction keep the view clear in all conditions. Note, on a long gun platform, the dot is quick to acquire and has little parallax issue. On the pistol, unless you practice, quick acquisition is not automatic but then again, I've had this issue with other dots I've placed on my pistols. For bullseye or shooting that doesn't need a fast acquisition, these are ideal but in speed steel, you will need to practice. Overall, this is the best low cost red dot sight out there. For most uses, I would put this sight up against any of the more expensive red dots and feel confident that it would perform. Photos: - S&W 22A (with gold lettering) - Colt Competition (white lettering) with UTG Magnifier.

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_header: Read the booklet and you'll be fine.
review_text: Please read the second page of the booklet that comes with the red dot. The lens is supposed to be angled to reflect the laser back towards your eye with the laser already coming at an angle inside the sight. Very easy to laser boar site with it being a green dot at 25 yards. Fits my rifles very well and stays zeroed on larger rounds like an akm with continuous follow up shots. For "optics ready" firearms, a riser is not needed, but for firearms with a fixed front sight a riser is required and a UTG mount works great. This is the newer model and it works fine. No dead spots like in other reviews. This product could do better by making the optic itself feel more durable because the initial feel of the product does feel quality, but has that chinenesium quality.

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_text: For the price this red dot is amazing. Penny for penny it is better than my Vortex and my Eotech. Zeroed at 50 yards in no time at all. Has held zero just fine over a few hundred rounds. Install could have been easier but that's really kind of nit-picking. To those complaining that they don't work -- you do realize that you have to remove the clear plastic shield that keeps the battery from making contact until the scope is ready to be used, right? Yes this isn't in the instructions but seriously, how hard is that to figure out? Could the dot be a little more crisp? Maybe. Could it be a little brighter? Maybe. But when you consider the price, what exactly are you expecting? It is bright enough to see in the bright Arizona sun and the dot is crisp enough to drill headshots at 100 yards without much trouble. If you're on a budget, buy with confidence. If you're expecting the same performance as a scope that costs hundreds more, then take a big swig of reality and save your money.

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_header: Only tried on a semi .22lr so far
review_text: Whether a knock off or not, it has worked well for me on a .22lr semi auto pistol. May try moving to a 12ga or .357 revolver in the future. Adjustments are OK though at pistol distance you really have to move them a lot to get POA POI to match up, but that’s expected. So far on a.22lr and several thousand rounds have had no issues. I like the size, not too big or not too small for range time. Worked fine enough to use to determine if I wanted to go to a red dot, liked it enough to keep it on the pistol. Moved it from my S&W 22 to a ruger MKII target pistol. Nice and compact, no big trouble to the balance of the platform I’d have to believe it would be a compliment to an AR in a 45 degree mount. I’d buy another, and probably will to put on something else.

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_header: I'd stake my life on this optic.
review_text: I've run these on several different rifles. Never had a single issue with one. They keep zero, hold up well to the recoil of even 30 cal rifles, aren't affected by rain, and stay solid on the gun. I like the variable red dot brightness and ease of adjustments. This is like a poor man's aimpoint. I'd go so far as to say that if you're on a budge, I'd even be willing to put it on a combat or duty rifle. Mine have held up through thousands of rounds, several rifle courses, and many competitions. Well worth the money and weight. Highly recommended. I am comfortable staking my life on this product.

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_header: Almost Perfect on my New Ruger PC Carbine !!!
review_text: The very low profile iron sights on the Ruger Carbine are hard for me to use so I decided to get a red dot scope. Wanted something inexpensive but reliable and compact. Looked like the TRS-25 might be the answer. And so far, it is. I've had it to the range twice and shot over 200 rounds with it at 25-50 yards. I also bought the UTG Low Profile (1/2") Riser Mount just in case the red dot still wasn't high enough for easy sighting. But the TRS-25 sits at the perfect height just above the iron sights and I didn't need the riser at all. So here are my likes and dislikes: Likes: Very compact and light (see photos) Easy on-off knob and elevation/windage adjustments Achieved my zero with only 6 shots Has held zero with no additional adjustments Good tight fit on picatinny rail Very affordable price Crisp, very bright red dot. I never needed to adjust higher than #3 (11 is the brightest) on a fairly bright, but overcast day. Uses the most common and inexpensive battery Dislikes (I'm going to have to be very picky to find any): OK, if I have to ...... The large, white Bushnell logo shows up like a bright neon advertisement sign. I think the newer model is the one with the smaller, gold toned logo like is shown on Amazon. That's the one shown on the Bushnell website too so I presume it's the newest model. But not a big deal. Overall, I'm really happy with this purchase and would recommend the sight to everyone who wants quality but doesn't want to spend hundreds.

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_text: Was a little leary about buying this with all the mixed reviews on the "new models". But for 40 bucks...what the heck. Bushnell must have listened to all the bad press, and made changes. First the emitter is in the 5oclock position, the dot was nice and bright (easily visible outside in bright snow on the 11 setting), the dot was visible everywhere in the tube (non of the reported dissappearing dot in certain parts of the tube), the clicks on the windage, elevation & brightness are very very positive. The lettering is gold on he box, but white on the unit. The glass is superb..crystal clear...with out any green that I can detect! Overall you can tell that this is a quality unit, made to last.......Way out classes it price tag. May even buy a second.....If your looking for a quality red dot optic and don't have hundreds to spend this is the one! Update: Don't worry about the white lettering...this is the 3.0 version. The original was the gold, then the hit or miss white, this version is spot on Perfect. Everything the old gold one was. VALUE VALUE Value....I'm buying a two more. Lastly..to those who are not seeing the dot as a perfect circle, oblong, or star burst. You most likely have astigmatism...either un diagnosed (this is a really well known side effect with red dot sights), or with out proper corrective lenses. I have that and when viewed with out my corrective lenses, all the dot sights look distorted. When I put them on, the dot returns to normal. Worth looking into you have problems seeing the dot correctly IMHO

product_title: Bushnell Trophy TRS-25 Red Dot Sight Riflescope, 1x20mm, Black
review_header: Everyone's an expert, but most can agree on Bushnell
review_text: Most guys and gals who have spent time shooting and training with various firearms are in their eyes experts on equipment, shooting style, ammo, optics, etc...and for each of them, their experience and opinion is correct: for them. But, you can get such a cast of colorful characters to agree on quite a few things. Most would agree, that for over 60 years, Bushnell has been an innovative leader in the optics industry. They have consistently high standards and reliable performance backed with excellent customer service and they stand by their products. Well, the Bushnell Trophy Red Dot TRS-25, in my humble opinion, is a fantastic example of Bushnell's quality, reliability, and pride they take in their products. Dollar for dollar, you will not find a more consistent, quality, functional, reliable red dot for any near their price point. So, rest assured, your getting a great product you could have paid considerably more for and still been happy. But, how does it perform? I strapped it to a Beretta ARX-100 5.56 (whose iron sights I don't particularly care for), used a laser bore sight to come close to zero at 100 yards, and sent 3 rounds downrange. The sight was pretty much zeroed for this rifle out of the box, but it only took a few clicks to set the sight dead on...only 3 rounds to zero. Well, that was a very pleasant surprise...seemed too easy. So, I rattled 100 rounds through the rifle at 25, 50, and 100 yards. The little powerhouse stayed on point. Next, I attached it to an old Remington Mohawk 66 .22 and went barreling through the bush to rough up the sight and see if it could take a rough night out. I banged into trees, got snagged by bushes, pounded across several meadows, and my rifle even fell out of it's scabbard...but, like a champ, this Bushnell held to zero and I had no issues or malfunctions. It's now bolted to my light EOTWAWKI rifle, a Kel-Tec SU16C 5.56 (keep your snickering to yourselves Kel-Tec haters ;) ). I put a lot of trust in this sight, it's battery life, durability, and performance...(and subsequently, the Kel-Tec SU16, but that's a discussion for another time). Do yourself a favor...spend the few extra dollars to upgrade from a generic Chinese red dot and snag one of these Bushnell's before they're gone...I personally am going to get a spare.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Great pillow for baby to hang out in
review_text: Our baby has loved it since birth. She hangs out in there and will nap in it if we let her. I love that it cocoons her and I don’t have to worry about her rolling out of it. It’s also easy to spot clean and to get the cover off to clean in the washing machine. I was worried about the position of her head and neck while in the pillow, especially after she was just born. We kept having to adjust her when she fell too low in the pillow. But as long as we watched her it seemed to be ok.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: This is my second and LOVE it for newborn
review_text: I discovered this with 2nd baby and wished I had found for first. Gave away to a friend with newborn soon after baby outgrew. Had to rebuy again for 3rd as love it so much! Only thing i’m a little hesitant on is it’s not organic, not sure how non toxic etc. it is but other than that I love it. Super easy to plop a newborn down propped up a little. Need to be careful if using around older (young) siblings as I stick baby on a table or high places sometimes in it and worries older brother will pull it off!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: A must have for every new parent
review_text: This pillow should be required on every single Baby Registry! I didn’t get one until my baby was 3 months old and the first day we tried it he took a three hour nap. I can’t even imagine how much easier my life would have been if I’d had it when he was a newborn. Their little tushies snuggle down on the mesh so they can’t wriggle out of it and it holds them like they’re in mom or dad’s arms. Highly recommend!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: A definite MUST for any new parent!
review_text: This is the best baby product on the market, in my opinion. I used it for my son and kept it to use as a posing pillow for newborn portraits. Every client that sees how comfy the baby is in this, immediately buys one! Not only that but, I love it so much that I buy one for every baby shower gift too! All babies love laying in this! They just look so comfy! It is super light weight and convenient to carry from room to room. My son used it daily until he was a year old. I highly recommend it!!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Nice alternative to a bouncy seat
review_text: Baby wasn't feeling the bouncer and I needed a place I could set him down when I have things to do. He likes his play gym and the carrier but I wanted an option where he could sit up and see what's going on in the room. This works well and he seems more comfortable in it. He's only a few weeks old now, hopefully it will grow with him!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: This was a lifesaver with a newborn at home. She loved it for sitting, snoozing (only while supervised of course), and playing. She cried when placed on her back or belly for the first couple of weeks, and so it was nice to have a soft, cushioned and comfortable place for her to lounge. I buy this for all my new mom friends now.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Love this product! My baby is so picky about where I place him after he falls asleep but he really enjoys being placed in this ! He hates his swing/ boppy / and crib but loves lounging in this thing. Seems super comfy for him like a hug and doesn’t cry as soon as I place home down. Longer nap times and seems happier. Also love the slight incline as he suffers from mild reflux. Great amazon buy !!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I purchased this for my baby who suffers from reflux. He was not sleeping well while flat and I didn't have a safe way to prop him up. This pillow worked well when my LO was swaddled. He couldn't really move much from the position I put him in so I felt okay with letting him sleep in it. (it's not advised but I felt it was safe enough for him after watching him in it during the day.) He slept much better in it but he is so long that it didn't take long for him to outgrow it for sleeping purposes. As soon as he got to where he could move his whole body in it, we stopped letting him sleep in it. Now it's only used while he's awake and being closely monitored.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Buy This After your baby grows out of the Boppy Pillow
review_text: Just what I needed. My baby is a week over 3 months and has pretty much outgrown the original boppy pillow. She can still fit in it, but she likes to sit up and look around and she kind of slides out of it. At this point I don't like for her to sit in the boppy pillow without me right next to her. This podster is perfect! She can sit up and see everything while being supported on all sides. She will probably be able to fit in this for 2 more months or more. The bottom can be let loose as she grows which is perfect for her to sit up at a slant. I love this thing and I'm so glad I found this. Also, the podster is a little bigger and much deeper than the boppy pillow so it won't take up much room. I've deemed this pillow as an essential item for the next stage of her life.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Love it! Wish I had purchased it sooner. I was struggling to manage my time and attention with 2 under 2. This lets me put my newborn down without him crying to attend to my toddler. I was hesitant because of the price but it’s worth every penny. I chose this one over the Boppy because it was deeper. The extra elevation has also helped with his acid reflex after eating.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: We have had it since 2018. This is our second child to use this same lounger!!! It is seriously a life saver! We used it with out 3rd child while we lived on a sailboat and with our 4th baby now that we live in a cabin. It is still soft and perfect for baby! My older kiddo slept in this till she was at least 18 months old. Now our little peanut can use it. I will say the velcro has warn out a lot, but surprisingly some how still sticks after all this time and tonnnsss of washings. I've washed the cover and the pillow itself, who-knows how many times. For an infant is truly works better to have a folded small blanket in the 'hole' for their bum. They are just too tiny at first, and I have big babies (9 lbs at birth). But shortly after you won't need to do that, and it's truly not a big deal. I thought that stretchy material in the middle would wear out super fast, but it hasn't. It definitely isn't as nice as it once was, but after 4 kiddos, 2 of which have used this exclusively, and two others jumping and playing on this pillow, I am amazed at how well it has held up. I've never personally had problems with the zipper, like I've seen on some other reviews. Ours has been fine. Like I've said, we LOVE this lounger and it is so perfect for our family!!! Would recommend over a normal horse-shoe type baby pillow ANY day! (Though you can buy this one pillow and a different cover and have two pillows in one if you wanted!)

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: We use this every single day!
review_text: We use this EVERY day! It's easy to move around the house, and our daughter loves it! It's nice to have her off the ground and in somehing that keeps her safe! We sometimes flip her on her tummy in it and let her do tummy time at an incline. The cover is easy to take off and wash and holds up to being in the washing machine! A friend recommended this product and I am glad she did! I would purchase this item again!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I love this little pillow over two years I’ve used it for two babies and they loved it and gave me much needed hands free time! I would bring it with me to friends houses and my parents house when I knew there would be no where else to lay baby down so I would have been stuck holding the baby. Not to mention it is Super cute and I definitely want one I am adult size lol

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Works great for twins with reflux
review_text: This is the perfect little lounger for my babies. I have twins who weigh less than 5 lb and needed something to help prop them up while I give them bottles and a way to keep them elevated after feeds for their reflux. I was looking at ordering a table for two but it was way too expensive and cumbersome. The podster works just as well and is much more convenient and versatile. Right now I have them sitting in it backwards because they are so small.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: We have these in my classroom but they are nowhere near this quality. The inner pillow we have in our classroom does not have a protective cotton covering like this one does so I will not have to combat the pilling on my baby's pillow. I also love that the cover has a zipper. The ones I have in my classroom are held together with a single strip of velcro and are always falling open. This pillow will not be subject to the same destruction and not have to be constantly put back together. This particular pillow seems to be of a higher quality more on par with a boppy. Highly recommend this pillow as it can also be used well after baby is grown into toddlerhood.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Loved this so much that I bought one as a gift for a baby shower. What swayed me on this one vs other competitors was that you can unzip the outer shell and machine wash it. Got the gray which was very gender neutral. My baby has used it since birth (with supervision) and he loves it. I use it when I'm folding laundry or just need him to hang out. Super soft too!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Wish we had ordered one sooner!
review_text: We lug this thing around everywhere and wish we had it since day one! I exclusively pump, so it’s been a lifesaver when it comes to pumping and having the baby around. He just chills out in his little nest next to me while I pump. He takes naps in it, sits in it so he can see what’s going on, it’s perfect for me to prop him in to read to him. We really do take it pretty much everywhere we go. I’m sad he’s starting to outgrow it!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: This is better than a boppy lounger. It allows my twins to sit deeper in the seat and therefore more securely. Additionally the cover comes off and can be washed unlike the boppy lounger which we have to do frequently. My son has a heart issue and needed to be in an upright/reclined position and this did the trick! It is so imbedded and easy that we don't leave home without it when we travel to visit family and friends. With all items like this children shouldn't be left unattended!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Alot of my pregnant friends who I've bought this for tell me this gift has been the best gift they have recieved out of all thei
review_text: I've bought this item numerous times. This item is the number one item that most mothers use out of any item that alot of people buy. Alot of mothers at first dont think this item os so important until they find this item is the most item they find that they use out of every item their friends buy them. Alot of my pregnant friends who I've bought this for tell me this gift has been the best gift they have recieved out of all their friends gifts, and It makes me so happy to know i purchased such a functional gift for them that lasts a long time

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: LOVE THIS PILLOW!! It's A Must Have
review_text: My daughter uses this pillow to sleep through the night in her bassinet and for naps. I know babies are not suppose to sleep in the pillow but we use it and it works great. My 3 month old actually sleeps through the night and I am thankful she gets a goods night rest in her pillow

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Update: this pod has now been through 3 babies. I have passed it on to my friends and their babies love it just as much as mine did. I now buy this for baby showers as I feel every parent should own one. It’s so easy to grab and throw into the car when visiting others. My 8 week old loves this. She weighs almost 13 lbs and fits perfectly. Not sure how long she will last but worth it!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Second one I've owned...they are awesome!
review_text: The first one I bought was for my first granddaughter who spent the first 105 days of her life in the NICU, it was soft, gave her comfort, and and supported her over those long hospital days....I have used it for our second granddaughter, and now, I ordered one a bit bigger to support our third granddaughter who was born at 9#6oz, and 21 inches long....she's a bigger baby and much longer and this one supports her fantastically!! Really recommend this, gives babies comfortable feeling like being hugged and helps keep them calm!!!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I ordered this for my infant who has SEVERE reflux issues. I couldn't find anything to help make him comfortable. I used Boppy pillows for my two older kids, but my third baby was so little that the Boppy just wasn't helpful. I wanted something that would almost wrap around him as if he were being held. I wanted to be able to lay him down after he ate and not hold him all the time, but if he laid flat, he would scream. I mean, he would scream even up to an hour after he ate. Did I mention I have two older kids and can't hold my infant ALL the time? The angle and the comfort of this pillow combined to give me some much needed relief. He really loves this pillow! His reflux issues are better, but now we use the pillow for a multitude of other reasons. He can't sit on his own yet because he's still only 3 months, but loves to sit in his pillow to see what is going on around him. I love to put him in the bedroom if I'm getting dressed, in the kids's rooms if I'm making beds, in the kitchen if I'm cooking...this pillow is super mobile! I would HIGHLY recommend this pillow to anyone, not just to a parent of a reflux baby.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Literally the BEST purchase I have made
review_text: Literally the best purchase I’ve made for our newborn. Wish I had had it for our first little one. From the day we came home from the hospital, she’s been taking all naps in this and sleeping in it at night time as well. I feel like this product has allowed for the baby to start off on the right foot in terms of the baby sleeping independently right from the start. This cradles her, so she sleeps soundly. (Note that we also use a baby blanket to swaddle her while she is sleeping in the Podster as well.) You can put it right in a pack & play (with the bottom elevated up), next to your bed for co-sleeping in the same room. Then when baby is ready for the crib, if they have not outgrown this yet, you can easily move this into the crib with them for an easy transition. Personally, My plan is to use the Podster until the baby has outgrown it, and then transition to the Dock-a-Tot.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: cannot imagine newborn life without one
review_text: recommended by an experienced mom. as soon as it arrived on my doorstep, my newborn baby has loved being in it throughout the day and night. I am going to be sad when he grows out of it. It hugs him so well and it helps me avoid spitting up (which he does often when he is laying flat in his bassinet). cannot imagine my new mom life without it. planning on bringing it with us when we travel to see family.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: My baby used this, on the couch, from birth to when she started trying to roll over. I used it to keep her head up after feedings and sometimes, for quick naps. I still use it but, for safety reasons, it stays in her play pen ON the floor. She’s 4 months and is able to slide off of it on her own. Machine washable!!!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: This is a great baby item.
review_text: I think this has to be the best product to by for a newborn. I had nothing to put my granddaughter in when she came to visit. I researched and found this podster. I had never heard of it before but once I read the reviews I was sold. I am not disappointed. I love it so much I’ve recommended it to a few different people and they have since bought them and love it too. My son and daughter in law love it so much they brought it to their house. My granddaughter is now 2 months old and still uses it and loves it to. It’s so well made and soft too. I’ll definitely buy it again for any one having a baby.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Excellent buy, one of our most used baby items.
review_text: Both sons loved this pillow and 2 year old will still lay on it to this day. Very useful as a feeding pillow and safe space for baby to hang out. Both my sons overheated easily and would get too hot if I tried to hold or cradle them during bottle feedings. My oldest is autistic and never liked being held, period. If I tried to snuggle with him, even as a newborn, he would arch his back and cry until he was put down. This helped him to still be comfortable and secure while also providing some airflow to his backside to avoid sweating. Something to consider: Please make sure you pay attention to your babies head shape on a regular basis and alter the amount of time spent on this pillow accordingly if a flat spot or other issue presents itself. As long as you are encouraging enough tummy time and not allowing them to lay in one spot for too long, all should be well. Because of our sons hatred of being held, among other issues, we allowed him to stay laying on this pillow more often than we should have. He never slept on it, as that is not recommended or safe, but he spent a lot of his awake time in it. After several months we did note a change in his head shape and worked with his pediatrician to help correct the issue. In hindsight had we made him do more tummy time and moved him more often this could have been avoided all together. Our sons situation wasn't caused by pillow, but rather our actions and excessive reliance on it. Just thought it was worth noting so others can be aware of the consequences of overusing a product such as this one.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Best sleep yet for my newborn (and for me!).
review_text: Used this thing for the first time last night with my 2.5-week old and it is the best sleep I’ve gotten since having him! He unfortunately refuses to sleep on flat mattresses (crib or bassinet) and would ONLY sleep in my arms, on my chest, or in his swing. None of those things are ideal (or very safe) when you are dealing with a nursing newborn and a VERY sleep deprived momma. Little guy had previously been waking up every 1-2 hours (I believe 3 hours was the longest stretch) to nurse or just to fuss. With this thing I actually got two 5-hour sleeps from him! *mind blown* Would highly recommend for new mommas who have fussy babies!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I just purchased this at the recommendation of my friend who has a 6 month old baby that was premature and has severe acid reflux. Her baby has been sleeping in this lounger for months. Fastforward to my 7 week old who will only sleep in bed cuddled up to me. I barely sleep because I dont want to roll on her and my back is breaking from being tensed in odd positions. But what do I do? She will not sleep in the bassinet, crib, pack n play or even the cosleeper. I have spent hundreds of dollars on sleep items. So here we are and I skeptically bought this lounger. My daughter loves this! She quietly had let me lay her right down in it. She has less gas after her feedings and she is sleeping right now while I am awake in shock and disbelief. My only regret is that I didnt buy this sooner!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Still using them daily at 19 months
review_text: Our twins used these in the newborn stage for naps (even though you're not supposed to) and feeding. We used them constantly. At about 6 months the twins seemed done with them and we put them away BUT I brought them back out on a whim when they were about 11 months old and now we are using them again daily. The girls are 19 months now. They use them to lie in when they are drinking their sippies. They wash great and are great. Highly recommended.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Just purchased this for my newborn Granddaughter and we’re in love with it. She’s a month old and wants to be held constantly. Put her in this and she went right off to sleep. We tried everything baby swing, bouncer etc..Nothing has worked like this !!!! So glad someone told me about it.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I’m so glad I got this pillow. My baby has reflux and I’m exclusively pumping. While I pump I’m stuck and it’s hard to tend to her which is super frustrating, but now I can jus put her next to me and I can at least comfort her and distract her with a toy when she fusses. Also the angle is nice for her reflux - less spit up after feeding. It’s also easy to clean with the removable cover. I also love the fact that it’s expandable. Highly recommended.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Makes my life as a new parent easier!
review_text: Needed a place to put my 5 week old infant after feeding that wouldn’t make him spit up— this is perfect because it has an incline and is supportive. So happy I purchased this— I now can place him on the pillow while I do chores around the house. It is easy to transport him in this so I can take him from room to room to keep an eye on him.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Love it! Especially great for Reflux babies
review_text: I love this pod and so does my daughter. I just wish I had known about it when she was born. She is almost 4 months now so she's towards the end range for usage. We had been struggling to find a comfortable position for her to rest while not in our arms. My daughter has reflux need I say more. We have also found it a great position for her to do tummy time in. Although she's not a great fan of laying on her tum when we do it in the pod she is much happier and can go for longer before having a total melt down. I think this is one ~ position, when on their forearms they are much higher up, so much easier for them to see toys on the ground and your face when you get down with them. Two ~ they can dig their feet into the opposite end of the pod and this looks like it gives them a bit more support than just their arms. I wouldn't leave her on her own in this position though as she could at any point push her self off or roll, but while I am their with her I have found it fantastic for tummy time. For lounging again it's a god send. She will happily sit in it and watch my older son play or look at and grab her toys while I sit in front of her. The green colour is lovely and gender neutral. A washable cover is for me an essential for me. (This is one reason I skipped straight over the Boppy Newborn Lounger). The padding is sufficient to provide good support without being overstuffed. I think the quality is great, I can't fault this product. I will be purchasing another to give as baby gift.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I love the incline on this lounger compared to the other one on the market. My baby happily sits in this a lot during the day. The only thing I do t like I’d the fabric in the seat of it. It stains SO easily and it would be nice if it were stain resistant.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: This is a must have item in my opinion. I initially thought I wouldn't use it that much because I have a boppy but I have used this way more than that. I bought it for my newborn son and he's now 4 months old and about 14 pounds and I still use it every day. It's great to put on the couch for baby to sit and relax with us or take a nap. I set it on the floor or in the pack and play when I need to do stuff around the house. It's easily portable and I bring it to my friends and family's homes. Well made, durable, easy to throw the cover in the wash. It's an item I didn't think of but now can't imagine not having it.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: BEST baby item we have ever bought
review_text: This is the BEST item we have ever purchased for our baby. He sleeps every night in it and has never once seemed uncomfortable. Easy set down if you’re alone and need to put the baby down. Very easy to clean the cover. Lightweight and easy to transport. He LOVES this pillow so much we decided to give one as a gift to a family member with a recent birth. They have reiterated everything I have said, they swear by it. BUY BUY BUY you won’t regret it.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: Very pleased with this little cushion
review_text: I actually really love this cute little lounger. I wasn’t sure what to expect or what this really was when I ordered it but I had read good things about it. I was so surprised. It’s very good quality and really cute. I got the green polka dots (for my son) because it was the cheapest color but surprisingly I really love the color, it’s very fresh and soothing feeling. I’m just really pleased. So many times I’ve gone out on a limb to take a chance on something only to be disappointed but this was the opposite, I was pleasantly surprised and my son LOVES it. 👍

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: This lounger is AMAZING! I was using a boppy with a blanket but my son would slide down and I would have to re-adjust him and would wake him by doing so. This thing honestly is a life saver, he has acid reflux so we have to sit him upright after feedings and I have him sleep next to me because of it waking him up if he lays flat and gagging on spit up. It is high enough for there not to be an issue with any chance of rolling over on him. And it doesn't make his head go into his chest so he gets good airflow when napping on it. Definitely worth the price. I couldn't be more happy with it !

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_header: This was hands down my favorite baby item!
review_text: I dont know what I would do without this. Great for newborns and still using it at 5mos to foster an ab work out to make baby learn to sit! My baby slept in it until he started to learn to turn. (We knew he was safe because as a newborn he couldnt turn in thisnoroduct due to the hugging sifes of the pillow shape like a doc a tot. If it wasnt for this, we wouldnt have coslept for the 1st couple of months! What a precious time it was.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Received this as a gift and since I had a Boppy I didn’t think I would use it, but boy was I wrong! I use this all day! It is such a perfect spot to safely place baby. It is supportive and baby doesn’t hunch over like they do in the boppy. The directions say not to take naps in it, but my baby takes supervised naps in it and cannot yet roll. Once baby is done with it my cat will happily keep it. The cover easily comes off. My only suggestion would be that they make a waterproof liner option like the boppy has to put between pillow and cover bc my baby is a puker!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Couldn't say enough great things about this purchase. It has saved us so much. This insert pillow allows you to fold up and compress the baby (like a little taco) when rocking them down for a little nap. It gives the baby a sense and feeling like you are holding them one you put them down. You just need to have a pillow or blanket to hold your desired position. I have 3 friends who have now purchased this since I introduced them to the lounger and they are all obsessed. We all spent so much more money on other loungers and the newest ones on the market and this one by far is our favorite!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I love this pillow for my daughter and she loves it, too. It makes her think she’s being held. I try to place her in her bassinet for naps, but she’ll wake up. With this, I can lay her in it and she stays asleep. Only thing is, make sure you supervise if your baby naps in it since back is best to prevent SIDS.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: When it arrived I took it out of the box, took the cover off, and washed and dried it. No shrinkage!! I put my newborn in it, she was too small. It swallowed her. But, after I put a small travel pillow in the middle in the center to lift her butt it became her favorite place! Now that she has grown into it. She falls asleep it!! It’s like her baby recliner!! I love it!!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I didn’t really think we would get much use out of this; I put it on my registry on an impulse. I’m so glad I did because this is my daughter’s favorite place to hang out! She prefers this over her swing and her bouncer. It snuggles her securely and I love the green dot print. Our only problem with it is that our dog is jealous and keeps sneaking onto it when the baby isn’t using it! Luckily it spot cleans well because he drools...

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Fantastic seat for baby. When I first sat my daughter in this seat, she cried and did not like being sat here. After a couple of test attempts, she came around and sat happily in the chair and it gave me a break from holding her all the time. My daughter is now five months and can slide out of this seat, so I will need to look for something to keep her steady. My two year old neighbor comes over and she loves to lounge in this seat and watch television so I will hold onto this for when my baby gets a bit older. It is a great product and I have told many moms about how cozy this pillow is.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Definitely one of my favorite baby purchases honestly. I love it. My baby loves it. She just chills in it a lot and when she's fussy I put her in it on my lap and rock her in it and she calms down. Prior to buying it i was laying her on a pillow and rocking that but it was unstable and my boppy she would slouch down in. She's 2 months old now and its been great. I definitely recommend it. Its a bit pricey but its held up being lugged around everywhere and used daily. I'm only a bit worried about when I need to wash it and having to try to stuff the pillow back into the sleeve. But I'm sure it will be fine.

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: Better than a boppie!! Should have purchased this before the other brand. Our granddaughter, just 3 months old loves it and appears to be more comfortable in this one. The green color is beautiful, it’s well made and, most important to me, ADJUSTABLE!!!!!! I love that With the Velcro tabs at the bottom, I can really make her comfy cozy!! For me it’s a winner!!!

product_title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
review_text: I LOVE THIS THING! I have 5 baby items I've bought that I'm always so thankful for and this is one of them. I don't care how people feel about it, but, we had our newborn sleeping in this in bed with us. It's great, because it's impossible to roll over on and it props their head up so you don't have to worry about them barfing and choking. The cover is super easy to wash and doesn't fade, looks as new as the day I bought it. It's so comfortable, that my husband and I both use the sides of it as a pillow while our newborn sleeps in it and it just feels so nice to be so close and comfy at night. It's awesome for just sitting them in it while you're doing stuff around the house too, young babies CAN'T roll out of it and makes for a great feeding pillow.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: BaByliss has been my favorite flat iron so I decided to get the curling iron. I have super thick, tight, curly hair that tends to be frizzy and unmanageable at times. After using this curing iron the first time (first flat ironing my hair), I was in a hurry to get to my event and forgot to spray hairspray in to keep the hold. As it turned out, I didn’t need to put any hairspray in as the curls stayed all night!! I’ve had this curing iron for a few months and I no longer use hairspray to keep the hold. I highly recommend this product and have several friends who have purchased it after my talks with them and them seeing how it makes my crazy hair look so pretty!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I had been using cheap curling irons from the drugstore and wondering why my curls always fall. My hairdresser recommended this curling iron and I was immediately in love with it. I feel like it heats up faster and gets hotter, making my curls hold well and cutting styling time in half.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I wear long hair extensions so needed a curling iron that could handle that much hair and hold the curl. This is it ladies! This gets way hotter than anything I own . Be careful not to touch it accidentally! I usually use a 1.5 but ordered the 1.25 so that may be helping as well with the curl. I might even get another one in the larger size. Super glad I bought this!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: This curling iron is amazing! The babyliss brand is just a great brand all around. My original shipment was lost by usps. I called the seller and they quickly turned around and sent me another one within a couple of days of reporting it. Although I was upset at usps for losing my first order I was very impressed with the seller for sending me one so fast! love how it curls my hair and curls last long. Definitely recommend!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: Works so great. Perfect size curl. Watch a video on YouTube And leave the ends out, it makes a perfect loose beach wave. Curls are even still good on day 2 with a little dry shampoo at the root and a soft brushing. Gets very hot so be careful.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: It's just the right size for loose waves, I was a little wary because of the reviews but I bought it after seeing that this is the curling iron they use at the Habit Salon in Arizona (look them up they are famous for their extensions and hairstyles with the long loose waves). I'm so glad I did. It heats up really fast and it gets hotter than my other curling irons. I recommend starting at the lowest heat setting and going hotter slowly to see how your hair can handle it. I have blonde highlighted hair and my hair can usually take a lot of heat because it's thick but on this iron I only have to turn it to 25 out of 50 and that is more than enough heat for my hair to retain really nice curls or waves. If I would have started out at 50 right away I would have fried my hair. I once heard the saying - You cook a Pizza at 450.. you don't curl your hair at 450- I think that is totally accurate. Some people go way to high on the temps for their hair type and that's why you read these comments about how they fried their hair the first time they use a new curling iron. Definitely recommend this curling iron though. My husband only ever likes it when I straighten my hair, but now with this curling iron he prefers the loose waves I can create over the straight - which is a nice change. ;)

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I love Babyliss curling irons. They heat quickly and you can control the heat with the dial. My hair grazes my shoulders and the 1.25 is the perfect size to give me great curls. I can do actual curls or loose beachy waves with it. I also have a larger barrel Babyliss, which doesn't get used as much, but is also fuctional on my shorter hair. I've had the irons for a couple of years and they are still great and - best of all - there is virtually no product build up on them!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: This curling iron is amazing! I’m a total spaz & not an expert at all but this thing makes my hair look great! I was using an old curling iron and did not realize how terrible it was until I tried this. Gives me a beautiful wave that lasts for days. It’s unbelievable. My hair stays in the clamp while I turn it to Curl and slides right out easily. Heat adjustment is great and overall it’s amazing!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: This is literally THE BEST curler I have ever used. Why I waited so long to purchase this ...I don’t know. No more Walmart Revlon, Conair crap for me ! I have very fine hair that does NOT like to curl. This curls my hair beautifully in no time !!! And it lasts all day ! I didn’t know that could happen !!!! Highly recommend for hard to curl hair !!!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: Great product! I didn't leave too long so I ...
review_text: Great product ! I didn't leave too long so I could get a more relax curl...

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: One of my favorite so far! I have very fine hair and other curling irons (I've tried Solano, Conair, Hot Tools etc.) are harder to hold on to and pull my hair out. This one is user friendly and does not burn my fine hair. I will say thought that you have to watch the inside as when the ceramic coating wears off you it will start burning your hair.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: Worked well on my fine, straight hair
review_text: I have very straight, very fine hair and this curled it well! I used it for my wedding and while the curls loosened, they stayed in all day. I used a low setting (less than 10) because I was worried about damaging my hair so it might hold longer if used on a higher setting. It definitely takes time and isn't the easiest to use but I was quite happy with the results. I would overall recommend this curling iron.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I have never been able to use a curling iron. I've bought so many and thrown them away over the years. My hairdresser has always been able to use one on my hair, naturally, so I had her show me what brand she uses and how to use it. I immediately came home and ordered this, and WOW - I love it!!!! Loved it so much I immediately ordered another one in a different size so I can have a choice of smooth lift, or curlier. Highly recommend this!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: BEST CURLING IRON I’VE EVER OWNED!!!!!
review_text: Love this curling iron! I had my eye on this one for some time. I ordered from kohls and got the wrong size but didn’t want to reorder from there because the shipping wasn’t fast enough. So I found it on here. I started by reading the reviews first and seen that it had burnt off some of the ladies hair. I usually like to see for myself so I purchased it. Of course I was a little scared lol but my hair stylist suggested this curling iron and I was so anxious to try it. I started with a low temp worked my way up. I kept setting the temp higher and higher till it was as hot as it could get. I had no problems with it! It made my hair nice and smooth compared to my other curling iron and curled beautifully! It’s actually the best curling iron I have ever owned! So happy with my purchase!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I have not had a curling iron in years, I normally braid my hair or use a flat iron for my natural hair. After researching the top curling irons for Black hair (mine is semi-fine), BaByliss Pro Nano was #1. I read the Amazon reviews and the only one that stood out was from BLACK woman, all the rest made no sense to me. The curling iron does not pull my hair (hair slides right off) and the variety of heat temps are great. For my hair, there is no need to use the boost however with the boost, it gets 'super' hot. The tip is great, keeps me from burning my fingers. Personally I am VERY SATISFIED. My suggestion, know the texture of your hair before purchasing. If you read the reviews, take them with a grain of salt and again know your hair texture. Oh remember to unplug the curling iron!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I give this Babyliss Pro 10 Stars!!! My Neice is a Cosmetologist and she recommended it. She has had hers for around 5 years (?) She says It will last forever. 😊👍🏽 I’m not disappointed!! My hair is thin AND FINE, and WON’T hold a curl for anything!! 😖🤦🏼‍♀️ Not anymore!! This curling iron is AMAZING! It holds my curls for a couple of days!!! Seriously, buy this now. You won’t be sorry! 😊👍🏽 I use it on either the second to the lowest setting or the next up: 7= 70 digress or 14= 140 degrees. It’s never burned my hair. Pro Tip: Do not use on WET HAIR 😉 Happy Styling!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: This curling iron was recommended to me by my hairstylist, which I think is the best thing she's ever done. I used to hate doing my hair and just settled for ponytails or looking a little frumpy rather than struggle with tools that in the past have created uneven and frizzy disasters on my head. No more! I try to be very mindful of my heat use to protect my hair, but I would uses this curling iron every single day if that wasn't the case. It creates beautiful curls and waves on both long and short hair. The temperature is easily controlled and it heats up super quickly. I recently bought a cheaper Conair curling iron for traveling, but instantly regretted it. Nothing compares to the smoothness, shine and all-day hold of the curls with a Babyliss curling iron. I think I'm going to buy a second one, I just haven't decided which size yet. Just buy it. Trust me.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: The BEST iron I have EVER used.
review_text: I read a lot of the reviews before buying this iron. People either loved it or hated it. My hair is thick, straight, and very hard to curl. This iron heats up instantly, slides through my hair with ease, and sets a perfect curl. Yes, it gets hot and you can adjust that down. Yes, the non-heated pointed tip is smaller than the usual barrel type, but I adjusted to it after only burning my fingers once! I had no issues with hair breakage, but I do not use the highest setting and only need to to curl each section for about 5 seconds to get the curl. I LOVE this iron!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: This works great. I keep it on low heat to create soft big lose curls. I’m sure I could turn it up and get stiffer more defined curls. There are some reviews saying it burns your hair off but that is user error. I don’t see any way you could burn your hair off with this.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: Exactly What I was Looking For!
review_text: The 1-1/4 barrel brought the exact beachy curls l wanted! Make sure to set the temp to the texture of your hair. It comes with a chart. I have slightly past shoulder normal texture but leaning toward thin so 300° was the perfect temp for me. I used thermal spray that adds hold and body. I don't think we can name a different product in a review but it's a popular, pricey brand that starts with a B. Easy to use. There were complaints of loose clamp but it held my thinish hair just fine. Great buy!!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: I got my hair cut and the stylist used a smaller iron and I was happy with the results
review_text: I had a slightly larger (cheap) curling iron that I had used for some time and my hair would never hold a curl. I got my hair cut and the stylist used a smaller iron and I was happy with the results. So I went on line and found this one and thought I would give it a try. I LOVE this curling iron! It heats up fast, has a great grip and I love the handle. Everything about this curling iron is great. I have fine hair with highlights - very straight. I get so many compliments on my hair now.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I love BaByliss hair tools! Every one I’ve ever owned has been such high quality and I’ve never encountered and issue. I recently donated my hair and found myself wanting to continued to curl it but my previously used iron was far too large. This is the perfect barrel size for my hair and I’m looking forward to growing my hair out and continuing to use this iron!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I love this curling iron. I love the temperature control, the style, and the size of the barrel. I was using curling irons that were to large thus my curls wouldn't last but this is the perfect size for the length of my hair. With this curling iron, my curls last after a day of working. My hair length stops right above my bra strap across my back. So, if your curls aren't lasting you may wanna switch barrel sizes and get this brand because it works wonderful. I switched from 1.5 to 1.25 size barrel.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: The 1.25 is perfect for styling beachy waves in my shoulder length hair
review_text: My hair is a little past shoulder length and I ordered both the 1.25 and 1.5 curling irons to style loose curly waves. I think the 1.25 definitely works best to achieve this style. The 1.5 barrel was just too big and did not hold or maintain my curl throughout the day (Although if your hair is considerably longer, the 1.5 might be a better curling iron for you). I have had these curling irons for well over a year and they have held up extremely well. They are strong, good quality, durable, and work great. I would absolutely recommend them to others!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I'm so glad I tried this curling iron! I have only used cheap ones up to this point but decided to splurge on this to see if there is a difference and I was thoroughly impressed! The iron is really smooth as you wrap your hair around it, and the lever for the clamp is in the perfect position for your thumb. A bit of pressure to the clamp and the hair slides through it easily (the cheaper versions aren't as smooth). The 1.25" made the most beautiful curls.... Very impressed!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: Hands down best curler out there. I can not imagine NOT having this tool. So many hairstylists have it so I thought I would try it out. It is affordable, worth every penny! So easy to use, and the best thing is the results it gives! The best loose curls! Most importantly it does NOT pull out your hair or get your hair stuck in the barrel clamp! Recommend to everyone.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_author: S. R. Ridley, A Nurse You Can Trust
review_header: The Perfect Big Body loose Curls
review_text: Absolutely wonderful! This is my third Babybliss product. As usual it works perfectly. I wanted loose Big Curls & this is exactly what it gave me. I tried the CHI flat iron for a straight-look & it was a horrible experience. It did not Straighten my hair at all. I went over the same piece of hair several times Trying to straighten it with no avail. I have owned the Babybliss 1 inch flat iron for >4 years & it still works like a CHARM. If you have anything other than straight hair CHI is not for you. However, you will not be disappointed if you go with the Babybliss products. S.R. Ridley, #ANurseYouCanTrust

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: Creates big, smooth waves in thick, fine hair
review_text: I've owned about a million different flat irons and curling irons and this one's awesome! I have long, thick wavy hair with fine texture that's color treated. I also blow dry and style my hair almost every morning so I need a tool that can style my hair quickly. This curling iron does that. I can get a lot of hair around it at once. Creates big, beautiful waves. Heats up fast. Babyliss are high quality and good prices. These tools last quite a while. This also does a great job at smoothing my hair while creating the big waves. My only complaint is I wish the plastic tip was a little bit longer so that it's easier to hold it with my fingers without touching the hot part. Took some getting used to and I kept touching the hot part because I didn't have very much room for my fingers the touch the plastic and but got used to it.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: BEST CURLING IRON I'VE EVER SEEN!!!
review_text: My granddaughter wanted this for her 11th birthday present. She had never curled her hair and I was honored to have her ask me to teach her to curl her hair. I had boys, so now we both are learning new hairstyles. This was recommended on all of the YouTube channels for girls her age. Thank you very much!!!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: Best curling iron I’ve ever owned.
review_text: I have long hair so I needed a curler with an extended barrel. I used a Helen of Troy iron that lasted for years and finally bit the dust. So I had a Hot Tools curler with an extended barrel that only lasted me like 6 months or so... I have a BaByliss straightener and blow dryer and I used to have the curling irons but they were far too short. So when I found this BaByliss curler I had to give it ago. Freshly washed hair, minimal product, and my curls lasted until the next hair wash day (I wash it 2-3 times a week depending on my physical activity) Absolutely loooove this iron. The top doesn’t rotate but the cord swivels, which is exactly what I wanted. Great product!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: Best curling iron for loose curls
review_text: Best curling iron I’ve ever owned and I have owned my fair share. My hairstylist used it on me and I loved it so I had to buy my own!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: I read many reviews and purchased multiple curling irons to try what would be best. This curling iron is the winner! Not only decently priced but so much better!! I will continue to purchase this brand in the future. My hair looks healthier and I don’t have to hold the curling iron in my hair as long as I did previously. I have very soft hair, but this also works well on my daughters coarse hair.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: As a woman of color with thick, processed shoulder length hair, many of the reviews were mainly from Caucasian women or unprocessed hair, so I left feeling mixed about the product, so I googled curling irons for women of color and the Babyliss Pro Nano, Titanium was at the top of the list of 5 others. Then I was a bit hesitant about the price, until I thought Amazon has a good return policy. So I took a risk, order on Sunday by 8pm and delivered Monday by 2:30, no other delivery service can top that speed. So, can wait to get the iron home and put it to work. Mind you, my hair is looking a little frizzy and I am having a hard time managing my split ends, so bad that I am at the verge of cutting my hair into a short bob. I was quite impress with how quick it heated up. The boost button didn’t seem to work well or maybe I was just unaware how to operate it. I did a trail run with running the curling iron through my hair to see how hard or soft it grabbed my hair. The the final step was to apply heat. OMG. I was so so so pleasantly please with the evenly distributed heat, how smooth and shining it left my hair after applying heat. I softened the root and only had to run the curling iron once slowly through my hair and boy I tell you my split end totally laying down. I got a one inch barrel and it left my hair with a bouncy with a nice salon look and professional soft curl. I am totally satisfied and absolutely love every feature. The last time I purchased a curling iron was back in the day when it was the gold barrel. Oh one more thing, I never felt as though the spring action on the curling iron was pulling my hair out or causing my split ends to break off even more. The spring action gently held and wrapped my hair around the barrel.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: 5 STARS! So happy with this curling iron!!!
review_text: If you're in the market for a new curling iron (old school with a clip) look no further! I recently cut a few inches off my hair so my $100+ T3 Body Waver's 1.75 barrel was no longer giving me the loose waves I wanted. I had planned on purchasing a new T3 iron with a smaller barrel, but after reading many reviews on-line I decided to give the BaByliss PRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron a shot. The price alone made me skeptical. I had my doubts this $50 iron could match up to my T3, which doesn't fry the ends of my hair and leaves my hair looking shiney and healthy. I ordered the 1 1/4" barrel on Amazon and had it in my hands within two days and have to say, this Babyliss blew me away with the first curl of the wand ✨. The curls last in my hair all day and it leaves my hair looking even more healthy and shiney than my T3!!! I typically don't like to put pictures of myself on-line, but had to make an exception here and show the waves this iron creates and the condition it leaves my hair in. I really do have a lot of split ends but this baby seals the cuticle and leaves my hair looking much healthier than it is. The power button and heat setting dial are in a good place, so you won't accidentally hit the buttons. At such an affordable price too! I give this iron 5 stars! ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: These beach waves were made with the 1 1/4 and clean hair! Yeah, I didn’t even have to dirty up my hair so the curls would stay. Easy to use and didn’t take 1/2 the time it usually would take me using my flat iron. I put it on the 30 setting. I can say this is by far my FAV for making these gorgeous waves. Thank you BaByliss for making a great functional easy to use curling iron!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: This curling iron is amazing! I have the Babyliss pro straightener and this is definitely an upgrade! The curls are beautiful and sleek! The curling iron doesn't come with a manual but I found this as a guide for temperature settiings!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: If you have thick Asian hair...go for this!
review_text: I have straight Asian hair that cannot hold a curl. This curling iron is the answer to my problem! And it doesn't even have to be on the hottest setting. I get beautiful medium curls with this iron. I curled my hair and had no hair spray on because I didn't have any. The curls held up for about 3 hours which was unexpected! BaByliss has my loyalty now.

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: My hairstylists uses this exact same curling iron so I figured I'd buy it since my hair always looks good leaving the salon. It's so easy to use and heats up quick. I was surprised to read the bad reviews. I have normal to thin hair and put the heat setting in the middle and it has not burned my hair. I make sure my hair is completely dry before styling it and use the mid to low heat setting. I also start curling in the middle of my hair and curl to my roots, let it sit until I feel the heat come through then start releasing my hair until I get to my ends and roll it back up to my roots. I typically leave about an inch of my ends free from the heat so I don't get a lot of heat damage or split ends. I love this curling iron and I do highly recommend it!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_text: This extended barrel iron allows me to curl my hair within just 2-5 minutes. That is the quickest I have ever been able to curl my hair. It is also very gentle, MORE gentle than any other iron I’ve ever used. Babyliss Pro has got AMAZING quality! NO REGRETS!!

product_title: BaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Spring Curling Iron , 1.25 Inch (Pack of 1)
review_header: Great results for fine hair, good price
review_text: My hair glides through the plates of this iron fairly smoothly, and the design of the iron makes it easy to use. I like the variety of heat setting options, and the box includes instructions on what setting to use for the type of hair you have. I have a lot of hair, but the texture is fine and it can be challenging to make curls hold all day. But, so far, so good with this iron. My only very small complaint is the barrel length. It’s a standard length, but I wish it was just a bit longer. I have to do a lot of gliding to get my hair on the barrel (my hair is a few inches past my shoulders). Overall, though, this is a solid iron. I wanted a good quality iron, but didn’t want to spend $100-plus. The price for the quality and performance of this iron is fantastic.

product_title: Coleman Cabin Tent with Instant Setup | Cabin Tent for Camping Sets Up in 60 Seconds, 4-Person
review_header: great value & easy to set up
review_text: We wanted something easy to set up and this tent delivered. It’s so easy that my wife set it up by herself in about five minutes. It’s also lighter than anticipated so you can carry it for short hauls to the campsite. It has lots of windows so it’s well-ventilated but you can also totally close the tent up. My kids didn’t have any trouble with the zippers. My family of four had plenty of space for sleeping and we were able to keep our spare clothing in there as well. The pockets on top and the sides are nice for LEDs. The included metal stakes are too short, smooth and thin to be used for holding down the tent although we were able to use them for the foundation tarp that we use underneath the tent. For windy conditions you’ll want to buy some real stakes. Thus far we’ve only used this tent in mild weather so I can’t attest to its performance in wind, rain or cold. An 8x10 tarp fits perfectly inside the tent. At $129 this tent is tough to beat and we’re very happy with it.

product_title: Coleman Cabin Tent with Instant Setup | Cabin Tent for Camping Sets Up in 60 Seconds, 4-Person
review_header: Great tent, very dark, quality made.
review_text: When I bought this dark room tent, there were no reviews on it, only reviews on other Coleman tents.
