This waver is the answer to those problems. You can do a light wave, mermaid look with this waver and it lasts all day long and I can still run my hand through my hair and it’s easy!! I love this seriously inexpensive tool. It does irritate my wrist from clamping and holding, but it’s worth it. If you have lifeless hair, give this thing a try!

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_header: Great price, works on even the most stubborn of hair textures, and holds up against sweat
review_text: I can’t get enough of this waver! To preface, I have very fine, relatively thick hair, and VERY straight hair. My hair REFUSES to hold a curl. I have tried all kinds of different products and irons to try to get my hair to stay curly, but most irons won’t even curl my hair on the hottest setting, and forget about getting large, loose curls. Any barrel larger than an inch leaves my hair almost straighter than it started. I purchased this waver because the price was right, but I was shocked by how well the waves held up! I used the middle settings of the iron to wave my hair for a protest march. I didn’t have any hairspray, so I just sprayed in some dry shampoo and hoped for the best. The first picture is what my hair looked like before the march, and the second picture is what it looked like after I marched straight uphill for almost an hour! I was sweating a LOT by the time the march was over, but even the bottom layer of hair that was touching my sweaty neck stayed curly, even without any hairspray! This waver is workout-approved. It took me a while to figure out how to use it, particularly because there is no heat guard on the bottom of the iron. Since my hair is short and thick, I split it into three layers and adjust the size of the wave based on how short the layer is. It takes me about 20 - 30 minutes, but considering that using the one curling wand that actually works on my hair takes me 45 minutes - 1 hour to use, that is much improved. TLDR - Great price, works on even the most stubborn of hair textures, and holds up against sweat.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_text: So on a whim I ended up cutting my hair off into a short bob after watching a few youtube videos on cute hairstyles you can do with short hair. I usually cut my hair short every 2-3 years anyway, but this was completely impulsive this time, and a LOT shorter than I usually go. My hair is so naturally straight its extremely hard to do anything with, especially getting curls or those beach waves I so desperately want. WHEN I TELL Y'ALL THIS IS THE GREATEST INVENTION?? Its so easy, it takes me 10 minutes tops to do... And even if my hair was medium or long length, I think it would still take that long. Thats just how awesome this thing is. My hair in the back is very short because of the bob, so I start out using the lowest barrel to get some good smaller waves, then work my way up to the big waves on the top and sides of my hair. I cannot WAIT until my hair grows back out so I can have LONG wavy hair! But its also a god send for this short hair, and for some reason holds the waves way better than any curling iron or straighter I have. Its seriously the greatest invention and I've told all of my friends about it. BUY IT!!

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_text: I have fine hair that doesn't like to hold a curl, though this product gives me some awesome beach waves that last and still look good even on the next day. Really like how you can adjust the wave depth and heat setting. Nice that the heat setting is on the inside of the handle, and not the outside, because I always tend to accidentally press the buttons when they're on the outside and change the setting. Would recommend using a glove because I burned myself a couple times while using. I just use the cheap one size fits all winter gloves and it works to protect my hand. Takes me less than 10 min to do my hair and looks like I spent way more time. Love it!

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_header: Revolutionized the way I do my hair
review_text: My hair has a pretty similar texture to what this ends up looking like, however my hair gets super frizzy and dready if it doesn't have product or heat on it before I go out. I haven't found any products I really "love" on my natural hair, so I've just accepted it being huge and out of control all the time. Then I started watching Sex and the City and began to strive for Carrie Bradshaw season 1 curls. They were so, so similar to my hair natural but 10x better. After trying every hair styling product on the market I gave up and decided there must be a styling tool to help with this. I tried different sized wands and flat irons and everything I could think of before stumbling upon the "Deep Waver." I really wanted this model but it didn't have automatic shut off and I didn't want to burn my house down, so I ended up buying this "A-Wave-We-Go" model solely because it has auto off. I freaking love this thing. My hair notoriously takes me over an hour to do, it's super thick, and I can do my entire head start to finish in about ten minutes now. I like to do varying wave styles throughout my hair, and the only bad thing I'd say about this is the knob to change the wave style is kind of hard to turn. I usually have to put some kind of cloth over it to get a grip on it and turn it. But even so I still give this 5 stars. I get compliments on my hair all the time after using this and it's so easy to use. It took me about four months to actually convince myself to buy this and I wish I got it sooner.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_text: This is a dream come true for me. I have short thin hair that is stick straight and doesn’t hold a curl very long. The “A Wave We Go” was so easy and quick for me to get the wavy look I was hoping even the first try. Each curl took 5 seconds to create. Then a light spray after and crunch with hands to set. That’s it! I’ve read from other reviews that the waves last 3 days or so. What a valuable hair tool I’ve found!! I’ve been using this tool for a couple weeks and am convinced it’s the most useful thing I’ve ever had to use to create a full and wavy hair style effect. I can now grow my hair longer.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_text: I was able to get perfect waves fast and easy. Added pics of me with flat hair then with waves. It doesn't take too much from your length either

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_header: If you start higher up like a regular curling iron you get curly hair not ...
review_text: You must play with it for awhile. With shoulder or longer length hair start the first wave at the knows, or chin line then go down trying to make only two three waves down. If you start higher up like a regular curling iron you get curly hair not waves.if your hair is thick the curly will look like an Afro, the only thing I can do at that point is pull it up and back. Just don’t expect to get it picture perfect the first few times,you will need time to explore just how to use it. Not to try 30 minutes before your going out.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_text: Easy to use and fast. I get so many compliments on my hair.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_header: THE BEST WAVER CRIMPER I'VE OWNED!
review_text: I absolutely LOVE my new Bed Head Waver Crimper! Not only does it have variable heat settings going up to 400 degrees; it heats up very quickly AND will automatically shut off if not in use after an hour (a safety feature to avoid burning your house down and conserve energy...joke! LoL) It is so much easier to use since it's smaller than other wave barrels I've owned. I've used a few that were just to bulky to handle (to a point I'd burn myself), but not this one. Also, I love that you can choose between three (wave) levels by turning the dial to achieve the wave you want. I've included pictures to show you what this awesome crimper can do, although the picture does not do it justice; it looks more beautiful in person. To achieve these particular waves, I set it to level one. I must add that it was my first time using it too; therefore I feel I'll get better and better as I continue to get used to it (I'm mainly used to straightening my hair). Overall, it is an awesome waver crimper that I highly recommend. It has variable heat settings based on your hair type; it heats quickly; shuts off if not in use after an hour (in case you forget to turn it off); gives beautiful, shiny, soft waves that look beautiful and actually lasts. I hope this review and/or pictures is helpful as I love helping others; if so, a helpful vote will make my day :-)

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_header: Riding the waves… the awesome waves
review_text: Yes! Finally… a no-skill-required remedy for my curl/wave envy. I've tried it all… the hot roller curls don't last and take forever, the overnight rollers keep me from resting comfortably, the wet braids looked terrible, the wet bun caused a lot of ¿breakage and still looked dumb, the curling iron was always awkward for me and the "curls" wouldn't last. Have I listed all the ways? All of my trials and errors eventually led me to this product. I did half my hair on my first run in about 1.5 mins. These waves are from the "deepest" setting on the waver. They are set.. Not coming undone even with brushing. I'm so excited to finally be able to pull off this hairstyle. No regrets! UPDATE: I took my new 'do out for a spin. These waves stood strong through an 8hr work shift, plus the snowy highway winds from getting a flat tire on the way to work. BOOM! Miracle.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_text: The tool I’ve been waiting for my whole life! I have the finest of fine baby hair and not that much of it. I am super careful with heat so an hour of trying to curl it with a wand is just not doable for me. I just wanted a loose wave to add body. I was able to achieve that in 5 minutes!!! I’ll attach B and A Photos that show what I did in 5 minutes with no styling product yet. The cons are that this item came a day later than expected and did not include a style guide. More of a pamphlet with instructions and warnings. Turn the nozzle counter clockwise for larger, loose waves and clockwise for small curls. I googled a video from the company.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_header: I love the speed with which I can do my hair ...
review_text: I love the speed with which I can do my hair with this waver. Using a traditional curling iron takes me much longer and often gives my hair that overstyled, helmet head look. This gives me loose beach waves that look just messy enough to come across as natural. I have short hair and it's great for my length. I've added a before and after pic to let you see what it does for my hair. I highly recommend.

product_title: Bed Head A-Wave-We-Go Adjustable Hair Waver for Multiple Waves
review_text: I have below chin/above shoulder length hair and it works phenomenonally! It is so hard to find a "waver" or "crimper" for short hair. The look holds really well! I am able to wear the style for 3-4 days at a time with maybe a couple of touch ups here and there by day 3. Overall, it lasts and looks great!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Love This 2-Slice Pop-Up Toaster – Lightweight, Fast, Efficient, Easy Operation, With Uniform Browning on All Sides
review_text: The media could not be loaded. For years and years, we had used our toaster oven to toast bread and muffins, and although our toaster oven is sufficient for baking and broiling, it really does not make ‘toast’. Although the bread would warm, it did not brown at all, until suddenly the bread would blacken and burn within seconds. Unfortunately, since the glass window in the toaster oven does not reach the bottom, we were never sure when the bread would start burning until we smelled it. Therefore we had two options, either eat warmed, untoasted bread, or take the chance and with any luck the bread would turn out very dark brown (not quite black), but unfortunately it usually would burn. Since we have enough kitchen appliances crowding our kitchen counter, I wanted a small 2- slice pop-up toaster, and without any extra ‘bells and whistles’. General Description: This Hamilton 2-slice pop-up toaster is perfect. It’s a lightweight compact toaster and it only measures 11” x 6”, with a 7 ¼” height, therefore it takes up very little space. In addition, since this toaster weighs less than 2 lbs. (1 lb. and 14 oz.), it’s not heavy, and I can easily put it away in a cabinet. It has a 30” electrical cord with a 2-prong plug. The color is a high gloss bright cherry red on the front and back, with a chrome finish on the top and sides. The spring loaded toaster slots are 5 ¼” long, x 1 ¼ “wide (to accommodate the thickness), and with a depth to fit and toast a 4” slice of bread, muffin, a sliced bagel or a sliced roll. This pop-up toaster has the cord storage area on the end and the cord remains coiled up securely and out of the way. The other end has the controls, which consists of a lever that is so easy to operate that I can use my pinky finger to push it down. A dial with a range of 1 – 7 controls the browning level, and there are segments between each number for a very precise toasting crunch and color. In addition there is a ‘cancel’ press button, to stop the toasting cycle and pop the slice up to the top. On the bottom is an attached crumb catcher tray that slides to the side for easy emptying and cleaning. Performance: There are 7 main settings for toast color and crunch, with the lightest at the number #1 and the toasting gets progressively darker and crispier as the dial adjustment moves to #7. I prefer the #4 toasting level for a light brown color and a mild crunch. This takes approximately 1 ½ - 2 minutes in the toaster, and the chrome sides remain comfortable to the touch. My toast cooks evenly in both slots and both sides of each slice have the identical crunch and color. We are very pleased with this Hamilton 2-slice pop-up toaster. It’s lightweight, fast and efficient, and it browns both sides of the bread evenly. We use it for bread, sliced bagels, hamburger buns, and English muffins, it is exactly what we needed.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Can't go wrong with this toaster!!!
review_text: I get that it's just a toaster... but for the price I dont know how to can beat this thing. It toasts really evenly no matter what you're toasting. I've put bread and toaster biscuits into this thing and honestly they come out perfect every time. The handle and the sides stay nice and cool so you dont have to worry about burning yourself. I will say that the metal top does get quite warm though, but honestly I kind of expect it considering there is a heating element an inch away from it. I did my research before I bought and wanted to make sure I got the best bang for my buck... Overall glad I went with this toaster over the one that was twice as much with similar reviews.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Toaster toasts bread. Toaster does not create money. Toaster does not advise financial success. Toaster does not protect against legal action in murder trials. But toaster will toast bread.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Great toaster, just a little pricey
review_text: This is a nice toaster, I bought it because my daughter needed her own toaster as she has gluten allergies. The only issue is I bought this then three days later I was told this same one sold at Walmart for 10bucks. Just could not get to the store, so ordering online was my own option.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: This toaster far exceeded my expectations.
review_text: After reading the bad reviews on most toasters at any price, I was prepared to be disappointed after ordering this one. When it arrived, I plugged it in outside and cycled it a few times but did not notice any odd chemical odors. I did notice that the center element did not glow as brightly as the two outer elements, so I thought I would have to return it. Then I started using it for toasting. This toaster had me smiling after the first time I toasted an English muffin. It was toasted to perfection. with the nooks and crannies of each half pointed toward the center. Then I tried it with the nooks and crannies of each half pointed toward the outside and again perfection. Then I realized that the lower glow from the inner element is probably by design to keep the temperature even throughout the toaster. I would often have to cut off burnt edges of English muffins when using our old Proctor-Silex 4 slice toaster. This Hamilton Beach 2 slice toaster has guides that grip and hold the slices centered in each slot, and I have yet to have any burnt edges after toasting 22 muffins so far. It took a couple tries to find the right thermostat setting for English muffins, but once I found 6.5 out of 7 is ideal, I have not had to touch the dial at all. I noticed in the Proctor-Silex that as a toaster ages, the setting has to be lowered not raised slightly as the years go by, so I am glad it is now at the high end of the range. When the toaster shuts off, the muffins are not easy to remove from the toaster. No problem. Raising the handle lifts both halves above the toaster where they can easily be pulled out of the toaster with fingers about an inch above the top of the toaster. I am glad this toaster has the simple hinged large trap door on the bottom. It is so much easier than dealing with a removable tray. I just unplug the toaster, grip it with one hand by the top center trim and carry it to the sink. At the sink I slide the cylindrical catch on the trap door to open it and shake the crumbs into the sink. This could not be easier. For only $15, this toaster is a very pleasant surprise, not just because of the price, but because it works so much better the the $60 toaster it replaced..

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Replacing my old toaster was not as simple as I thought. Too many options, too many 'compacts' or combinations of toaster and oven, etc. I, fortunately saw this one, by a brand I had chosen in my search, and it was the perfect size for my large breads, bagels, etc., it is also very attractive, although I was a bit put off by the color red... It looks great, it is light weight, easy to clean, cool surface, easy settings, and a great price. Pleased and recommend.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: It's a toaster. Plain and simple.
review_text: It's a plain and simple toaster. It toasts bread. It's an unassuming toaster, it just does its job without complaint. It isn't a flashy appliance, in show stopping red, just begging to be noticed. It doesn't cook eggs or make coffee with a need to be more than it isn't. It's just a toaster, plain and simple.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I read all the other reviews before purchasing and figured I didn’t have anything to lose. Yes, it is very light weight and feels cheap. But this toaster works great! I like how easy it is to empty the crumb tray. It’s easy to change the darkness of the toast. There’s even a place to wrap the cord around. I use this toaster every day and I’m glad I made the purchase!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: BIG PLUS: 30" cord. All appliances these days are made with a "standard" 24" cord. Too short. I had to prop my old toaster up on a carving board to reach plug. 2nd PLUS: Has a cord holder to wrap cord around. Lever a little flimsy, but toasts well and looks pretty in kitchen. Barbara Maley

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: When you pay this little for a toaster, the expectation is that it will take an hour to toast two slices of bread. My priority was to find a toaster that would fit into a small space. Found this one and I was pleasantly surprised to find that this toaster toasts pretty darn quick. Doesn’t have the feel of an $80 toaster but you shouldn’t expect that. All that anyone needs to know is that it is very, reasonably priced and it works great.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: This is my third purchase of this brand and model toaster. The first two purchased were exactly the same as this red one except black in color and one model lower because it did not have the cancel button featured on the front like the red one does. I decided to purchase this red one on Amazon for $3.00 more than the black style because of the cancel button feature. The black model without the cancel button had to be unplugged to get the toast to pop out if you needed to. For both the black and red toaster, in all the years I have used this brand toaster I have never experienced any toast get stuck inside or fail to pop out. I believe my first purchase was in 2014 so these last a long time. The red toaster settings seem to be more precise than the black toaster making perfect every time. I like my toast crisp and absolutely no burning on the bread as burnt toast makes my stomach sick - this toaster wins my vote for not burning and making perfect toast every time. I use a higher setting for English muffins and toaster waffles and a lower setting for regular toast. I have used room temp, refrigerated, and frozen products in this toaster without any problems. I have not used any sugar-coated type product in the toaster and recommend they are toasted in a toaster oven to keep the sugar frosting on the top. I recommend this product for its ease of use and precise settings for a variety of products and have always had excellent results in my experience - the toasted product comes out just the way I wanted it without a lot of hassle making adjustments.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I am a Hamilton Beach fan, anyway, so I expected nothing less than a quality act in this toaster, too! It not only works great - LOVE the wide slots! - but it's too pretty to put away when not in use! I was also very impressed that all inside walls were wired for toasting and all WORKED, giving a quick and complete toast on both sides. SO happy to have a trusty toaster again, thanks!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Extremely easy to use and cleans better than other high end ones I have purchased. Fingerprints wipe away easily…a “plus” for sure, and bottom opens entirely to shake and wipe clean. Attractive enough to leave out on counter and lightweight to place away when not in use. Cannot beat it for the price!!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: As described! Works well. I love the red color. And that it has a pop-down tray to shake out the pesky crumbs that get stuck down there. It's more brightly colored red than I feel the picture lets on, but that's a plus for me. Looks great next to my microwave in the same red shade. :)

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: This toaster is great! We bought this toaster to go in the ...
review_text: This toaster is great! We bought this toaster to go in the trailer for when we go camping. It is nice and compact. The toast comes out toasted evenly and the settings allow the toast to not be burnt. The color is great and it is easy to clean. This toaster would be great to use on a small counter as well. **[...]. If you have any questions, just ask! :)**

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Was looking for a toaster after my 20 odd year old one finally bit the dust. Didn't feel like spending $40 on a toaster so I went with this model and for the money, I think it is a good deal. No frills obviously, just a toaster. And no, it doesn't toast everything just perfect but it does as well or better than the one I had originally. One feature I do like is that the slots are pretty wide and long so you easily fit in a bagel or a larger hunk of bread. And the mechanism that holds the bread is self adjusting. So for $18 I'm happy.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: We have every gadget you can imagine in our kitchen, thanks to a husband that loves them! But we didn't have a simple toaster. I don't like the toast that comes out of a toaster oven. So I bought this simple toaster and I love it. Finally, a piece of toast that is actually toasted to perfection on both sides! A very nice toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: After checking out Walmart and Target I came to Amazon. Walmart & Target had slim pickings but it let me see first hand what all the fuss is about with toasters and the different brands and prices. I like this toaster as it has the slot for thicker breads/bagels and the temp. control. When the lever is pushed up, it will raise whatever is in there up which I find helpful. I see no reason why it won't last me a long time.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: One of my best purchases I made in a rush and that was long overdue! Have been using this for over a month and half, and totally love it. I’ve used it for loaf, buns, bagels and hotdogs! All of them toasted the way I wanted them! Such a versatile little machine!!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: nice little toaster for a low price
review_text: I was prepared to purchase the "professional version" for three times the price until I read the reviews. This is a nice little inexpensive toaster that heats up my daily toast and muffins nicely. As with any toaster, you will need to experiment with the correct settings. It has a "cancel" button and the tray opens on the bottom for cleaning. You can't go wrong with the price.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Pros: Toasting works great. I read some reviews complaining about over-toasting - I don't have this problem. On setting 3 (out of 6) it's a bit under-toasted to my taste, and 4 is perfect. And, it works surprisingly fast! I hated so much staring at old toaster for long minutes, begging to pop already as life were mercilessly slipping away. Cons: The lever feels kind of flimsy and I am afraid to break it, especially since you need to push it a bit hard to lock it down. This is my main concern about durability. Also, the top panel does get very hot (the side panels do not), so be careful. Other notes: 1. I let run empty a couple of times before using it with bread, to let out some weird smell that it had in the beginning. It went away quickly. 2. Color, in case you care: It's brighter than shown in the product images. It's as if they were taken in a dimly lit setting. The actual color is fiery red with a slight lean towards cherry, or something like that. Overall I'm happy, and it seems to be worth its price. *** Update: After using this for a while, I'm updating from 4 to 5 stars. It's really great.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Toasted bread just fine... quick delivery, package in good condition.
review_text: I needed a basic 2 slice toaster, it works just fine for our needs. The lift for smaller bread slice was helpful. Toasting was uniform. There was a very very mild smell on first use, it was fine after that. I like the cancel button. Love the red color. Delivery was quick. Package was in good condition. Strangely it did not come inside a Amazon package , it was delivered in the kitchenaid box. Perfect condition.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Absolutely love this toaster! Sooo much so that this is the 2nd one ive purchased. Not because anything went wrong with the last one that wasn my own fault. I accidentally spilled candle wax in my last one. Lol. Has light/dark control. Super lightweight so easily moved about. Love the red color. My favorite feature is the lever that allows me to raise up the bed of the toaster to retrieve my food from it much easier without getting burned. Wide enough to toast bagels n muffins too

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I like the slots are wide enough to allow English muffins or thick slices bread. I also love the "cancel" button that stops the toast instantly. Settings are accurate, instead of burning toast when you don't have it set to that. I like the dark red pop of color, too. Very satisfied.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Great lightweight toaster from Hamilton Beach!
review_text: I had an old toaster that has lasted a very long time until a few weeks ago. I bought this one because it is a Hamilton Beach and it has cool walls. I was always burning myself on my old one. I have tested this toaster on bagels and it toasts just fine. I like it on the 4 setting which is right in the middle. It keeps the bagel crisp but not burnt. I put my hands directly on the sides while and immediately after it was done and there is no heat coming through. Excellent! Besides the brand name and the cool walls, I also love that it is lightweight and has a place in the back to wrap the cord for storage. I keep my toaster on a shelf in my kitchen so the cord wrap keeps it neater. I have had no problems with this toaster and my only complaint would be that if I lived in Canada the warranty would be 5 years but in the USA it is only 1 year. What is up with that?

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I make so much toast Hamilton Beach 2-Slice Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto Shutoff, Red (22623)! I make toast for me, I make toast for my wife, I make toast for my girlfriend, I make toast for my neighbors wife, My wife makes toast for that guy she told me not to worry about... This thing makes toast!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I've had this for almost three weeks and, so far, I'm very pleased. This is just what I was looking for! A simple, traditional-type, toaster with no modern "bells & whistles". Toasts my morning bagel to a nice "toasty" brown (not black to the point of being stiff, hard, and inedible....Neither is it so underdone as to be not toasted at all.) Just right, every time! Comes at a great price, too! So, if, like me, you want JUST a toaster that does the job it was meant to do and does it well, buy this...I'm sure you'll love it as I do!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Works great, but a little lightweight
review_text: Nice low-end toaster, very basic and all plastic outsides/lever/knob. Wouldn't hold up to being dropped or rough treatment, but the insides are good metal and it works perfectly. Good value for what you're paying. If you have little kids or are rough on appliances, maybe get something sturdier. Otherwise, this is a good looking, useful toaster at a good price

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I had a Black and Decker Toaster that frankly, I hated. It took forever to toast bread. It's taken me a number of years to look for a new simple toaster. I found it in the Hamilton Beach Cool Wall 2-Slice Toaster. It toasts well with a wide choice of settings. Slots are wide enough for bagels.Some tall breads you need to toast on their side so that the entire slice get toasted. It's nice looking and the cool walls actually stay cool during use of the toaster. I also like the fact that you can wrap the cord around a "wrap around" at the back of the toaster when not in use. Add to that a fair price and I think it's the perfect 2 slice toaster. So glad I bought it!!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: This toasts bread well. The thermostat is very good once it is adjusted. two things about it: the slot is barely big enough for the commercial wide sandwich bread loaves, and it toasts one side of the toast slightly darker than the other. These are not a problem, but it is not a high end appliance, nor should it be for the price. Toast for the masses!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: So useful - so worth it. Why'd I never have one before?
review_text: One of the best things I ever bought! Better than my pool table. Better than my punching bag. This toaster is amazing! Works amazingly well. For the price, YES!! If you're worried about it smelling funny in the beginning, don't panic, as that's not unusual for new appliances. Just plug it in, open the windows, and run it on the highest setting a bunch of times. Voila! Fixed! Sure, it might smell funny a bit at first, but don't you want a toaster? Sometimes, if you want something great, you gotta work a little. When I first bought it, I went out to the garage, plugged it in, ran it on each setting twice and then the smell left. Now, I use it all the time. A+

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Got this toaster a few weeks back. I have toast almost everyday for breakfast/lunch/dinner, so am a frequent user. This one works perfectly, and toasts the bread very evenly. The only thing that I don't like is that it seems to take more time than my previous toasters. Other than that, it's a fantastic purchase for the price point!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Works great and I don't know how this happens at this price!
review_text: I am still trying to figure out how someone gets this thing hot on the outside too. Do they use a blow torch? Run a home use item 100 times in a row at their restaurant to finally say it is hot and they burned their fingers? This thing has never been hot for me and I am impressed because it is half the price of the old one that did get hot and didn't work as well ever. If you need a basic toaster you will be happy.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Better Than Expected Great Little Toaster At An Unbeatable Price
review_text: We aren't big "toast people" here and over the years we've been through many toasters and toaster ovens and frankly none have them have lasted and weren't worth the counter space. Our last one a four slice capacity Cuisinart had been packed away into a cupboard for a year or more and we never thought twice or even once about it. That is until I went for surgery and was facing a long recovery time at home and a simple diet with toast playing a major role. This toaster fits the bill perfectly, it's got a great retro look, the red color pops, the sides stay cool to the touch, it can easily accommodate a bagel and it makes great toast to fit your fancy from a light golden brown to charred. Uncomplicated, well made and under twenty bucks! If you've been searching for a toaster that's basic and simple - I would say you can stop looking around because here it is and you won't regret it. It's a terrific little toaster and an equally terrific deal.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: This toaster is so affordable that even if it malfunctions eventually it is no big deal. I've bought much more expensive toasters and frequently stopped working and I had to take the time to call the company, request a replacement, and wait for a week or so to receive a new toaster. I noticed this toaster had a longer warranty than my kitchen aid toaster which only had a year warranty! It says not to toast pop tarts in this toaster. That probably voids warranty if they found lots of pop tart jelly in your toaster. My husband thought that was so strange you couldn't put pop tarts in the toaster but oh well..we really don't eat them often at all. Before my first use of this toaster, I depressed the handle and did a toast without toast to burn off any chemicals or oils that remained from manufacturing. After that, it's worked marvelously. Will update if I have any problems!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: The toaster is light and easy to clean the slots are wide enough for a bagel, heats up quickly and theres a temp control so that you can control how burnt you want your toast. good low price and it's easy to fit in a small place on the kitchen counter. great toaster!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Nothing fancy, but does the job. This toaster has zero features except making perfect toast. If that is all you want you don't need to spend more. There is no slide out tray to clean crumbs., instead open the trap door at the bottom of the toaster and shake the crumbs into a garbage bag.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: When the toaster I'd had for the past decade suddenly conked out, I was faced with a variety of new toasters that had all kinds of features I knew I'd never use. I just want to make the occasional toast or bagel, that's it. Some of these toasters were pretty expensive, too. Quite randomly, I selected this one, thinking it would do the job without robbing my wallet. I am happy to report I chose well! I've had this toaster for a couple of weeks now and really like it. As a bonus, the cute red trim also adds a cheery burst of color to my kitchen.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Great little toaster until it broke
review_text: I don't know what reviewers of this toaster are complaining about. Mine works great and I use it everyday. In fact due to this great little toaster im eating way too much bread. I got mine from Amazon warehouse for 15 bucks and because of the bad reviews i was gonna buy a much more expensive one. Sure glad I used common sense and bought this cheap one. Ps. It stopped working after a few months. The toast lever won't stay down making it useless. Oh well I guess you really do get what you pay for.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Buy After The Tariffs Are Lifted
review_text: This toaster does what you would expect a toaster to do. The price had increased to reflect the tariff from what I paid for my prior toaster also purchased on Amazon. It has the fall away trap door on the bottom for unloading crumbs. Hamilton Beech is a well known brand in kitchen appliances and should do the job for a least 4 years, less if you have a family using it.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Ok I had a cheap toaster and it had the cord in the front and you could not plug it in and see the functions. So my search for a toaster was based on I wanted the cord in the back. That's sounds like a simple thing NOT!! Any ways I found this little toaster cord in back and the color was perfect and the reviews are great cant beat the price and its Amazon's choice product. The toaster is great and toast evenly perfect product.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Toasters have been around for a long time.
review_text: So why so many choices? This one toasts bread. It is remarkably lightweight. This bugs me. Not substantial like the toasters from the old days. Flimsy feeling, but it does the job, which is not a difficult one. I don't remember what I paid for it, but I hope it wasn't much.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Works better than the expensive ones!
review_text: I am so pleased with this little toaster that I had to write a review (something I rarely do!). I purchased it for my little camper and it delivers a great piece of toast every time! Evenly toasted on both sides! Lightweight and easy to stow and go with. It works so much better than the expensive well known name brand toaster I use in my kitchen, that I may just decide to get another one of these and pitch the one in the kitchen! (It is not reliable and does not toast both sides evenly.) Thanks for a really good product at a decent price! I am very happy.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: It's a sleek looking toaster that knows it's job. It replaced a ten year old toaster that was getting kinda hit and miss with toasting bread. This one takes care of business rather quickly and looks beautiful doing it. Never really thought about a toaster's appearance but this one looks good on the counter. Just a bonus I guess.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I originally bought this toaster Dec 2017. It only worked for a month and stopped so I wrote a bad review. It turned out to be owner error. When I originally purchased this toaster, I researched toasters and saw so many bad reviews at all price points. So I was not surprised it stopped working. Now it is June 2020 and this fifteen dollar toaster is still working great. I just ordered the same toaster again .

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: I was trying to find an inexpensive toaster for the 5th wheel. We went to Walmart and they had a LOT of toasters on display, but not one box for any of them, so I checked Amazon and found this toaster. We used it at home to try it out before putting it in the 5th wheel. It worked just fine and I was looking forward to using it while camping. We only got to use it once or twice in the 5th wheel before the forest was closed due to the Caldor Forest Fire in California, and we had to leave. So far, the toaster works as expected. Looking forward to using it more in the future!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_text: Needed to upgrade my toaster from the 70's. (It still worked, but the knob on the lever fell off, and I didn't want to mess with trying to re-attach it.) My recent purchases of a coffee pot, and later, a can opener, led me to look at Hamilton Beach toasters. I'm glad I did. Just wanted a basic, 'getterdone' toaster, and found this 2-slice toaster with the perk of being able to toast bagels, if I wanted to. Haven't tried a bagel yet, but confident it will be perfectly toasted, when I do. I love Brownberry brand bread, and the loaves tend to be shorter, but wider than standard bread loaves, although the slice sizes are the same width as regular bread. This toaster accommodates the wider length slices nicely. On first use, I thought the appliance might be defective, as pressing the lever to make the bread descend into the toaster took the slices down, but there appeared to be no action. Pressed the lever a little farther down, and voila! the toaster engaged. To my surprise and delight, there are little 'cages' inside the toaster that close in on the bread, and keep it from curling while toasting. Didn't expect that, but what beautiful results it yielded. I'm very happy with my purchase, especially since it was at a reasonable price. Highly recommend this toaster if you are looking for a simple, efficient, and sensibly designed 2-slice toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: STYLISH, SIMPLE AND INEXPENSIVE FOR NORMAL TOASTING NEEDS
review_text: I was looking for a simple and inexpensive toaster that looked stylish and this Hamilton Beach was the perfect choice. I looked at all the options and realized I just needed a dependable no frills toaster that did its job. I've been pleased with this toaster. I've used it to toast English muffins. The slots to seem extra wide. They look like a bagel would fit but I have never tried toasting a bagel. This toaster is light weight and has a crumb tray that opens at the bottom (not a removable tray). I've always liked Hamilton Beach products so I am hoping this will be a dependable product. There is a dial to turn to modify how dark you want your toast and a level to lower the toast. There is a cancel button. Sweet and simple for normal toasting needs. I don't make toast everyday so again, my needs were simple. If you have a large family and are making several slices of toast everyday, maybe you would want a heavier duty model but this one fits my needs perfectly.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: Affordable Basic Very Happy With Mine!
review_text: Excellent value for the money. About as basic as it gets. Put bread in set browning time push handle when bread pops up take out. Big enough for bagel, does not have setting to toast one side only, will toast both sides of bagel so it gets nice and warm all the way through. Very lightweight. Like almost all appliances it needs to be heated a few times to burn off residue from manufacturing, protective coating etc. Take it outside, to the garage, open air patio or just open windows and ventilate well. Turn timer all the way up and run through a couple of cycles. Mine took two. Thank you Hamilton Beach!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with Shade Selector, Auto-Shutoff, Cancel Button and Toast Boost, 2-Slice, Red
review_header: A LOT OF REASON TO BUY THIS
review_text: A lot of great features, the price and the size of the holes for the bread rolls or bagels. I also like that t cools fast and the out layer does not get hot the top does so be careful. it cleans great from the bottom which I love no slide out draw hold it over the sink after it cools and open the bottom and it releases any thing that might otherwise burn leaving a smell. the size of the slots help release the particles of bread they do not get stuck. Yet the toast or bagel toast to perfection because of the holder (gate I call it) holds it in place while toasting. Also I misjudged how toasted I wanted a waffle and I push it down reset the number and it worked. on other toasters I would have had to cancel wait for the cooling down and start over, Those toaster were much more expensive then this.The color matches my kitchen appliances. I JUST LOVE IT!!!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Easy tent for casual campers but please Coleman, make an add-on screen porch available!
review_text: Got this as an upgrade to our old 4 person Coleman tent that was too small for three of us. Easily held a queen and twin air mattress. Had about 2-3 feet left at the other side of the tent for shoes, luggage, dog bed and dog (you know, the ushe). Two adults and one kid slept comfortably. We're in the South so the well-ventilated style is fine for no colder than it gets here in the spring and fall. We stayed comfortable in about 45-50 degree weather bundled in our sleeping bags. For much colder weather though, I'd say go with a less-ventilated tent or prepare to layer. Easy, two pole criss-cross set-up. The instructions failed to tell us what to do with the guy lines at the four corners of the rain fly so we had to do some detective work and study the pictures on the packaging (turns out you just stake them: not sure what purpose this serves except to secure it in windy conditions since there are other guy lines to space the rain fly away from the tent). We haven't had it in wet weather yet so I can't comment on that. My 6' hubs stood easily in the center of the tent. It has a ring at the top so you could hang a lantern (though the ring is closed so you'll need a carabiner or hook to attach your lantern to the ring). The side pockets are the standard size ones, big enough to hold a phone and book. If you want to stake the floor vent to keep it open, you'll need to bring some extra line or place the back of the tent close to the edge of your tarp/footprint because the elastic tab on it is pretty short. I will say I wish Coleman made add-on screen porches for this model for shoes, etc. but there is enough room in the tent for your gear if you don't mind having it inside. It came with a door-mat size piece of tarp that had no explanation in the instructions so maybe that's a shoe mat? Overall, easy set-up and plenty of space. I'd definitely recommend for family camping!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Great tent! I'm a relatively experienced camper
review_text: Great tent! I'm a relatively experienced camper. It took me and a friend about 10 minutes to get it setup...super easy! Loved that even my friend that is about 6'4" could easily stand up in the center of the tent. After checking mine out he decided to get one too. However, I doubt you can fit 2 queen sized blowup mattresses in there though. We had one double high queen mattress and a single/twin one. Not much room between the mattresses but we had at least 1-2 feet from the end of our mattresses to the door so there was room for our bags and such. liked that there 2 pockets...one on each side to hold your headlamp, phone, or whatever you need to have close by while sleeping.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Simple to set up, great price
review_text: I bought this tent to take on my first camping trip in years (in essence, I'm a "beginning-level" camper at best). That being said, this product was incredibly easy to set up, tear down, and fit back into its original bag. I did not test it in rainy conditions, but it seems to be made of quality material and I liked the cover. The price was hard to beat, and it was shipped to me almost immediately after I ordered. Very impressed!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_text: I have always liked Coleman gear. It's generally very durable and good quality. I have owned several of their tents over the years and they generally last 10-15 years of solid use before there is a reason to replace them. I think this tent will be no exception to this. The good stuff: Good size for a four person tent. As you likely know, this does not mean you are fitting a king bed in there but 4 people with sleeping bags should fit fine. If you are sleeping four adults you likely will have to store your gear someplace else. I use the tent with two kids so we have some extra room. Easy to put up. If you have put up a tent before this should take you less than 10 minutes. Only thing you don't have out of the gate to setup is a mallet to drive in the stakes into the ground. Rainfly is already waterproofed. A common mistake when buying a tent is assuming that the whole thing is already waterproofed. This is not always true. In this case, Coleman did you a solid and already took care of the rainfly. I would still suggest getting some waterproofing fluid and doing all the other seams but this is not mission critical if you are in a hurry to get out in the woods. Has lots of nice features. A door mat, a place to slip an extension cord into the tent for power, lantern strap, some nice storage pockets, an optional floor level vent... pretty much everything you can expect in this size tent. Easy to take down as well! This tent might be the first one that I have every been able to simply roll up and fit into the bag without any trouble. There is even a "rip cord" on the bottom of the storage bag that expands it to make it simpler to get it in. I didn't even have to use that feature. It rolls right up and into the bag. Just use the pole bag as a guide in terms of width and use it to roll up the tent and push out the air. Fits in the bag no problem. The bag is also pretty small so storage is easy. The less good stuff: As with any tent in this price range the stakes that come with it won't hold up to constant use in hard ground. If you are going someplace with clay (like Georgia, for example) you will eventually bend them and have to replace them. While this is a con I don't think this is something to be unexpected. The included ones work fine in most soil and replacements are cheap. The included door mat does not attach to the front of the tent and has to be staked down. This makes rolling up the shoes to toss them inside at night not very feasible unless you just leave the mat floating. Again, not a huge con but would be a nice feature. I usually do this to prevent morning dew from getting our shoes wet. The strip of fabric that covers the zippers on the door can get snagged in the zipper from time to time. You need to carefully back it up a bit to pull it out. I don't think this issue is specific to this tent as I have encountered it before on others. Overall, this is a great tent that will provide many years of service. Thanks to Coleman for being a reliable source of gear over the years!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: IF YOUR'E DEBATING 3 PERSON TENT PURCHASE>>JUST DO IT!!
review_text: First off this tent is incredible lighI weight. Before purchasing the Coleman Sundome 3 Person Tent I reviewed a lot of tents. This one in particular I read both negative and positive reviews on this one and then decided to go for it after debating for 1 month. For reference i am a 5'5 female and my husband is 6ft tall & we had plenty of room for us and our camping gear. I'll be honest we were skeptical on the waterproof aspect of this tent. We set up camp and it poured the rain and the tent stayed dry inside. I rated 4 star water résistance because the inside bottom corner has a place to run cords through it zips but not well that part little water droplets got through. Nothing crazy though. Zippers on the tent aren't made too good kinda made cheap but if you take care of your tent they should last. We were nervous about the rainfly seeing as the tent top is all mesh and we ended up loving the rainfly for the top and bonus it never leaked and we were in a rainstorm. The Sundome mesh top will be perfect for clear nights and star gazing. I purchased this on a tuesday and it arrived thursday so quick shipping which is a bonus. Super easy set up 5- 10 minutes to fully equip. We are excited to use this on more camping trips this summer. Would recommend to anyone purchasing a tent for two and their camping gear. You could fit 3 people, a child or your fur baby but for just us two & our gear its perfect. Highly recommend.I also attached a short video waking up to rain this morning.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: So much better than I expected!!
review_text: I've had a lot of experience with tents and this one is fantastic. I don't do as much camping lately, but I needed to replace an old tent with one that would fit my husband and I, and our two young girls. I also wanted them to be able to play in it in the back yard. We've had a very stormy summer in western Pennsylvania with record rains. This tent stayed up thru two giant thunderstorms dumping record rain fall. After the first storm it was 100% dry inside! I checked thoroughly. The second let a little water in, possibly blowing up under the rain fly, and as anyone who has camped in a tent before knows, some of that you can't avoid. The tent has really nice interior windows/zipper blinds -a must for me, I like to be able to see out and control privacy and ventilation without taking the rain fly on and off. It also has a lower vent in the back as part of the rain fly. Nice and private allowing for ventilation. The front also has one of those power ports! I haven't used them too much but I feel like those would be so fun and useful! Especially if camping during a road trip at KOA's or something. You're able to run an extension cord into the tent without tripping over it in the door or allowing water in during rain. It has two nice tent pockets but only one hook from the peak of the ceiling. That's kind of a bummer, but you could easily sew an extra hook on and attach hanging cup holders, pockets, or those new "entertainment lofts" to hold iPads or tablets to watch movies on. I think those are a great and fun idea so the lack of extra hooks, lofts and pockets is the only downside. Overall it was way bigger and roomier than expected. I'm 5'4" and could almost stand up inside. Plenty of room for me and my girls or a slumber party or a road trip and duffle bags and gear! Whatever!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: A tent so good, they stole it out of my car...
review_text: I liked the tent, it was easy to put up and didn't smell plastic-y or anything, it kept the outside out of my sleeping area, and it was nice and tall so I could dress while standing, although bent over. The window design was very clever and the extra "doormat" included was very useful for shoes, etc. Nice engineering! The problem was, despite the fact that I had already taken the poles and the fly and everything else into the house, the tent itself was still in my car and SOMEBODY STOLE IT. Coleman folk, do you happen to have an extra tent-body lying around? I have all the other components... sigh... Somewhere there's a very weird-looking example of this tent being held up by wooden dowels and duct tape, I guess. That's 2021 Portland for ya; folk really know their high-quality tents... or other people's... !

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Only Took Us Newbies 15 Min To Set Up.
review_text: So far I’m very impressed for this price. My husband and I read the instructions and had no problem figuring it out. I was a bit scared we wouldn’t be able to roll it and fit it back in the bag but we did first time trying. Make sure all air gets rolled out as you go along and it fits. Everything seems sturdy as long as the winds stay below 30 or so. I don’t know about being rainproof as I haven’t used it outdoors yet. Nice pouches inside for holding things like car keys. Holds both of us OK. I would use one larger air mattress instead of two if using those, otherwise two sleeping bags will fit fine. Photos showing it put up and in case next to kitten for size reference!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Excellent tent and free camping doormat!
review_text: This tent is perfect and everything I could have wanted for a camping trip. The interior mesh pockets are great for holding flashlights or your phone. The rain fly comes down a bit low in the front, but I guess you'd want that if it was actually raining! Mine also came with a rectangular piece of tarp like material and I couldn't figure out what it was for and then it hit me...It's a tent doormat! How awesome is that?! It even has a loop on each side for staking it into the ground so it doesn't move or blow away and they give you enough stakes to do it. The set up was a snap and take down was easy too. The bag it comes in expands (pull on a tab once you remove the box) so that you don't have to try to stuff all the materials back in the box, you can put it directly in the bag with room to spare. It made things so much easier. I haven't tried it in the rain yet, so when I do, I'll update my review.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Great Purchase! Weathered the Storm in 50mph wind and rain!
review_text: Great 2-person tent. We needed a tent for our 8 year old son and found this at a great price on Amazon. It's very easy to put up, take down and is very light weight. Only takes minutes. The material is strong, poles are solid and it has two small pockets on the inside, and it fits a twin-size air mattress easily inside. We had our son pitch this tent in the yard just before a thunderstorm to test how it would hold up in heavy wind and rain. My husband (6 ft) and son weathered the storm in the tent pitched in our yard and as you can see on the video, the tent is solid and didn't budge. They were completely dry inside with the heavy winds up to 50mph and rain. We left it up in our yard for a week. It also gets great airflow. The only complaint the boys had was that when it gets really windy, the top rain cover design creates a loud howling noise when the wind gets between it and the main tent. Other than that, this is a truly solid tent, great purchase, and we highly recommend it. Our dog also loves the tent.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_text: The husband and I spent a few days considering many tents to add to our 'bug-out' bag. Basically, we wanted a light enough one to work with just a pair of backpacks and some base supplies. After narrowing it to two, we finally went with this one because of the brand. Year after year, Coleman seems to out perform most camping equipment. We just returned from our first grab and go trip, and this tent was perfect. It fits two adults wonderfully, the air flow of it was plenty satisfactory, and it was so light weight. I'd absolutely recommend this tent to anyone looking for an easy-carry shelter. And size-wise for those tall folks wondering, my husband is 6'2" and had no trouble fitting, so don't be discouraged by it's small size and weight.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_text: Set it up in the back yard with impending week of heavy rain. Heavy, downpours, wind, for 4 days. The main problem was getting in and out during a storm. Due to the small overhang of the rain fly, and the angle of the door, water would come in when entering and exiting. Also the flaps that cover the zipper would blow over and expose the zipper, then rain would come through the zipper. Mind you this was extreme weather and 4 days of it. No other leaks except the zipper, held up great and I consider it a great tent for the money. I like how open and airy it is with the rain fly off. Using it at the beach in a week. Going to enjoy the sea breezing coming though the tent!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_text: I camp a lot, and without a doubt Coleman makes the BEST inexpensive tents. They are light years better than any other brand at a similar price point. Case in point: I bought this to replace my last Coleman 4-man dome tent, and that one lasted me over 20 years. It's a breeze to set up. I can do it alone in under 10 minutes. My only complaint: like I said, I got this to replace another Coleman 4-man dome tent, so seemingly the exact same tent. Except it's not. It's so much smaller. For one thing, The ceiling is much lower. This means not only can I not stand up in the middle, (which is no big deal,) but the walls are also much more slanted, making the space inside less usable and sort of wasted. My rule of thumb is usually that if you use air mattresses a tent is comfortable for half the amount of people it's advertised for, (so an 8 man comfortable for 4, a 6 man comfortable for 3, etc,) but this 4-man tent is really only about right for 1 person on a single air mattress and their gear. You would have a really hard time trying to put a queen air mattress in it. As long as you are aware of that though, it is an excellent little tent, and an especially great option for beginners because of the simplicity of set-up.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_text: This is one GREAT TENT !!! I am able to put it up by myself in about five minutes !! It's plenty roomy inside, and very sturdy, A major stoem passed through destroying many campsites, but not mine. The only thing i would recommend is to buy better tent stakes. I bought the BIG METAL stakes with orange plastic heads, drove them into the ground next to the corners of my tent and tied the corners on with heavy duty parachute cord. My tent went no where !! . This is an awesome tent for the money !!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: The tent is really spacious and we were able to easily fit a queen size inflatable mattress
review_text: Just bought this tent and used for the first time camping this past week. The tent is really spacious and we were able to easily fit a queen size inflatable mattress, an XL dog bed, 2 suitcases and a bunch of bags and still had room to move around. This worked great for 2 adults and a med-large dog plus all of our stuff. It went up in under ten minutes. The tent served us well through the week but the real test came during a late night storm. We only had the corners staked and tied because the weather was nice but we got a surprise storm and even with the sides not tied down, the tent held up. We were able to get the sides staked and tied quickly which was great because it turned into incredibly strong winds, rain, and lighting. Not only did the tent protect us from the wind and rain, it also stayed bone dry through everything due to the great rainfly coverage and bathtub bottom. This tent is made of very high quality materials and we were very happy with the purchase.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Great tent with a good lineage
review_text: I have a 20 year old version of the same tent that's a 4 man. It is still in use and does not leak. I have replaced a couple of pole segments (thanks Coleman for having spare parts available). We wanted something larger so I went with the 6 man tent. If properly set up with good stakes I expect this would weather a moderate thunderstorm. The stakes, as usual, are a joke. Before using the tent you must go to your local big box sporting goods store and purchase some real stakes. And be sure to take a hammer. Great tent at a great price.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Excellent tent! Very waterproof. Withstood severe rain and wind
review_text: Update: My two kids and I used this tent for a Scout camp this past weekend. The first night was torrential rains and heavy winds for at least 6 hours. I sat awake wondering when the rain would start getting into the tent, waiting for my rain cover to blow off or for water to start accumulating. In the morning our tent was in one piece and completely dry inside. I didn't use a ground cover or tarp. Just the tent. We had not one drop of water in our tent. The other families that were in tents all had rain in their tents. One family had at least an inch of water. This tent was fantastic and I was so happy to wake up in a dry tent. Please note I did buy and use better tent stakes, I upgraded from the stakes that were included. I would highly recommend better tent stakes. But with better tent stakes I highly recommend this tent if you think you are going to be in rainy conditions. I researched a lot of tents prior to purchase. I needed something easy to set up on my own. I wanted a tent that could withstand heavy rain. I also wanted a tent that could comfortably sleep 4 (2 Kids 2 adults). This tent met all these requirements. I was able to set up almost the entire tent on my own and quickly. The tent itself was no problem but I’m only 5’2” so struggled with the rainfly but I was able to get it with help from my 7 year old. The size of this tent is perfect. I used it with just one queen air mattress and there was so much room. I was able to set up a little table (just a bin)and play mat inside the tent for my kids. On night 2 it downpoured and we were kept completely dry. I could easily stand up in the tent. But again I’m fairly short. This would be an excellent tent for warm weather camping. I would not use for cold weather. I live in Minnesota and took this tent camping this past weekend. I thought I’d be ok temp wise. The temperature both nights dropped to 36 degrees and due to all the ventilation the tent got pretty cold. However this was my error in using this tent in cold weather. The tent itself is great. Perfect for warm weather. I just would caution about using in colder temps. I look forward to using this spring and summer!

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_text: I went camping at Gennie Springs in Florida for the first time this past weekend. I bought this tent a couple weeks prior to ensure I had everything ready to go. It arrived within 2 days thanks to amazon prime. Once it arrived I set it up in my living room to see if it had any defects. Non were detected. I commend this tent for it's ease of setup. I was able to set it up by myself in under 3 minutes. When I set it up at the camp site with the help of my girlfriend it took us barely a couple minutes. The tent itself is just big enough to fit a 2 person (queen) inflatable mattress from walmart. However, you have to make sure to inflate the mattress inside as it will not fit through the door fully inflated - learned this the hard way. The tent kept the water out at night. It was a nice weekend with the lows around 68; there was great ventialation in the tent to the point where I had to cover myself extra well in the middle of the night as it was getting chilly. Overall I think this tent is excellent for two people and especially for the price point. A tent of similar size was being sold at walmart but marketed as a 4 person tent - talk about being cramped. Highly recommend.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: This tent is outstanding! It survived a New Mexico monsoon storm.
review_text: I really didn't expect much for a tent this inexpensive. Wow was I surprised! I bought it for a one-off camping trip so I didn't want to spend a lot. This tent survived the ultimate test: A New Mexico mountain monsoon storm with 40 mph winds and driving rain. The tent did not leak one drop even though I could see a literal stream flowing under it at the height of the storm which lasted about 2 hours. Since I had a lot of time to gaze up into it and look at every detail while waiting out the storm, I was quite impressed by the way it was designed with reinforcement at tension points and how well sewn it was. Also, the way it's designed with a mesh top and rain fly over that means condensation was not a problem. It says it's a 4 person tent…uh, not really. My queen size air mattress took up nearly the whole tent. Maybe 4 small children… It's very easy to set up and take down and Coleman sewed the directions into the carrying bag so they will never be lost. Super impressed with this high quality tent at a fantastic price.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_text: Camped Friday and Saturday night, rained almost 90% of the time. This tent kept dry the entire time, even with the vents opened to allow a breeze to come through. The majority of the top portion is breathable, so in July and August it should be fantastically breathable. The rain top kept it dry with rain, but I must note we didn't get hard winds with the rain. Was more of a drizzle then downpour. No wind to blow the rain sideways. The Saturday morning during the rain, we had 7 people in the tent playing cards to kill the time, everyone sitting on a queen size inflatable mattress and a twin mattress. Would definitely buy again. It came with multiple tie-downs in case there was heavy winds, but I didn't use as our storms were just gentle.

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Smaller than I thought, got the job done, but look elsewhere if you want headroom
review_text: I've used this tent only once and can't speak to its weather resistance - it didn't rain when I used it. It does seem to be solid quality, and the bottom seems to be weather proof - the bottom is essentially a tarp attached to the tent sides. With that said, I got the 4 person size, and it was for just me with a camping cot, which wouldn't fit front to back, and barely fit side to side. If you aren't using a cot, it would be fine as a 2 person tent with gear, but 3 people would start to feel cramped, never mind 4. It's also not a tall tent. I'm 6'1" and the next tent I buy will be one I can fully stand in, or at the very least only have to slightly duck. Can't blame the product for my own personal preferences though when it comes to the cot and my size - if I wanted more room, I should have gotten a bigger tent, right? The tent sets up easy and is pretty self-explanatory: 1. Lay it out 2. stake the corners 3. insert the poles, arch and attach at the plug fitting, then clip to the tent 4. inset the rain fly pole, anchor the rain fly to the tent, stake the rain fly on the sides It took me about 10 minutes to set up, and it stayed tight all weekend. Overall, I trust the Coleman brand - it's solid quality at prices you can afford - I got a nice deal on this tent and got it for about 38% below the normal pricing, so what's not to like about that?

product_title: Coleman 4-Person Dome Tent for Camping | Sundome Tent with Easy Setup , Navy/Grey
review_header: Great Family Tent for Car camping
review_text: The key to loving the Coleman Sundome 4 person tent is to understand what you are buying. For around $60.00 you are getting a great tent used for the occasional weekend camping trips with your kids or family. I purchased 3 of these tents to use for backyard campouts/sleepouts that my kids want to have with their friends. For the price, they are great for that. I will also use one of the tents with my son for weekend Cub Scout campouts. Again, this is the perfect tent to use during a summer/fall weekend campouts where you are not carrying the tent a long distance. What this tent is NOT is a backpacking tent or a tent to be used often or in very cold weather. I have a Kelty Trail Ridge 3 tent that I use for backpacking or when the weather is supposed to be under 40 degrees F overnight. It has better poles, is lighter and much smaller (making it about half the weight of the Coleman Sundome 4). Again, this tent is not perfect for all activities. The fiberglass poles are not suited for heavy winds or very frequent use. The Rain-fly only covers the top half of the tent meaning in a heavy rain/wind, you are likely to get wet. The stakes are the cheap tin one that bend after only a few uses. So if you intention is to campout for several weeks at a time or go backpacking, look elsewhere. But for 60 bucks, this tent is a great value for the accessional family campout for a long weekend. A few other notes: - This is the same 3-pole Dome tent that Coleman has been making for a long time. However this Sundome 4 has a few revision I like. The rainfly has 2 sets of Velcro attachments that connect it to each of the main tent cross poles. In previous version there was only one attachment per side. - Also, this version has a small loop in the center of the tent to allow you to hang a small light. I recommend this one as a cheap and lightweight tent light ( ) - Lastly this version has a small ground vent that allows air to come in from the bottom of the tent to help reduce condensation.
