The elevation and windage screws gave positive clicks when adjusting. After firing a few hundred rounds it still held zero. WHAT I DIDN'T LIKE: The brightness / power dial was a little jiggly. Don't get me wrong each setting positively locked into place but the dial had a little looseness to it. WHAT YOU SHOULD TAKE AWAY: This was designed for people looking for a casual day of rimfire plinking at the range. This is not priced or built for home defense, competition, or battle. This was made for a AFFORDABLE FUN.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: An awesome red dot reflex site that doesn’t break the bank
review_text: I really like these red dot sights. They are a fraction of the cost of most other red dots that you find in gun stores, they have multiple options for brightness, multiple options for the type of reticle, and you can choose between and red light or a green light. They are set really accurate out of the box but they are easy to adjust if you need to adjust them. They also provide the tools for that as well and they even include the battery that powers it.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: I mounted this on my Ruger SR22 and it not only looks awesome, the sight was easy to mount, easy to adjust and accurate. I hit the paper targets from about 30-35yards. I was hitting the steel targets from at least 50 yards out with ease. The sight has a nice cover over the glass and nice and bright. I was shooting in the day and both the red and green dots were bright enough. Great purchase that serves it's purpose without breaking the bank. I highly recommend it.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Easy to install, comes in a compact box with instructions, lens cleaning cloth and a battery. Takes 2 minutes to mount, easy to adjust left/right and up/down via allen wrench. Has 5 green and 5 red levels of brightness. Has a lever on the back end that selects 4 different reticles: dot, circle with dot, circle with crosshair, and circle with dot and outer crosshair. I found that when selecting different sites with the lever in the back, the backend of the sight will move 1/4" to the right. This can be fixed by a dab of locktite or threadlocker under the base. When sighting make sure the sight is pushed to the left, do your alignment, then locktite it. Great little sight with the features of a more expensive sight. I would buy this again.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: BUY THIS OPTIC! Works great on ARs
review_text: I bought a few sights. Mostly from sig. Read plenty of reviews, watched multiple videos, everyone says you get what you pay for... I believed that, until I fired my AR while using this sight. The sig Romeo sight I got cost me over 300 bucks. 10X the amount I paid for this reflex sight, and I hate that Sig sight. Sure its using a AA and battery life MIGHT be a bit better... but it is atrocious to figure out. This sight, I slapped on, placed a boresight in my AR and had it Zeroed in less than 5 minutes. Threw 80 rounds down range and never broke zero. I can keep both eyes open with this sight its so damn accurate, no need to over concentrate. Every shot was right where I placed it and my grouping had never been better with an optic. I'm shooting 5.56 NATO and it held the entire time. No issue. Best 30 bucks I ever spent. When and IF it ever does quit on me, I'll be buying again.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: What a DEAL. Great little sight
review_text: Pros - all the stuff they advertise plus you can change the battery w/o having to dismount the sight. Excellent field of view. Price - I mean, you can't beat this deal with a stick!! I'll likely order a second or third one just to put on the shelf. Cons - A bit heavy, I wouldn't use this on a pistol. There is no mention of dot size in the ad but it looks to be about 3 MOA, so again good for rifles mostly. It is a bit heavy so again not for pistols. The highest brightness setting is still a bit dim, about 2/3 as bright as my Burris, but still quite workable even on a bright day.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: For the money, these are really hard to beat. They work great on AR pistols, shockwaves, etc. I have bought several to outfit my firearms with the same reflex sight. It's easier for me so I don't have to remember different controls on different sight systems, not to mention just buying 1 type of battery. I like the different reticle selection and it's brightest setting is more than plenty bright. There is parallax, but it's managable. I have no problems putting this inexpensive sight on any of my firearms. The sight seems well constructed and even using a shotgun, the recoil has not sent it out of alignment or caused it to suffer any physical failures. Thumbs up on this one, there's no need to spend 3, 4 or 500 dollars for a optic that fills this particular need.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Bought this low cost item to see if I wanted to stack a reflex sight on top of my scope. Mounted it two ways, at a 45% angle and flat on top. I have shot around 200 rounds of .223 and the device is working strong. No performance issues. Easy to zero if you start with a bore sight. This has worked so well I decided not to upgrade it to a more expensive model.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: A very nice beginner's step into affordable optics.
review_text: My first impressions where positive with the reticle, the different intensities for reticle illumination was nice, able to adjust correctly for day and night-time activity, an easily accessible battery was a major plus, as well as the reticle dial to change styles. The styles provided are among my favorites that I've seen in other sources, and work well for preferred sight on target. I have not thus far experienced any blurriness or double images, and the protective cover helps keep it clean in storage. The Allen wrenches that came with the sight are a nice addition that I can easily store in my gear, and in all, I will prefer ordering future sights from this company. Edit: Had my first accident with the sight. I was storing my 10lb rifle with the rubber cover on the Reflex Sight, and it ended up falling roughly 1 1/2 feet to the floor and ended up landing on the left edge of the sight. (Provided picture above). Still works fine and no issues, quite happy with how sturdy this is.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: After talking to their support team all of my problems with the item were fixed and took care of. Turns out part of the problem i was having had nothing to do with the product but my own fault. Their support team helped me correct it and everything worked great!!! I would buy from them again and again. Not only for the great prices but for what the company went through to make me happy and to fix my problem. Keep in mind that this item would cost well over a 100 dollars if you was to buy it from a store,, It fits my M-4 perfect. I have ran countless rounds through my gun with it on there and not once has it moved or failed me what so ever.. Great Item guys and thank you so much for all your help. Its not always the item that makes a customer happy but how we are treated that keeps us coming back..

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: I was a little skeptical about this purchase, but I thought I would take a chance for the price. Have to say that I am very pleased with my purchase. Mounted it on my daughters GSG-16 and had it zeroed in by the 3rd shot. Held zero after 300 rounds at 50 yards and just needed a small adjustment at 100 yards. Worth the money. I've already ordered another one for one of my other rifles.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: The sight looks and functions as described. However, I would not recommend it for any gun with significant recoil. I put it on my 12ga shotgun and it failed after about 10 shells. The reticle dropped all the way down and wouldn't budge when I tried to re-adjust it. The price is right, but I wouldn't put it on anything except a BB gun, airsoft, or paintball gun. And of course my window for return has expired. UPDATE: After leaving my initial 1 star review, the company contacted me and asked if I would either like a refund or another unit. I opted to get a replacement product (they didn't even make me send in the broken one). Maybe I should have just taken the refund, but I figured I'd give it another try. If it fails a 2nd time, it's on me. 5 starts for excellent customer service! :)

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: This is the second one I've purchased purchased it for a friend as the one I have on my AR is awesome. Anybody currently looking at sites for their AR understands that even just iron sights are about a hundred bucks and thus far surpasses in ironsight. I do however have a 45° setup for iron sights on my rifle as the backup sight. But after about seven hundred rounds I still have not needed them this is performing flawlessly extremely easy to adjust. I don't think you can go wrong with it at all

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Solid item for such a low price
review_text: Placed on AR15. Did not easily co-opt w/BUIS I used. However, by itself is an extrememly good sight. It also includes batteries and tools. There is a lock that was not readily clear on instructions but when I found out it was then easier to adjust alignment knobs and they click nicely. Response from Feyachi was prompt and helpful when I contacted them. May not be something to rely on in battle but seems good enoughf or all other uses

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: The sight shipped faster than expected. It comes packaged securely in a nice box that is filled with a good dense foam with cutouts that hold the product very securely. In the box were both keys needed to fit and secure the sight to my gun as well as not only one but two batteries so that is a major plus. It also came with a little rag for cleaning the optic which again is a major plus. As soon as it came out of the box it was very easy to tell that it was very well constructed. To be honest I was actually surprised by how nice this little thing was for the price. I did not expect to receive such a quality item for amount they are charging. It also only got better from there. installation was extremely easy and straightforward. As soon as you put in the battery and turn it on its a pleasure to look through and see one of the 4 optics you decide to use. The red dot is my favorite and the others are just as good to be honest. They give you the option of a crosshair, a circle dot, a dot and another style which I am not fond of but I am sure some will find to be to there liking. It gives you the ability to not only change between those 4 sights but also between red and green color which is really pretty dang cool. On top of that you can change the brightness of the optic and color all on the same dial simply by spinning it. As you spin it it stays firmly where you put it. There is no loose parts or questioning what you have set. It feels very firm and well put together. Zeroing took all of five minutes at most. It is incredibly simple, fire a shot and adjust the zero with the provided wrench until your shots are hitting the center of the optic. It really couldn't be any easier. All in all this product exceeded my expectations and both my sons are very jealous. I will be ordering two more of these sights as soon as they get their guns.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: I have owned high end target optics for target shooting my whole life. Not expecting much I purchased 2 of these reflex sights for the kid's Nerf rifles. I was expecting extreme cheapness, but this Reflex sight is unbelievably well made for the money!! I can't find an area where they cut corners. The product comes very well packaged with instructions, 2 spare batteries, 2 Allen keys (for scope attachment and aim adjusting), soft plastic removable lens cover for storage, and even a cleaning cloth!!!! 95% metal construction. Only the back projector cover is made from dense plastic. Not sure what the lens is made of, but it is crystal clear. This reflex sight is cheaper than the toy plastic Nerf product!! I am sincerely stunned they are so cheap. In my opinion, you are getting a $100+ sight for less than 30%. Just don't go putting it on your $800 rifle that you also run junk ammo through, m'kay! Although it is unreasonable to try and find fault with such a bargain, two things that I would change are: 1.Turning the device off involves rotating the color/brightness wheel to a specific setting (R or G). I initially instinctively thought that the tiny red-dot setting at the back of the scope was the 'OFF" setting. I can see my kids leaving them on. 2.There is a tiny bit of reflection coming from the plastic projector surround that could be eliminated by removing the flat square border around the projector outlet. It is very very minimal, but could be eliminated. These picky issues are rendered inconsequential by the overwhelming deal you are getting with this scope! 105% recommended without reserve.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: I've bought 4 and used them to replace some that were 3 times the cost.
review_text: These little reflex sights are great on an airsoft gun. Especially on a pistol or smg where you want fast target acquisition and a wide-angle of view or both eyes open (know your dominant eye) etc. I put them on TM-mark23 and Novritch SSX-23, and they work great. Sadly the Novritch red dots are far too small and dim to use like this I have found, and those were like 3x the cost. These little reflex sights have a paralax wiggle unlike a red dot. Where a tubed red dot sort of forces your eye to the barrel position, the reflex sights let you have the pistol further away, and in a duck hunt style action grip. Let's be honest, you aren't always playing airsoft and holding the pistol like you would at target practice, sometimes you're laying in a ditch and peaking your head up, this type of sight makes that easier. So it will feel a bit funky, but after a few games you'll really like it.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Its really awesome for the price! It's a weird sight picture if you use it to sight through as a sharp shooting sight. That is not its purpose, anyway. But with both eyes open, and the sight held out in front of your dominant eye, you see the reticle perfectly for a very quick target acquisition. I have not sighted it in yet, so I can't speak completely to its accuracy. I'm using it on a stinger ar6 pistol crossbow and it has made a nice group of about 5"just snapping off shots. Just shooting low and to the right. I'm waiting to sight it in correctly until I upgrade the limbs. It comes with a scope cloth and also a little plastic lens cover to keep it clean and scratch free. It's cheap enough to use for paintball or airsoft or on a little tactical crossbow, as well as any firearm where you're mainly concerned with quick BMC shots on multiple targets. I'm really happy with this purchase! You will be too.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: A Must For Astrophotography With DSLR Cameras & Long Lenses
review_text: It can be really tough trying to initially align a camera and lens on a deep space object under the night sky, especially faint objects that are tough to see in the first place. Trying to find the object either through the viewfinder and/or live view can be a challenge at best. That's where this red dot really shines, literally. Once securely mounted on the camera, and calibrated so the lens and red dot align on a distant object, the initial alignment on a deep space object becomes a lot easier. Two things to keep in mind: 1) Don't forget to order the accompanying hot shoe mount to attach the red dot to the camera (it does not come with the red dot), and; 2) Use the two small set screws that are already in the accompanying mount to secure it to the camera hot shoe so it does move around (there's a fair amount of play between the hot shoe and mount you'll want to eliminate). This red dot has become my new best friend for deep space astrophotography using a DSLR and long lens (I have a Nikkor 200-500mm f5.6 lens mounted to either a D850 or D500).

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: I am not disappointed at all
review_text: I got this sight because of the price to finish my rifle build. I am not disappointed at all. It looks nice. It is very easy to switch between reticles and colors. It doesn't feel cheap. Cant wait to get it on the range. It even causes me to type in incomplete sentences.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Seems to be a great deal for the price!
review_text: I really like this sight, even though I've only used it a couple of times. I installed one on my M4 airsoft rifle and one on my son's P90 airsoft rifle. Like the description says, it has both red and green options, multiple brightness levels, and multiple choices of reticle shape. The sight is easily visible both indoors and out. I really like that reflex sights do not suffer from paralax issues, so even if you can't get your cheek fully welded to the stock (due to airsoft masks/goggles), as long as you can see the reticle in the viewscope, you can aim the gun accurately. I would definitely buy this again for other guns, and will probably do so.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: This is my 3rd attempt at wanting this to be good... UPDATED- 4th time ! This may be a Winner!
review_text: This is my third attempt at wanting this to work! I read the reviews and thought the product looked cool, and that it does, BUT! The 1st Feyachi showed a kaleidoscope refraction like you see in my mock up. Amazon graciously took it back. I ordered a second one from a different company a lesser price, ($19.00), and got the same type of a distorted mess! Amazon graciously took that one back too. So I ordered this one again hoping it to all be just a fluke...WRONG! Same mess! Didn't matter what pattern I switched to, or what color, both red and green gave me the same distorted results. A note: I noticed if I was outside, in bright light, the refraction's weren't as noticeable, but they were still there. When I turned to a shaded area, the refraction's came back with glaring results. Is it me? My eyes... I just came back from the eye doctor today and had a full blown exam done... The doctor said my vision, peripheral vision and every aspect of my eyes was "BETTER THAN MOST" my age... "Nothing wrong with your eyes at all Mike!" So I'm really lead to believe, these lower end red dot sights are the left overs from the higher end manufacturers. Maybe one will work for you? Hope this helps. -Mike UPDATE #4... Before I took this return to Kohl's, I made a trip out to Bass Pro Shop just to compare this Red Dot to the big box store stuff... Had the attendant show me the $229.00 Red Dot and when I looked through it... I saw THE SAME TYPE OF MESS I WAS SEEING in the Red Dot I was going to send back to Amazon! I asked the clerk how they can sell stuff like this? He looked in it and said, "Like what?"... I asked him if he see's the blurry star pattern? He said "Nope, just a dot." (What the???) I took it back from him and looked, and there was the blurry star. Asked to see another one... SAME BLURRY MESS! We went through a couple more and they were all the same, to me a mess, to the attendant, a crisp clean dot! Then he said he heard a couple guys talking a few weeks ago and the one guy said he couldn't use the Red Dot because he had astigmatism. (Now remember, I just came from the eye doctor that day and the doctor said nothing about astigmatism, whatever that is/was.) So instead of going to Kohl's, I went home thinking I had some research to do. Got home and the neighbor was on the front porch so I asked him what he saw looking through it and he said... "A little red dot." "What! Are you crazy! Don't you see any blurry, star like effects?" Then he said..."Well, maybe a little, but I've got astigmatism!"... I looked on the web and studied up on astigmatism. Then found on one of Feyachi's description's, that the reflex sight will not work with astigmatism's! Next day, Wednesday, I took it out to the range and... At the 25 yard target, it looked like a... RED DOT! I must be going nuts! Got the .22 zeroed in to 2 inch groupings! Got back home and looked through the red dot and the star burst was back! Didn't panic though and was going to do one more trip to the range then return it... So Thursday went back to the range and at 25 yrds, there it was, a little red dot! Was able to tighten the group to 1" before the rain came. SO... At this point I'm not returning the Feyachi Red Dot. I will be out at the range multiple times before the return window closes just in case something else happens. But at this point, this thing is a winner! I'll post one more update after this and let you know the results. Oh! And the other two pictures... The pict with the red arrow... Look what popped it's beady eyes over the hill while I was shooting! I stopped shooting and now wondered if I was hallucinating? Seeing red dots, then green dots, then deer while target practicing in the background? I'm losing my mind! Then the stinkin' thing had the gall to taunt me as it waltzed over to the 100 yrd targets! I give up! Will keep you guys posted. -Mike

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Considering the price of reflex sights that are expensive and supposed to be the best. I was amazed with this reflex sight mounted on a tactical 12ga shotgun when firing 3" magnum slugs. If you know the recoil of this ammo, then it should be considered an extreme test of a mounted sight on a picatinny rail. This inexpensive sight withstood the recoil over and over without the slightest change in its accuracy. Not easy to say about some of the more expensive ones. Make sure that you mount it correctly and use a bit of blue loctite on all threads when securing after sighting it in.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: This is a great red dot
review_text: This is a great red dot. Bore sighted at 25 yards and zeroed at the range in under 20 rounds. Has held zero since then and I don't see why it won't continue to unless it is bumped pretty hard. There is good feedback from the adjustment screws. The reticle can be blurry at first but, but it clears up after running for a couple minutes.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Feyachi Reflex Sights Great Product at a Great Price!
review_text: I purchased a "Feyachi" reflex sight for my Hatsan Sortie PCP pistol and was pleasantly surprised at how well constructed it is and came with 2 Allen wrenches, sight cover, an extra battery and a cleaning cloth. It took about 10 minutes to install and sight in with all adjustment screws easily accessible. The red and green displays are in multiple patterns and brightness and target acquisition is fast and repeatable. The price is unbeatable so I bought a second sight for my Benjamin Marauder pistol and installed it using a dovetail to Picatinny/Weaver mount. These sights are compact and a pleasure to use.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: very nice but not suitable for my immediate purpose
review_text: A very nice sight. I might be able to use it in the future. Unfortunately, my Amazon search was for "Crosman 760 scope" and this product showed up so I assumed it would fit my BB/pellet gun, but my assumption is incorrect. This excellent sight does not fit the narrow rails on my Crosman. The search results should not have shown an incompatible product. Maybe my 760 is an older version and newer models have regulation mounting rails. I examined the sight by hand. I give this sight high marks even though I cannot use it for my original purpose.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Great red dot for plinking at the range with my 10/22
review_text: Let me address something first: I noticed a lot of other reviewers saying the dot is blurry. Personally I have some mild astigmatism in my left eye ( Left: PWR +0.00/-1.25x180 ; Right: PWR -1.50 ) but that doesn't seem to give me any issues with blurriness when using this scope both eyes open. I have noticed that the scope is blurry in enclosed spaces (as I assume the focus point of the dot is around 25yd), but turning down the brightness fixes that for the most part. At further distances I can see the dot crisp and clearly, whether I have one or both eyes open. The dot itself has worked fine for me after about 800 rounds through my Ruger 10/22. I've had a lot of fun using it to plink at the range, and can see the dot just fine in the daylight at max brightness. I will say this dot has some noticeable parallax at closer ranges (the dot seems to move if you move your head), but at 25-100yd the dot appears fixed in space. The sight feels real solid, and as an added bonus I can still use the factory lock on my gun with the sight on. I'm a novice shooter so take my accuracy with a grain of salt, but I've managed to get 3 inch groups at 50yd with this sight. Not sure how that holds up to other shooters but it's acceptable for me. All in all it's a pretty great sight, and for less than $20 I really have no complaints.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Very good quality for the price
review_text: It is very well put together for the price. On a 22, there is almost no recoil so it does not shake this much. I would probably go with something more expensive if I had a much more powerful rifle, but for the small rifle I have it looks and works fine. Considering the massive difference in price, I cannot see myself wanting to get anything other than this for the .22. The sight looks and feels great. It has either red or green and can work even in pretty bright sunlight. I would buy this again

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Best Reflex Sight for the money!
review_text: I purchased 2. Mounted one my 7.62x39 the other on my 5.56. I always use a small dab of blue loctite on the mount screws.Had each one zeroed in with a few shots at 25 yards. Very happy with the groups. 1/2" to about 1 1/2" . After 90 rounds of 7.62 and 100+ on the 5.56 they still held zero. After using reflex sights at 5x the price, I can honestly say there is little to no difference in my opinion. Don't be afraid of the cost and give this reflex a try. Everything you need in a reflex sight. Excellent battery life, very bright, adjustable , clear with great visibility. I have bought other items from this seller . I only had one product with an issue (wrong charger) and they took care of me quickly!

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: While my initial thoughts on this sight, was that it was cheap and decent. I installed it on my new AR Pistol. Checked it out to make sure it worked and then locked the gun up until I could take it to the range. Took me about 2 months to have time to get out and shoot everything. The sight would not turn back on. I changed the battery with a brand new known good one. Same result, will not turn on at all. I e-mailed the seller at the email in their profile. No response. Don't waste your time with this junk, buy something a little more expensive from a seller who actually cares about their customers. UPDATE: I was emailed by the seller finally who wanted to make it right. They have been working on getting new and improved sights and making the quality better. I’m going to try a different sight and see how it works. Thanks Pan for reaching out to make this better. UPDATE: Pan offered me several options to make it right. I gave them 5 stars now because they have been so willing to replace the sight and make me happy.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: I had an expensive Eotech before that was fuzzy, no easy adjustments, only one color, etc. Returned it due to the temperature drift issues. This thing was very easy to install and adjust. Multiple different brightness's and reticles. Seemed to zero very well with my laser boresight. Still need to shoot it to tell, but VERY pleased with the quality so far and esp. the price.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Ok, just received this thing and it is exactly the same as the Browning red dot. Exactly. Solidly build with a crisp bright reticle in all modes. We are really impressed with this thing. We are off to the range to test the durability and how well it will hold zero, and how long it will last. For 20 bucks are expectations aren't high as it isn't a Venom, but we will see. Will report back after we have run not a bit. But wow...first impressions are very good.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: I put this on my Ruger Mark 4 22/45 lite and its no disappointment. It was only off by four clicks when I got it. It’s small when you first get it, but for the price, colors, brightness options, an extra battery, easy use, and how light it is makes it a definite 5 star.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Installs easily. Easy to use. Put one on a marlin model 60 that i was cleaning for a friend (his eyes can't pick up the iron sights anymore and he has trouble with scopes) and sighted it in. Shot groups fit under the pad of my thumb at 25yrds. Had to buy one for myself to put on my ruger 10/22. Groups were the same. Doesn't fit dovetail mounts so I had to get an adapter rail for the marlin, the ruger comes with a removable dovetail that's held on by 4 set screws, easy to swap out for a weaver rail.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: A superb item at a great price!
review_text: Everything about this works and works well. So much so I ordered a second one. I had never used a reflex site before and really took to this quickly. I couldn't imagine how it could be any different than a traditional red dot. However, my target acquisition times went way down without sacrificing accuracy. I am right-handed, but left-eye dominant. Thus, with a little bit of training I am better with this than any red dot or scope out to about 100 yards. Super long-range shots? Of course I would need a good scope. Any cons? Well CR123 powered would be better, but those are much more expensive. This works great.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: A stumble, but then off to the races!
review_text: From 1 star to 5 stars. I ordered one of these last week, and while it was a bit of a lemon, the customer service was fantastic. The service was so good on getting me a free replacement, that here I am 10 days later w a new sight that worked right out of the box. I'll have it out to the range to zero tomorrow, but it already looks more than a great deal for the price. Some of the reticles are more blurry than others (I like the dot reticle best anyway, that's what the original CCO's had) but the brightness settings are fine. The lowest settings would be best for dusk/night and the brightest settings show up clearly in the bright daylight when you need them, but the middle brightness works in the daylight. I used the old principle that you should turn up the brightness until you can see the dot, and then back it off one, which worked. That had me at the third of five settings. Room to go down for night, and up for the brightest days. One thing I wasn't expecting but appreciate greatly, is that on one of my rifles, the HUD has a large enough field of view that my iron sights remain visible, greatly mitigating the fact that this sight doesn't have a quick detach. This has the potential (I'll know once I get to the range) to be nearly the quality and effectiveness of the CCO that hundred of thousands of troops have trusted their lives to, and costing 3% of the price. The bang for the buck seems to be unquestioned. One final suggestion to the manufacturer, the instructions could be a bit more thorough, let me know if you want any suggestions.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Great holographic sight, and the best part is that it is under $25. This is is great, and I must admit that I did not expect much due to he price. But it is easy to sight in and holds the adjustments. You can use a red or green sight, in addition to multiple colors you are also able to select Colton multiple sight pictures, such as a dot, cross, cross with dot, or a circle and dot. You can also adjust the brightness. The sight will also line up with the iron sights, I used them to adjust he sight.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Dont let the price fool you.
review_text: This is a superb product and I'm not saying good for the money. I bought this sight from this seller and it came in the mail on time. I didn't really expect a lot of quality for the cost as I was just getting it for a temp sight for a 300 blk pistol build. Boy was I underestimating what was in that little black box. I opened it and found the sight wrapped in bubbles and in a foam padded case. It also came with the Allen wrench to install and adjust it, along with a set of batteries. Looked nice and packaged very nice. At this time I was thinking why would someone pack a cheap made sight this nice. I installed it on my gun, bore sighted it at 10 yds, moved out to 20 yds. Dead on at 20. Two days ago I had a major upset. My pistol fell over in my safe. I figured that the sight was probably shot from the hit that it took. A couple of shots from the back porch proved me wrong. Still 100%. Sometime in the near future I plan to buy several more of these sights as backups. Don't let the price fool you. This sight has all of the quality of one that will cost $200+.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Read all the reviews and decided to buy this Feyachi Reflex just to see how I would like that type of sight. Had never owned or shot with one, and for the price, thought it would give me a good chance to decide whether to upgrade or go with different type. Item was shipped promptly by Amazon Prime and arrived within two days. Bolted it on last night and went to the range today. The attached picture shows my first two rounds at 15 yds. Good enought for me, and this was right out the box with NO adjusting !!! Shot a total of 200 rnds and it continued to shoot as accurate as it did with those first two. Using it on a Smith & Wesson 15-22 Sport.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: This sight is awesome for the money. Zeroed it in in three shots and it's held it's zero after 200+ rounds of 5.56 with out any adjustments. Was skeptical Bc of how cheap it was but, was very pleased to be wrong. I'll be buying another once my next platform is complete. Definitely recommend this one.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: Alright so I bought this to go on another 22 ruger mk4 and wanted to compare it to the browning version. Make they are exactly the same except this has the green as well as red. Both are heavy good steel literally the same in every way. Visibly the optics are the same I would say the browning is slightly more visible dot but not nocibly. Quality detail are the same but browning clicks a little smoother when changing the dot but not noticibly. Only difference is the glass in the browning has some slick polish on it giving it some iridescent red blue and seems to be built in to the ring. This sight has a grey glass which has a ring that holds it in place from the front. I would say Save yourself the $$ and get this one without shooting. I will update after the range.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: There appears to be several sellers of this same sight under different names. This is the second one I’ve purchased and so far the cheapest. It’s packaged well and included two batteries. The installation on my Aviani Triumph 727 Competition Air Pistol was quick and easy using the Sun Optics USA Airgun Scope IZH 46 SM7900 Barrel Mount (see photo). I thought I would share one point of clarification. Some of the reviews seemed confused on the use of the small Allen wrench. The large Allen wrench is used to connect the sight to the mount. It is also used to adjust windage and elevation when zeroing the sight. The small Allen wrench is used to lock these adjustments. Out of the box, the lock adjustment is tight so it needs to be loosened before you begin the zeroing process. There is no marking on the sight but it is shown in the instruction pamphlet. Some people also were discouraged with their ability to make windage and elevation adjustments. I wonder if part of the problem could have been that the zeroing lock was tight and never loosened when they tried to zero the sight. My zeroing plan was to tighten the lock adjustment, shoot a group, loosen the lock adjustment, adjust windage and/or elevation, tighten the lock adjustment and repeat the rest of the sequence until the zeroing process is complete. Out of the box it was shooting low and a little left. I raised it up, then walked it right until it was on target. Positive clicks when adjusting. Easy Peasy! I shot a 20 pellets group (see photo, I pulled one a little right, my fault) and it kept tight enough to drive tacks. I’ll do a little fine tuning, but I’m pleased with the first group with this sight. I changed from red dot to green dot and the zero didn’t change. I don’t shoot the other reticles because they are too big for my old eyes. They cover more than the X ring. I have a stigmatism and there is a little flaring. For me the smaller the better. I couldn’t be more pleased with this inexpensive sight. I just installed two more on my 617 and 686 Pro.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_text: A really great product for $17. No problems pulling off under 1 inch groups at 35 yards. No problems hitting the 12 inch plates at 100 yards. The paralax was also very respectable for the price. Brightness was also sufficient even on a clear sunny day on highest setting. Mine actually shipped with 2 batteries, but the packer may have just screwed up and included an extra 1. The instructions were good. Not 100% clear, but enough for a simple sight like this. But with over 10 years of experience working with Chinese factories, I know that consistency is always an issue, so I'd recommend taking this to the range as soon as you get it so you can make an exchange/return if you happen to get a dud.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Excellent sight; don’t use on a 7.62
review_text: This is an excellent optic for what it is. For the price, you legitimately cannot beat it. I bought this as a “let’s see what happens” type of purchase for a 7.62 rifle. For the first 20 rounds or so, this sight grouped better than should be possible for this price. On the 21st round however, the glass completely split in half and the electronics stopped working. This is no fault of the sight as it is completely unreasonable to expect it to work on such a powerful weapon — however while it did work it was nothing other than impressive. If you’re using anything 5.56 or below as a weapon, don’t waste money, just buy this.

product_title: Feyachi Reflex Sight - Adjustable Reticle (4 Styles) Both Red and Green in one Sight!
review_header: Not sure what the high dollar ones offer that's better..
review_text: Not sure what the high dollar ones offer that's better .....this one works perfectly an a ar15 , and maybe 400 rounds run threw it

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I'm now an empty nester and I'm happy with this 2-slice toaster for just the two of us. By the way, it toats the bread evenly on both sides.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: The last three toasters I had did not toast evenly. This one does it very well.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_header: IT'S PERFECT SLIM SIZE, TAKES UP NO ROOM AND I HAVE MY TOAST, ITS JUST PERFECT

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: It's great to be able to use this toaster for bagels or 4 bread slices all at one time! Good options for settings too .. glad I bought it.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I love the options on this toaster, not overly fancy but more options than the run-of-the-mill toaster. The bread is nice and evenly toasted. The bagel function does make the bread softer. I'm happy with the purchase.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: The reviews on this toaster were what made me choose this model. It toasts well and is easy to operate. It is also very easy to keep clean. Some toasters get grease marks from fingers and will not stay clean. The finger prints come right off. It has a nice compact design. I have had several toasters in the past 5 years and none was as well made as this one. Even the more expensive ones were not made well and did not toast evenly. This one is perfect. I just hope it lasts!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: Toaster looks nice and works great! The bagel setting is a neat option that only toasts the insides of the bagel slices if you prefer a softer outside. It also gives a consistent toasting experience as opposed to my previous toaster, which would burn your stuff one time and barely brown it another time. Adjusting the level of toasting is easy and the knob has clear adjustment settings. Assuming it holds up, this is a good purchase.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: Outer case is plastic, a bit flimsy but it serves the purpose. Cleaning is a little awkward, have to pick it up to open the door. But for the price, it's good.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: Works great. Easy to use. Looks great in our kitchen on the counter. My wife loves it.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: Despite its price, it does exactly what I want done and well. It has the cancel button so I don't have to ruin everything by yanking it up. It has the bagel mode which I doubt I will use but why not have it. Yada yada, easy to clean and easy to use. Good product from a reputable brand.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I replaced an expensive toaster that broke within a year after purchase. This one was very affordable and it is also reliable (in the first several months). It's a great value.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: Easy to use. The only cons I want to mention is there's no removable chips clean plate. I need to flip the entire toaster and pat to remove chips and bits.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I love this toaster. The bagels toast well on one side while the other side is warm and soft. The appliance is so light weight, wide for thick breads, if bread is small.......you can lift lever to reach the bread—so you won’t get burnt, and the sides of the toaster do not get hot. It’s worth the money. I would recommend this item for the person who love bagels and toast.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: Love the more modern look. Cooks great. It is hotter than my other older one that was very similar, so start at about half way for normal toast. I like how you can place something ontop to warm.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: shopping for a toaster is not as easy as it used to be. I needed to replace an old one recently and found this one. This is a good basic toaster. It is reasonably priced; it looks just like it is described; it works simply and does what a toaster is supposed to do. The toast is evenly browned; it accommodates different sizes of bread including bagels. The bread falls into a basket that moves to surround the bread. It can also toast frozen breads or waffles.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I bought a cheap toaster the first time because I rarely make toast. BIG mistake! This toaster is not expensive but looks chic and the features makes shifting from toast to bagels very easy. I don't know about you, but it seems that cheaper toasters won't evenly toast the bagel. Not a problem with this toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I like my new Hamlton toaster very much. It’s easy to adjust how light or dark you want your toast. It has big slots for bagels or waffles. It’s easy to keep clean. It works out great for my house because we can keep one side for regular bread items and the other side can be for gluten free items, that’s one of my favorites things about having a four slice function toaster. The handles a smooth and easy to press download. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone that likes to make sever slices at once. Hamlton Beach is a good make.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: This toaster is super light and the toast pops up so much that grabbing it is no issue

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

review_text: Great compliment to a stainless steel look in the kitchen! Toasts evenly and at the shade you want!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: Needed a replacement with no frills. This new one toasts well which is what I've needed. Easy to clean surface too. Looks nice. Out with the old disgusting, hard to clean toaster oven. Terrible at toasting for a while. Already in the trash can. Recommend. Easy on the pocket book too. Good for bagels. Giving 5 stars due to quality versus price.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I needed a new toaster and this one has been perfect.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: The toaster of all toasters. It browns the bread to desired level. The crunch factor is in place when you need it. The toaster is easy to use and clean!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I have only had this toaster for about a month, but so far I really love it.!!! It doesn’t take up a lot of space on the counter and I like the feature that you can lift the handle to take out your toast easily. Nice variety of toast settings also.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I like the bagel option and even better the cancel option. The toast will pop up if you cancel without having to move the lever mechanism. The black, soft touch sides eliminates the problem of having objects too close, usually the bread bag, getting melted onto it.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I decided I had to get a new toaster when my old toaster couldn't be adjusted to a compromise between barely warm and burned. I also always had trouble getting English muffins out of it. This new Hamilton Beach toaster took care of those problems. When what is being toasted is popped up, there's an allowance to push it up farther with the handle, which allows you to get a hold of it. It is also accurate in the settings. I have to get used to not using the handle to pop my toast up like I'm used to during a cycle because this one wants you to use the cancel button, but since the doneness is way more accurate, I have no problem with that.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I like that it fits bagels really well. Also has a bagel setting. I had to turn it up almost all the way for bagels but it works great and they pop up nicely :)

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_header: The Only Toaster That Makes Perfect Toast
review_text: My husband is beyond fussy about his toast. I am embarrassed to say I bought and returned 2 other popular toasters before buying this Hamilton Beach. It actually toasts both sides the same, an even light brown. If you really use toast for breakfast or sandwiches,like BLT, you probably need this toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: When I started to look for a new toaster, I remembered the most helpful review I had read the last time I needed to purchase a new toaster, namely, "It's a toaster." So, I plugged in the model number of my broken toaster and purchased this updated model version. It works fine, and it does have a smaller / narrower counter footprint. So, remember: "It is a toaster..."

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_header: Bought for my daughter's family - they love it!
review_text: We recently visited our daughter and their family in Florida. When they moved, I guess they didn't take everything with them, and when I wanted toast with breakfast, that was something they didn't have. We bought this on Amazon and had it delivered to them. I get a call "did you buy me a toaster?" Yep, it was Dad. She says everyone uses it daily and loves it. She said it toasts evenly and don't know how they went without one. You wouldn't think a toaster is a good "just because" gift, but sometimes it's just the things you don't think about that helps others.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: When you first open the toaster, you will want to run the toaster for a couple of cycles in a well-ventilated room (or outdoors if you have the option). The product will produce a very bad chemical smell that will fade after you run the product a few times. I ran the toaster about 5 times without any bread in it to completely get rid of the smell. After that, it works perfectly as a toaster. I only really toast white bread and found this toaster adequate for that use case.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: This toaster is great for the price. It's easy to use & clean. Gives a nice even toasting to sliced bread. Toasting other things like pop-ups, halved biscuits, etc., is a piece of cake with the wide slots. Note: Because of the wider slots, sliced breads may take a little longer because the bread is a little further away from the coils. Nice buy, totally satisfied!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_header: Great Price, Great Machine. Can't beat the ease of it.
review_text: Full size croissant sandwich maker. I love this machine. It thaws my frozen bread perfectly. Toast my Costco croissants to perfection. Hot dog buns, hamburger buns, etc. I am just mad I didn't get the four slot toaster. Great machine for any household and the price is even better. You don't need a thousand buttons or options. You need crispy bread! This does it to perfection!

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: The slots are nice and large. The defrost feature is nice. It has the bagel feature and we've used it. Nice that you can "boost" the bread up, since I often buy smallish bakery breads that are difficult to reach without this feature. It seems to take a while to toast, but honestly, this my 4th toaster in my adult life and I've always felt every single one took too long to toast. LOL

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: I bought this toaster because our old one didn’t have slots large enough for bagels and it was old. This toaster is great and has a blue light that comes on when it’s in use. There is also a cancel button that will pop the bread up immediately.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: The toaster is just your standard toaster. There are a lot that have multiple buttons and digital fancy things. This is not it. This is EXACTLY what I was looking for. I just wanted a basic toaster that looked nice and did a great job and this is it. It fits bread, bagels, whatever. This is the perfect toaster if all you need is things to toast.

product_title: Hamilton Beach Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Defrost and Bagel Functions Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button, 4 Slices, Black
review_text: It makes the bread crunchy. What more could a girl want? One thing I will say though -- for a "wide slot" toaster I was surprised to find that it's still not wide enough to accommodate a wider, flatter bread like you often see with rye or pumpernickel. I still have to cut a bit off the end to get them to fit, but not very much, so I'm not too miffed.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Great toaster at a good price
review_text: Like this toaster! Can't speak to longevity as I just got it today. Have made a batch of whole wheat toast, and toasted a bagel, which started out frozen. This gave me a chance to try all the different controls and settings. All seem to work quite well. Like the bagel and defrost settings. Toasts evenly enough for me, not perfect, but hey, it's toast, not heart surgery. For $19 you get a clean minimalist look that goes well with most decor, has the current modern settings of models costing ten times as much, and hey, it makes toast! Remember to follow the directions and cycle it a few times empty to burn off manufacturing residue. As the instructions say, "in a well-ventilated area." Like outside, lol, or in your garage. After that it's fine. Recommend.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: After seeing toasters on Amazon for upwards of $300, I naturally opted for the less than $20 model...........Guess what ?? It makes toast! and it will handle bagels and other wider items. This is just fine and the sides stay cool which I really like.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Great Toaster at a great price!
review_text: So far, so good. I realize I have only had this a few days and used it four times. I love this toaster, I leave it set to #3 and everything turns out perfect. I used the bagel setting and bagels toast perfectly. Only recommend following directions on first usage. Must run through several temp settings without food to burn off manufacturing smell. After that, works perfectly. At this point, still early on usage, recommend highly to others, great value and seems to be well made. Another great Amazon Basic's product!

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: My teenage son had a virus and didn't want to discuss any food. I told him when I used to have a virus, my mom would make a piece of toast and rub a spoon of peanut butter on it. I think that's a regional food, Mid-Atlantic. He said that sounded pretty good. I said, "Where's our toaster?" He gave me that 2018 teenager look, "What's a toaster?" I'd appreciate it if high schools would stop teaching kids what cars are. Anyway, this long-lost kitchen gadget that I honestly don't think I've owned one of since the 90s, came in 1.5 days thanks to Prime and I have to say for the price, this toaster seems like a steal. It has cool-touch, the slots are big enough for bagels, it has a bagel button, a cancel button and a frozen button. It has the intensity dial and after a few tries it's making perfect, lightly browned toast to smear peanut butter on. Everything about it is built good, the cord placement is also in a good location making it easy to use sideways. It also has a crumb tray in it. I expected to pay maybe ten to fifteen dollars more than I got this one for from Amazon. Just be warned, if you have teenagers, they will be at risk of rubbing butter, peanut butter or whatever else they can find onto the bread BEFORE toasting it. Now that I think about that I think that's what happened to my last toaster. Highly recommended for those looking for a good, basic toaster.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Pretty chill on the chill scale. Only used the left slot. Can’t wait to try the right slot. 10/10 would chill with this toaster again.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: I purchased this toaster to keep at my desk at work, which technically is not allowed. However, needing a better option than using the disgusting toaster in the break room that's never cleaned, I decided to test my luck. This little toaster is small, quiet, and toasts anything from English muffins to bagels quickly and evenly. After I'm done using it, I can easily move it out of sight since the sides remain cool, and toss it back in the drawer once it's completely cooled down. The bottom is also easy to slide out to remove crumbs, a feature unused with the break room toaster. Would highly recommend this product. Long live the contraband toaster.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: What a great toaster at any price. Everything fits in it from bread, texas toast, bagels, pop up pastries and english muffins. The extra lift is just what you need to get those english muffin tops up where you can grab them. The self centering devices make sure everything gets toasted evenly. As with all new cooking appliances there will be that burn off smell. I set my toaster up under the range hood, turned the fan on high and followed the initial startup directions to burn off the stinky stuff. When I finished the process I put it on the counter and started toasting. This thing works sweet! The power cord is long enough to reach my outlets and the underneath storage wrap is perfect if you only need a few inches to make a connection. Excellent inexpensive product that gets the job done.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: A very reliable and attractive appliance
review_text: I looked at other reviews and waited a year from purchase before I wrote this review. I have had no problems with this toaster and I use it just about every day. The controls are excellent. Those reviewers who complain that the lever stopped working must be using too much pressure to push it down. Because the lever is electronic and can be raised with the touch of a button, very little pressure is required to push it down. For the price, this toaster can't be beat. It makes perfect toast and toasted bagels at the desired setting and it is simple to clean.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Excellent toaster. Slots are wide enough and deep enough for my morning bagels at work.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: I LOVE This Simple Little Toaster
review_text: I bought the "Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black" 5 months ago for only $22.90. So far, I'm VERY happy with my purchase! This toaster is so simple and basic, but it does to my bread, bagels and frozen waffles exactly what needs to be done. It toasts my bread perfectly on both sides. And with a push of the lighted "Frozen" button, my freezer Eggo waffles pop up perfectly crisp. Push the "Bagel" button (also pleasantly lighted) and my bagels get toasted on the inside with the outside gently warmed. More Pros: •It only has two slots so it doesn't hog counter space. •It's easy to clean. •The outside stays cool to the touch. Cons: •If lack of counter space isn't an issue for you, 2 slots may not be enough. •The price has gone up 18% during the 5 months since my purchase.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: I had the first one returned due to the bread carrier not staying down, likely a manufacturing defect, but it was replaced very fast (Prime) and the second unit just works... The setting for bread set at ~2.5 is good, anything above and it may burn your toast... that is why the 3 stars on that regard... but once you find the setting you need, is pretty consistent (provided you use the same thickness slices). If you have thicker slices, you may need to back out to avoid burns... the other functions... I haven't used, so I don't know if they are worth anything... as simple toaster... it works.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: There are many toasters out there. I know I looked. I just wanted something simple and cheap, but not cheap quality. This is that toaster. It has three buttons on it. The top button/light goes on when the toaster is in use, but also serves as the cancel button. The second is for frozen items, like frozen bread and waffles. The third is for bagels. I have tried it toasting bread, frozen bread, frozen waffles, and bagels. I can say it did a great job every time. The bagels were as advertised that if you use the setting the inside will be toasted and the outside will be warm but not over done.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: You never think about how important a toaster is...until the one you have dies. Toasting bread is one of my best skills in the kitchen, but to do it well you must have a toaster. This thing works well and is so easy to use, I didn't even bother with the instruction book....well most men don't ...right? It's light weight, black and silver looking so it blends in well with our kitchen.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Really good value, I just received it and it was a replacement because the bread I'm using don't fit correctly on the previous one. But now I have no issues at all, other users have complained about smell, but if you read the manual you would find there the starting process to get rid of it. The pic I'm sharing is from a pair of frozen slices at level 4. Showing that it works really good. I'll continue checking it, but as first impression I recommend it.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Works great even on thick homemade bread!
review_text: Like many others, I've been making bread at home and enjoying nice thick slices of warm bread! I'm talking about 1/2" thick and tasty! These slices wouldn't fit into our old toaster which was sized to the usual skimpy commercial, wonderbread sized slices. Enter, this new toaster and the slots are indeed extra wide! We have had an issue with only one side being toasted (no we weren't using the bagel button). I'm not sure what's up with that but the toaster is very consistent in its "toasting" and pops up the thicker, heavy slices no problems!

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Bought this to replace a Black and Decker that didn't last nearly as long as hoped for , and never toasted the bread evenly . Also had a retractable cord that we had issues with practically from day one . This little toaster was very cheap , and we were figuring on using it as a stop gap until our research turned up a premium one . Low and behold , had it for over a year now , no issues , temp control works well , mostly even toasting , and super easy clean out . If it lasts another year we will be very pleased . I would recommend for the price .

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Toast Master 5000 should be this little darling's name.
review_text: This toaster is fkn amazing. It toasts bread as if you placed it out as an offering to a Fire God. This little miracle has save peanut butter and jelly the shame of going onto the more inferior version of bread that comes out of whale killing bags. My office's moral has tripled since I purchased this gem. Seriously. Buy it.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: My old toaster broke and it was time to buy a new one, that was when I noticed that toasters are pretty expensive for what they are. Then I came across this AmazonBasics toaster and I was intrigued. There are a few things I look for in a toaster and it met them all. 1) Does this make toast? CHECK 2) Does it have a cancel button? CHECK and 3) Does it have a toastyness adjustment? CHECK So I bought the toaster and I got it and I was so excited because I hadn't had toast in two days!!!! I made my first batch of toast. My first impression was, wow this handle is so smooth, nothing like my old toaster. Then came time to adjust the level of toastyness, hmmm...I think I will go with 3. I waited and then POP (a nice quiet pop) my toast was done. It was perfect and this toaster is awesome.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Sometimes basics are all we need.
review_text: I never had the opportunity to pick out something as innocuous as a toaster before, but sometimes choosing something trivial carries a lot of weight, compared to other things in life. That being said, since it’s just me, a two slice model is ideal. Also having the option to brown one side of a toasted item, like a bagel or English muffin, allows for safe retrieval by hand with minimal risk of burning my hand. It’s not flashy, but it also didn’t cost a lot of money either, especially for being a Warehouse Deal. If the box is mangled or handled a lot, but the item inside is functional and untouched, I will take it.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: I am very happy with my purchase of this toaster! It has a small footprint, which is great for conserving counter space. The slots are wide and deep, perfect for anything from English muffins to bagels or artisan breads. It has an indicator light that clearly shows when it is on that also serves as the cancel button, so easy to find should you need it quickly. It has a frozen mode and a bagel mode. The cord is sufficiently long unlike others I have had. There is definitely a strong smell upon first use as others have stated, though I do not think it is more than others “hot” appliances. I plugged this in outside the first time and ran it through 2 cycles on setting 5 and now it doesn’t smell at all! My first use of it was an English muffin on setting 3 and I am happy to report it toasted it perfectly golden! For the price, I am very happy with it and will pocket the extra $50 I would have likely spent on other kitchen brands.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: After all these years of buying toasters I just wanted one that was a simple and clean design, and just to toast. I love the Amazon Basics!! It’s just what I wanted. I have decided to lighten the load of the kitchen counters and keep this toaster under the counter. It is lightweight and so after each usage I turn it upside down to empty the crumbs out. It’s giving my counter a less cluttered look and cooks my toast perfectly!

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Quality of the product is good. Easy to clean and use. Temperature control system is fine. Good buy !

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Bezt toaster I have had... better than models costing 3 times as much.
review_text: Unlike others I have owned and discarded, this one toasts evenly. We bought it for our RV because of its small footprint. Since getting it, I have tossed the other two, each of which cost just under $100 but which toasted very unevenly. I have used this one with several kinds of bread as well as english muffins and bagels, and it does a superior job on everything. I'm ordering another one for the house. Need a 4 slice model? Buy two of these. You will get better toast and still save money.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: I was literally looking for the cheapest toaster that has a bagel toasting option (and wasn’t guaranteed to burn my house down or blow all fuses) I could possibly find and thus came across this amazon branded one. Personally I find it ugly , I don’t care. The black parts of the housing are plastic, and look it, too. I can’t promise you that each slice is evenly toasted - I frankly never take the time to check that they are. The bread, any type I’ve put in so far, smells , feels , looks and tastes toasted - good enough for me! It’s super simple to use, as all toasters should be, which delights my kids (we so far always toasted under the broiler, so they’re super excited about making their own toast, poor toaster deprived kids). I absolutely would recommend this to anyone looking for a functional, inexpensive toaster.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this little ice maker!
review_text: Wish I'd bought it sooner. When the ice maker in our Whirlpool refrigerator stopped working, we tried in vain to get the replacement assembly to fix it. Two different companies claimed to send the 'right one' but over $200 in parts and what seems like 1,000 store bought bags of ice later, still no solution. Finally got tired of asking people to bring a bag of ice over practically every day or every other day to sustain my iced tea drinking habit and I bought this little gem and hoped for the best. I was not disappointed. As a self-proclaimed "ice-aholic", this machine has not let me down, Only one slight issue (and it's really not that big of a deal) you just need to break up the little slab of ice cubes that dump out into the tray as they don't usually separate on their own, But, truthfully, who cares? For all the inconvenience (and expense) of having to haul bags of ice from the store to home, break it up and squeeze it into my freezer just to have to repeat the same process a day and a half later, I'll take the few seconds it takes to break up the little slabs so I can have all the ice I need and then some! Great product!

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: I was looking at a few different toasters and comparing features and prices before deciding. I wanted a toaster that was going to be delivered in the next few days and was big enough for bagels at a decent price. Those were really my only requirements, except that I also did not want it to be red. (For some reason I always seem to find a lot of red kitchen decorations and appliances.) There was another toaster, similar to this one, that I had decided on but it was a little pricier and it was not going to ship fast enough so I chose this one instead. I don't regret it. This toaster has some good features: -The slots are nice and wide, definitely wide enough for bagels. In fact, there is also a bagel setting, which works great. Put the bagel into the slots with the outside facing in, and the inside will remain soft while the outside gets toasted. -The frozen setting is good, too. Although, I don't use it much because I don't like the idea of water dripping into the toaster. (I don't really know if that's what happens, admittedly.)
