The few times that I have used it, it works well. Frozen waffles come out nice and toasty. -It is very easy to clean. The tray comes out easily, wipe it clean and put it back in, the end. I have had no issues. -There is a cord control mechanism at the bottom of the toaster. I don't know exactly what to call it. You can tuck the cord into it so that it's neat and not dangling anywhere potentially dangerous. This was a surprise feature for me, which I like a lot because, although it is sometimes inevitable because everything nowadays is electric, I don't like cords all over the place where you can potentially snag or trip on them. Coincidentally, I found out I have a friend that also has this toaster and they say they like it a lot, too.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Reminds me of the GE toaster we bought 60 years ago.
review_text: That GE toaster we bought 60 years ago was very similar to this toaster and it lasted for 20 years. It even looked the same. This seems to be a retro of the old one. We liked that one and we like this one. My daughter dropped the GE 40 years ago and broke the tiny knob on the temperature set lever and I threw it away. Dumb. Anyway, this is the first toaster we have had in the last 15 years that seems to similar to the old one. It is light, doesn't have "Clever" features and seems to be a retro of the old GE. The temperature adjust knob is simple too, just turn it to the midway point and it will make toast moderately toasted. I hope it lasts as long.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: I never knew what a challenge it would be to find a toaster that will toast on both sides evenly. This is my 4th or 5th toaster in the past 30 days; started out with of the most expensive toasters thinking at that price it has to toast perfectly; WRONG. Not only did it not toast on both sides but the bread would get stuck when it popped up. On to the hunt for the best toaster and reading dozens and dozens of reviews. Who knew this was more work than purchasing a new car!!! All I want is my toast to toast evenly on both sides - it that so hard to do???? Think about it - it's a TOASTER; isn't that the whole idea of a toaster? Put bread in, little-heated elements inside the toaster light up and cook the toast for a short time and then pop up. So why do some toaster toast one side OK and the other side is toasted randomly (maybe the top OR bottom or just the side). Hmmm, makes me wonder what's going on in their quality control :-). Anyway, I found the perfect toaster and this is it!! Great price, toasts evenly on BOTH sides just the way a toaster should. Don't hesitate if you're looking for a toaster to do a good job; don't let the fact that because this toaster is relatively inexpensive it's not a good toaster because it is - it's the BEST toaster. I've used it now for over a month and I continue to be impressed. English muffins have never been so well and evenly toasted. Can't say enough about how well this toaster does the job!!!!

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: my little 10+ year old toaster died so i went looking for a new one....who knew toasters could get so pricy...well i spotted this one...had all the features i needed for cheap!! now I've seen a few questions about this toaster its consistency on toasting etc....here's what i noticed...sometimes I'm a 2 piece of toast guy maybe 3 or 4...well with dial on 3 its plenty dark!! id recommend not going much higher (at least for toast)) or it will be burnt!! now I've noticed if i do just one slice second time around it comes out darker than first...but if i do 2 slices 2nd time around it seems pretty consistent... i definitely recommend this !!

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: if you just need an ordinary toaster this one is great, love it. Toasts English muffins to a tee. If you want bells and whistles then buy bells and whistles.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: I have celiac and needed my own toaster (cross contamination) for only gluten free bread. This toaster works as expected. I hadn’t had toast in so long it was heavenly to finally be able to toast my (gluten free - aka blah) bread and smother it with jelly. It did have a plastic smell when I unboxed it. I ran the toaster through a few “toasting” cycles to burn off the smell before I used it with food and that worked great.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Finally, a real toaster that works like a toaster should work. Now a toaster is really a super simple device that everybody should be able to produce and at a reasonable price. But current toasters range from $19 to up over $100. I've gone thru several units in the past three years that toast only slightly better than a Zippo Lighter, but their toasting shades are all over the map. First ones look good, but the second slices look like burnt pieces of oak!! I took a chance on this one from Amazon, because I knew I could send it back if it didn't work correctly, and have been most pleasantly pleased. This one works like a toaster!! If you remember what the old Sunbeam toasters of the 1950's used to do, this one reminds of one of those. Set you shade/temp and leave it there. It's consistent in its toasting. And with these wide slots, bagels, english muffins, and even some burger buns and hotdog buns can be toasted. Cleaning this toaster is really no different than other toasters, unplug it, drop the crumb tray, then lightly tap the sides of the toaster over your trash can and you're good to go until the next time. I feel good knowing I've finally found a toaster that actually works, but of course your results could be different.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: This review is for the silver color toaster. I wanted a simple toaster and this is the reason i purchased this one. Please note that the toaster does have a white base. In some of the pictures it shows just a silver toaster. The toaster does what its intended for. It does have a knob for the toasting level. When turning the knob its not a click on number knob, it sounds more like your turning up the electricity. Im mentioning this just in case this is important to you or not. Also the cord is not very long, which i dont mind. Like i said before i was looking for a simple toaster. This toaster also has a bagel button and defrost button. I dont use these since i like toasting just bread and at a light toast. For this i use the number 3. I’ve had this toast for a couple of weeks and is still delivering results. So if you want a simple toaster i think you will be happy with this one!

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Happy with this purchase. But, what can I say...it's a toaster. No glamour here. Just an appliance that works well and didn't break the bank. After reading dramatic reviews about the ungodly stench when it heats up I opted to run it through several toasting cycles outside (in a safe location) before actually using it inside. What ever smell there might have been disapated and first use indoors was absolutely odor free. So far, very happy.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: This toaster does a very good, even job of toasting bread on both sides in one slot. The evenness is good on one side of the bread and a bit less good on the other side in the other slot. Not a serious problem, though. It does bagels very nicely. The toaster comes with a small but well done user's guide. As per instructions in that booklet, when first unboxed, I put the toaster through about eight dry runs with nothing being toasted. That dissipated the metallic/chemical residue odor that's common with high-heat small appliances. At its first actual use with bread inside, there was no odor. My one complaint so far is the heat-setting adjustment knob. It's matte black with a ridged circumference. There is a small, slightly raised matte black indicator ridge on the knob that can be hard to see. The knob itself has no detentes and turns easily. That can make it easy to accidentally move it off your just-right setting and a bit fiddly to get back to where you want it. Providing detentes at and between the setting numbers or including a protective collar around the knob would add little to the cost and go a long way toward maintaining the user's desired setting.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Cheap but functional, and worked well for me
review_text: Gosh, I never knew toasters were so controversial! Seems like there is a lot of variations in individuals, so it might be hit or miss no matter what brand of toaster you get. I casually researched toasters for weeks before settling in this one. I wanted a simple, effective toaster mainly for thin-sliced Dave's Killer Bread, with the occasional bagel as a treat. The higher end toasters are certainly more attractive than this one, but I couldn't justify spending several times more on something that toasts bread. This toaster toasts my thin-sliced bread consistently - no uneven patches. The few times I have used the bagel and frozen setting, they also performed well. It has a bit of a flimsy feel to it - cheaper materials, lightweight, so I don't know how long it will last. Normally I prefer to buy one well-made, long-lasting product over a cheap product that needs to be replaced. But since the reviews for higher end toasters are just as mixed as the low end ones, I decided to go for this one.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Best toaster I have ever owned
review_text: We absolutely love this toaster. It toasts evenly, very easy to clean, and it has a cancel button as well as a bagel and defrost option. It's a little more expensive than the run of the mill toasters, but well worth the price. Cool feature is the pull out tray on the bottom which makes it stupid easy to clean.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_header: Need a Toaster?! Look no further!
review_text: Very happy! This was my first “Amazon Basics” product and I couldn’t be happier!!! This toaster is amazing! - Looking for warm bread? This will do it! - Want some crispy blackened carb slices? This will do it! - If you love perfectly toasted bagels... this will do it! - Want to try and burn some crackers? This will probably get the job done! - Looking for a new way to make a toaster strudel? It won’t be a new way... but it’ll get the job done! - Are you needing a new appliance to sit on your counter and never get used? Check! - Have you been wanting to try and warm up that focaccia? This thing should get er’ done. Your probably thinking... what can’t this toaster do?! Right?! Well it won’t babysit... make you a fresh squeezed margarita... or do you laundry... so I’m a little disappointed in that. Toast is an essential part of a daily routine. This thing will help you be a better toastier person... for reals yo. I would recommend buying this toaster to anyone in the market something to make you a delicious breakfast. Highly satisfied.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: Decide to pick this one because of the positive reviews, to replace the expensive toaster I returned that didn't toast worth a darn. This Amazon Basic is awesome!!! Toasts both sides well, and does not seem to take too long. It has the lift handle for smaller slices of bread, so you don't burn your fingers. Great bargain and construction seems solid. At the price, I don't mind if it last a couple of years and then needs to be replaced.

product_title: Amazon Basics 2 Slice, Extra-Wide Slot Toaster with 6 Shade Settings, Black
review_text: When the toaster arrived, the box was plain and simple. And yes it’s mostly plastic, with a few metal accents. And no, it’s not a heavy weight, if you can’t live without a toaster that weighs as much as your stove, this isn’t for you. What makes this different from other toasters in this price range is the the frozen, bagel and cancel buttons light up, so you can know what’s going on. Some toasters don’t have these lights, so you’re in the dark, so to speak. Another item that sets this apart for me was how well it toasted. With a frozen piece of thick bread, and the toaster set on 4 & the frozen feature selected, the toast came out nearly like charcoal. Our last toaster didn’t have a frozen option, and it would take going through on 6 to get the bread barely tan. If I wanted dry white bread, I could do that in the microwave. I love that this thing gets down to business and makes “toast” the first time! The stated dimensions for the slot width is 1 1/4” my measurements make it closer to 1 1/2”, which should be great for badges and buns. As to the odor from the coils, just follow the directions in the owners manual, the odor cooks off and disappears fairly quickly. So far I’ve been impressed with this and all Amazon private label products I’ve purchased. Their bottom line doesn’t seem to just be the lowest bidder. They seem to find a nice balance between quality/fairly well made and a reasonable price. I would definitely be willing to try other Amazon branded appliances as they become available.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: It's a good cheap sling for the money. The clasps are made of metal and are decent quality. Several people have asked if it can be converted into a single point and the answer is yes. There was a hole in one clasp that is big enough for the second one to fit through with plenty of room. I'll pick up another two or three of these.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Sometimes I need to hike a bit until I get to where I am going to shoot my bow. This sling makes it a lot easier to carry. I am new to archery. The archery slings may work better. For my money, however, this sling was a much better buy. I will figure out what is appropriate for my bow later. For now, I have something that works for very little money.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Seems pretty sturdy so far. Know in cheaper slings like these the metal clips are unknown metal and not the greatest but these seem decent so far. If they break for some reason will update

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Product works as intended. I would not mount this on a heavy or expensive rifle. This works perfectly on my M&P15-22. The clasps are metal and all other hardware is plastic. If you’re tall or need to extend the length of the sling, I recommend looping the excess though the second buckle as shown in the picture to keep it from unraveling and dropping you’re rifle. This sling is good for a day at the range but would not recommend using this sling to carry a rifle hiking or trekking long distances as it would be very uncomfortable. Aside from everything mentioned I would purchase again. The rating is reflective of the quality at the price point.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Awesome sling! Was surprised was expecting junk.
review_text: Awesome sling. Was expecting it to be junk. This is basically the same as the $70 options. Just some features you can live with out. Best sling you can buy under $50

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I grabbed this so I could let my AR hang by my side while I'm not shooting. No tangling, easy on easy off, lightweight and durable. Great price.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: NOT FOR BB GUNS ONLY REAL GUNS !!!
review_text: It’s a prefect strap for your gun but the problem with me was that I bought it for a BB gun which wasn’t meant for it and the weight of the gun couldn’t handle itself. So I suggest you only buy this for real guns... plus it’s good for the price and time -5stars

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Will keep your rifle on your shoulder
review_text: I have a nhi other similar sling but liked the clasps on this one for quick changing between two point and one point. The bungee part isn't as stretchy as I'd hoped but has a slight amount of give. My other one is nice and stretchy.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Well made sling, easily adjustable, good value. This hardware allows for single or double point attachment. Wish it came with a shoulder pad but I can probably find a slide-on addition.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Fits my cz evo micro, I’m 6’4 and after adjusting the sling the gun hangs in perfect position. Metal clips, seems very durable, time will tell of course, I use it at the range over a tactical vest. I paid $7 here and have never bought a more expensive one, but this seems high quality. I’m buying another maybe 2. Really you can’t go wrong with this one, IMO.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: This sling is very durable and you can tell by looking at it that it is not cheaply made. I would highly recommend this sling, especially for the price.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Length and adjustments are great, plenty long for a 6’3” person. Strap excess could use a elastic holder to keep from flopping and the clips/buckles are noisy as they are not coated with anything. Great for target and on the move, not for hunting. Would recommend.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Exactly what I was looking for
review_text: Aluminum clasps that lock well and are easy to open. Straps are just the right width (1.5").... not too wide, not too narrow. The elastic straps at both ends of the clasps are a nice touch that have just enough give to absorb light bounces when walking but not so loose that it jiggles. Length of adjustable straps were perfect for both single point mount as well as double points. Overall, for the price, can't be beat.... buy it!

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: It makes for a simple quality of life improvement and adds some extra flair to the look. I will say it took me A LOT of tinkering to get it set up just the way I like. So many different ways to refigure buckles, change the length and get the loose ends just right.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: You can not find a better product for the money. I originally bought one because I was skeptical of the price being low. Well, once I received our first one and tried it out, I ordered a second one. It is comfortable and made well for the price. If you MIGHT need a sling at all, give this one a shot. For the money it's great to have as a spare or for a shooting buddy that shows up unprepared. Definitely recommend, especially for the price.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I have yet to properly put this sling through the grinder, but I’ve done a number of runs with overloaded gear and had zero problems as of yet. This sling feels very solid and has yet to give me any regrets

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: High quality product for a low price.
review_text: This CVLIFE two points sling is made extremely tough and the clips have plenty of room to fit whatever type of mounts I choose to put on my gun and the other CVLIFE products I've purchased have all been very well made, and CVLIFE stands behind their products 100% they are now the brand I look for in whatever it is I'm needing I highly recommend this brand.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Yes, I know...there are more feature rich slings out there in the world, but for my needs, this is perfect and I have more money to spend on ammo if I can ever get my hands on some.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Great Price and a Great Warranty
review_text: You should buy this not only because it’s a good product at a reasonable price, but also because of their 12 Month Warranty. That alone gave me confidence in the product I was buying.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Fast shipping and works great thanks
review_text: Works and looks great thanks

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: CVLife Products are a great value
review_text: CVLife Products are a great value, and when compared to what they offer here compare to a sporting goods site, CVLife price for the quality cannot beat. In addition CVlife products are normally Prime products so free shipping. This 2 Pt sling is comfortable and made to last. Available in multiple colors. I am pleased with all CVlife products purchased, including this new addition 2 point sling.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I like the strap. Very versatile but the clasps were to large to connect to my Savage 64F. Not a big deal since I had some loops to use in between. Comfortable to use.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Sturdy sling, plenty long, works well
review_text: I read reviews where people had concerns about the plastic parts where you adjust the sling, but I have no concerns with the quality I see. Plus there are 4 of them so even if 2 were to break somehow the sling still works. The sling had a strong bungee cord embedded on each side encased within the fabric. It allows for some shock absorption but feels very sturdy. I put it on an AR 15 and it is plenty long.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: 55" of good basic sling w/ steel clips and strong elastic!
review_text: VG value sling! Would buy again! - 55" max tip to tip length (if need longer could replace center webbing) - Web is 1.5" wide (flexible "seat belt" quality, not the thick stiff stuff) - Bungee sections are strong - No speed or quick adjust (just normal web adjust slides) - Snap clips are steel and operate well

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I really like this sling, it's definitely the best one I have. I used it on a 5 day turkey hunt in southern Ohio on a 20ga. Plenty of adjustment, once adjusted it stays in place. It rained most of the week, this thing got drenched several times for hours and I haven't seen any ill affects from it. The clips work well and seem to be good quality. Most importantly, it was extremely comfortable. I had this sling on my shoulders for several hours each day and never had that painful backpack strap feeling you get after having a strap on your shoulders for awhile. I'll definitely buy more of these in the future.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Using this on an M4 A1 Airsoft rifle and it is perfect
review_text: The sling works perfectly. Easily adjusts to any size person and the clips will fit just about any weapon you want to use it on. Material looks like it will last a long time. Also has a section of bungy cord built into it to lessen shock when running around.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I like that there are 4 strap holders. I don't know what they are called. They make sure that there are no straps hanging down to get caught on something. I like that I can make the strap somewhat tight to my body and still have that little extra stretch to get on target when I need it.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: This is well made enough that I should get years of use out of it. It's long enough that you can adjust and cut to your liking and comfort. It serves its purpose well and so far I've had no issues.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Cant seem to get it to fit comfortably over the shoulder or not have the firearm upside down horizontall., but I think it’s more that its on a long stock shotgun as opposed to pistol grip, and it needs another connection between sling and and swivel connection that to allows for 360° rotation. Sure i’ll figure it out. Length is good though.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: A good product for the price. It is easy to put on and easy to adjust. Its basically 2 slings in one. You can use it for over the shoulder carry or switch it to around the neck carry. It's a very good sling. I reccomend it.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Good product & fast shipping. I wish it would fit a modified buttstock like MAGPUL brand on my AR but had to put a clip or hook at end of my rifle to stay on correctly. Other than that it has multiple adjustments, sturdy material & easy to use for my needs. Definitely recommend it!

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Sling is extremely easy to adjust. It's my first sling from this company. I was drawn to it by the price and functionality. It'll go on my primary home defense weapon. I very impressed with it.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Used this product immediately upon receiving for a 12 hour Counter Terror Rifle course. I only took the rifle off one time during lunch break I was hesitant on purchasing due to the seemingly low price but I’m very happy with my purchase. It is comfortable, sturdy, and the bungee makes maneuvering a breeze. I will be ordering more for my other rifles

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Great price and holds up really well during firefights and running sliding all around

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I don’t really care for spending 200 bucks on a strap. Maybe that’s a mistake on my end, But for a range setup this is totally fine. If I’m in a position to need something better I have bigger problems than the strap, so tbh for a working mans setup, this is adequate.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Excellent sling, especially for the money. The clips make for fast, easy setup and changes. Can be used as a single- or two-point. The bungee sections are nice and stiff, and the webbing is wide and strong. Thoroughly impressed.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: CAN BE USED FOR SINGLE POINT OR 2 POINT CONNECTION
review_text: I bought these as Christmas presents for my hunting buddies, they both loved the ones I have on my rifles. They are lightweight, flexible and strong with several ways to adjust them for either single connection or 2 point connection. We went hunting day after Christmas and my buddies loved the flexibility and the option of having a single or double attachable sling. Can’t beat the price either.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: The only item that i have ever ordered and recieved on a sunday ever!!! Item cane fast and 2 days earlier than expected . Very strong durable and reliable excited to take this in the field when i shoot great buy

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I just received this in the mail today, it appears to be made well, I am happy about that. Five stars ***** for now, we'll see how the longevity portion goes. The material is a slick type of fabric, whether it's man-made or not, I don't know, with use comes wear, so that part is still in the unforeseeable future. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________ The stitching appears to be haphazardly sewn in a very jagged line, whatever that means. ________________________________________________________________________________________________________ The buckles are plastic, they 'appear to be' solid and 'should' last a while, but, you know how plastic is when it comes from 'you know where'. They are 1/4 inch at its thickest point, and 1/8th inch at its thinnest. The metal hook fastener that holds the strap onto the rifle is seemingly O.K., time will also tell what will happen. It does appear to be well-made, but sometimes metal from, 'you know where' is not made to standards. As far as comfort, I would have to give that a 3 star rating, *** it's not that comfortable because the sling is very narrow, about an inch. This rifle I will use this on is a Ruger 10/22 and it weighs 'about' 8 pounds or so, that is loaded with 30 rounds and it has a flashlight and a green laser on it. It also has a 3 pound .920 heavy bull barrel on it, which REALLY adds to the weight overall. I also have an after-market plastic stock, (Fab Defense) which is really about the same weight as the wooden stock it came with. All of this crap really adds to the overall weight, quite a bit... ________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Really a GREAT price, but again, only if its made well, and we'll see about that in the long run... Five stars ***** for now... ________________________________________________________________________________________________________ I tried to make it a single-point sling, but, really, to do that, you would have to place BOTH snap buckles in one ring, I have it that way right now just to see how that works, I have no place to try it out right now, so it'll just stay that way until I decide if its worth it or not, I think not, but, again, we'll see... Three stars, *** but, I have to say, it's not like they said it would be a single-point sling, but I bought it hoping that it might work out. So, maybe it'd be a five star rating ***** IF you want a two-point sling... ________________________________________________________________________________________________________ It got here in two days, it was packaged very well, and I didn't have any problems at all from the seller or USPS, things went good for a change. :) I don't plan on using this for anything in particular, mostly plinking, so the weight part is not a worry for me, your rifle may vary, of course and change the dynamics of what I have above...

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I have not had a chance to really put it to the test yet but it's a nice fit. The hook catches are very easy to connect and disconnect. Very comfortable over the shoulder.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Tits, PE Buckles Resist Heat and more Important NOISE!
review_text: I immediately ditched My $40 Mossburg sling and bought a few more of these. I have a 28" barrel Semi-Auto Mossburg 9200? I forget what it is, It's old, weighs 20lbs, good only in a blind but, casts shot over a wide area. This sling has no problems handling the weight, that and the buckles don't heat or clang.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Im honestly shocked at how sturdy this product is. It feels super solid, has a lot of slack (im 6'1 with huge shoulders) and it fits very comfortably with a lot of room to spare. The only thing id add to this would MAYBE be a neck cushion so it doesnt dig in, but thats nit picking. Im very happy with this purchase.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Perfect for your Airsoft or .22 plinker
review_text: Can’t beat the price and build for a better then basic 2 point sling. Bought it to sling my air soft rifle rather than pay 75$+ for something with better build and comfort. The adjustments points are long enough for a longer barrel rifle. The cut ends rub against the trapezius for me which is kind of irritating but again- it’s what you pay for. Materials used are adequate (airsoft). You will need your own QD or Clip attachments. All in all, a decent 2 point sling for under $10!

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Great sling at a low price. I wish it had a little padding, but it's still comfortable to wear for extended periods.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: I was looking for a rifle sling for my ar when I ran across this one and thought I would give it go. Much to surprise this seems well made and comfortable. I only bought 1 to try but will be ordering a second today for my rifle. In some of the other reviews they say that the hooks are plastic BUT THEY ARE NOT. So do not worry about this they seem strong and I pulled on then with all my weight (250lbs) and they did not move a bit. Good sling at a affordable price. Good job Amazon.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Just to be clear, the rifle I stock hogs with has a heavy duty Magpul sling. This sling is not heavy duty. That being the case, I like to have a sling on each long gun. This one serves on those firearms that I do not use for hunting or regularly use in training. I doubt this could take a constant beating but it's good to have something on the firearm so that it's ready to go when needed.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: This is an excellent value and an acceptable quality sling. I will be ordering the 2 pack next since the one just received is a decent item. The 2pk works out to $5.45 per sling. You just can't get a sling like this sent to your front door for any less. Sure, it has plastic buckles, but if you want metal you can get those for $29.95. I've seen a lot of negative reviews, but honestly, the guys that wrote those have some type of conceptual disorder! Any adult should be able to look at the pictures, read the description and realize that this is worth the price!

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Really great sling for the price. I was hesitant about buying it since it’s so inexpensive but I was very happily surprised when it came. Very well made. Excellent product.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_header: Good value for a traditional 2 point sling
review_text: Have been thinking about a sling for a while. Compared single and double point and decided to go with the latter. The product arrived super fast and the hooking up to the firearm was a breeze. Tried it on and adjusted the length for a few times and finally it fitted well. The sling makes my AR feels very stable against the body and won’t bother much when walking around including up and down the stairs. Good product.

product_title: CVLIFE Two Points Sling with Length Adjuster Traditional Sling with Metal Hook for Outdoors Black
review_text: Not sure how you can beat it's value! Metal HK style hooks, mate well with the traditional sling rings . Good quality webbing. It does have plastic buckles, but so does my cheap old Allen sling for my hunting SG. Banging that thing around in the woods for near 20 years, with no failure. Do I wish it had quick adjust thumb loop....yeah....but for under ten, I think I can live with it. Plus the webbing comes off on both ends I could sew one in myself. Good Quality, low price...perfect for a defensive carbine. Oh and one more thing I'm a big guy (north of 350)...barrel chested....thirty pack instead of six pack...there is Plenty adjustability in this sling.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Good hair curler! I'm happy with it for the price. Get's very hot; has caught my hair a couple of times on the screws on the closing clamp, but not a big deal for me. A bit big for travel, but tuck it in among clothes and it doesn't take up much space.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I like it overall! The only annoyance is that the temperature adjuster spins sometimes while using it.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I haven't had or used a curling iron for 20+ years and since Covid came on the scene I couldn't cut my hair to I just let it grow out. Now that it's long I've been wanting time style it with large curls and I'm so happy I picked this curler! It has a good range of temperatures and I like the size of the curls it makes! I would definitely recommend this item to anyone looking to have large, bouncy and fun curls!!!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: It was good for the price I did not spend a lot on this it’s very cheap and it did what it was supposed to do. I was kind of doubting buying it because of all the bad reviews even though it was a little bit of money compared to other brands but I still ended up buying it. Because of the size of the barrel obviously you’re not gonna have tight curls it is a little hard to not accidentally press the buttons because they’re right there where your hand is When curling your hair. I just have to be very careful not to press the buttons there’s two options if you don’t read the instruction you might not know (I didn’t at first). There’s a turbo and there’s an on and off the turbo means it’s super hot for hair you can’t really curl that well because they’re being stubborn I wouldn’t use that one for all my hair. The temperature is easy to change. The length of the cord is fine it’s decent not that long but not extremely short were you just keep unpluging it every time. I loved how my hair turned out it was just what I wanted and it lasted the whole day with some hairspray. I have thick hair btw.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I love big curls and have been wanting to get a 1.5 inch curling iron for the longest time. While my 1 inch iron still gave great curls, there are days where I wanted bouncier curls/waves. Another issue is the fact that my hair was only 2 inches past my shoulders, so maybe it's too short? My 1 inch curling iron is already great, so there shouldn't be THAT much of a difference... Right? WRONG. I had such pretty curls that my friends all complimented me and are planning on buying this for themselves as well! My curls were so bouncy that I could help but do hair flips at any given chance.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Awesome price, works great! Just double check the size you are ordering I just clicked order and didn’t choose the right size I could have returned it but it was priced so good I just ordered another one in the size I wanted but now have 2 options!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: It's been a few years since I used a curling iron. Though this is easy to use and great settings, they're all right where my fingers "like" to go, so I have turned off the iron a few times. But I would still highly recommend this iron.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: These curlers get extremely hot … not only do they get hot they are actually good for the price . These are a must have especially if you love big barrel curls

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I really like this curling iron. My hair won't hold any curl, but I use this on my ends. I purchased it because it is bigger around than most curling irons and it is ceramic. If it isn't holding your hair it may be loose. Mine did not have that problem. It holds my hair fine.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: Works perfectly.. curling irons don't burn hair people do!
review_text: So I know what you're thinking why bother buying this cheap curling iron I can tell you I have spent hundreds of dollars on expensive curling irons and flat irons and what I have came to understand is it really doesn't matter what brand you get the only thing that matters is how you protect your hair people always find it shocking when I tell them that you know what my curling iron cost $20 my flat iron maybe only cost me $60 the curling iron works amazing the only thing I cannot stand about this curling iron is the fact that the way that I position my hand my thumb is always on that turn e side that controls the heat range so there's this non stop clicking that happens because I end up sliding the Heat switch and that just irks my nerves but I have managed to really pay attention to where I place my hand and you know what my hair isn't burnt it's fine at the end of the day if you're going to get a cheap iron just make sure you have the right heat protectant and serums for your hair I literally laugh at women who sit up here and say that this burned their hair or this just fried their hair .... there's really no reason why that should be happening to anybody when you can go out and buy you a decent brand of heat protected and shield protectant for your hair it does not burn my hair my luxurious blonde wig is still smooth and silky as it was so don't feel like you need to invest in a super expensive curling iron because this definitely works it heats up super quick and that gets the job done perfectly fine

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: Better iron than more expensive ones
review_text: This iron holds my hair, no loose clamp on mine. I wanted an iron a little bigger than the size a have for a bigger curl and this iron works better than the one I returned that I paid $140 for. Glad I returned the other one, it had a loose clamp!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: Replacing all my curling iron sizes with this one!
review_text: This is just like any other curling iron with two important exceptions: it is lighter, making it easier to handle, and most importantly, it has a timer feature so that on the rare occasions I forget to unplug it, it turns itself off!!! GENIUS—-all curling irons should have this!!!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Love it. My 1” iron makes tighter curls but I wanted a real lose barely there wave. This worked perfectly. I don’t hold it on long and I don’t get any creases. Works just as I hoped.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: My go to everyday curling iron for work
review_text: I like my hair laid down with good heat and the barrel size is perfect for my medium length hair for loose but not bone straight hair. Give my hair volume and an under curl. Wavy not frizzy. Make my hair look smooth and unbothered.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Lol oh man, do I freaking SUCK at curling my hair. I don’t even know why, honestly, my stylist seems to be able to curl my hair just fine using a similar style iron with the same size barrel but I’m sure she could probably use corn on the cob and still get amazing results. I guess that’s why I pay her hella Club Penguin Coins so I can pretend to be an Instagram thot. Sometimes I have her curl my hair just so I can watch and study her hair wizardry fully aware I’m just going straight home afterwards, getting into my favourite eye-gouging, bright, neon-pink camo Snuggie™ to lay on my couch and binge-watch 90 Day Fiancé. Her skills curling my uncooperative hair had me pretty dang convinced she’d made some deal or contract with a very powerful hair demon. You ever seen Inuyasha before? She probably conjured up that same hair demon lady from the first season. Or so I had thought.. until I discovered this bad boy. I can curl my hair like nobody’s business, easy and damage-free. I didn’t even have to sell my soul to some weird anime chick with a fetish for snatching people’s hair. Idk it’s just all around great and easy to use, so much so that I’m thinking of putting up my very own hair-curling/lemonade stand, make myself a decent amount of Neopoints and maybe someday move on up to making the big Voxels. Haha.. ha yeah that’s probably a bit too ambitious for me, honestly. But uh.. yeah, best curling iron I’ve ever owned and used. Oh, and what’s best feature of all, you might ask? Heh, easy one: it’s pink.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This is an excellent curling iron. It works far better than another more expensive curling iron (same size barrel) that I also own. It heats quickly and clamps down just enough to curl my hair without leaving a line. It makes my hair smooth. Recommend it.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This curling iron size is great for when I just want super loose waves. It’s easy to use & I like that it can heat up quickly because I’m almost always running behind.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This is the perfect size barrel for what I need. It heats up fast and is easy to use. The one downfall is the dial for the temperature control is where you fingers tend to lay and hits the dial and changes the temperature while using. Overall this is great and works well.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Love!! I got the 1 1/2 inch iron and it heats up well and easy to use! Only complaint is that the barrel part is heavier than the handle so it doesn’t sit on the counter without tipping over. That’s no big deal when I’m paying such a great price. Definitely would buy again in more sizes!!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This is my new favorite curling iron and I’ve used it everyday since I bought it. The 1 1/2 inch barrel is perfect for curling my ends and creating beach waves. I bought this to take to Greece and it worked great with a power plug adapter.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This curling iron is very smooth and heats up quickly. The temperature control is in an odd place for me, I was placing my thumb on the dial and inadvertently turning down the heat setting when curling my hair. So I had to train myself to hold the iron differently so I wouldn't accidentally turn down the heat. Other than that, no complaints. It works great and I would purchase it again.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Easy to use! I was impressed for the price. The temperature control placement is a little awkward because if you aren’t paying attention, you can accidentally change the dial or switch it off. I did like the inclusion of “turbo mode” which made it heat up a little more for hard areas. The top layer of my hair is coarser than the rest and harder to get to maintain shape, but turbo really helped it catch up to the rest of my hair

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I’ve been using this for about a month and love it. It’s smooth and does not tug on your hair and heats up quickly. I also like that it has the auto shut off.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5 Inch Curling Iron 30 Heat Settings is Perfect
review_text: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5 Inch Curling Iron with 30 settings worked great last 3 days I styled my hair. I only had 2 settings on my 15 year old iron. To be able to choose heat setting my hair needs is nice no more standing over an iron praying it didn't get to hot to use has been great.. I purchased the 1 inch matching iron too. Ceramic iron is much different then the old metal barrel irons. Don't feel like I'm damaging my hair this week at all while curling it. Conair brand is the only brand I've bought since I was a teenager. Hair products last a long time and work perfectly. Happy I have this new Ceramic iron.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: Perfect for Graduation or daily use to achieve Korea-style hair
review_text: I purchased this 1.5 inch barrel because I didn't want straight hair for graduation. However, I didn't want tighter curls because I found they didn't look good underneath the graduation cap. While it's great for achieving big waves (Victoria Secret vibes), I love using it to achieve C curls (Korean style). I especially love that it comes in rose gold/white color.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I was skeptical to buy this, as some of the reviews say it doesn't work very well, but I've had no issues so far. It curls my hair nicely and gives the cute blowout look everyone is looking for right now. It heats up very quickly, and I have pretty fine hair that holds curl easily, so I can understand why it may not work for those with thicker hair, but it has done the job for me at a fraction of the price of other curling irons.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: great travel option for the price
review_text: I bought this to be a cheap travel option, since my normal curling iron isn't dual voltage so I can't take it to Europe. It worked better than expected, came with a convenient heat sleeve so you can pack it up before it completely cools, and it's a cute color. win!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I LOVED These curling irons. Loved how big they were because I wanted big juicy curls. The only problem is when I curling I accidentally keep turning them off. I’ll have to get use to them because I haven’t used curling irons in a long time, only wand curlers. But again LOVE Them. Gave me nice big curls.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This is my second one. The first one lasted for 8 years so I knew I would buy it again. I like the two heat controls. I have hard to curl hair.. It gets hot and really curls but the Ceramic wand doesn't burn your hair and leaves it shiny. I highly recommend this product@

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I love this iron easy to use while fixing hair cord swivel and temperature control really nice not like an old iron have options for what temperature you want. A must have!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Definitely one of my favorites. This curling iron is quick to heat up with multiple settings. It does not burn your hair. It's easy to handle & cools down quickly as well. Light to travel. Definitely a great buy.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I was shocked how it glides through my hair no breaking or snapping my hair out. Love it.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Does what it’s supposed to do. My hair is super straight and rarely hold a curl for more than 5 minutes! Yet, used this curling iron for no just a few curls and they lasted! Received compliments!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This is such a good quality product. It heats up within a 15-20 seconds. It takes 5-10 seconds to curl each strand. The curls last for hours, and because the barrel is thick and produces natural looking curls. My curls turn into waves when I sleep, and my hair looks great in the morning!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This is a pretty big barrel and very smooth. It heats up in seconds and has a turbo switch that is impressive looking. Works great & gets very hot. Why PAY MORE?

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Well it works really good the on-off control I accidentally hit all the time cuz it's in the wrong spot. And the end of the curling iron is very short to keep from burning your fingers Also there is a warning to not put it near water as apparently it has no way of protecting you from being shocked. That's really the one thing I don't like about it.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: At first, I totally thought this was a piece of crap. I ordered the 1.5 inch barrel since I love the loose waves and I have mid-long length hair that I typically grow out. My hair is very fine so I originally used the 5 heat setting. It didn't do anything! So I changed it to 10 then 15 according to the box instructions for thin and normal hair. None of it worked. I thought maybe I just suck at curling hair like I have for years. I used my abandoned 0.5-1" remington curling wand, that I'm not a fan of since it tapers down to size making really tight curls, to check if maybe my Chi thermal protection spray was interfering with the curls. It wasn't, the remington made perfect tight curls. Came back to read the reviews and some people mentioned the turbo option. I tried it one more time with it still set to 15 and the turbo option on. I'm not sure if increasing it makes turbo even hotter but it worked perfectly! The image shows the left curl which was the failed curl. The right curl is after using turbo. Hope this review helps someone! One thing I don't like about the wand is that the temp range is 1-30 rather than actual temperatures.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: Too big for real curls in my hair
review_text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to. However, if your hair is not really quite long, I would get something smaller than 1.5 inches. It seems to be just a bit too big to get anything more than a slight wave on my hair that is a few inches past my shoulder.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I like this product a lot. I’ve had 1.5 inch curling irons before and this one delivered exactly what I thought it would. The temp control selector has a wide selection to set the temp at. It spins around the handle to select. I did find that and the the on/off buttons to be easy to accidentally hit while styling my hair. I think another reviewer had mentioned that as well. That was the only less than desirable part. Honestly, for the low price, I don’t find that a deal breaker at all. This curling iron has been great and I love how I can style my hair and be on trend with big soft waves. I also found the customer video reviews of this product to be helpful.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: great for adding nice, shiny wave to my hair that lasts. I had a large barrel years ago and tossed it because it did not get hot enough. This iron compares to my professional irons for heat and control of temp, very hot! I can curl like a pro.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I really like the conair curling iron! Once I got it in the mail, I tested it on my hair right away. At first glance at the curling iron, i was confused on how to turn it on, but the instructions page was easy to follow and understand. I have med/thick hair so I put the setting between 10-15 and my hair curled perfectly at the right temp. I'm very happy with the way my hair curled.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I love how well conair irons hold up. I’m a professional hairstylist and use this at home everyday! I did this hair tutorial on my IG @daphnepodolak

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I'm very happy with this styling wand. I've had many over the years, but this is my favorite. I don't have to turn it to the highest heat setting, it doesn't pull my hair out, and it's gentle on my ends. Heats quickly but cools down fast so it can be put away soon after using. Great price too! My stylist was impressed!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Excellent replacement for my old revlon that broke. Easy to use, gets to perfect temp and creates the exact wavy style I’m going for. Curls nicely and cools down quickly.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: This curling iron is exactly what I was looking for. I have the 1.5” and it makes really nice, loose curls, and it’s easy to use. It did smell a little like plastic when I first got it, but that only lasted for a few uses.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: My previous Conair curling iron of 15 years was in pristine condition, but the cord ripped, and sparked. I had not been able to find the exact one like I had, but this one is extremely close (mine had a hard plastic cover for travel and a "kickstand" for setting it on a surface that you could bend back out of the way while curling. Other than that, it is the perfect size and has worked perfectly (unlike a smaller one I purchased in a store first that has slits in the plastic at the end of the wand that allow the heat to reach my fingers and burn me every time, so glad this one has a solid safety handle on the end). Thank you so very much, you have no idea how much better this has made my daily routine!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_header: Great alternative for more expensive items
review_text: My new favorite curling iron. It’s pretty, heats up quickly & produces beautiful waves (I purchased the 1.5” size. The only thing I would change is the screw that my hair sometimes gets caught in near the clamp handle part.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: Love it! Perfect for long hair. Easy to use. My last curling iron was an 1/2 inch smaller so I was looking for a more "relaxed" curl. My hair holds curls pretty well throughout the day but I've found with this iron, at the end of the day I end with some big curls and some waves. Looks very relaxed and natural.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I loved this tool. Affordable, easy to use, doesn’t leave my hair frizzy. I have very thick wavy hair and this worked great on mine. Loved the beach curls. The turbo feature is great as well. I’m very happy with my purchase

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic 1.5-Inch Curling Iron
review_text: I love this curling iron, it’s a beautiful color it has a turbo boost button to get hotter. It’s very pretty and would make a beautiful gift

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: First of all, I am NOT an expert (obviously). I am all for quick and try to fuss as little as possible with my hair and makeup. Since I have been wearing fantasy hair colors my hair has been more noticeable and I figured I had best take a little time to do something with it each day so it looked less bone straight and a little more interesting. So, I used what I had. The traditional curling iron. This took FOREVER! I was using it for body, not curl. I thought something easier had to be out there and I stumbled onto this. My picture shows my straight fine hair on one side and the way it looks after one pass with this contraption. I am sold. It took maybe 10 minutes to get all of my hair through this tool on my first use (I have fine hair but I have A LOT of it). ZERO PRODUCT is in my hair in this picture. It gets screaming hot, which is what fine hair requires to hold (very hot and fast works best). I will see how long it stays with me, without styling products, and hopefully I will remember to update this. But I wish I had this thing in high school...many years ago. Nutshell...if you, like me, are a fumbling untrained hair unprofessional this is a great tool for you! Has a great lock feature and tempature control. It also has a wide and longer than expected barrel (I know, that's what she said 🙄). You can cover more ground than with a standard curling iron. It is also very forgiving.

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: First off, I have fine, straight hair but there's a lot of it. It takes a LOT of work to curl my hair with a curling iron & a lot of product to get it to stay. I just used this waver to do my whole head for the first time & it was pretty easy. Nothing in my hair except Aussie detangler so it probably won't stay long but this was just a test run. So far, I'm happy with it! Easy to use, heats up fast, & has multiple heat settings. It made my hair really shiny too! Next time I'll probably use mousse but I just did this on a whim. I did try this on a few sections of hair the day it came in & I had hairspray in my hair & those pieces stayed exactly like they were when I first did it.

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: I usually have bad luck with hair styling tools and they eventually end up at the back of my sink unused. I bought this because I just got my hair cut (long bob) and I like the messy wavy style, however I can never recreate what they stylists do at the salon. I bought this because my hair is not quite long enough to curl and I cannot seem to figure out how to curl my hair with a straightner. This product gives me quick effortless wavy stly without the hassle! I use it every day that I style my hair and I love it. I like that it heats up quickly and locks for easy storage as well.

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: This is the best styling tool I have ever purchased. I have spent hundreds on tools in the past that did not style my hair as quickly, or nicely as this iron. I can curl/wave my hair in FIVE MINUTES... and it lasts for DAYS or until I wash my hair. This is the only tool that has ever worked for my hair. Usually my hair loses curl from a traditional curling iron within a couple of hours, no matter how much or what kind of product I use. This works on my hair with no product and lasts days. I was shocked because of the price and originally purchased this as a “whatever it probably won’t work” product... but I was so wrong. I get so many compliments on my hair. If you are on the fence, TRY IT. There is a learning curve for how to position it to avoid harsh lines, but once you figure it out, it will be the easier tool you ever use.

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_header: Fine and thin to wavy and visually full!!!!!
review_text: I have used this product for a few weeks!!! All the positive reviews were right!!!! I have stick straight, baby fine hair, that never holds curl without AUQUA Net!!! This product after a simple wash and dry, add a little hair spray to give me something to work with, then separate into parts like the video shows WORKED! It’s stayed over night, gave my hair full volume (which I never get!), and is husband approved. I got this on a huge deal but I WOUlD PURcHASE again at full price knowing what I know. Thank you bed head for making this work. I have short arms so it took a little practice to maneuver it Bc you can easily burn your self but worth it!!!

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_header: Great! But tough on carpel tunnel
review_text: Oh my I love this thing! I have NEVER been the kind of gal that could do my own hair. I've tried and tried and ALWAYS failed. I am just not coordinated enough. Plus I look like a toddler with my hair curled. Not this time! Haha. Beach waves are exactly what I needed! It's so cute! It took me a couple times of messing with it to figure out how I liked it. I tried twisting sections of hair first like the other girls on here, bit that didnt work out for me. Turns out I just turned it to mid heat setting, opened and closed it on a small section of hair (no hair spray) and voila! Perfect! Only two suggestions. I did not like what they looked like when I did it on the upper side of my head (closer to the scalp. Looked very 1920s) so I just started the crimping lower in my hair and it looks very pretty now. Also, if you have carpel tunnel like me (I'm only in my 30s too) this may be very hard for you to open and close. It was very painful for me to use this. Takes pains to be beautiful I suppose lol. But seriously reconsider this item if you have bad carpel tunnel/arthritis etc. This is already an issue for me. Bring on the ibuprofen! Love it though! Lol

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: This hair waver is easy to use and provides a great result! For my shorter hair I only need to clamp it once for each section, doing my entire head in about 3-5 min. You can do retro/glam waves or do additional clamps for beach waves. Even my hair dresser is planning to buy this now! Only downside is the temperature control, it is hard to see what temp you are on and it is easy to accidentally move the dial. Still worth buying!

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_header: Best curling tool I have ever used!!
review_text: I have naturally straight hair. I don't even blow dry it, and it looks like I flat ironed it. So, I have always had trouble curling my hair. I have tried curling it with wands, curling irons, and flat irons. NONE of them could get my hair to hold a curl without damaging my hair extensively for having to curl it multiple times and leave the heat on for a long time when doing so. And then once I got a curl, I would have to use so much hair spray that my hair became one unit of movement. AND even then, it would be flat by the end of the evening. I found this on a great sale and decided to give it a shot. I tried it as soon as it arrived; it took me less than 10 minutes, and I have curls that last 2 days with no spray after curling!!! I am completely blown away!! Before using it, I sprayed hairspray (Vavoom) in my hair and brushed through it, then used this to curl. It takes a little practice to make sure the waves don't all line up around your head, but even if they do, all you have to do is change your part or pull half your hair back. My only complaint is that the temperature setting is a dial from high to low and no actual degrees. I would love to be able to set it at an exact temperature/know what temperature is working for my hair vs having to guess where the dial is. Best purchase I have ever made for myself!

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: I really like this waver. My hair is somewhat fine, but I have an average amount of it. The problem with my hair is that I've never colored it and so it has a lot of slip and is "too healthy," to the point that it doesn't hold a curl. This waver (set on medium/low heat so I don't fry my hair) really works. I had the heat up too high at first and my hair definitely had a crispy smell to it. You really don't need the heat up as high as it will go. Speaking of which, the temperature control doesn't say the temp/low/med/high, so you just gotta wing it. That's really my only problem with it and it's not difficult to figure out. But anyway, this is the only hot tool I've used that kept wave in my hair all day and night. I gently tussle it and use hair spray when I'm done and it's perfect -- so much body for my naturally pin-straight, silky hair. Hold the hair section out from your head and use the wand vertically rather than horizontally, stagger where you start in relation to your scalp, use different sized hair sections, and use it in the same direction the whole time (as you switch sides, you might unknowingly flip it). All this helps give it a more natural, mermaid look and prevents a weird uniform wave all over your head, which is not a good look. Happy waving!

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_header: My new #1 favorite styling tool. In LOVE!
review_text: For most of my life I’ve tried different ways of getting the finger-wave retro hair look, I’ve tried to learn pin curls, actual finger waving, spiral wands (what I usually use), and now, finally, my prayers have been answered. This wave tool does exactly what I’ve been striving to create for decades, and it does it FAST. Plus it gives my hair a huge amount of body (it’s normally very thin, low volume). This photo represents my first time using it. It took a little trial and error to learn where to place it, how to get the hair between the jaws, and how to get the wave to match as I work my way down. Excited to learn how to use it even better, maybe with some sort of stying product for even more shine and body (I have nothing on my hair in this photo).

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: I love love love this! I used to have natural curls that were really pretty, and my skin plus hair has changed so much within the past couple of years that my hair won't really curl anymore....it just will do a wave here and there. I decided that I wanted to purchase this to see if it would give my hair some beautiful waves, and boy does it ever! When I curl it with a straightener or a curling iron even with hair products it just falls out....this literally lasted for two days. It most likely would have lasted longer, but I washed it so I could go to the beauty shop and have my hair cut. Enough rambling on....this product is amazing and I highly recommend it. The price is right, the waves held perfectly (I even put it up in a ponytail when I went to bed) even the next day it was so pretty and wavy that I didn't have to re-style it or put any kind of product in it. By the way I like to be as low maintenance as possible and the only products I did use on my hair was a beach wave spray before I used the wave thing, and then some hair spray after I was finished.

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_header: Easy to use for the not-so-hair-savvy
review_text: First time using it, I am TERRIBLE at fixing my hair and this was easy for my 12 year old to use on my hair, so that says a lot. My only contention would be that the temperature gauge is a slider so you don’t know what temperature you’re using. I toggled up to medium-ish heat for my super fine, thin hair. It’s really humid out, so you definitely need to pair with good products to tame frizz if you live in 100% humidity like I do, but overall, it’s a heck of a lot easier than a curling iron and gives you some fun waves! Worth the price in my book.

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: Wow, when Meaghan O’Connor from Little Lime Dress in NYC demonstrated this iron on Instagram stories, I was blown away. Immediately jumped on Amazon to purchase via her affiliate link. I mention this because the link helps the business and it doesn't cost more to purchase this way. Wow is all I can say. My hair now has a fresh summertime wave any time of the year. What makes me especially happy is this iron helps enhance all my hair's natural wave. As I've gotten older my hair has begun its wave. During the pandemic and less device grooming have noticed the wave has increased or is it I'm not dampening it with a blow-drier more often. Even with a lot of long hair, this iron requires very little time to produce its effect. I haven't needed to keep the iron on my hair longer than a few seconds. The wave adds volume and a youthful appearance without expensive trips to the salon. Also, adds variety to options. If needing a more sleek professional straight look do this. If, like most of the time need a little fun hair care this iron rocks. I've only been experimenting for a month. I find it is easy to use out of the box as far as creating waves easily that look amazing. I am still working on varying types of waves. Super wavy to less more subtle. Similar to my natural hair. Highly recommend this product if you want to have a regular option without the expense. The wave stays fill on all day, too. Easy to re-wave the next day to touch up. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️💯

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: The media could not be loaded. Was soooo excited to get this in the mail. It was an Epic Dail Deal for $17! They normally cost around $29. I ended up ordering 2....one for me and one for my 13 year old niece. It's sooooo simple to use. Clamp it on my hair for about 5 seconds each time. Adds so much volume and I dont have to squeeze super hard. It also locks close for better storage. Love everything about it.

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: I absolutely LOVE this tool. I've used it twice and can't get enough! I got tons of compliments and I don't feel I look 80's at all! The first image is with the waves brushed out, and the second is just with hair spray. This tool is super easy to use (I will say though that I have small hands and tend to get cramping from the large handle...totally worth it for me though with this end result!) I'm able to do much larger chunks of hair at a time opposed to my curling wand so my styling time is less, and with as much hair as I have...thats a godsend! Highly recommend!

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_header: Debated buying, but loved it on first try! Lots of Volume and Definition!
review_text: Where has this been all my life? I don't normally bother to style my hair, but I thought I would give this a try because of all the great reviews. It works wonders! My thick hair is so difficult to work with when I use curling irons, and my wrists get tired. This styling tool is a much easier and faster alternative with comparable results. I can make the waves deep or light. When I brush it out, it gives my hair the volume I've always dreamed about - and it lasts for days! As you can see from all the user photos, your results will vary based on a number of factors: your hair texture, if your hair is wet, what products you use, how hard you hold down the clamp, how long you let it set for, and how many strands you are trying to style at once. Try changing these variables to find what works for you. For me, I found that the best results for my thick hair came from dry hair with no products, a two-handed clamp, and about 30 seconds per medium section. Troubleshooting Tips: * The dial for the temperature is too easy to change. I think that's why some of the critiques are saying it does nothing for them or fries their hair. I noticed that my fingers were wrapping around the dial and changing the setting during use. I wish it was digital and would have paid more for digital, but this works well enough. * Clamp down the hair with both hands for more definition. Keep the iron perpendicular to the hair (across it sideways). * The iron doesn't seem to open that wide. You've got to relax your hand completely for it to open. * The iron is larger than my other styling tools, so I sometimes have a tendency to get burns. You might want to use a heat glove for this product. Don't know if anyone will see this...but I hope it helps someone! :)

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_header: Takes practice but end result is super cute!
review_text: This is a fun tool! It took me a bit of practice and it isn't super fast to do a whole head of hair, but I loved the results. I have very fine hair so I sprayed each section of hair with a light hair spray before waving - it seemed to hold better this way. My hair is shoulder length with long layers. Most sections needed 2 crimps to get a wave the whole length of the section. I also held my hair in the clamp longer than I do when using my curling iron (which is a Hot Tools, and gets VERY hot). The cord is nice and long and I love the purple color. This isn't my everyday hair look, but I like having a different look when going out!

product_title: Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves, Purple
review_text: I never liked how my hair looked with a regular barrel curler, but I absolutely love this curler! I get so many compliments whenever I use it. It is time consuming to use, and I definitely recommend putting your hair in small sections to use (I watched YouTube tutorials before I used, and practiced before using it for an actual event, and I absolutely recommend doing this because it took a couple times to get it right for my hair). I currently have medium length hair, and the curls look super bouncy and beachy. I attached a few pictures to show my progress and how it looks at different angles, but I seriously love this curler!
