Because the Dash Clear View Toaster is that awesome! The short of it; don’t waste your time looking for anything else. This toaster can handle anything you throw at it with golden brown perfection, quickly. The Dash Clear View Toaster is the best bang for your buck, hands down! The long of it. We are a “somewhat” healthy eating family. We run the gambit when it comes to bread choices. Hardly ever white, mostly wheat for the kids, and tapioca and/or rice bread for the adults. Not all breads toast to perfection at the same rate. Each one of these breads has a very specific heat tolerance that can make for difficult toasting times. And that’s where the window really comes in handy. With the Dash Clear View Toaster you can sit back and enjoy the toasting experience all while watching the progress through its’ front window. Gone are the days of premature toast ejection just to check on the “doneness” of a specific bread only to have to reinsert the payload back into the heated bay. Visible perfection each and every time. With the white or Tapioca bread, which toast rather quickly, a quick turn to 4 gives us the perfect amount of crunch. The wheat bread takes slightly longer, about a 5 to a 5.5 max. And then there is the ALWAYS FROZEN rice bread. This beast of a bread (Food for Life brand) is twice toasted. Once as a 7 with “defrost” selected and a second plunge at a 7 without the “defrost” selected. AMAZING! The controls are easy to understand, clearly marked and simple to operate. Plug it in, place the toast in the slot provided, push down the plunger and away you go. It takes a matter of a use or two to figure out the proper settings to your liking. The “defrost” feature just doubles the time on the dial. The “bagel” feature only toasts on one side. With some sandwich breads like rye / pumpernickel etc. that have a tendency to toast really well and tear-up the roof of your mouth I like to use the bagel setting. Put the toasted side to the inside (meat side) and the soft untoasted side to the outside, you get the crunch without tearing up the roof of your mouth. AWESOMNESS! I have yet to use the “re-heat” feature … so you are on your own with that one. Sorry Charlie. As far as the toast rocketing from the toaster with the velocity of an unladen swallow, African or Eurpean – doesn’t matter, I have found that to be inconsequential. Does it pop up and sometime flop out on its own? Yes, rarely. But that has happened with my old toaster as well (a re-gifted 2 slice Panasonic that we got as a wedding gift 22 years ago). So really I kind of like the nostalgia of it when it does happen. BONUS! Let’s just hope that I get 22 years out of this amazing beast. So in conclusion, I just wrote an essay on a toaster. What the hell am I thinking?! Yes, it is that great. Click the “Add to Cart” button and get the Dash Clear View Toaster. You will not regret yourself for doing so, unlike your college spring break weekend. Love you son!

product_title: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Aqua
review_header: Best toaster we’ve bought in years!
review_text: This is a GREAT toaster. We’ve bought so many lousy toasters in the past five years but we finally bought the right one. Makes perfect toast and bagels weather frozen or not. It looks great and takes up less room set back against the counter backsplash out of the way. Love the red! Matches my Kitchenaid mixer and coffee maker!

product_title: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Aqua
review_header: Well designed, great looking...and it toasts!
review_text: Just short of our 25th anniversary our old toaster (guess when we got it) bit the dust. There is limited counter space in the kitchen of our Victorian home and we thought the wall hugging design of this toaster was a good idea. The design has a sort of 1950s vibe to it - sort of a Wurlitzer juke box or maybe a little hint of Flash Gordon going on. We really like it. The PROs: *Can't say enough good about being able to see how your toast is doing - it's a whole dimension of usefulness that other toasters don't even address. *All controls are up front and highly visible - no more having to crane your neck down to the side of your toaster to see which button is which - and then having to guess anyway because the printing has probably worn off...or having to wonder which way you have to turn the dial to get your toast lighter or darker. *Really nice looking and a bit different. We like things that are a bit different, like each other, or our kids, or our dogs. The CONs: *I thought about dinging it a star because, as others have reported, the ejection spring is a bit - how shall we put it? - enthusiastic. Especially with a smaller or lighter item it will occasionally launch your breakfast right out of the slot. But on second thought we find this amusing rather than annoying - and far preferable to having to fish your toast out of the slot because your spring has lost its mojo. So we actually consider this a little plus. In case you're wondering, when you select bagel it toasts the side that's facing the window so you can still see how your toast is doing, so the designers were on the ball there. Right now ours tends to brown more quickly toward the top than the bottom but other reviewers have noted that this somehow evens out over time so we'll give it the benefit of the doubt and hope this will happen with ours. It's not drastically uneven but it is noticeable right now. My wife was a bit hesitant to spend more than about twenty bucks for a toaster but we're both glad we did as this thing is designed so very well, looks absolutely great, and is something that is just a bit different from the standard polished cube, adding a touch of style to the kitchen counter. And being able to see how our toast is doing means we may well never burn a breakfast again. Outstanding!

product_title: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Aqua
review_text: I am a toaster fanatic...always looking for a better one! This one may be “the one”! I love the window so you can keep an eye on your progress. The bagel function works well and we use it for toasting hamburger buns and it works great! It’s amusing that the toast pops up and OUT of the toaster... sometimes it lands on top of the toaster or flops onto the counter; it doesn’t bug me, my counters clean 🙃. It took probably 20 uses for the browning to regulate; at first the top portion of the bread would brown significantly more yhan the bottom. Idk why but it seems to have worked itself out and browns evenly now. I love it!

product_title: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Aqua
review_header: Early in the morning toast looks like a sunrise in its window and toast in the ...
review_text: This toaster is worth the price just for the entertainment value. Early in the morning toast looks like a sunrise in its window and toast in the evening is like watching the sunset by the orange glow in the see thru window. Some toast pops out and lands on top ready to pick up, sometimes the toast is found sitting on the counter next to the toaster when it has popped up, this will all depend on the weight of the bread (12 grain VS Wonder white)Seriously it does toast bread evenly and works good. I would try to toast breadsticks but I am afraid I might get hit by the flying bread sticks as they launch. Would buy again and have recommended to friends.

product_title: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Aqua
review_text: This is a very interesting toaster. There are two rods (about 1/4inch diameter by 11 inches long) at the bottom that get red hot and radiate upwards to toast. This is one reason I bought this toaster; I’m hoping that these rods will last longer and give better service than the old skinny wires that seem to go bad in spots in no time at all. We will see about this over time. But, the main reasons I give five stars to this toaster is 1) great look, 2) one long toaster slot, 3)view window, 4)unique heating elements. I can now toast odd things like hot dog and hamburger buns; or large bagels or even large pieces of bread from a loaf! And can decide to toast on one side or both! The only negative thing I can say is; I wish the crumb tray would slide out from the same side as the lever to start toasting. Other than that one minor want, this toaster is a home run! Worth the 50bucks! And would recommend this item to anyone interested. Thanks, Reamo

product_title: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Aqua
review_header: Update: make sure the crumb tray is in place!
review_text: UPDATE: We thought it was broken because it wouldn't depress. turns out the crumb tray wasn't in place and this is some sort of safety mechanism. LURVE THIS TOASTER! One of the best features is that the buttons for the different settings (defrost, toast, bagel) don't have printing on them which can rub off over time effectively rendering them useless (I'm looking at you Oster). And it provides a surprising amount of entertainment for my kids and I what with the window to my toast's progress and the occasional flying toast which has so far landed quite helpfully on top of the toaster slot, actually making it very easy to retrieve our toast. Another unhappy mention for the Oster - it wouldn't pop the toast after maybe six months and I caught my kids fishing their toast out with a fork. Thankfully they have the sense to unplug it, but still. I have yet to comment on durability. My toaster is used, then put away, so it does need to be sturdy. I'll be happy if it outlasts my stupid Oster which didn't see it's first birthday.

product_title: Dash Clear View Toaster: Extra Wide Slot Toaster with See Through Window - Defrost, Reheat + Auto Shut Off Feature for Bagels, Specialty Breads & other Baked Goods - Aqua
review_header: So Glad I Bought This Toaster
review_text: I loved the look of this toaster but was concerned with the mixed reviews. I decided, after looking at toasters that ran from $13 to $299 ( who pays $299 for a toaster ? ) this was so much more attractive than the others, it would be worth buying as long as I could return it if not working properly. So, for an additional $4 I bought the Amazon 4-year warranty. The toaster is great...lovely design and works just fine. I was concerned about the toast flying out of the toaster but, although it does pop up with more enthusiasm than most, the toast settles back into the slot. I have found that rather than use the defrost function the # 7 setting will toast frozen whole grain bread to perfection. So far, very happy with this product.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: Nice looking on the counter and great product
review_text: This toaster if very worth the money. It has wide slots that work well with Texas Toast and Bagels. There are three (3) white lights next to the "setting" dial: bottom for toast, middle light is for bagels so it only toasts the front size and not the back and the third setting cancels your setting and pops up your toast or bagel. If the item in the toaster is small, you need not use a fork or other utensil to get the item out of the toaster, simply lift the lever up another half inch and you can remove the item by hand. Also has two easy to insert on top of toaster as a keep warm for pastries. Easy to adjust all your preferences. Best toaster ever!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Happy with this purchase. Toaster are mostly expensive and it's hard to find one that is reliable, doesn't overheat your bread (and I'm French so I know what I'm talking about!). This toaster has many different functions (e.g. bagel). The support help if you want not to toast but for instance just warm a "croissant" or "pain au chocolat"! I have been using it every morning for 1 week and the regulator also makes sure that I don't burn my slices. Great design as well and this natural beige color looks really neat! Feels like a high-end product, but for a good price. Anyway, great. Five stars.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Just tried our new toaster it's amazing! Hamburger buns toasted just like a restaurant with toast them. This toaster has good levels of how to toast your breads dark light medium and it's a very nice looking toaster. Great price great quality so if you're looking for a toaster if you're looking at this one I would buy it.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: This toastedlooks great an so easy to clean out crumbs. Love the warming trays an easy to put on . Great valve an just easy to use . Would recommend

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Shipping was quick and the toaster works great. I wasn't expecting the warming function to toast, but it does which is great. Super easy to use and toasts really quick. I was a little concerned it was going to be a pretty cheap (poorly made) item because the cost was pretty low, but looks like a much more expensive toaster. The other thing that was nice is when the toast pops up you can push the lever up so that the bread actually sticks above the toaster to pull it out so that you don't burn your fingers trying to get it out of the toaster. This is a helpful feature.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Seems sturdy, has different levels of toasting that seem reliable on repeat use. Kroger private selection wide pan bread slices fit with a little shove down into the toaster. Been happy with this toaster.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: Looks like it plays video games
review_text: My nephew asked if it was a video game system as well as a toaster because I had the two top racks connected and due to its shiny/flashy appearance - this nice-looking toaster works better than most I have had, and six months later it is still going strong. I don't think I could have realized how convenient it is to have 4 slots instead of 2 until I had one! Even if you are like me and don't have a big family, I really feel that 4 slots is the way to go. And the toast controls on this one are pretty accurate. The optional racks are great for defrosting or simply warming. I am very happy with this purchase!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: WOW, great toaster from a new brand!
review_text: I took a chance and ordered this toaster because of the design and price. I never heard of the brand, but then again I never heard of "LG" either and look at what they've become. I've owned lots of toasters - from a $300 toaster from Williams Sonoma others from Wal Mart. Time will tell if this holds up but toasters are inherently disposable - they don't last forever. someone obviously took the time to design this - the features are great, it has a modern timeless look, and the "warming stand" on top is unique. Pus, it works great (my son thought it was an antennae!). The main thing I look for is the bread toasting function, and this toasts evenly and quickly. I like the way you can dial in a setting and it has a lit cancel button. It appears well-made and was carefully packaged. The instruction manual suffers from language translation, but it's easy to understand. For the price, I think it's a great buy. Another reason why Amazon is taking over the world!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: I would trust this brand based on my experience.
review_text: I ordered this toaster back in April of 2020. In November one side malfunctioned and no longer worked. I e-mailed the company and they were extremely helpful. After sending them a video of what it was doing the promptly sent me a brand new replacement within a week. Fantastic service from this company. I would highly recommend this product not just because of my customer service experience but also because the toaster works great!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: This toaster has several features that many toasters do not have. It is a 4-Slice toaster, with "Bagel" button which only toasts the side you want toasted. The days of hard bottoms/tops are gone, only one side of the slot gets heat. With 7 heat settings, the Bagel option, and the detachable warming racks make this toaster unique. And the "HIGH" lift feature means no more fumbling to get a piece of toast or bagel out, the slider raises them up for easy removal.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: I had a Sunbeam 2 slice toaster that was finally giving out on me and I wanted a 4 slice toaster to make breakfast easier. I was a bit confused about that warming rack and didn’t think I would use it but it’s a game changer. The toaster works great, no complaints, but that Warner has changed my life. I buy muffins, croissants whatever pastry I want to be warmed and it warms it perfectly.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Finally! It’s taken so long to find a toaster that suits our family’s needs. We’ve been through some cheaply made toasters and some higher priced toaster ovens but this one is perfect. I think the size is perfect, too - not too big on the counter, it toasts perfectly and the trays remove easily for cleaning. I like the retro styling and the LED indicators are clear and easy to read. The settings are perfect, and the toaster does what it says. A 4 is lightly toasted and viola, the bread is lightly toasted. Too many other toasters burn at medium heat - this one seems to be made really well.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: This is a 5 star product. The toaster gets quite hot and toasts as expected. The two features I love most about it are the warming track and the high lift. The warming rack takes seconds to put in and is great for croissants etc. The high lift makes it easy to get smaller items out of the toaster. Would definitely recommend this product. After a month, no problems at all

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: It cooks evenly, the cook timer knob thing, is accurate. It is very easy to clean, I'm loving the whole tray thing in toasters. No weird smells, just on the first heat up. I know toasters usually give off a smell for awhile, not really their fault depending on how long, this only did it on its first heat up and I never smelled it again, I think this is built a little better. This didn't cost very much at all, very much well worth the money.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Was skeptical cause this toaster was one of the least expensive, bull loved the retro look! So glad I listened to the other reviews and got it! Love this! Works great for me to have 2 slots for my GF stuff, and my husband to have the other 2!!!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: I absolutely love this toaster so much. And would def recommend it!! Not only is it actually really beautiful to look at, but it works really great. I’ve had so many toasters (I have 4 kids) and everyone makes a mess or it has buttons that don’t work. This is by far my favorite!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: This toaster is very efficient. can toast four at once. Nice design as well. Very easy to change temperature depending on how toasted you want your toast to be. I’m my opinion level 3 or 4 is good enough for crispy toast but if you want it to be more burnt (toasted) level 5 to 7 would be the way to go. Saves time with an easy 5 min breakfast. A toasted bread with a slice of meat would be an ideal breakfast. At the same time, toasting croissants.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Reasonable price and works EXTREMELY well. I especially like the warming rack which I had never seen before. It warms bread,rolls very well! Clever little add on which makes this probably the best toaster I have EVER owned! Highly recommend it!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: Easy and attractive on the counter
review_text: Have only had the toaster for less than a week but like it very much so far. Slots are big enough for english muffins or bagels. My husband likes his items toasted darker than mine and so far both sides come out as wanted without overdoing or burning. I love the warming trays as well. Good looking on the counter also. I was missing the warranty card and contacted customer service. They responded immediately with information and a replacement card. Excellent customer service.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: This toaster is great, I was particularly impressed by its operation time, it takes it a minute and fifteen seconds to make toast from the bread. I love its look and I also love the little addition to making croissants

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: Great settings for variety of toasted food
review_text: I love the toaster options. It cooks bagels perfect and croissants on top! Highly recommend!!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Now, this is a pretty snazzy toaster! It looks great and could probably heat up an entire living room if you let it... Fits a bagel just fine. I haven’t tried the warmer racks, but I don’t think those will be a problem. Now, not all toasters last forever, but this one will be just fine during it’s lifetime. I highly recommend.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: This toaster makes me feel like I'm living in the future. It is so nice I ended up buying a couple other new appliances because it made the rest of my stuff seem cheap. It works amazing, even toast and the bagel setting is great.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: I have had thus toaster for 3 months working very well including the brackets on top to warm up Italian bread or biscuits, it real works leaves it crisp and warm to our taste, but we can warm it more if we like . ( Overall toaster is great buy)

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: I bought this on May 22. Yesterday one side stop working. 7/15 Update 7/29 the seller send me a new toaster. Works perfect. Great toaster, great seller.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Looks so good, I threw away my ugly toaster cover. Never knew that there was a toaster that offered the option to only toast a bagel on one side or to warm a roll. Absolutely love this toaster.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Loooooove this toaster from design to functionality!! And the bagel toaster racks on top are awesome feature!! and it’s quick!! Way better toaster than the one I had before!!!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: Save a lot of time for my breakfast
review_text: The media could not be loaded. I’v been using the toaster for two weeks. It works good. It was a hard time for me to choose which one to buy just two weeks ago. I read lots of reviews on different brands. They all have complaints. Finally I made my decision simply by the foldable rock design. After a week of use, I know better of it. I list em below. Pros It roasts maximum 4 slice a time, fast supply for a family’s breakfast. In addition, 2 different browns a time, satisfied different needs. There are enough adjustable functions-how brown, one side or two sides roasting. With the foldable racks, it fits not only sliced bread, but all shapes ones. It is easy to clean the surface, and I believe metal is more durable than plastic. Cons The roaster is light-weighted. It slips easily on the counter when I press the function buttons. It is difficult to clean the inside with a dishcloth. The only way I can do is heat it before use. Cautions Turn the round switch from small numbers, you may need several test before you know which number makes the brown you want. After push down the lever, don’t forget to press the function button-defrost or bagel, otherwise the lever will not pop up automatically. The surface is very hot after use. Leave it aside for a while, it will cool down.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: Coming from a Cuisinart where one of the levers broke off, and complaints by my husband that it never toasted whole grain bread dark enough, I decided to try this unknown brand toaster. It is amazing. Slots are big enough. It toasts darker (looks like the element wires are thicker than the Cuisinart) and the lever is able to be pushed up to raise your bread, if it is too short to grab after it pops up. And for those wanting the bagel function to only toast one side, it does do this. We have had this toaster a few months already and it looks like Amazon is saying that it is out of stock and has no idea if it will be coming back. Note: this toaster was available a while ago under a different manufacturer name with a good review. Amazon did not sell it, but had this one, the identical toaster under the Yabano name. So if you see the identical toaster under a brand new name, but looks identical, give it a try. Maybe that's what they have to do, keep renaming it, to bring it in from China? Who knows. It works. It's still working after months of daily use. And my husband is finally happy with the darker shade of his toast.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: I had this about two months. Bought this to replace a 15+ years old GE 4-slice toaster. This one is far superior; nice, even browning in all slots. Gave it 3 stars for ease of cleaning because the trays have to be accessed from the rear. Love the defrost feature and the levers actually lift the toast high enough so you don't burn your fingers or need tongs to remove the toast. As another reviewer mentioned, the high wattage browns the toast on the outside quickly without drying out the bread. I have not used the warming racks yet. Only other con is that the marks on the dial were hard to see so I outlined them with a marker. I recommend and hope it lasts.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_header: This toaster is better than sliced bread?!?
review_text: I got this toaster thinking it was kind of cute with its retro look and color but also very reasonably priced. It arrived intact and in a timely manner and all I can say is "WOOOOW"! I broke it in with my nasty low carbohydrate and gluten free bread thinking to myself, "Anything has to be better than this" and holy cow! This thing toasted my gluten free, low carbohydrate, flax and rice meal mixed bread like substitute to the most glorious shade of golden brown!! I was still skeptical when I hit the cancel button (three is INCREDIBLY BROWN FYI), but as I dragged the butter knife across what was usually fragile and crumbly bread substitute... I heard the very familiar and long lost scrape of a knife on actual toast. This toaster might just save me from myself.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: I've used this toaster about 10 times since I bought it, so not too much. But I'm happy with it. I toasted sliced bread, bagels, english muffins. It looks good, has plenty of room, and work consistently. If you want a decent toaster at a decent price I think this is a good choice.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: I was so excited for this toaster! Everyone that comes to my apartment is amazed. The holes are big enough like it says for pretty much anything and the little stand are so easy to use and set up. The knobs are soft and easy to turn and numbers are clear to read. Looks so nice!

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver
review_text: My last toaster lasted for over 10 years. it was a combination toaster and toaster oven, yet I think we used the toaster oven feature rarely. well it finally broke and then the search began for a new toaster. i contemplated so many different ones, but went with this based on the reviews and the style. 4 slices, and good reviews. here is another good review. To start, after plugging it in, I ran it to without bread to do 2 things, one, to let it heat cycle to burn of anything it might have on it and 2 to check to se if all the elements lit up correctly. It all looked great so it was time to test it. it toasts really good, its quick, and does the job great. Love the look of it. and the little top brackets to stick on worked great for giving some hamburger buns just a slight amount of light toasting. Fantastic.

product_title: Yabano 4 Slice Toaster, Bagel Toaster with 7 Bread Shade Settings and Warming Rack, 4 Extra Wide Slots, Defrost/Bagel/Cancel Function, Removable Crumb Tray, Stainless Steel Toaster, Silver

review_text: The product looks great and we received compliments on it in the week we used it. Unfortunately, one of the latching mechanisms inside the roasting compartment didn’t work. Also, the bottom part of the toast didn’t toast as well as the rest of the slice of bread. A for aesthetics, F for functionality. I returned within 30 days and received a prompt refund. UPDATE: I received a new toaster from Yabano Customer Service. The new one has the same beautiful look and now toasts my bread to perfection. My wife and kids have been using it regularly and love it! I used it yesterday and the bread was evenly and perfectly toasted on both sides. The customer service provided was superb after having a hiccup with the original product. If you are at all hesitant about buying this product, my experience with their customer service would indicate you should go for it and feel confident that customer service will take care of any issues promptly. Great product; great experience!

review_text: I researched a lot of 4 slice toasters that could also be used for bagels before getting this one. We love it! product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Skeptical at first, but my sis recommended a Dock a Tot. This was basically the same thing, but less expensive and able to grow with my baby as opposed to the $200 one-size alternative! I was also concerned about SIDS while using this, but I think it's more about being a mindful and watchful parent. My baby had a hard time sleeping on the 'hard flat open' surface recommended by the AAP--I know he COULD do it, but sheesh it took at least an hour for him to fall asleep and staying asleep was tough. Combine that with waking up every 1-2hrs to feed at night? And attempting to put him down for naps in the daytime?? SO HARD. As soon as I started using this as his bed (able to move it to my bedside bassinet or his crib), he immediately was sleeping better and quicker (and longer!). It's almost fishy how something as small as this could work, but it does. I think he appreciates the softer padding, but more especially the life-boat-like quality of being encapsulated all around that makes him feel cozy and safe. Pro: You can take this bed with you on trips and he'll sleep the same!! And picking him up to transfer while he's asleep is perfect. 100% recommend, even if you're skeptical. It's worth the $60.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: My 1 month old refused to sleep in his bassinet, this lounger helped so much!! he is a little under 8 lbs and 20inches for reference. It makes him feel safe & cozy. you do not need to spend $175 on the dock-a-tot... this is just as good for less than half the price. The material is extremely well made and soft. the memory foam is the perfect amount of firm for a newborn. i like how the ties make the lounger adjustable. this will also help once we start putting him in his crib. i highly recommend getting this!!! 2 thumbs up for sure.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: We bought this so that our baby could sleep in our bed (you gotta do what you gotta do to get some sleep) and so that we would feel relatively relaxed about it. This product is perfect for just that. Our baby lays between my husband and I and sleeps soundly at night. She didn't like the bassinet and I truly think that's because the mattress is too hard and she didn't like the pack n play either. This product is soft, comfortable and as far as I can tell "safe" for co sleeping.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: My fiancé’s sister in law recommended this product as her kids responded well to sleeping in this. It is half the price of the doc a tot and just as great if not better. It is really soft and double sided, which is a bonus if your baby spits up a lot. Our little guy would only sleep in our arms until we purchased this. We put this inside his bassinet when it’s time for bed. Now he only wakes up to nurse and goes back to sleep immediately after burping. Buy this product!!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This is the best bed ever. Not only can your baby sleep beside you but it is so convenient. We had a bassinet right next to our bed. However, my baby would wake up ever 2-3 hours and I would be so exhausted. We definitely did not want him sleeping in bed with us because we are heavy sleepers BUT this bedding just fits perfect in out bed. It does have a perfect barrier around him. It is soft enough for him. He loves to hang his arm out of it even his leg. Also, I am a breastfeeding mom, and can just turn to my side and feed him while he is laying beside me which is very convenient. My baby boy was a big baby. Currently is 16lbs and 25inchs and still fits perfectly in it. You wash very easily! I WILL DEFINITLY RECOMMEND TO ALL FIRST TIME MOMMYS

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This baby co-sleeping bed is incredible. My baby refuses to sleep in their bassinet & is also very colicky (cries for hours at night). We tied the bottom of this little bed as tight as it could go so it makes my baby feel secure & not just on a wide open space. In the beginning I was against having our baby sleep with us (because I didn’t want to have to deal with detaching in the future) but when you’re dealing with a colicky newborn that can’t be comforted even though you’ve tried EVERYTHING, then you start to reevaluate your expectations. We placed the bed in the middle of us at night so we have peace of mind being able to check on baby or tend to baby when needed. I recommend this product to all new moms who don’t want to be apart from their newborn.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: I absolutely love this. It is larger than I expected, which is a good thing. The fabric is beautiful and soft. The stitching is well done. It is also very easy to set up. It is very beautifully made. The packaging is even good quality.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Bought this instead of a dockatot after my newborn struggled in her bassinet. I thought these were kinda stupid -but baby loves it! I think because she can safely snuggle against the sides and feel still in the womb. Easy to put together, memory foam is firm but soft. I bring this thing all over my house! She naps on the couch in it, on my bed at night (for middle-of-the-night newborn breathing checks), fits inside my arms reach bassinet! I think I would throw it in my suitcase for travel too. Skip the spendy dockatot! This works great!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Absolutely beautiful and very soft. Got this for my soon to be baby boy. So don’t know about baby comfort or him like it yet, but I love it! Easy to put together and will be easy to wash all parts. Zippers seem very sturdy as well.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: My newborn son sleeps so peacefully in this. It's not too bulky, fits in the middle of husband and I, we have a queen bed. I LOVE having my son right next to me at night. Bottom is soft enough to sleep on, but sturdy enough to prop up with pillow underneath so baby can sleep at an incline after feedings.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Better quality than Dock A Tot for half the price
review_text: This is really convenient to have on our sectional couch as another place in the living room to be able to put the baby when he’s not being held. He seems to really like it and has taken 3-4 hour naps in it. He had a large spit up once and the cover was really easy to take off and clean in the washing machine. However I recommend tying the ribbon in a double knot before you do so and/or use a gentle machine cycle as the ribbon came out and it took me forever to thread through with a safety pin. Don’t waste your time with the doc a tot. This baby lounger is more attractive and half the price

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This is one thing I can say is of good quality, it’s pretty and I washed the fabrics a couple of times I got to pint out the zipper doesn’t look long term solid but this item is for short term use anyway. I really just took initial newborn pics in this, and our baby slept in it for a few hours and that was the end of it as it’s just so cold when the baby’s put in it she didn’t like that, and slept with me ever since, as a breastfeeding mom and baby we just don’t need any of these “uzpariktes” and now at 5 weeks that she’s going to be 12lbs soon, it’s kinda tiny. Soooo this is definitely an add-on and NOT a necessity for baby registry, I wouldn’t gift it either, better to have another kind of bursting pillow than this. I’ll probably give this away on OfferUp

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: I was on the fence about this product at first. With this being my 3rd baby, I really felt like I wanted to purchase only the necessities as babies outgrow literally everything so quickly and I have wasted so much money over the years purchasing cute little things that in the end, were seldom used. After about 2 weeks of bringing baby home and him ONLY sleeping when I held him, my sleep deprived self gave in and ordered. This was a game changer! It fit perfectly inside his bassinet and made a world of difference. I was able to transfer him to his bed to sleep without him waking up as soon as I put him down. Now we use it in his crib and I believe it has made the transition very easy. I 10/10 recommend!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: We know these are not recommended for sleep but just like these swaddling has been linked to SIDS and hip issues and thats recommended by hospitals. Swaddling did not work on our little one anyway but we noticed he sleeps well in his car seat. This is similar to the car seat in the way it makes the baby feel secure and snuggled but the baby sleeps as a safer angle. This one is very high quality. The long bumper pillow was very well stuffed and clean. The flat mattress portion is firm while still providing baby with more comfort than the bassinet mattress. The zipper configuration makes the zippers almost disappear. The fabric is 100% cotton and the pattern is cute for a baby boy. We picked the stars and each size matched the other well.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: I was surprised by the quality and comfort. The side walls firmness is adjustable, not sure what the other reviewer was complaining about. the middle cushion is thick and very comfortable as stated in the description. Took 5 minutes to assemble and the star pattern is reversable (white with blue stars or blue with white stars). We also purchased a TotAha for the same price and it's unusable! the middle cushion is paper thin, provides no support, and very uncomfortable! In the process of returning TotAha. Avoid TotAha, don't waste your time!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This thing saved me. You’re supposed to have your baby sleep flat, but my little guy would only sleep in my arms or in the boppy pillow. Sleeping in the boppy long term was giving me anxiety so I tried this. It wasn’t a success right away, but he turned onto it after about 5 attempts & began sleeping for longer stretches. He’s 3 months old and been using it for 2 months already. I have it set inside his bassinet & he’s very comfortable. He’s a big guy and I’m not sure what I’ll do when he outgrows it. It’ll be a sad day indeed. Ps - I’m a borderline germaphobe and all the parts of this wash up really easily. Another plus!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: I have a baby who hates sleeping on his back. We were getting desperate and started looking at Doc a Tots but couldn't really stomach spending nearly $200 on essentially a baby pillow that I was not even a little bit convinced would make a difference. Came across this one on Amazon... still skeptical, but decided it was worth trying for the price after reading the reviews. I wish I could tell you why this thing works, but I have no idea. It just does. I got my first 5 hour stretch of sleep in over a month. Worth every cent. If you're sleep deprived and have a fussy bedtime baby I can't recommend this enough. I hope it works for everyone like it works for us.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: We call it "His Bucket". As we move from one room of the house to another, the bucket comes with. Its both firm and soft. Wherever you are in the house, having one of these nearby is great for quickly setting baby down and knowing they'll be fine. Fits perfectly inside the bassinet we have. Now, as far as cleaning goes. No. Not really the easiest thing to clean. Learned that firsthand. Its cumbersome to pull apart after the first time you assemble it. Its memory foam inside. The outer liner washes normally though. But its not like a waterproof mattress liner; all liquids go right through it. Since that first difficult mess, we've learned to use thick spit cloths to line the inside where baby's head rests. Mess happens, pull the cloth, replace it. Much easier.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: I bought this to put in my daughters bassinet when she first came home from the hospital because she looked so small in it. she is 5 months old and has slept in this in her bassinet in my room every night since. i also like that it comes with a travel bag. i took this on 2 vacations and she slept and napped very soundly in it. the bottom also opens so now that she is taller she is still able to sleep in it. i wish cleaning it was easier. only the middle pillow is removable, not the side pillows. so when she spits up i wash the middle fabric with a sponge and hang dry. wish it was something i could just throw in the wash - but i would reccomend this still. a much more afforable option that the dock-a-tot.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Compared to the over priced 100 and 200 dollar baby beds its still up there in price for the size and what you get but this is prolly the best option for price sturdy solid and easy to tear down to wash.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: We’ve only had this item for 3 nights but it has made a drastic improvement in my son’s sleep! He is finally sleeping through the night at 6 months because of this product. We did dry it in the dryer which caused shrinkage, making the inner pad for very tight in the cover so don’t dry it! I did comment on the machine drying and the seller offered to send another product to make up for the issue. Great seller, great product. Highly recommended!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)

review_text: This lounger came airtight and sealed and immediately puffed out the way it was supposed when taking it out of the bag. I am really impressed with the design and quality. I showed it to my sister and she ended up buying one for her friends baby shower! I havent gotten to use it yet but it fits nicely in my Arms Reach Cosleeper and I think it will be really useful when then baby comes! 🥰

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: The best purchase I have ever made!
review_text: Wow !!! There are not enough words to describe how wonderful this product is! It was the best purchase I have made so far. My baby is 3 months old and has been sleeping from the 1st month here. I place it inside her crib and she sleeps blissfully through the night. Mommy and people who want to give a gift to a future mommy: buy it! My baby from when she was born to the first month, she hated sleeping in her crib. I read on a mommy blog that if they fell asleep on a product like this, it would improve her sleep - and in my case it has worked! since then my daughter loves her crib and of course inside this nest.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: OMG I love this! It is so high quality, was super easy to get put together, is super soft, super cute, a great size, lightweight, really durable, and just overall really really lovely. I plan on using this for my little one to sleep on the couch next to me while I work, take naps on top of our bed (alone of course), and bring to family's homes as a nice, small, portable travel sleeper. My toddler crawled in this to test it out for his upcoming brother and he would not get out. Cannot wait to use this!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: After 3 months of trying to safely cosleep to get any sleep at all, our infant has been able to sleep in her bassinet EVERY night since we introduced this lounger. I know it is still not in accordance with “safe sleep” guidelines, but it is definitely a step in the right direction for us. I still sleep right next to the bassinet so that I can check on her frequently and hear any movement she makes, but she is sleeping on her back & in her own sleep space for the first time since she was born.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Buy this, not a dock-a-tot or snuggle me organic
review_text: Let's just start by saying if you're thinking about paying $100+ for a snuggle me organic or dock-a-tot I'd seriously consider this instead. We tried a snuggle me, thinking it would be a magic thing and safe because of the sling design; it was neither. My baby slept no better in it (at t time he was under 3 months and didn't want to sleep out of our arms) and all the sling did was make it so his head wedged against the padding when he occasionally managed to turn it. Since that was a fail and the dock-a-tot was $75 more, I didn't want to try it. But when he outgrew his newborn lounger that he used (finally) to nap, I tried this. I don't know if I would have felt safe bed-sharing with him in it when he was a newborn, but I wish I'd had it for those few nights where he just wouldn't sleep in his bassinet and I would cautiously pull him into bed with me. Now that he's almost 6 months I feel safe bed-sharing with him in this and it often works for naps. It is a life-saver for me on those inconsolable nights. I see absolutely no reason to spend $100 more for the dock-a-tot and wish I had had this from the beginning.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: My baby was having a hard time with daytime naps, only sleeping for maybe 20 minutes at a time. We ordered this hoping that it would extend her naps by at least a little and it definitely did that. She now would sleep for two hours or more and we ended up having to stop using the lounger as she would sleep so much during the day that she would not sleep at night. We are going to keep it for if we ever travel or for trips to grandma's house where she may need extra comfort. It is a little difficult to put together especially after you wash it, but this was definitely worth the price as I can't believe that any of the more expensive options could work better than this did for our baby.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This lounger is so nice and in my opinion, with every penny. I bought because we co-sleep, but also have an almost 3-year-old in the bed sometimes. We will put baby in this with mama in the middle and toddler on the other side. It’s like a dock a tot, but way more affordable and even nicer! The material is super soft, the inside where baby lays is roomy and the “mattress” is so plush and comfy. Baby will sleep like a dream in this! Plus, it’s easy to move around from one room or the next, or to take it on the go. So quality. It’s one baby purchase you won’t regret making.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Before, baby would scoot right next to me while sleeping. She would wake up sweating from body heat and I worried about her rolling over and not being able to hold herself up to breathe. This is breathable, she doesn’t sweat if left in light clothing layers. She can’t roll out of it and I can’t roll onto it. The mattress is firm but comfortable for her. It’s quality made & cute. Easy to clean too. Just a tip, since it’s not waterproof, put a changing pad under a blanket so you don’t have to wash it everyday.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Highly recommend this product. We were hesitant to spend the money on a dock a tot and SO happy we didn't after seeing the quality of this product. The cover is machine washable and easy to put on. No odor in the packaging when received item. Perfect for the newborn/infant stage when they are napping during the day, easy to put on the couch and know they are safe and not going to roll off. Don't waste your money on a dock a tot! Buy this!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Really easy to set up. Great quality
review_text: It was brand new out of the box. Leave the foam pillow to air out over night before use and make sure you wash the Cover in cold water and hang dry first before inserting the foam pillow. I prefer to hang dry so it doesn’t shrink in the dryer. You can tumble dry low for a short time but, I’m always scared of it shrinking and not fitting over the foam. Foam is easy to insert in cover and easy to tie to have the oval shape. The baby loves it and sleeps so much longer. You can leave it square or oval with the tie. The baby looks comfy in both positions.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This co-sleeper has saved our lives! When we brought our baby girl home, she would only sleep when we were holding her. After spending two weeks with my husband and I taking shifts holding her day and night, we were desperate. I basically bought everything that Amazon promised would make my baby sleep! Before we got this every time we laid her down, she would fuss and work herself up to spitting up all over herself. Not in this, she immediately went from sleeping less than a minute by herself to sleeping a few hours. Now she’s three months old and sleeping through the night in this inside her crib. So thankful we bought this. Also as far as quality, the material and the cushions are nice and comfortable. We’ve washed it lots (again spit up) and although it is a bit tedious to take apart and put back together, it holds up really well. The only negative is the zipper feels a bit cheap, I’ve been afraid it’ll break a few times. But overall, this is such a great co-sleeper and a wonderful alternative to spending $$$ on the dock-a-tot.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Oh my! Why I waited so long to get one of these is beyond me. I never thought that I would need one because my other two kids slept fine, but this third one is not as easy going. I didn’t want to spend a lot on a doc a tot. My baby is 2 months old and would wake up every two hours. “Santa” brought this and ever since I put her in it she has slept through the night EVERY-NIGHT!!! It has magical sleeping powers. No joke! I’ve used it on my bed and in her bassinet and it works wonders. I highly recommend this!! Packaging and set up was super easy. Very soft and seems comfortable.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Looks great, super soft, comfortable for my son
review_text: Bought this to transition my son from bassinet to crib/ pack and play. Very happy with the quality of fabric and cushion. Material is soft (I did wash before using obviously) but it was soft to begin with. Packaged great and instructions were clear. My son is 3 months old, 25 inches long and 14lbs. He is a little long for the nest but he rarely sleeps completely stretched out and if needed, you can untie the bottom. The first night using this he actually slept through the bight for the first time and has been doing better all around since.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This is much cheaper and same results as a docatot. My son loves this. Easy to clean and travel with.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This product was a lifesaver! My daughter was diagnosed with neonatal rhinitis and Laryngomalacia at around 5 weeks. She wouldnt sleep for ANYTHING since she was coughing, choking, had mucus in her throat, everything. When we laid her on her back, she just wasn't comfortable and only slept during the day when I'd leave her in her upright bouncer and swing. UNTIL this came along. Thought I'd give it a try and she slowly started sleeping better. We had to also get the wedge for the halo Bassinet and put it underneath this (wedges are not recommended by the AAP but our doc said it was okay so idk) but worked like a charm!!!! It wasn't the wedge because that alone didn't do anything. Get this right away!!!! We still use it for now at 5 months in her crib. She loves it. We might have to stop using it soon since someone said as she starts to roll over it might smother her. But until then, this is a great product. Makes them feel comfy. Super easy to assemble!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: If your baby can't sleep, GET THIS!
review_text: My son is 5 weeks old and has been struggling to sleep ever since we brought him home. He is very gassy too so it troubles him and doesn't help him with sleep. I saw this and wanted to try it because we all need sleep. From the first time he was in it, he slept wonderfully. He seems so cozy and comfortable and has actually been able to sleep in longer stretches. This was really easy to put together. I washed and dried the cover on delicate. The zippers on the cover are thin and do seem like they could break if you are rough with it but there's no need to be rough with it. To put the mattress in, just fold it in half and put it in. This is a must have!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Bought this while pregnant to fit into a side lying bed for my little one and am amazed at the quality, how easy it is to clean, and how cute it is. The bottom of the nest is nice and sturdy but soft and comfy and the sides can be drawn in or taken out with the provided ribbon to fit the size of your baby. Easy to transport from one room to the next while asleep without disturbing him as it doesn’t bend and keeps him secure during movement. My well fed little one is 5 weeks old (pictured) and it is at the smallest it can be tied but still leaves him room to move around but not enough to where he can roll on his side or have his face covered- he sleeps soundly in it and seems to love the feel of being surrounded in the nest and is his second favorite place to nap/sleep. Can’t say enough about the quality of this product and will be using this until it’s time to pass it on.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Tired mama here! My first child was a dream baby when it came to sleep... this next one, not so much. She’s 6 weeks old and was having the shortest, fussiest sleep at night. We have a bassinet that she would just never stay asleep in, waking every 60-90 minutes. Swaddling never worked and only made things worse because she wanted her arms out. She would wake up more frequently swaddling her arms down. I started having to sleep on the couch with her and use a infant lounger cushion. Once that stopped working I didn’t know what to do. I remembered a friend of mine had the more expensive “brand name” version of this and thought about getting one, because I was desperate for some sleep. I decided to try a more affordable off-brand one with good reviews. And can I tell you? HALLELUJAH! So very glad I found this. As soon as I put my baby in just to try it out, she closed her eyes and fell asleep, NO JOKE!! I actually cried happy tears. The first night she slept a solid 3 hours, woke to nurse, and went back to sleep right away to sleep another 3+ hours. On the 2nd night she slept 4.5 hours before she work to nurse. I was completely skeptical at first, but friends, this works. And it works well. If you’re desperate for sleep, give it a try. Also, I read several comments about how difficult it was to put together, but I didn’t find that at all. I folded the bottom pad lengthwise like a taco and inserted it into the cover with ease. The only thing I was it had a crease you could feel, so I made sure that was on the bottom side not directly under baby. The roll part that goes around baby is a bit tricky, but you just adjust it with a little trial and error, it wasn’t that difficult. Before first use I washed it and hung to dry. (Photo is of my little one sleeping soundly during a monitored nap, I don’t usually use a blanket at night, we use sleep sacks). My only one complaint is that I wish they had more colors! Especially ones for girls. And not so many with white as the main color because that gets dirty easily.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: I finally found something my daughter will sleep.
review_text: My daughter would only sleep with my holding her or right next to me in bed at night. I wanted her to be safer in bed so i did research on something i could put her in while she was still in my bed. I found out that the Dockatot had good reviews but ir was very expensive. This one seems to be working just as well with almost 1/3 or the price.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Im happy i purchased this item! I had trouble getting my newborn to sleep in his bassinet. He would usually wake right after I put him down and would cry on and off for hours. I purchased this nest when he was 4 weeks old. It took him a couple of days to get used to it but once he did, he started going down with minimal problems. He’s 10 weeks old now and loves it! He sleeps soundly and doesn’t wake prematurely like he used to!!! I definitely recommend this product.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Shipment was very fast. I selected regular shipping, but I received it in 2 days! This product looks pretty nice. I really like the light blue/purple color. Hopefully my baby likes it, too! :P It is very soft and breathable. I used other baby nests before, and my kid got his back wet quite often. With this item, it doesn’t happen so far. I have not washed it, but it should be easy since it’s machine washable. It came with a handy bag as well. This is very convenient to carry it for travel.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Love this thing - from a Father
review_text: Lemme tell you something. This thing has absolutely SAVED my handicap while playing PGA 2k20 and caring for the son (3mo) at the same time! I can lay him this little comfy thing right next to me on the course while simultaneously reminding my online opponent that "I am CHAMPION" as I sink a 75ft putt from the sand trap.....you heard that right...putt...from...the....sand trap. Anyways, enough about my ungodly abilities on the digital Links. Back to the Lounger. Super easy to position my lil guy for feeding (via one hand) by sliding half the lounger into your lap. When he spits out his nook? So easy to reach him next to you and slip it right on back in. Kids sleeps like a log in this thing as well. Its pretty sturdy on the underside (memory foam). Wouldn't recommend trying to carry the kid in it though - my kid now has to wear a helmet (kidding kidding). But seriously, don't carry your kid in the thing. Anyways, highly recommend.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Great! Our baby love it, it has lasted really well.
review_text: I have been really impressed with this item! Our little one immediately loved it. It makes it easy for him to have a comfortable familiar space of his own anywhere and helped him to start sleeping longer stretches right away (especially as winter hit and it got colder). It’s super easy to take on the go (though not tiny). We move it room to room and he likes that. Our son is almost 5 months old and still in his bassinet in our room at night. During the day we have started placing this “nest” cushion in his crib in his nursery to help ease him into transitioning into sleeping in there. Now that he is older he notices more when he’s in a different place. This nest has allowed him to be cozy and comfortable in the crib, and makes him sleep in there more easily. It is also great to take for the pack n play use at grandmas. It’s a beautiful “nest” and super soft fabric. The leaf print is very pretty. I highly recommend!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: The media could not be loaded. This is very good quality lounger. My newborn sleeps comfortably in it. It is easy to handle. Machine washable. For my first child, I had purchased one which left me with great disappointment. I lost my money on that. So this time when I bought it, I was just praying for a good and comfortable. I must say it is certainly my good investment. It is thick enough and nice. Base is firm and soft. It is also easy for travel. Overall I love the quality and comfort of using this baby lounger

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Solved the Problem: My Baby Sleeps Great, But Only When I am Holding Him.
review_text: I just have my second kid, he is 4 days old. Just like my first, baby sleeps great while you are holding him or when’s lying next to you on a soft bed supported with pillows, but as soon as you lie him down on a flat crib mattress or even my flat sleeper I have for them - instant tears. I got this in the mail literally yesterday, so obviously my review is written on the high of a first full night sleep, but that said... my 4 day old has slept every hour (minus some hiccups for 20 minutes) since 8:30pm. It’s now 5:00 am and he is still asleep beside me on the bed. He has woken up 3 times to feed, falls asleep at the end of Feeding and when I lie him down, not a single tear or flinch like he knows I have just set him down. It is such a relief!

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: Easy to put together. Love that I can take it apart to wash. Soft and comfy. Me and my boyfriend use this as a co-sleeper for our son. Reminded me of the DockATot without the high price tag. We loved the deer pattern for our son since we did a woodland theme for his room.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_header: Are you tired of waking up in the middle of the night?
review_text: Do you have a baby that doesn’t not sleep well at night? Are you tired of waking up in the middle of the night? I was until I bought this baby nest. It simulates the baby still being in the womb. My daughter would not sleep all night until I got this. It is super soft and made of 100% organic cotton. The end closes or opens up for when your baby gets bigger.

product_title: Mamibaby Baby Lounger Baby Nest Co-Sleeping for Baby, Ultra Soft & Breathable Fiberfill Portable Adjustable Newborn Lounger Crib Bassinet | Newborn Shower Gift Essential (Leaves Pattern)
review_text: This product saved my life! As a 23 year old single mother of the energizer bunny disguised as a beautiful baby girl... sleep was something I almost forgot was a real thing and not just an old wives tale. I was desperately searching for any and everything I could buy or try to get any kind of real, quality sleep. A friend told me to look into a "Dock-A-Tot"... I read the description and was sold.... then I saw the price and laughed wondering which organ I should sell... when I read the reviews on it I was not all that impressed for something so expensive.. about midnight that night, still awake with said energizer bunny, I needed to find a more affordable version to atleast give it a try! That was the best parenting move I've ever made. The very first night using this product I did not have to spend hours sitting in a rocking chair, neither one of us had to suffer while we (yes... WE) cried it out, I didn't have to make a sacrifice to the God's. I assembled it after washing (which took about 3 hot seconds), I placed it in her crib, completed bedtime routine, then I laid her in it, and in the time it took me to walk out of her bedroom and go to my bedroom to look at her on the monitor she was ASLEEP! she slept more that first night than she had the entire 4 months of her life leading to it. I tell everyone about it and the magic it holds. I will buy it for every baby shower I attend until the day I die. Naps and nighttime have not been a struggle period since this was delivered to my door and I am so beyond thankful for the creator.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This 4-slice toaster is so convenient and fast! I love how wide the opening is so I can toast thicker bread and beagle without a problem. The build is sturdy and not flimsy. Our family likes the bread more toasted so I like the convenience of quickly turning the knob to adjusts the browning. The bread came out great! I love the light green and silver combination of the toaster. And the round corner style unlike conventional toaster. It looks great in my kitchen!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
