review_header: Great for experts and novices alike
review_text: Now this is a serious toaster that will please both the experienced toasting experts as well as the novice. It has enough buttons to warrant a substantive user manual, beyond usual safety recommendations such as not using the product while underwater. You can reheat, toast on one side, heat one side and toast the other, defrost, or just press the lever if you are in a hurry. The dials are continuous, so you could set the darkness to 3.141 if you want. The color is great. The approach is retro but with a modern functionality. Adjacent to the levers, there is even a toast icon with arrows included, in case you are having one of those days where you temporarily forget how to make toast. Best of all, this thing makes perfect toast. I could not be more pleased.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This pretty thing has met my expectations. It's well-made, feels sturdy, and the levers have a smooth steady action to them. The cord is heavy duty, and the crumb trays are cake to slide in and out. I love the extra inch or so upward lift on the levers, making it easier to retrieve the yummies without touching the toaster. The color is true and it looks fantabulous. I love the styling. Function and fabulocity in a toaster: win, win!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I LOVE this toaster!! What can I say, it’s absolutely beautiful! It works so well I don’t know why anybody would crank it up to settings seven… The second setting was perfect. Also, my daughter used the defrost setting for a piece of frozen bread and it worked like a charm! I took a chance on a brand I had never heard of before and I’m so glad I did. Hopefully it lasts as long as my old Cuisinart stainless steel four slot toaster did.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: After many disappointing relationships, this one feels right!
review_text: We like things toasted. Bread (commercial and artisan), frozen waffles, English Muffins, Bagels, Hamburger Buns (a Wisconsin thing), etc. And we have tried many different toasters that don’t require a second mortgage to buy. Our prior favorite, Cuisinart 4 slice, performed extremely well but usually lasted only a couple years. After going through 3 toasters, we wanted quality with reliability. This unit has surpassed (so far) our expectations. It has worked beautifully in all out various challenges from defrost to bagel. It does take some time to learn where your favorite settings lie on the timer dials, but once you do you will be in the happy place. And it looks real on the counter. Recommended.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: A big disappointment. These units apparently are not tested. Consequently, they are cheaply made and many of the elements do not light up. Obviously poor quality control, we returned two. Customer service is phenomenal. They answer promptly and are extremely courteous, caring and helpful. Awaiting our replacement purchase for an Ikich which should be coming today. We ordered the Ikich based on 900 reviews and an overwhelming number of satisfied customers. One comment in particular kept popping up, "toasts evenly right up to the edges. " We'll see.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: The media could not be loaded. This 4 slot toaster is great to use. I used to have a two slot toaster but it takes forever to make all the toast for my family. This toaster was package nicely so it came in perfect. The bottom of the toaster has a few hooks for power cord arrangement to keep the cord in the right place. The tray is located in the backside of the machine. They are easy to pull out and cleaned. The buttons and dials are also easy to use. There are two sets of buttons/dials so I can make different levels of browning at the same time. I have used the toaster a couple of times for bagels, toasts, and even frozen waffles. All turned out nicely browned and crispy. I strongly recommend this toaster.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: The product is great!! and I'm very happy with my choice. The BAD thing about it is not he product, but the consistency of the advertised product every time I use my computer, even after trying to remove the "BUY" ad it becomes so annoying that it makes you sorry you purchased on line. If it was available in store I would gladly take the time out to go and pick it up. The product is great so far.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: If ever there was a sexy toaster, this is it. It looks beautiful and works perfectly. In a moment that felt like the epitome of being an adult, I actually got excited while reading about what each button on this bad boy does. This toaster has features I never knew I needed. You want a bagel that’s only toasted on the cut side? Done. How about some bread that’s just heated without toasting? This appliance has your back. Want to heat a frozen waffle that’s perfectly warmed without having to over toast? Consider it done, the defrost mode will heat before toasting. This toaster was the ultimate upgrade from my 11 year old $3 Black Friday door buster toaster, and I absolutely love it. Do you like mint green? Do you like toast? If the answer is “yes”, don’t hesitate and “buy now”. You’ll thank yourself as soon as you unbox it and all it’s minty glory.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: We have 11 children and eat a lot of toast. Over the years we tried and been disappointed with a lot of toasters. This BUYDEEM toaster has been awesome for us. It heats up fast, evenly toasts the bread and has a wide range of settings... which is important because some of us like it lightly toasted, others a bit darker, and still others would rather have a golden-brown bagel. Most impressive to me has been the customer service. The one side of the toaster was having some issues. We contacted customer support. They replied immediately, send a replacement toaster and followed up in a professional and friendly way to make sure I got the new unit and was happy with everything. Seriously one of the best customer service experiences I've had in years. If you need a workhorse toaster that is backed by outstanding customer service, this is it.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Well it’s just a few days of use so I can’t give a true review for weeks. I will say I’m very happy and it has exceeded my expectations. It’s charming in appearance. Very simple to use. I love the lighted cancel button. I love the way it toasts. It’s slower than our previous toaster but it produces a better slice of toast. It doesn’t just burn the surface but actually produces a deeper toasted bread. I will come back and update if my opinion changes over weeks/months of use.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I like the easy to read dials, the color and the fact that the muffins and bagels can be heated on one side and toasted on the other.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I love this toaster. The style and color are what initially caught my eye but the functionality sold me. I’ve had it for a couple of months now and it still works great. Even toasting and easy to keep clean. I received my first toaster and it had a dent in the top. Requested a return and was contacted by the company. The customer service was excellent! They sent me a new toaster and I didn’t need to send the damaged one back. The customer service rep stayed in contact with me through the whole process and made it very pleasant.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: 11/11/2021- I purchased this Item in March 2021. Now it stopped working. The liver that holds the bread down will not lock. And I am out of warranty. My mistake I didn't think I needed an extended warranty. 11/28/2021 - I am updating my review. I experienced outstanding support from the BUYDEEM customer service team. As soon as Amazon forwarded my concern to the manufacturer, their customer service team Member Mira contacted me. They have replaced my unit with a new toaster. The new one is working without any issue. Thank you BUYDEEM for outstanding customer service.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: A Very Good Toaster That Is Very Lightweight for Some
review_text: UPDATE #2: I want to let the Amazon public know what I have faced with the Buydeem Company since writing my initial review and Update #1. After writing my initial review, I received a note from Buydeem to explain to them how I burned my finger because they thought it was impossible to to so. They asked that I CHANGE my review to reflect this. After re-reading my review, I realized I did not write a fair review and did not give them a fair rating of the toaster. Since the toaster’s tipping forward and dropping toward the floor and in trying to catch it I burned my finger was my fault in having it at the edge of the counter, I decided to explain it in the update and I changed my rating to a 5-star. As I stated both in the update and in the initial review, this is a GREAT toaster; in fact, I have yet to find a toast that does everything one could want from a toaster as well as toasting bread perfectly—fully browned top to bottom and left to right—except for the one that is handmade in England and sells for six (6) times the price of this toaster. Then, after making the change, I received another notice from Buydeem begging me to change my review as they had dropped from a 100 percent rating to 88 percent due to MY single rating. I wrote them back saying that I had already done so and asked them why they hadn’t bothered to look before they wrote me. Then, they wrote me back immediately asking me to add pictures or better still a video of me, I presume of my making toast so show how good the toaster is. I am telling the Amazon buying public this because I feel that this type of conduct by a seller, manufacturer, or vendor is pandering to an almost illegal degree. And I feel certain that it would be against Amazon’s rules that any of these companies/people are allowed to do. So beware, if you purchase this very fine toaster and don’t give it a 5-star review, you may be facing a, shall we call it ‘a comeback’ from Buydeem to fix your review and change it to a 5-star so they can keep their rating at 100 percent. They may or may not do this, but from my experience, they will. UPDATE: First, I want to add that when my review was posted, Buydeem wrote to me to review with me what I said below. First, they sent me a copy of the UL Certificate they received showing that the toaster is UL rated and indeed it is. So that issue has now been cleared up. Second, the fact that they contacted me shows they care about their product. Never has any product owner or manufacturer taken the time to reflect on what I said in a review which, to me, shows they are passionate about the products they make. So, I want to make another item in my review very clear. When I said that when I pushed both plungers (lift levers are what they are really called I know now) down to lower the bread into the toaster to be toasted, and the machine tilted forward and on one occasion burned my hand, this was a one off situation. I actually had the toaster at the edge of the counter because, as I said, it wobbled. It wobbled because a foot had come off during shipment and before I realized it and replaced it (it was in the box) I was trying to find out why my counter was so uneven. So, I moved it toward the front edge of the countertop and then tried pushing both lift levers down. Being a strong man, pushed too hard, the toaster flipped forward, fell off the counter, I tried to catch it and because I had just toasted four pieces of toast just before this, the toaster was already hot, when I caught it from falling to the floor, my fingers touched the hot part of the toaster, the chrome edge around the burners which on any toaster are always hot. My point was that if it tilts forward, and IF you accidentally touch that area of the toaster one could get burned. The toaster itself, the green body of the toaster, is very cool to the touch. I advised the person who contacted me that were the toaster a little heavier such as making it on a die-cast chassis, this would prevent this very light toaster from tipping forward when the lift levers are pressed downward too hard or lifted up too hard it would prevent the toaster from tilting backwards. Since I wrote that initial review, I have since learned to not push so hard on the lift levers and as a result the toaster remains on all four feet and, therefore, remains firmly on the countertop. For this reason, I am changing the rating to a 5-star. As I earlier said, other than the King of Toaster, the Dualit family of toaster, this is the first toaster that toasts bread very quickly and leaves it crunchy on the outside and soft on the inside. That is the way a good piece of toast should be. And it toasts all the bread evenly from end to end, top to bottom, side to side. This is, for the price, a marvelous toaster. Other than the Dualit, the best toaster I have ever had that is sold on the US market. I hope that clarifies this my earlier review. Not very often do I alter a review, but this toaster really makes the grade A and deserves a 5-star rating. _________________________________________________________________________________________________ I know you are going to ask how I could give this toaster a 4-star rating when it’s easy to use, has great value for the money and it’s a great style, I’ll explain. This toaster is a very, very good toaster when it comes to toasting. I don’t know of another toaster that does its job more quickly than this toaster. And, it does it very well. The browning is very even from top to bottom and right to left. In that vein, I have no complaints. However, Amazon does, in its description, mislead us. It states that the weight is 8+ pounds. With no knowledge of the brand except for the good reviews it had, I decided to purchase it along with the fact it was heftier than most non-die-cast toasters such as the Breville models which I have been used to. But the Buydeem weighs in at 4.13 pounds, just a little too light to be valuable as a toaster, especially if children are using it. This toaster does get hot. When I lifted the risers to remove the pieces of bread after they were toasted, the toaster flipped up off the front feet. Worse, when I pushed both risers down to start all four slots toasting, the toaster flipped downward to the counter. In either case, had the toaster been used over and over again, I could have burned my hand. This, for a child, could be—I will say it again—could be a danger. For this reason alone, I am returning the toaster for a model with good reviews that will not flip up or down. It seems to me that a toaster that not only is made in China but is from an actual Chinese company would have weighted it down a little more for safety reasons. I did not see any UL Certification but it may have been..

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This is a great toaster! I'll admit when I first got it, it had a funky smell when I was making toast- like it needed to get broke in. But now that it is broke in, the smell is gone. It's the best toaster I have ever had and I love the styling/color of it. It seems to toast more evenly that other toasters I've had. Maybe I got lucky with this one. It never shows fingerprints either. I really love it!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This is the best toaster we’ve ever owned…married 47 years and that’s saying a lot! Toasts to perfection!!! Defrost is a wonderful function for frozen bagels. Our only complaint is that the marking on the darkness dial is the same color as the dial and somewhat hard to see. I just took a finepoint sharpie and put a dot at the top of it so I could see the setting pointer. Overall, a 10 out of 10!!!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: So far this toaster works great and I love the look. We always buy the 4 slice toasters because my wife is gluten free (allergy), so my son and I use one side and she uses the other. I've noticed this toaster is toasting more evenly than our last toaster that usually left the top 1/3 undone. My only minor complaint is the knob to set the length of toasting spins freely without any physical clicks to identify your setting. You have to physically get down and look for the faint marks. I don't know about you, but my eyes are a bit blurry in the morning. It is what it is, so not downgrading it for that.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: The many 5 star reviews is the reason we purchased this brand. The dial & selections are easy to read. We’ve only used it a couple of times so far. The reheat option is a plus for our busy household. It’s a good step up from our previous 15 year old toaster.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This works great, looks awesome. Big slices are no joke this is big, the heats amazing i felt it standing back so don't have things close. I look forward to having this a while it seems like I may get my wish , finger's crossed!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: Great toaster, large but easy to use
review_text: Opening the box I was stunned by the large size. Takes up space on kitchen counter. But after using it a few times, I've decided it is worth giving up the space. There are 4 extra large slots, I love bagels and they fit easily. I love the uncomplicated way to set heat settings. Just dial to a setting I like, cooking time is fast. I am so very pleased with this toaster.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I was looking for a retro-style toaster that would go with my farmhouse kitchen decor and this fits nicely! The description says the color is turquoise but it’s celery/sage green and that’s the reason I bought it. I wanted it to match my sage green Hoosier cabinet and it matches perfectly! The description said shipping would be over a month but it came in 10 days. It was nicely packed and double boxed. It has lots of features like a bagel setting, defrost setting and will take thick slices of bread or frozen waffles. 7 shade settings and it toasted a bagel the first time without having to toast it 2 or 3 times to get it the right color. One of the best features I like is the “cord keeper”! You can wrap the cord around the bottom to keep the excess cord out of sight! It’s very well made and stylish and looks great in my kitchen.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Ok, this sounds ridiculous, but we spent over a year searching for the perfect toaster. After years and years of cheap, ugly toasters, we were on a desperate search for one that was not only going to last and toast well, but was aesthetically pleasing to the eye as well. This toaster is my dream toaster. I love the color. I love the look. I love how it toasts. I love that it flows seamlessly into my kitchen vibe. This toaster is 100% worth every penny!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Been using this toaster eveyday for several weks now and we really like it. Still trying figure out the way the bagel should go in order to get the cut side only toasted but we don't eat bagels that often. So not sure if the cut sides sould be facing each other or facing away from each other! The bagel would work for toastiing burger buns too though.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I love this toaster. The looks of it are so cute! I used it the night I got it. First couple uses had that new plastic & electrical smell but now it's just a wonderful small appliance addition to our kitchen. I eat bagels regularly and the bagels feature does really well... turns off the heating elements on the inside side of the bagels (bagel placed in toaster with the inside facing out). It works really fast compared to my toaster oven. I'm very happy with this investment.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: When searching for a new toaster, I first found this in a mint green, which doesn't go with my kitchen. But I Loved the design & described functions & found it in Chrome! I have tested All the functions at least once & so far everything seems to work as stated. I really like the toast shade control, it's very precise.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I've never been excited about a toaster before, but this one is so much better than anything I've owned before that I can honestly recommend it to others. It toasts beautifully, gives you lots of control, and even has the ability to lift a short piece of toast up higher so it's easier to get out.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: Reminds me of my Grandmother's kitchen!
review_text: This 4-slice toaster is a great buy! I love the retro design and color! It's easy to use and provides a nice, even color toasting on your sliced bread. The slots are wide enough to toast a small bagel. I wouldn't try, however, to toast a NY-style bagel in the toaster, the wide slots are not THAT wide. Perfect for reheating biscuits though!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This toaster is perfect for me. I absolutely love the color and retro styling, with the ease of modern tech. Buttons, dials and levers are sturdy and work and feel well. My bagels fit and my marble rye bread (extra long) almost fit! Clean up was a breeze too. Im very happy with my purchase and highly recommend this toaster if it catches your eye like it did mine!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I had this toaster for 6 months when one side stopped working. I contacted customer service and they were actually amazing. I sent proof via video and I had a new toaster in a matter of days. They even stayed in touch via email through every step, keeping me updated. Super happy, best customer service I've ever gotten. Plus, this toaster looks great AND gives a nice even toast. Definitely recommend.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: We recently returned a bad toaster that broke after 5 weeks, ordered this one and we love it! It looks great, and so far, has worked perfectly. Every piece of toast, English muffin, and bagel has turned out well--hot and evenly toasted. It's very easy to use, and has 4 slots, so my husband and I can each have our own side where we keep the setting that we like. Great product!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: It stopped working after a month UPDATE
review_text: I loved this toaster and it was working just fine until I decided to try one of the other heat settings. I used the defrost button to defrost 4 pieces of frozen bread (this morning) and it worked fine but when I went to toast bread the lever would not stay down. I thought maybe it overheated so I waited for it to cool down. Now hours later it still does not work. The levers do not stay down and it's impossible to toast. Not sure what to do since I am about a week past returning it. (But I loved it, so I just want the problem resolved!!!!) UPDATE! I realized that the outlet died, not the toaster! SO WE ARE ALL GOOD!!!! Sorry about the mixup!!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Not only does this toaster look great on the kitchen counter, it makes wonderful toast and bagels, English muffins and crumpets, which are often hard to get right. Whatever you toast it comes out with enough moisture content and chew inside and perfect toasty even browning on the outer surface. The defrost feature works well on frozen bread slices, and for larger items like bagels and crumpets the settings ensure perfect balanced toasting of each side. Easy to clean and easy to use.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I really like the design of this mint color toast. I used to use my mini oven to toast my morning slice, which takes me about 10 mins for frozen one and 8mins for ambient one. That’s the trigger I want to buy a toast that can shorten my morning routine. Then I saw this cutie! It’s just so pretty to put anywhere! I wish they have more colors though. I’ve been using it for half year working well until I saw some smoke whenever I toast. This really scared me so I contact the customer service. And then I met Angel Marcia! She is so patient and helpful to help to solve the problem. She even try to troubleshoot my problem remotely. Thanks to one-year warranty, Marcia decided to send me a new one and it arrived last week. I really appreciate all her help and Buydeem’s excellent service.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I love this toaster. I have have had many over the years, they have all ended up in the trash, never worth the money, and normally looked pretty bad after a couple of months. However, not this beauty! It is actually a great color, kind of retro, very well made, easy to clean, and the 4 slots are big enough for everything I put into it. The heating seems to be evenly distributed, and keeping it clean takes a few minutes. Great buy, Thanks Susan

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: We’re really pleased with this purchase- I’ve never had a 4 slot toaster before, so I’m thrilled about having a 4 slot toaster, but it also toasts perfectly including bagels. Highly recommend

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: BEST TOASTER VALUE FOR YOUR MONEY
review_text: I researched and bought this toaster as a replacement for the Black & Decker TR1400SB 4-Slice Stainless-Steel Toaster we bought 7 years ago. Right away, the construction and quality of the toaster struck me. The style is a cool pastel green retro look, and the buttons light up :-) Contrary to some of the other posts I've seen, the power cord was about 3ft/1m in length. PROs: 1) Great set of features for the cost 2) Cool retro color and look 3) Quality construction and feel CONs: None I can find at this time. SUMMARY: This is an awesome little toaster!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I'm pleased with this Toaster. Came well packaged and at a great distance so it took a few days getting to me. The four compartments are nice and large. It's easy to use and clean with the slide out trays. Stylish. Note: if your levers do not stay down in a locking position for toasting, check to make double sure toaster is properly plugged in. Levers will not stay down if toaster is not plugged in properly. I had read someone's Review which stated the levers would not lock down. I encountered the problem myself and figured out the remedy. I recommend this nice 4-Slice Toaster.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: Amazing product and great value for money
review_text: What really we like more is the color and the vintage look. The toaster is really made of excellent quality stainless steel with 1800 watts and also they have options for Bagel and English muffins as well. Very easy to clean as it has crumb trays attached. Also easy to use with all instructions mentioned. Definitely worth the money. Shipping was really very fast, packaging was amazing and we got it delivered without any damage. If you are looking for a better quality toaster, definitely recommend this to everyone.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Love this Toaster!! I was a little hesitant because I had never heard of the brand. I really loved the vintage green color so I trusted my guts and bought it. I don't regret it at all! It works perfectly. I love all the different options it has on it. The slots are wide enough for regular sliced bread and bagels. I uploaded some pics, sorry the toaster looks white in the pics lol. I recommend buying it!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I purchased this because of the high ratings it received, I see why. It works great. For Bagels and English Muffins we place the cut side facing in and set the toaster for Bagel/Muffin. The cut side come out golden brown and the uncut side is warmed but not over toasted. It really is amazing compared to our last toaster. Frozen waffles are perfect and plain old bread is wonderful. We like the color too.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: It’s exactly the toaster I wanted.
review_text: I really love my toaster. I knew it when I saw it . I said I want that one. Why I like it is very unappreciated. The controls are smooth. When you put in bread and press the handle it feels smooth and locks. It toasts evenly. My kids just want brownish warm bread. I like even toasted bread. This toaster does just that. The controls work great and are also smooth and easy to set. Having 4 slices and can toast bagels is a must for a family. The finish and appearance are great and I really love the retro look on my butcher block counter tops. Overall a great toaster

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: VERY close to Kitchenaid’s Pistachio color!
review_text: Sooooo close to my Kitchenaid Artisan in Pistachio! This is a gift I asked for for Christmas, so I opened it up upon receipt to inspect and make sure it works. I love this color in my modern kitchen and it’s very difficult to find this relaxed pastel green without it being more electric or tacky. Pistachio is more of a rare color in the Kitchenaid brand so I was so excited to find this BuyDeem. It’s also a fraction of the price (and much nicer in my opinion) than the Smeg toaster I saw in a similar color for upwards of $200. I pushed the handles down and she worked! The handles and buttons are fun to push. Can a toaster be classified as fun?! The coating is nice and smooth and will be nice and easy to wipe down as well. I can’t wait until Christmas now so I can toss my 16 year old one that’s missing parts. I hope this one lasts as long.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I haven’t had a toaster in years but finally got tired of the toaster- oven taking forever to toast a bagel. I have stainless steel appliances and needed a change. When I saw this toaster & the light mint color with al the features I was looking for, I knew it was the One! I have been happy every day since it arrived. Not only does it toast perfectly, it was fast! The settings, the slot size, the options and the color all add up to a great and highly recommend toaster!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Excellent toaster! I love the retro look and it toasts fantastic! Really glad I purchased this little beauty! It's well built and toasts everything from bread to bagels! I love it! I believe whom ever purchases it will be very happy!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This toaster not only looks great for the more modern farmhouse kitchen but, it also works great. I love the bagel/muffin option. Bagels come out perfectly toasted. There is also the handle which you can pull up so you are not sticking your fingers in a hot toaster for those smaller pieces. Love this toaster! Color is not bold, it's more of a subtle mint green. I've got a bowl of green apples in my kitchen and it's a nice contrast of green colors.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: Pretty nice toaster with some smart design choices
review_text: I needed a 4-slice toaster to replace our old Black & Decker, on which one pair of slots had stopped working. I was a little wary about trying this one, because I'd never heard of the brand, but the reviews looked good, so I took a chance. It's turned out to be a really nice toaster. The original unit arrived dented, but the seller took care of that without issue. Here are the things I like about it. 1. It toasts quickly and evenly, and it toasts on the first go. The old B&D often needed a second pass with certain bread types, but not this one. I recommend starting at a lower setting, because at the halfway setting it'll really blacken a slice of white bread. Better to start low, as you can toast bread more, but you can't un-toast it. 2. The metal "cages" inside the slots that hold the bread are nice and close together. In the B&D, these were well over an inch apart, so small slices or heels would turn sideways and touch the element (and burn), or get stuck. The Buydeem has less than a 1" spacing, so it holds each slice way better. No more burnt edges or stuck slices. 3. It's a good looking toaster. 4. I like the cancel button to pop toast up early, rather than having to tug upward on the lever. It's just a little easier. The only downside is that the cleaning trays slide out of the back and not the front, but this is a minor inconvenience. Otherwise, very happy with the toaster.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: Great Toaster That Actually Does The Job!
review_text: I paid over $80.00 for another brand of toaster which was brushed stainless steel and it didn't toast bagels or muffins even close to what this one does and for a lot less money. It is now sitting in the box that this fantastic toaster came in, in my garage. This one has a separate Bagel & Muffin button that does an outstanding job of toasting and you are able to lift the items after they are toasted for easy removal. No more forks and knives trying to get items out!!! Best toaster I have ever owned period!!! One issue is (and I wrote them about this) that they should have put a small decal on top of the toaster to show which way to put the bagel in or the muffin. They sent me a picture! Problem solved!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: I freaking LOVE this toaster! Seriously.
review_text: I can't believe I love an appliance this much. It's ridiculous. It's an adorable style and color. Like I just squee every time I see it and I've had it for many months! But more than that, it's durable and consistent. Our family toasts bagels almost daily and it cooks them perfectly every time. It feels solid, stable and omg is it cuuuuute! A part of me wants to get a back up one just in case it ever gets damaged in a move or one of my kids wants their own one day. I just want to horde this adorable toaster, what is wrong with me lol. Don't debate it if you're interested- it's worth it!!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: We've had it about a month now and use it daily. It's perfect so far. No inconsistencies, settings produce the same results you expect them to. Not too strong or too weak, just right! Its made well, the dials and levers do not seem flimsy. And this toaster is the cutest thing ever! I did run it twice with nothing in it to "purge" the heating elements before we used it. It smelled a bit with those 2 cycles but after that was fine! I also love the reheat option in case I got distracted and it cooled off. Tge cancel option is great if you reqlize your timing us off with planning the rest of your breakfast lol Just get it!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This is the cutest appliance you could ever ask for! I love the mint green color & retro style. But more importantly, the options for toasting are so incredibly helpful. We have been using this every morning since it has arrived. My husband and I can have breakfast together now instead of one of us having to eat ( so the food doesn’t get cold! )while the others bread is toasting. It has cooked toast, bagels and English muffins evenly & give them just the right amount of crisp. We highly recommend this product!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This is a good-looking toaster with a really nice vintage design that separates it from those modern-looking, stainless steel encased ones which gives a more cold, industrial feeling. Its rounded edges/buttons as well as a light touch of turquoise are morning breezes to a family about to depart to a busy day ahead. The operation of this toaster is very easy. It works the way a toaster should and no manual-reading is needed (not even sure is a manual is included). The dial at the bottom is actually "analog" I believe as putting it in between two numbers does the job just fine. The extra-wide/deep slots are perfect for hand-cut slices from home-made bread or XL-sized bagels. Last but not least, I like how easy it is to wipe cleaning the toaster. My old one had a brushed stainless steel outer casing and if oil or water gets onto the surface, it would be quite difficult to remove the stain as the oil finds its way into the tiny grooves. This toaster is paint-coated with smooth finish, so it is more likely to resist oil/water erosion therefore a lot easier to maintain a pristine look in kitchen area.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: Excellent toaster for English muffins & bagels
review_text: I've owned two toasters in my life: an ancient USA-made Procter Silex 2-slotter and this one. I'm using this one exclusively for fresh-baked bagels and Thomas' English muffins, and so far this model does exactly what I want, i.e., it TOASTS without burning, period. I only use the bagels/muffins buttons and I leave the two adjustable control knobs all the way to the left of the dial (their positions don't seem to affect the outcome very much anyway). I read some of the negative reviews of this model: bad smells after the first few uses, uneven toasting, and an ejector that doesn't push the bread upward properly. Before I put anything in the slots, I turned on all four slots with no bread, just to see if the "burnt plastic smell" occurred: it didn't and still doesn't after several uses. At the same time I waited a bit to see which side of each slot's heating elements glowed the brightest, which would tell me which side of the bagel or muffin would be toasted thoroughly. Sure enough, my bagels and muffins are consistently toasted on the side with the hottest elements... and no uneven toasting! As far as the complaints about the ejectors not pushing the finished toast far enough upward so the toast can be retrieved without burning one's fingers, I found that giving the ejector lever an extra push upward after ejection worked just fine. Toaster technology (at least for the under-$100 models) is pretty unsophisticated, and so is unlikely to fulfill many users' unrealistic expectations of perfection and instant gratification. Accepting that fact, and using patience and a light touch when operating the admittedly delicate construction of this inexpensive toaster should make for a long and satisfactory relationship with this product. Then again, maybe I just got lucky and bought a non-lemon.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: I had this for around 6 months. Don’t use too often the other day my husband was using it and changed the settings, he pointed out that as turned the knob the numbers were wiping off. It’s ridiculous! Considering the price and age. Update: I was contacted by the company. Replaced toaster. The new is one perfect. Work and looks perfect. I would say it’s worth every penny.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_header: Cool Appearance, Works Great, Many Features!
review_text: I’m really pleased with the Buydeem DT-6B83G 4-Slice Toaster! From the wide slots, to the bagel & muffin options, to the sweet retro appearance, this toaster is a winner! (Yes, I AM excited about a toaster)! Controls are straightforward-the browning controls are advertised as 7 position, but are actually infinitely variable. Engaging the bagel or muffin options are simple (just hold the option button longer for the red light for muffins). The extra lift feature keeps you from having to go fishing with a fork for your food. I especially like the cord length...not too short but not too long and easily wrapped for storage under the toaster. Crumb trays remove easily for easy cleanup. One thing I really appreciate about the Buydeem toaster is consistent results! One run of toast or multiple back to back, the amount of browning remains nearly identical. Many other toasters seem to get confused by residual heat from prior repeated use. The Buydeem does not. The retro appearance in shape and color is truly well done! The rounded lines @ pale turquoise finish add a touch of luxurious simplicity to the kitchen. Did I just use the word ‘luxurious’ to describe a toaster? Dang right I did! 🤣 Additionally, the folks at Buydeem did an excellent job at designing the exterior of the toaster to stay cool while looking great. I’ve attached photos with this review of my results of toast, blueberry bagels, & English muffins prepared in the DT-6B83G toaster-each set to the middle darkness setting and using the bagel or muffin setting as appropriate. All breads were fresh. I’m really pleased! Toast is my ‘perfect’ outcome. Bagels were warm throughout and nicely browned/crisp on the cut side. Muffins, despite not looking browned, were perfectly warmed (easily melting butter) and with a nice crunch to every bite. Again, these were all at mid setting for comparison-you can adjust to suit yourself. Hopefully this review helps you decide if this is the best toaster for your home. I’m very happy with mine in all aspects.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Got this as a Lightening Deal, and boy am I glad we did! It's a lovely looking toaster, works very well (my kids can operate it no problem), and really, I have no complaints! I would definitely recommend!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: The stainless steel toaster comes in style with 4 extra-wide slots. The long cord can be organized with ease through the space beneath the toaster. It's very durable, easy to use and clean by utilizing the removable base. Perfect toasting with shade setting 4 - super crispy and crunchy. Awesome price for the value!

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Love this toaster! I was looking for something that I would not mind keeping out on the counter. This is perfect for us. It is a pastel green color. My hubby and I have our own sides so we each get the toast done the way we like it. And it is great when we have house guests. I like that the cord is long but there is a way to store underneath so it does not have to be bunched up behind it. I use the bagel setting often and it works like it says it does. I have not used the defrost setting yet. We are very happy with this purchase.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: Is it possible... can a toaster be... this sexy? Yes. Absolutely yes. This sexy toaster fit right in my farmhouse style kitchen with it's cool mint green color and retro vibes. I have made toast with it and a toasted sandwich with cream cheese and thin sliced turkey - it was delicious! This toaster pops so quiet I missed it, twice!!! My toast was cold, but then I noticed this amazing thing also has a REHEAT button!!! So no worries if you miss that pop sound. Your roommates won't even hear you make toast in the night.... Pros: Four slots and they are the wide and long type meaning those fancier breads fit without squishing the sides of your slice. It has a bagel setting, as well as that nifty reheat button so your toast doesn't get burnt or overly crispy if you aren't hovering over it and miss it pop up and have to retoast it. The LED lights around the buttons are kind of cool too. It is fairly easy to clean, just dump the tray, so no worries about crumbs or bits of bread burning in the bottom and ruining the perfect taste of your slice. The knobs have a neat texture and are adjustable so you can time it just right for Pop Tarts (2), toast (3.5) or toasted sandwich bread (4). And who really goes past 4 anyways? I mean, the setting is there so you can, but let's face it if you are setting your toast past 4 on the dial you probably should seek out some sort of therapy. If you are using 7 (and it does go up to 7) then mayne you should go to your room and start considering why you hate toast and what it has ever done to you to warrant that. Cons: My husband is a little jealous of how much I love this toaster, and has been asking me if it is better than him. What could I say? I mean it makes TOAST, all he makes is methane gas so... Maybe consider ordering a couples therapy workbook to go with this toaster when purchasing. PS. NO, I am not receiving any promotional consideration for my review of this beautiful toaster I just really, really love it! If you think that makes me weird... then you probably just haven't found the right toaster for you yet. Don't worry, it will happen... especially if you buy this one.

product_title: BUYDEEM DT-640 4-Slice Toaster, Extra Wide Slots, Retro Stainless Steel with High Lift Lever, Bagel and Muffin Function, Removal Crumb Tray, 7-Shade Settings (Cozy Greenish)
review_text: This 4 slot toaster is very convenient for me and my family especially in the morning. My old toaster which was with 2 long slots just 6-shade setting and it takes a lot of time to get enough pieces of bread for the whole family toasted. Now we can do it twice as fast. Works very powerfully. 7 shade settings fulfill me and my family at one time. The bagel function is amazing! I put the cutting side face-to-face as the listing suggested, and I put my fingers on the bagel to feel, it does heat up both sides firstly and then toasts only the cutting sides about 2 minutes later, the bagels are crispy that we all love it so much!

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Solid light and even SOLID customer service!
review_text: Edited from 1 to 5 star based on customer service and product actually working properly. Original 1star review "Light is bright as described...but a light slap or a slight jarring bump and the light turns off. I played around with spacers, thinking the battery was too loose. I think the problem maybe the electronics on the led may be bad. Too bad, seemed like a great deal with all the batteries, mount, and charger." Updated review: The seller/manufacturer reached out to me via email after I had already returned the faulty light, they were offering to replace the light. I explained to them that I had already returned the light and already received a refund. They still insisted on sending me a new light, explaining that I must have received a defective light. They were adamant that I receive and test a new light because they stand behind their products and being a small company, word of mouth(reviews) are paramount. I received the new light within a couple days, 1st thing I did to test the light was smack it around on my desk and then proceeded to drop it waist and head high on a carpeted floor. The LED didn't even flicker. I am convinced that the 1st light I received was an outlier and does not represent the majority of their products. What makes me even more confident that this light will be more than adequate for my uses is that the company stands behind their products. 4.5 stars for the light, a great value for $30-ish, (light, 2 rechargable batteries, charger, rail mount, and two switch caps. 5 stars for customer service

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: This is my first light I dod not use the mount that was included as o already had a mount. This light comes in just a bit under one inch. So if you use it with a one inch mount you will have to take up that extra space. I used a single layer of duct tape. It is now tight in the one inch mount. I put this on an old school Icatha modle 37 Kind of a home protection with an extended tube magazine. At one time a lot of LEO's carried these Its a good ole gun shoots slugs good put to 80 to 100 yards and buck shot patterns tight out of it. The light is every bit as bright as advertised It's about a perfect size so I do not care that it's not adjustable. The light switch works great in either mode and has not given me any trouble. The only problem I have is deciding were to attach it for best use. Another great thing is it makes that front sight glow bright so you have no trouble seeing the sights in the dark.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Killer value! Bright as bright can be!!
review_text: Mounted one to my son’s airsoft and another to a DPMS auto bb rifle. Quality / brightness truly impressive - pressure switch seems to work well, but a little fussy if you overtighten the battery backing. The pressure switch needs Velcro or other sticky to hold, it’s clunky but I don’t imagine a more expensive option would be better. Really a killer little light that costs nothing...I’d just as soon have a few in house on standby for emergencies. Buy this!

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Great light for the money and good customer service
review_text: I purchased this light approximately one year ago. When it arrived I was impressed with the overall quality and brightness of the light. As others have stated, this light is a bit bright for indoor use, but great in outdoor situations. When mounted the tail light switch worked flawlessly with a definite click on and off. I was skeptical of the pressure pad switch which seemed spongy in use and did not always work properly when applied. Being a bit disappointed, I put it away for a period of time. When I took the light out at a later date the switch did not work at all. After contacting Feyachi's Customer Service and discussing the situation with Pan I received a new pressure pad switch free of charge. The new switch seems to be made of better materials and works as it should. Hats off to a company that cares about it's customers and stands behind their products.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: 1st item defective. 2nd worked great. Good customer service!
review_text: It has a short in it out of the box I have started a return to replace it. I will attempt to update if the new one is better. I have update to 4 stars due to awesome customer service. I will update about the replacement item. But excellent customer service. They told me to keep the faulty unit (pressure pad tail switch doesn’t work) and they sent me a new one free of charge. The new one works fantastic. And I’m happy with it. Especially cuz I am able to use the normal tailcap on the faulty unit as a regular flashlight.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Amazingly GREAT product! Very well built & high qaulity! For the price, you can not beat it. It is an Awesome Flashlight

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Ordered this product back in October of 2020. It's surprisingly bright and well put together. Especially for the price. It rivals my Olight pistol light for brightness. Only issue I ran into is that my pressure switch failed recently. Not sure exactly when, but I'm still giving it five stars because I contacted customer service and they responded in less than 24 hours saying they would send me a replacement pressure switch immediately. They were very helpful and willing to do what they needed to in order to make it right. I didn't even ask for a free switch. I actually asked if they sold a replacement switch, and they said they'd send a replacement one for free. In conclusion, the light is very bright, the picatinny mount is extremely secure so long as you tighten it sufficiently, and customer service is excellent. There are better lights out there, but for the price this is one of the better ones I found.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Of the inexpensive tactical lights on Amazon, I have found this one to be one of the most reliable. Previous versions had a very questionable pressure switch setup. The latest version has a much better pressure switch configuration, and has managed to survive quite a bit of abuse. I am not a professional, nor am I a competition person, I am just an individual who will need to depend on a simple flashlight in a highly unlikely situation. I am not of the mindset that the only way to guarantee quality is to spend more money. I have also had highly expensive accessories fail on me at the wrong time. So, given my track record with this type of light (I own three, and they have worked flawlessly for the last three years) I trust this wil turn on when I need it to. (Just make sure you periodically charge the batteries) Great value for the non-law enforcement, non-competition, value-minded shooter.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Picked this up because I don’t have $200 plus for one of those sure lights. Wanted a good bright light to mount on my marshmallow roasting stick so I could see to make sure it was golden brown. The remote on off switch works great so you can enjoy the campfire and not have the light on all the time. The Picatinny rail mount worked great once I figure out how to put a rail on my marshmallow stick using gorilla tape. Haven’t used it to much to know how good battery life is but it is rechargeable. Durability, seems well built, heavy in the hand feels robust. Dropped it a few times in the dirt while eating s’mores and not paying attention but haven’t really abused it yet by burning the end of my marshmallow stick and trying to write my name in the air with the red hot end. Brightness, this is a good bright light. We have some material about 200 feet away and lit up the area quite well. I will definitely be buying a few more of these to put on our other marshmallow sticks. The cost savings alone from not catching your marshmallow on fire makes it worth it.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Awesome bright tactical light that won’t kill the pocketbook.
review_text: I’ve been running lights throughout my entire career and I was looking at other options besides dumping $200 dollars on a light. This is a bad little dude that is well constructed and appears to have really good rubber o-rings to create a water tight seal. It is bright, extremely bright for the price and is perfect for room clearing. Now the wires for the pressure switch appear to be lower quality but time will tell when it goes through the grind. Battery life is unknown for now since I haven’t had the light that long. However, for everything you get I don’t see you going wrong with it! The light mount itself, in my opinion, is worth $15 dollars! Overall it is a well built light tube with a powerful LED that has two switch options with two batteries.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: I bought this for airsoft night games and I'm glad I did. It's extremely bright and easy to use and you can swap the end cap to use it like a "regular" flashlight with a local pushbutton toggle or you can put the provided remote pressure switch end cap on there which has both momentary contact as well as a toggle on the same pressure pad. Very convenient! I'll definitely be recommending this flashlight to my friends and buying another if I need another tactical flashlight.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Nothing at all to complain about. Seems well made and much cheaper than other options.
review_text: Light seems very well made and works perfectly. Extra battery is a nice plus. Something like this doesn't get used every day in a home protection scenario so it is hard to say it is durable, but it seems so. I am very pleased with the brightness, the operation of the switches and with the mounting device. This is a good deal, and I would recommend it to friends without hesitation.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: This is a really good value. Consider the fact you get not just one rechargable battery but two AND a charger. I did not think I would use the remote switch initially but then I figured out the remote switch is really two switches: One for continuously on, and one for momentary on. One very minor downside is, there is nothing to secure the remote switch with. I used a small piece of foam tape, but you could use Velcro or even something like Barge cement. For another switch, the included Velcro wasn't sticky enough, so I glued the Velcro base on with Barge cement, and so far it's worked well. Velcro is probably preferable to some kind of adhesive for ease of removal.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: I bought this to replace a nearly identical flashlight that came with a scope kit for my new rifle. The kit light can light up a single room decently, but is almost useless outdoors or in large spaces. This Feyachi though, is astoundingly bright. It's one of the brightest lights I now own, and is less than half the size of the other models in the same light quality. It does have a noticeable bright spot in the center, but it's still able to light a 100 foot by 150 foot yard nearly as well as my LED motion flood light.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: First one i got was defective and I easily exchanged it for a replacement. Both times they came with an extra battery. I suspect that these lights are from china so you can probably find them cheaper. I wanted to buy from feyachi because they have a good track record of replacing faulty product. As long as they keep it up I would highly recommend buying from them. Its like buying a lifetime warranty with the product, which is a good deal on buying anything that is mass produced in china. I would test it out thoroughly the first couple weeks, if you get a defective product, you should notice right away. Its one of those hit or miss things where if it works, it will work pretty much forever. But you might not always get a winner right out of the box.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: I originally bought this as it had the option to be mounted on my rifle (with a pressure switch too). After using it for everyday use and walking my dogs I bought another couple as they are incredible value for money and the battery seems to last forever (and not to mention is rechargeable and comes with an extra battery!) My only dig is that the weld where the light housing met the shaft broke away, but that was after a good use of 1.5-2 years of heavy use so I can’t complain too much

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: I was surprised at the quality and brightness of the light. It comes with just about everything you need to mount it on your weapon or use it standalone. At first I used it for a couple of nights to walk my dog. I could see a good ways ahead of me and around into the woods. I then mounted it on my FM-9. It was easy to mount with the included offset Picatinny rail mount. I purchased a Feyachi M-Lok mount so I could mount it at 9 o'clock. I used double sided tape to mount the pressure switch and she's set. I've had it for a few weeks now and have only had one problem. The pressure switch that came with the light didn't work. I contacted Feyachi and they sent me a new one right away. I used the button cap and it worked just fine.. Excellent customer service. In the time that I've had it, I have put it to the test. It's been dropped, kicked and stepped on but I have not had a problem with it doing what it's supposed to do. I recommend this light if you want to light up what is in front of it. I'll be ordering another for my AR15.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: excellent product. Even better customer service !
review_text: Update 4/22/2020 Even after the replacement was sent and now In working order? They still reached out to me to make certain I was satisfied! Why can’t all amazon vendors treat us customers like this?!?! Update 4/14/2020 All I can say is wow. The product is wonderful but the customer service is incredible. I’ve never experienced a company more willing to make certain that they have happy customers. Was contacted immediately to rectify my problem. Sent promptly the replacement part and I was off to the races. Absolutely have earned my business. Thank you so much! Absolutely loved the quality of this. Looks great on my build and functions without a hitch. Until I put the toggle switch on it and it won’t work. I’m guessing a faulty switch in the toggle but a bit of a disappointment since that was a primary function I was wanting. Maybe they have a solution for me. If I can’t get it working I’ll have to return it

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Had a little trouble with the push button at first then it started working(acted like it had a bad connection), pressure switch worked great at first. Put on PS90, started having trouble with it again like it had a bad connection, fired first round and light shut off and now it’s acting like it has a horrible connection again and is extremely dim and neither switch really wants to work. Both batteries are fully charged, and I even tried my friends fully charged 18650 which worked great in his surefire light, and it was still extremely dim. For the record, the PS90 has extremely low recoil(5.7x28mm), maybe equivalent to a .22LR in recoil. Very displeased with my purchase, would like a refund or a new light(that actually works). Seeing all of these good reviews makes me feel I just received a dud and that some actually work. *UPDATE* Writing this update to give Feyachi and this flashlight a 5 star review! Yes I had a little trouble with the first flashlight, but not everything can be promised 100% perfection when pushing tons of the same product out. Some will have malfunctions, it happens with every product including other huge name businesses. I received a defective flashlight that had multiple issues. Contacted Feyachi, they were extremely respectful, polite, helpful, and professional. They reviewed my complaint and replaced my flashlight in a timely manner. I recently received my new flashlight, and so far, it works perfect! Thanks Feyachi!

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Update: I love this company and their products. Tac light is holding strong. After some light duty use... there appears to be no problems whatsoever at this point. Really no need to charge the batteries as they hold a charge well. I've charged them each once/the initial charge and still have no need to switch. far so good. This light is bright. And I haven't even fully charged the batteries. IMO for what you get out of this kit, it's a pretty fair deal. I have not tried the pressure switch yet. I am going to wait until I have both batteries fully charged until I try it outside. The mount works as it should. So far I'm impressed. Will update if anything changes. Second update: Taco light is holding strong. Pressure switch works great. Still have no need to replace the battery although I do not "use" it very often. Solid product.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: I own three Streamlight TLR2's and they are great but for just a flashlight, this is an excellent cost effective choice. I purchased this to accompany my Beretta CX4 Storm and found the size, fit and ease of use to be excellent. The brightness of the light is remarkable and would devastate your target. I'm not sure at night if you would even require firing a round as the light is disabling as though being hit by a spotlight. I would definitely recommend it!

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Package arrived quickly, construction seems solid, mounted easily to the rifle (less than 5 minutes). I'd have been happier if they included something for fixing the pressure switch to the fore grip of my rifle as the 2 sided tape doesn't seem to hold well and I'm hesitant to glue anything. I haven't put it through the rain, snow, underwater testing but that's probably not going to happen so don't wait for my review on it. For the price I'm very satisfied.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Bad threads on end cap- Updated!
review_text: Threads on end cap are not threading onto flashlight without jamming. Pressure switch end cap threads on fine but regular end cap has something stuck in the threads and only screws on about 2 turns and stops. Tried switching to pressure switch and no problem screwing cap on fully. I supposed some metal flakes from cutting the threads are stuck in the threads and won’t let the cap thread on fully. Update: I was contacted by the seller and a replacement is being shipped within days of this review, so I have to change my rating to 5 stars because of impressive customer service. Also I purchased the m- Lok version and it works great and it is very bright.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Mount's bolt is wrong size and remote switch wire connection loosen
review_text: Updated: 1-15-20; After I posted the below issues, I received the response the same evening from Feycchi's Pan B. who had shipped me a replacment and even offer one of seven items for me to choose for test. This is outstanding customer service and it's the way to go in order to be the best in amount of its competitors. Found out the following issues: 1 - Picatinny Offset Mount is defected with one of four bolts! That defected bolt's head is bigger than the rest, and it won't be able to screw into the hole at all or would damage the hole of mount! 2 - The remote press switch connection had a problem, sometime it worked and sometimes it didn't, the internal wires connection is loosening!

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: I mounted this on my AR-15 and so far it's exactly what I was looking for. The mount is nice a solid and I was able to locate it where I can easily hit the on/off button. I didn't even need to use the pressure switch but still nice that it comes with that option if you want it. One of the things I like most about this light is the fact that it's just on and off, no low-med-high or flashing settings that you have to cycle thru. It's extremely bright and has a very nice pattern. I can't attest to the durability yet since I haven't had it that long but I've banged it around a bit and it seems solid. I think I'm going to get another for just a general hand held flashlight.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_header: Add scope you got night vision.
review_text: I've bought several flashlights from Amazon and this one's Definitely brighter. It comes in a very well packed box, with the flashlight, battery charger, not one but two batteries, a pressure switch, and mounting tools. The mount seems nice and sturdy, the batteries charged and work fine haven't had to recharge them yet, but only used it half HR 45 minutes. I used this to replace a rechargable zoomable flashlight I put on my AR15, after I received this could obviously tell it's much brighter but was worried cause it can't zoom, let me tell you even though it can't zoom I can still see much farther than my zoomable one Wich until now I thought was very bright. I have a 200 yard range outback my house and I was testing it around 100 yards, looking threw my scope at 100 yards I could easily make out my 4,2 and 1 inch metal gongs easily, really nice was like night vision but didn't cost a grand or more. If you're using this for a defense rifle, or hunting at night don't think you'll be disappointed.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: Very bright, quality light. All aluminum mounting is very sturdy. I mounted this to my rail on a 12ga shotgun and zero problems. It lights up an entire room. The momentary switch is a nice touch if used. For the 30 bucks or so you cant beat this flashlight with charger and batteries. Ordering 2 more for other rifles and just to have as a flashlight.

product_title: Feyachi FL11-MB Tactical Flashlight 1200 Lumen Matte Black LED Weapon Light with Picatinny Mount, Rechargeable Batteries and Pressure Switch Included
review_text: I have oodles of flashlights all over the place, but couldn't resist getting another with a mount included. Not a bad light at all; bright, standard "tactical" look and aluminum body build. Comes with two 18650 rechargeable batteries and charger.
