I never do anything with my hair so I'm so glad it was easy to use. My waves last 3 days even with sleeping in them and not using any hair products such as hair spray to keep them in place.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: Love love love this. I have very long hair and curl it when I go to events or go out. I wanted a new look and my hair naturally has a semi wavy pattern on the back and sides of my head. I did not want the large loose beachy waves. This gave me exactly what I wanted . More practice and hair products would give this a really polished look. I literally started my hair at 10pm the day I received it - I couldn't wait to use it. Took me about a 1hour and 20 min. Pretty typical to my curl time. Previously had been looking at the L'ange waver - I just can't bring my self to pay 100 on sale and norm 179.00. For something like that. Very very happy with this product. Went to sleep and hair still is holding shape . Buy it !

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I love this curling iron. Had many other types before. This one has an excellent rubber topped handle for curling and releasing your hair without getting it tangled -- an important feature for women who have long hair. Since I've owned several of their other curling irons I know that when I set a certain temperature, that will be the temperature and it won't burn my hair. This is a 100% complete confidence appliance for your hair. I love it!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I bought this as a xmas gift for a family member and she was super excited. She loves to style her own hair as well as styling hair for others and she was excited to use this new styling iron. She loved the rose gold color as well. It's her favorite color.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I have short hair, and I got this to “curl” the bottom layers. I use a regular curling iron for the top layer. It works well for me. I have naturally very straight (maybe a slight wave) hair. It has never taken curls super well, but I have found success with this!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_header: Does the job very well for price paid
review_text: Ordered Friday night, arrived Sunday. Very easy to use and the temperature gets pretty hot for the price paid. Very satisfied with this purchase

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I absolutely love this product! I was back and forth between this one and the Bed Head waver. This one is perfect for my hair! I have very fine hair and it did wonderful. I held it on my hair about 5 seconds and I had the perfect waves. This one is well worth the money! Conair has never let me down with their products. They have been around for years and I can see why. These pics were just a little trial run. I didn’t take my time with it. I can’t wait to use this again! I highly recommend this product! You can’t beat the price either!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: This is the perfect size waves for my medium-short hair! It is very easy to use. Only took me about 10 minutes to do my whole head. Waves lasted through the night. (I wash my hair every day, so cannot vouch for after that.) My hair is fine with a medium thickness. I would definitely recommend this Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver, especially for medium-short hair.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I absolutely love this! I was actually looking for something with barrels a little bit bigger, but I ended up going for this one because of the price point and reviews. I'm glad I did, I love it. You can do a couple different things with it, to give a beautiful wave effect or a crimpy effect. I did more of a crimpy pattern in the photo, but I've also done the wave pattern too and it's beautiful. I do waves by putting the the tool directly on the next section of hair that the last "wave" pattern ended. I do crimpy style by clamping the hair tool on each section of hair in 3 or 4 different places, about an inch or 2 apart from each other. I dont use any hair spray and the waves last for a couple of days!! It also doesnt burn your hair as long as you use the right setting. This is awesome because I had tried a Lange products before and no matter what setting it was on, my hair always smelled burned for days.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: This wave iron is amazing. It works fantastically. I love it

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: Yes yes and yes again! You will not be disappointed. I purchased this for myself and my teenager happily started using. So, I purchased another for myself. I tried purchasing the bed head beach wave after watching a tik tok but it is to bulky and hard to use. This works like a charm. It works in my daughters thick long hair and my thin short hair. I love this it is perfect! Highly highly recommend!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_header: Easy to use, love the end result!
review_text: Takes a bit of time to crimp all of your hair as you’ll need to do it in sections, but this is the end result! I have medium thickness hair and pretty long hair. Any time I style my hair this way, I get compliments on it!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I love it, it’s extremely easy to use and the crimps turn out beautifully.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: There is a turbo setting which makes the wand heat up super fast. I was on my way to beach waves in a few minutes. Super easy to use and not as bulky as some of the others out there. It feels like it is well made, for the price. I love the rose gold color. Works as expected and I even got a couple compliments on my hair today, which NEVER happens.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: My girls have the straightest hair and they always try ways to get “wavy” hair. This is a miracle worker. My 11 and 7 year old want it used almost daily! My 13 year old uses it at least once a week. It gets so hot, which is good because all my girls have thick thick hair. Definitely worth every penny!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I got this for my daughter who wanted that beachy wave hair. She has a lot of hair and it take quites a while to do her entire head, but the look is adorable and most importantly she loves it. The waves last more than the day we do them. Very happy with our purchase.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I saw a girl use one of these on TikTok so of course I ran out and got one not really expecting it to be this amazing. I am one of those “wish I was girly” girls. I suck at doing my hair though… not anymore! I curled my whole head in like 10 minutes and it looks waaay better than anything I normally try. It’s so easy and fast. I can’t believe it was less than $20. Best beauty investment I have made in so long!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: The media could not be loaded. This product gave me voluminous waves with ease. I used redken dry shampoo on day two hair and in small sections, I held the iron to my hair Near the scalp, moving down to the ends. I went to bed and woke up to a relaxed wave. I teased it a bit at the root, and voila. This iron is a must have!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I was really excited for this and I love it! The heat capacity is perfect for my hair and if you’re looking for more of a braided hair look this is just right for you. I will be purchasing one with thicker rods for a wavier look but I love this for its look!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_header: It's a heat wave! Seriously, the cutest waves ever!
review_text: I bought this tool as a compromise to a high end tool I see shared on social media. I saw plenty of videos that made this tool look so easy to use so I had to try it for myself. I have thick, course, naturally wavy hair and was looking to add more curls and texture to balance out a style. This is a well made hair tool, plenty of heat setting options, and grasps tightly to my hair, creating super cute waves, every time! Love this tool.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: Very easy to use!!! Works great

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: So far I really like product. Easy to use. Heats up fast. There's even a turbo button. Very good quality. It really only took about 15 mins for my first try. My waves really last a 12 hr switch. The tool gave my hair lots of volume. Normally my hair is thin and straight, no volume at all. I left heat on hair for about 8 secs. It's lightweight and easy to hold. Be careful it does heat up fast and continues to keep heart. I didn't even have to use any product on my hair. I probably would not keep on surface. I would raise it or put on a towel. Don't put directly on surface. It would burn counters. Perfect for short hair. Highly recommend

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: Have really been wanting to try this specific hair tool. I so skeptic when I buy anything like this but I’m so glad I went with this 1! Heats up fast and has different temp settings! You won’t regret this but!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_header: Heats up quickly and super easy to use!
review_text: I was getting tired of curling my hair and wanted to do something different. Something to give it volume! My post pregnancy hair feels thinner than my pre pregnancy hair but it might just be because I'm use to how insanely thick my hair got while I was pregnant. So yes, I need more volume. And let's be real, I chose this one because it was rose gold. However this heats up faster than my hair curler does. I don't have to hold down as long and I can easily just slide it down to the next section of hair. And bonus! When I'm done my hand/wrist aren't cramping like crazy. Yes, I know, I should probably get that checked. My husband says it makes my hair look "nappy" but what does he know. I think it's cute and different.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I received this yesterday and I just tried it out really fast and I loved it so far!! I have thinner hair I only used between 10 and 15 for heat, i did big sections just to try it out and only put a little bit of hairspray in. My hair doesn't hold curls well and it dId with this. It got hot fast and it held great all night and my hair is still wavy today. I am a lefty and I turned the dial a little but it really wasn't a problem. Can't wait to try smaller sections and different ways to do my hair with this. I deffinitely recommend this waver!!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: This is the 3rd hair waving tool I’ve used and by far my favorite one! Great price and ez to use. My advice to others is get a good pre-iron spray or serum. This was my 1st time using it and I hope to get better at it with time.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_header: Works great and easy to use!
review_text: Really like how the waves turned out. It’s easy to use the device warms up quickly. For some one with thick hair it did make my hair frizzy and bushy looking. This product I believe is for someone with fine thin hair it would look really good on and also give them volume. I do like this product a lot.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I love this waver. I use it on the bottom layer of my hair to build up volume. My hair is shorter and you can't really curl the bottom layer so this is perfect for adding texture.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_header: Best iron for wavy hair types
review_text: I have been searching for this particular type of curling iron for several years since my 15 year old one from conair broke. To don’t think the company has made this model for a long time. I have very curly blonde hair but often my top layer and around my face is frizzy or partly wavy and partly curly. I use this iron to help me get a uniform curl and to revive my curls the next day.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I really like this hair waver. It’s so easy to use and makes it look like you have way more hair than you do. If anything I’d like the cord to be a little longer but that’s not a deal breaker for me. I wanted a waver that would make bigger waves than this since I liked this one so much. I also ended up purchasing an Amika waver and honestly it didn’t feel any sturdier or better made than this conair waver, only difference was the size of the waves.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: Love this! I have long and would consider it more on the thicker side type of hair. When I use this it looks like it has more volume. The style stays throughout the day. I like to take my time the first day I do it, but then I use dry shampoo the next day and just go over some pieces. So now i am washing my hair less and loving the style of my hair.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I love this product. My friend bought one at target and I liked hers so I decided to buy one off of Amazon just to give it a try and guys! It’s super easy to use and I love how it has a little stand so it won’t burn your counter top. But overall one of the best product I’ve bought

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I have long straight hair but I used this on my sons hair and it waved it like a champ!! He has straight straight medium thick hair. It took about 7 mins. I love this waver/crimper. Loved the different settings on this top

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I've tried plenty of wavers over my lifetime and so far this is the best one I've ever tried. I have very thin and hard to curl/wave hair. This waver works instantly instead of me having to go over sections repeatedly like I've had to do with ones in the past and the wave lasts all day with some hair spray or product. Absolutely adore it and will be using this on a damn near-daily basis. 100% recommend it if you're thinking about buying one!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: My hair doesn’t really hold curls for more than a day, but my hair held these crimps! It takes a while since you have to do it in sections, but other than that it’s amazing!

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: Very easy to use. Gets pretty hot, takes juuuuust a little more time to get hot than I would like, but over all it does the job well, I like the way the crinkles come out. Just wish the crinkles were a little bit deeper.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: Okay so when I was younger I had a crimper that was amazing, I moved around a lot so it got lost, from there which was 2014 I wasn’t able to find one with amazing quality until now, I found this one but it actually is 10x better, u can adjust the temp and it heats up quicker. If u want better results and aren’t use to a crimper, spray hairspray on ur hair, and use it where the thump part is upside down for more volume.

product_title: Conair Double Ceramic Triple Barrel Curl Styling Waver
review_text: I really loved this barrel iron. My hair is shoulder length so I really wanted a smaller one as many of them are quite large which I would think is best for longer/ fuller hair. It worked perfect and I use it at least twice a week. It gives either subtle or obvious waves depending what you want with great volume! I just add some mousse and scrunch a bit. A little tip, I’ve noticed the waves lock in on my hair much more if I do it before bed sleep as usual lol then put some mousse in the morning and touch up any strands I think may need it which hasn’t been many. :) best wishes all.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: 3 nights off the Santa Fe river with 2 adults and a child
review_text: We had a great time overall, the tent served its purpose and provided us a nice view of the sky without the rain fly, and plenty of windows. The zipper on the bag broke for the tent but it has clips so it was still able to encase the tent and rain fly. One corner of the tent would get un-steaked from the ground during the night but it never collapsed and we didn't even notice until we went out to inspect it. I'm not sure if that my figity 9 year old or because of the way we put it in the ground. Were also on somewhat hard sand/dirt surface so I am definitely taking those factors into count for.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: We were looking for a car camping/summer camp tent for our back property. What we received was a tent ample enough to take backpacking, innovative enough to allow ventilation, and even an added hole for electrical extension cord or throwing shoes out of the tent. Although there is no vestibule, there is a third pole under the fly which creates enough roof to prevent drizzle and still allow for ventilation. It’s free standing and successfully shields rain without needing to be tied off. This is after opening up, setting up and sleeping in the tent in the rainy Seattle area. So far, so good!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I purchased this tent for a backpacking trip that my girlfriend and I are going on. I took it out for a weekend camping trip to practice setting it up and to get a proper feel of the comfort level, easiness to assemble and water resistance. I found that the tent was extremely lightweight and easy to carry around while it was strapped to my pack. My biggest concern was not having enough room for 2 people to sleep comfortably in the tent but I was pleasantly surprised to find that myself and my girlfriend had plenty of room for our sleeping pads and still enough wiggle room to lay out our clothes and shoes. It rained during the trip and we stayed completely dry while inside the tent. A great purchase and an awesome tent.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Went backpacking with the family. No sooner than we got to the camp, the clouds looked threatening. My daughter was able to put up the tent in a matter of a few minutes as we unpacked the backpacks. Sure enough, the rain came down hard for several hours. The tent was able to accommodate two adults, two teens, and a labrador. Lightwieght to carry, waterproof, and room for a family+ Would buy another if needed.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I went to the northern part of Arizona for a weekend trip alone and did not want to bring anything large, I was surprised by the lightness of this tent and how effective it is weather resistant. I am 6 feet tall and the space inside was enough to be comfortable with all my gear inside her. That night the wind was wild, but it never felt cold or unsafe. I got there at night and still was able to assemble it easily. From now on I will always carry it with me and lighten the load while feeling safe not to be exposed.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: For less than 90 bucks, it gets 5 stars
review_text: First, let me state my truth, I thought I was buying a disposable tent for an overnight camping trip. Since the really expensive tents are 4-5 times more expensive, I thought I’d be getting a cheap tent that would at least help me get through an overnight outdoor adventure. I was wrong! This tent is great quality for the price. It kept us warm at night, is very spacious and above all — easy to assemble and disassemble. I purchased the 6-person tent to ensure it comfortably fir our family of four, and it did just that. If you’re looking for an inexpensive, quality tent, pick this one. Note: we did not get to test it in the rain.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I was looking for a smaller tent for myself and my two children. We had been using a 6 person cabin tent, and it was so big and bulky. This tent is roomy, really easy to assemble and folds up compactly. I have not had a chance to test it overnight or in the rain, but it appears to be made well and the seams look like they are well sealed.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: We bought several of these as gifts to the homeless of Central Ohio and haven't actually used them yet. We did erect one and found it very easy to put together and large enough for 4 adults and a small dog. The instructions are sewn to the inside of the bag that contains the tent and the rain fly, so losing them should never be a problem. The poles that support everything consist of fiberglass sections that are joined together magnetically making it simple to pack/unpack. Based on the materials that it is constructed of, I believe that with the rain fly attached it will repel water during a rain spell. I like the fact that it is roomy enough for a queen sized mattress, has screened windows for ventilation and has a pocket to put your electronic devices into to keep them above the ground. Plus it was available for an excellent price.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: IT CAN WITHSTAND A DAMN RAIN/WIND STORM
review_text: It was my first time camping and using this product. I am beyond impressed. While up in the mountains, a HARSH rain/wind storm came around for about 2 hours and my tent did not move one bit compared to then her tents 3-4 times larger than mine. 11/10 would recommend. 🙂

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Bought this tent for Grandma to come along on our camping trips. We had previously purchased a Coleman dome tent and ended up returning it because of a pole breaking immediately, plus we wanted something with simpler set-up. I loved how easy and fast this Moon Lence tent was to set up (easily under 10 minutes). We bought the 2-person size and it was perfect and cozy for my mom plus her stuff. Leaving for another camping trip tomorrow, looking forward to using this tent again!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: So many features for the price.
review_text: Great tent for backyard camping. I was surprised by the quality considering the affordability. There is even a pocket that holds a 7in tablet that allows for touch screen navigation through the pocket. We left the top off, so it great for viewing the stars too. It was also easy for one person to assemble. The only downfall is that I don't think it could fit six adults comfortably but six children might fit. My son said to give it 10 stars. :-)

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: This tent is big enough for one full size adult (6 foot tall) and a little extra room for a bag too. It was lightweight and very easy to put together. One person is all it takes to get this tent together in about 5 minutes. It may not be good in a heavy downpour, but it does hold up to a small drizzle just fine. I highly recommend this tent.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Get the 6 person tent for 2 people!
review_text: I’ve never built a tent before and purchased this tent in hopes of finding one easy to assemble. I timed myself, and it took me 15 minutes to put this one together. It was very easy to understand. Getting the corners all connected before bringing it up was a bit tricky, because then the other side would pop out; but all in all this tent was easy to assemble. I’ve used it to camp in my backyard and camp on the beach. Air ventilation flows great and it was the perfect tent for these activities. I bought this tent which stated it’s a “6 person tent” when it really is a 3 person tent MAX. Definitely not six people unless you’re packed like sausages. My friend and I were able to hang out in it comfortably, so I would recommend to get the 6 person tent for 2 people. That way you have room to bring in some of your things. I didn’t get to try the water resistance so I didn’t review that. I bought the yellow one and loved the color. Would definitely recommend this tent to anyone! Thanks

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: More camping in the future with this baby!!!
review_text: This is my second tent I owned, but this one is great!!! Very light weight, easy to carry. Cleaning it, great, dries quickly. It can be ensemble by one person only and it takes only 5-ish mins . You can put a queen inflatable mattress and still has room for your belongings . We loved this tent and more campings to come!!! I recommend this tent!!!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Great budget tent for the casual camper
review_text: This is an excellent budget tent for the casual camper. I grew up camping a lot with my family, but my husband and I just wanted something inexpensive for backyard or weekend camping. We weren't looking for something super light for hiking with or super durable for long term, frequent use in demanding conditions. For $50 this tent easily surpassed our expectations with thoughtful design details and surprisingly good construction. The tent features an internal cargo pocket for your odds and ends and a nice hook at the top for hanging up a battery powered light. There are a couple of panels that unzip and can be rolled up and secured so you have a screened "window" for light and airflow. The support rods were easy to put in place with the clip/hook system although I was used to seeing ones that thread through a little fabric channel along the diagonals of the tent. Anyway, the whole thing is a win. If you are looking for a super durable, heavy duty tent and/or need one light enough to hike with, I can't speak to this tent's ability to handle those needs. (I also wouldn't try to sleep more than 2 adults in the tent.) But it worked great for a quick overnight with 2 adults in mild weather.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: This tent is easy to set up and take down. No water got in at all, which I was worried about. It's a two person (adult) tent, so expect a low ceiling if you're tall like me. Due to a knee issue, I did have a tough time getting in and out of it with the slanted face and low, outer cover height at the entrance. For the price, though, I was duly impressed. It handled our three week trip with no problems.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: High Quality, Easy to Put Together, Excellent Bargain
review_text: I bought the Moon Lence 2 person tent not knowing what to expect, but I am pleasantly surprised with the quality, durability and features of this tent. We tested it in the yard with the hose and no water got in! At this price point, I was shocked. It is large enough for my 6'2 nephew without him having to scrunch up and offers plenty of room for him and all of his gear. This is great for wilderness camping and at an affordable price. It is nicer than the kelty and coleman tents we have that were more expensive.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Packs well and easy to assemble
review_text: I needed this tent to pack on my motorcycle. It measures just 16" long in the storage bag and easily fits in my travel bag. Opening and setting up the tent is simple with clips that clip over the support rods rather than through them. I found the tent a little larger than other 2-person tents and also a little higher at 48" so it was comfortable for me and all my gear. After researching lots of tents in this price range, I chose the Moon Lence and am super happy with it!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I used this tent for a 5 day wilderness camping trip and it was great. It's very small and light when it's not setup so it's easy to pack and transport. It is easy to setup and take down. I recommend getting a tarp to put under it, as you should with any tent. I was fortunate to have very good weather so I can not attest to it's water resistance as of yet, but as soon as I can I will update the review.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Waterproof bottom and rain fly works good
review_text: Was a little skeptic if the bottom would be waterproof but it kept us dry all night. It was also a very dewy and wet night so the rain fly also helped keep the dampness away. Some light rain in the morning did not get through either. I could put it up in about 10 minutes by myself. Would recommend this for a couple but may be too narrow for friend camping. I’m 5’1 and I had plenty of room for bags and gear by my feet. Air vent at the bottom is a plus

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Decent little tent for the price
review_text: I’m giving this a tentative 5 stars. I really like it and love how easy it is to put up, however, one of the seams ripped on the third use. To be fair, there was a rather freakish wind storm but I didn’t expect it would tear. It took a couple of calls to Amazon to get it sorted out (the first attempt went frustratingly bad), but ultimately they did replace the tent. Time will tell if it holds up. I hope so because I really do like this little tent!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: This is definitely MUCH better than the last one I had. Just the material alone is ten times more durable. The last two were by coleman and ozark trail & no need to even say anything about the latter one, the name speaks for itself. This tent is rated 1000mm & the rainfly is also rated 1000mm. The rainfly is actually the first thing I noticed the difference in. This rainfly is not the extremely thin flimsy rainfly most come with, it's got a thick durable feel to it that I definitely feel much better about taking out in the rain than I ever did with the other guys. I still bought two tarps to go with it, one for the footprint & one for the top, along with a can of waterproofing spray. When I finally experience the strong winds & rain that will be coming soon I'll come back and update about how it held up. I do suggest, like most tents that you go out and purchase all new stakes. The ones it comes with are definitely questionable, and entirely WAY too small to be any kind of effective come the winds. I purchased the rebar stakes.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Extremely easy to set up, under 10 minutes!
review_text: This tent was perfect for my weekend camping trip. This tent is extremely easy to assemble. Two long cross poles and the tent is up. The rain fly is also super easy to put over the tent. Took me under 10 minutes to fully assemble. I did order the 2 person tent in orange. The tent can fit 2 people if you are just using sleeping bags and not much additional gear. I bought the tent just for me and it fit one twin size air mattress blown up with room for my clothes bags and other items. You would not be able to fit 2 twin air mattresses or a queen mattress. My favorite feature is how compact the tent is when folded up and stored away. It folds down real small, which made packing the car that much easier. It comes with plenty of metal stakes as well to stake the tent into the ground. I also recommend bringing a tarp to put under the tent and hammer for the stakes.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I wanted a lightweight tent to replace the very heavy insta-tent that I bought about ten years ago. The nice thing about the insta-tent was that it was VERY easy to put up and take down and I needed to be able to do it all by myself, but it is so heavy that I had to tote it around in a wheeled Christmas Tree Bag. I now live in a second floor condo and can't lug that thing up and down the stairs, so I took a chance and bought this tent. I just put it up and down myself in my living room and it was SOOOOO easy. And it weighs almost nothing! I will update regarding waterproofing after I actually take it out camping. But I now feel like I can go camping with my grandsons and not have to worry that I might hurt myself lugging the tent around. At 62 years old, that matters.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Bought tent for a single person, due to COVID, couldn't share tents. Great purchase, Good quality, light weight and easy to set up / take down with one person. It did not rain, so can't comment on the waterproof abilities, but it was warm and then very cool at night, so there was a lot of dew and the tent was still dry, so gets good water resistance. Overall, very pleased and good quality light weight tent.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: My son has been talking about camping for a while now so I decided to pick up some stuff to try out and see how he would do. Well I decided to get this and couldn't be more happy with it! Assembly took probably 5-10 minutes and disassembly was easy enough. Has plenty of ventilation for those hot summer nights. We had a great night despite it raining a bit in the early morning, we didn't get wet thanks to the cover. My favorite thing was that I could get it back into the travel bag without fighting with it for 20 minutes!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I just took my 2 person tent out for the first time this weekend. It poured rain and the tent faired pretty well! Def recommend a tarp underneath it. I had a tarp and only had a little bit of water seep in around the bottom. Overall, it remained pretty dry inside! Super easy to put up, directions are sown into the bag so they don't get lost, and it's easy to get it all put back together too. I'm happy with this purchase!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: This tent was awesome! Super quick and easy to set up. Literally it took less than 5 minutes. It was also super windy where we camped and we even had a super heavy freak rain strom and it held up beautifully! I would buy this tent again in a heartbeat. When it came time to take it down, it was equally as fast. My husband didn't think it would go back in the tiny bag, but it did easily!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: i purchased the 4 person tent Moon Lence camping tent in June and have used it several times over the summer. it is very straightforward to set up and break down. it fit 2 twin size air mattress with enough space in between to walk into the tent and room for our bags. we didn’t have any problems with bugs getting inside and felt safe inside when our campsite got ransacked with raccoons. this tent is very well made and super lightweight as well. i can see it lasting through many more camping trips. i love my little tent and i look forward to using it again!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Easy to put together, take down and put in the bag.
review_text: I bought this originally in case we had a hurricane and the house was too hot to sleep in. No hurricane but pitched it on my porch while my house was being remodeled. I didn't use the anchors because it was on my porch but it held its own against light wind and rain. I like the rainfly because it isn't the suze of a handkerchief like some are. I've used it many times since then to give my dogs the experience lol. Would buy again and definitely recommend to a friend. I was also impressed that it actually fit back in the bag when I took it down.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Definitely water resistant but divide the number of people in half
review_text: Me and my wife used the 4 person tent during a short camping trip during which we experienced a heavy thunderstorm. The tent held up well and we did not get wet, but afterwards even with a tarp underneath, the floor was soaked through and there was about 5mm of water on the floor throughout. Rwgaedless, I really was impressed with this tent and would purchase it again. The setup process was somewhat difficult but it was our first time camping so I'll chalk that up to inexperience. I would hesitate to put electronics on the floor but other than that it worked just fine.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: For the money spent, I couldn't have been more impressed. I wasn't out in the rain but the rainfly had a smart design and I liked that they attached with elastic cord. Personally, I would likely be claustrophobic to be one of 4 people in this tent for the night. I slept with my dog on one side and me on the other side of the tent and we could have fit another person between us comfortably. I am a fan of the Moon Lence brand and first bought one of their backpack chairs which I'm very happy with.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I bought this for a camp out at our pool with my 9 year old. Easy to rig up, conpact to carry & comes in a bag. I love that the instructions are stitched into the carrying bag instead of a paper that can be blown away. It's a bit taller than other brands for this smaller size. It was perfect for us! Although I can't speak to the waterproof quality, it did work great for bugs

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: The tent is spacious and user friendly, the instructions were very clear and setting up took little time at all, there are two major interlocking poles that get clipped onto the tent and a smaller pole for the rain guard, the setup took less than ten-minutes. The interior is spacious, can easily fit two adults and a small child. The interior has areas for venting air and pockets to hold cell-phones or other devices. Overall I would rate this five stars.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Bought this tent for my grandson and I to go camping. It came in a small box, I was worried it wasn't going to be big enough. Took it out of the box and it was in it,s owm carrying bag great size. Set it up and was amazed at the room and how easy to set up. Rained first night we stayed bone dry, highly recommend.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Great light weight tent for the best price !
review_text: This is such a great light weight tent for the price. We bought the larger tent for our family of 6 and we comfortably fit the 6 of us on two full air mattresses. There’s a pocket on the side for our phones and keys which is a great feature. Our first night it rained all night long and we woke up in the morning warm and dry. We’re looking forward to taking it backpacking in a few weeks.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I was amazed to unbox a briefcase size tent with handy sturdy carrying straps. It’s more lightweight than my purse. Sorry about the picture but I took it late at night after I set up and hadn’t made the bed. I got the four person tent and it was ideal for my deluxe twin air mattress and my bucket and two bags. Of course I had to fill the mattress inside but it was a double zip door with a half screen. It was cold and damp at night but had no moisture inside Nice roomy mesh pocket inside that held flashlight and keys and glasses. I hung my lantern above me. The designer must be a real camper because they were detail oriented. Nice ventilation and rain fly went on well I could lay and look up at the stars without it also. Easy to put up and I took it down quickly three times for this trip. No complaints about this at all

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: High quality, check the dimensions, not the # of people.
review_text: We have only used it once and there was a bit of rain when we did. For two people with no experience putting up tents, we were able to put it up in 15 minutes. It's straight-forward and quick. The directions for putting the tent up are conveniently attached to the bag, so you're not going to lose them in case. We are only two, so there was plenty of space, but we picked up the 6-person. I know they don't measure people in cots, but we could fit two cots barely ~ describing it as a 6-person makes me think that a couple that actually ordered a 2-person variant would be unpleasantly surprised by the amount of room. That said, they do have a picture that gives dimensions; so the information is there and available to be scrutinized. Overall, happy with the purchase, it fits us and felt sturdy - and with certainly many less parts than the last tent I set up some 15 years ago.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Got this tent yesterday so our family of 4 could do some backyard camping and camping down at our farm. My son was so excited to set it up that we put it up in our living room. It was so simple to get set up and incredibly roomy! Plenty of space and 1 person could set this up easily in just a few minutes. Material feels durable and at a lower cost than the major name brands, it’s crazy not to give this a try if you’re in the market for a new tent. Can’t wait to take this out and try it in the woods. Also comes with a rain fly, but we’ll try that out once we pitch it outdoors. Highly recommend.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: So I was scared to buy cause of the possibilities of the wind destroying it and I took a chance sure enough high winds where at the highest and …. THIS BABY HELD UP !!! Given I used all of its accessories to the max (more using the bright green tie downs and going out of my way to buy extra and different steaks cause that’s what you do when you go camping go prepared.) all in all it held up and was super easy to put up and can fit a full mattress with room on the sides when it can also fit a queen with little room but still was an awesome tent wasn’t able to test water resistant but I’m sure ut will do fine make sure to put tarp under as you would for any tent . Oh and for the cherry on top this tent held up in the winds against 4 different big ass durable tents but don’t take my word for it try it out and take proper steps and pro-cations ! :)

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Easy set up, great for warm weather, vibrant color
review_text: This is such a great lighter tent for warm weather camping. I get too hot at night usually, but this tent kept us dry while also avoiding the stuffiness I have experienced with most other tents. The color is so vibrant too which is what I wanted to make it easier to find my way back to the tent if I go hiking into the woods. It had plenty of space inside for my dad, me, and all of our gear. My fox hound couldve slept in it too, honestly. The set up was simple even in the dark. It is very intuitive.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: This tent is exactly what I was looking for. Great deal for your $$$. Inexpensive and lightweight, however sturdy and good quality. Very roomy. I bought for two persons, could have fit 3 or 4 in my opinion, also tall enough to stand up/change. Has mesh pocket for book, snack, etc, hook is handy for hanging lantern/light. Set up was a no-brainer, took less than a minute, now my 10 y.o. Love the color to match natural environment. Arrived as described. Definitely recommend!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Very happy with this purchase. I’ve been looking and researching for quite a while for a tent to fit my kids and myself for camping. This tent had fantastic reviews and the look and style (plus it is my favorite color) and seems to be exactly what I’ve been looking for. Super simple and will keep us safe out here in the Pacific Northwest.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I like its airiness and how QUICK it goes up! It also is a lovely green / almond shade. I thought the green might be a bit bright and unnatural but it really fits in with my organic garden and looks the same shade as all the natural stuff :) Full disclosure I've never had a tent in my life so I thought this would be unfamiliar territory, but the tent actually has its instruction affixed to a label INSIDE the bag it comes in - so it really couldn't be easier. Great thing to keep in the home for emergencies, that guest that enjoys the outdoors - or that guest that misbehaves lol. All thumbs up :)

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Overall this tent is a great value for the money. My camping situation: We camped in North Texas in October. It was pretty cold in the evenings (about 40 degrees) and the tent was a bit chilly at times. The main reason for this was that the vented area at the top of the tent does not completely close. I know this is not a design unique to this tent, but in 40 degrees and 20mph winds, I think it makes a big difference. However, having said that, the tent held up incredible well considering the punishing winds it endured. We had all stakes put out and the tent never faltered or ripped or flattened even though I'm pretty sure there were occasional gusts of up to 40mph. Sadly I did not get a chance to see how the tent did in the rain as it was dry our entire trip right up until the morning of the last day. By then we'd already torn the tent down to begin packing. Overall I think the tent did really well and I might have pushed it a bit beyond what it was designed for in temperatures, but I was really impressed. The seams seem strong and the zippers do as well. It's easy to put up and down, even in the challenging wind and it's pretty light for as large as it opens up to. I think my sons and I will get considerable use out of it.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: easy to set up and take down, sturdy and feels like a well made tent. it says 4- person but would say more like 3 person (full mattress and single side by side). Personally, if you're not sharing with a child, would say best for two people but in a pinch, everyone can lie side by side and make work. Ordered the green and really like the green that is not obnoxious and tends to blend better with nature. recommend!!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I'm a casual camper and this is just about perfect. :) item arrived very quickly and set up is super easy for one person. I'm 5'11 and there is enough space for me and my 2 dogs which is all I needed. Haven't experienced rain yet so can't speak to that, will update as needed. Overall, would recommend - you don't have to spend hundreds of dollars on gear in order to camp! I currently have no complaints

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: The tent is easy to assemble and straight forward. Lots of floor space and enough height for children and adults to move about. Unique features we enjoyed were the extra waterproofing on the seams and the corner zipper to nab anything left outside without opening the large entrance which helps to limit any disturbances that could wake up light sleepers. Bring a good ground cover and remember to use the stakes for the rain fly and you have a good basic tent for a family to use.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: For the price this is a great little basic tent. Very easy to set up. The rain cover was a bit confusing though. My heat pump is out of service for a month so no AC. I use it to sleep outside as the heat this summer is almost unbearable. It's going to be a great tent for the grandkids as well.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I set this tent up in my living room, and liked the way it felt so much , I put a futon in and moved into it for the night. I like the design, the Saffron orange color is soothing, very easy to set up and roomy for 2 of us. I must admit I did not try it in the rain yet, but the fabric is waterproof, the bottom thick and the seams very tightly woven. The tent arrived in a carry bag with easy instructions. It is the easiest tent I have put up. The dome is high enough for comfortable sitting and moving about. I will be going on a camping trip next week to an area that is sure to get wind and rain, so If I have anything else but rave reviews I will let you know.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Pleasantly surprised with this tent. Great value.
review_text: This was my first tent (and camping experience) and it went better than expected. The tent was very easy to assemble and the instructions are stitched into the packing bag so you never lose them (although after the first time assembling it you pretty much know how to do it again without the instructions). The space was perfect for our family of four, two adults and two kids. We had to install the rain cover because it was showing to rain and the tent protected us from water. It was pretty windy out, but the tent was solid. I liked that it had ventilation from two sides so the air could flow across the inside of the tent keeping the air inside fresh. A nice surprise was the little see-through pouch hanging from the inside of the tent which I assumed were for shoes, but we used it to put our cell phones in. All in all I would recommend this tent.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Makes the perfect indoor fort! Exactly what we were looking for!
review_text: Our 3 sons wanted a “fort” in the toy room for reading, relaxing, playing their tablets, & of course overnight sleepovers. I’ve purchased countless different teepees & hated each one of them for different reasons- too small, tip over easily (my boys are wild), cheap quality etc. So when I saw this 6 person tent for under $100 with great reviews, I figured I’d give it a shot. Took it out of the package & had it assembled within 5 minutes. Super easy & nice quality. I ordered a 6x9 grey shag rug to make it a comfy area for them to lay & play and it fit perfectly. They absolutely LOVE their new “fort” & have been relaxing in there all day. Very happy with my purchase. It’s exactly what I had hoped for! I can’t speak to how well it will hold up outside, because we obviously are not using it for that at this time, but it seems well made & sturdy. Oh & did I mention that it’s SUPER lightweight & comes in a very compact carrying bag?! Perfect for camping trips where you have 50 million other things to carry. Don’t hesitate, just buy it! I’m extremely picky & read thousands of reviews before ordering anything, so trust me when I say it won’t disappoint.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Sturdy and nice looking tent for a great price!
review_text: After spending months looking for an affordable but good quality tent, I am thrilled with this one. I had never heard of MOON LENCE as a brand but I have only ever bought one other tent in the past. For my family of 4, this is extremely roomy (I got the 6 person). There is also plenty of space for 2 more family members or friends. It's also really great looking. I wasn't completely sure before getting it, but I think it looks great. I would definitely recommend the brand and this tent because it may be lesser known than Coleman but it's more affordable too!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Look no further: this is the best camping tent
review_text: When I received this tent in the mail it was in the tiniest bag. I was immediately skeptical and thought it would be too small, but once I began assembling it, it came to its true size. I could not be more satisfied with my purchase. The tent was incredibly easy to assemble, with instructions attached to the bag so you never lose them. Every piece came in it’s own little bag inside the bigger bag, which is a + for organization. There are two “windows” on each side of the tent that open and close from the inside. The bottom is made of tarp material to avoid water inside the tent. A rainproof cover is included for a rainy day. My siblings and I are very excited to go on many camping trips this year.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: This is tent is perfect for our needs, especially at the cost. I didn't want to spend too much money since this tent will only be used in a lean-to (we're allowed tents in lean-tos where we're going but check your local rules) to keep mosquitos and other bugs out in bug country. I'm 5'2 and my husband is 5'11 and we both fit perfectly in this tent. Enough space for us in our two person sleeping bag. The tent was VERY easy to assemble, with the instructions in the bag that it came with. Setting it up for the first time took around 15 minutes but now that we know how it works, I assume that when we put it to actual use, it'll only take less than 10 minutes to set it up. Disassembling it was even easier, taking less than 5 minutes for only one person. It's not an ultralight tent for backpacking/backcountry but it is lightweight enough to carry through a campground. I can't attest to how waterproof it is because I don't intend to use this outside of a lean-to. Can't wait to use it in 2 weeks! EDIT: Used it during our camping trip. Worked perfectly for our needs. Added a pic. Roomy enough for me and my husband (5'2 and 5'11). Love the internal compartment inside for small things like a flashlight. I'm in love with the color.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: This is a nice looking tent that will definitely serve our needs for camping. I can't tell if it's waterproof yet because we only took a day trip. It set up easy enough, though we didn't quite put the rain cover in right. Screaming kids made it hard to focus lol. We have a family of 5, so we got the 6 person size, and while it should work for us, I don't know about 6 adults! Haha you'd have to all be really good friends!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: Its a good three seasons tent
review_text: I'm a 6ft1 dude and 200+lbs so I don't really fit in tents. Lugging tents around has never been a problem, but I can appreciate it when a good tent comes along. So is this good? The answer is yes. This tent isn't the lightest tent, but its lighter than similar tents at the big box stores or the blue store. The tent manages this by having thinner shock rods. The tent stills sets up solid though, and it did well when I set it up in the back yard when it was pretty gusty with 15mph winds yesterday. Good! The tent is a three seasons tent. The top half is mosquito netting, but we don't have bugs this time of year so I can't really test that out. The door is the normal door-and-screen job. The tent does have two windows in the back, but it does not have a second door. If you want two doors for your two person tents, you want another tent. The people in the tent sleep N/S and the door and window are E/W, so someone has to climb over someone else for late night bathroom breaks. On the other hand, this tent is super comfy sleeping one person, and it's light enough to carry like that. I generally like tents which have two doors but it's personal preference. The guy lines are also reflective on mine, which is great, because I got it to go scout camping. People won't trip over them in the night. The rainfly is also good, it's made of a different material than the tent and it's very waterproof from me leaving it up overnight. Lots and lots of venting which is good even with the windows shut. Water in the tent makes it heavy and makes gear not be warm, so getting the condensation out of the tent is super important. I'm really happy with it, we'll see if it survives boyscouts this year.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: Already bought a tent from moon lence and must say that I'm absolutely satisfied. Material, colour, quite as lot is a promised and expected. Bought tents for my family camping vacation in the wilderness. Tent has 2 windows. one on the back and a few on the front in the door. Both windows can be closed with an additional zip. Zipper are also good quality. Nets on the inside of the tent that allow further ventilation when the windows are closed. There is also floor ventilation on the back of the tent and ground tarpaulin is a good quality. Love this types of tents because quick and easy to assemble and disassemble. Building up the tent is really easy. Also for me as a woman! Simply remove the clips during dismantling, then open the ribbon and the inside collapses cleanly. A strong rod is attached to the roof tarpaulin in 2 eyelets and fixed in the middle with a ribbon. All in all, tent is sewn clean, nothing sticks out and the seams are sealed with a transparent tape on the inside. So it can't get wet from rain inside. There is also a nice tote bag for the tent that can be pulled tight with a zipper and 2 quick clip tapes. I am very satisfied with the tent.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_text: I bought this tent only to use for late night girls' night "campouts" on the back deck with my teen daughter to watch movies and have snacks, without being eaten alive by mosquitos. I just bring in my laptop. I can't vouch for the water resistance, since it wasn't raining when we used it (so far just once) but here's my experience: I unpacked it. The directions were pretty easy. I'm sure I'll put it together in half the time in the future since I now know how to do it, but it literally only took me about 10 minutes, and that was with stopping a lot to read the instructions. I think the rain cover was actually more difficult for me to figure out and took longer to install than the actual tent, but now I know how to do it. This tent can be put up with rain cover in 5 minutes once you know what you're doing. It's VERY lightweight, comes in a small carry bag. Since we only used it on the deck, we didn't need to use the stakes for tying it down, but they are included. It's is sturdy enough for what we're using it for and appears to be well made. There was plenty of room inside for us to relax on a pile of pillows in front of the laptop with 2 small dogs and snacks. We carried it indoors without taking it apart, because with a person on each end, you can "fold" the tent flat bringing the poles together. If you wanted to use it on the ground, I'd probably recommend a tarp because any sharp sticks or rocks may rip the material, plus you'd feel them. The bottom of the tent is very thin, made of the same material as the rest of the tent. Over all, we love it, it's easy, light weight, easily transported, even carried while assembled, has a removable rain cover so you can enjoy the stars on a clear night. Well worth the price. I'm happy with it. UPDATE: I put the tent on the back deck again for another movie night "campout" with my daughter. I left it there overnight to continue the next day. I got up in the morning and it was gone. It was VERY windy, and I didn't have it tied down, so it turns out it blew away. It crossed my yard, flew over my fence, tumbled across the street, around a huge tree, past three more properties and over another chain link fence where I found it in someone's back yard. The rope had caught on the fence and stopped it from going further, so I was able to fish it back over the fence. I carried it back home on my back, wind still blowing hard, filling the still erected tent with air like a kite, and nearly carrying me away with it. I'm a little embarrassed to think neighbors might have saw me, a middle aged woman carrying a fully erected tent on my back, turning me into a human kite on a windy day. I put it back on my deck, this time tying it down, and wouldn't you know it, it didn't even have a single rip in it. Still in PERFECT condition after the ordeal it went through! I love this tent.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV （6 Person Tent
review_header: I recommend this 100% i loved mine
review_text: I literally loved it, first thing that I loved the most it’s that it comes in a really small bag which makes it really comfortable to carry it, it’s not heavy at all , i got my campaign tent 6 people size the mattress that you can see on the picture it’s full just in case it helps for someone to know that, and it let me some space inside which I loved as well , i assembled it once I received at home just to have an idea in the camping place it took me literally 10 min so 5 stars on that as well super easy to assemble, i went to ginnie springs Florida and it rained the second night I stayed there it was great since this was my first time camping and I could make sure that was waterproof and it is !!! I absolutely recommend this product and this brand i love my little cute tent.. hope my review helps someone else to get what they need

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: Extremely easy to set up, under 10 minutes!
review_text: This tent was perfect for my weekend camping trip. This tent is extremely easy to assemble. Two long cross poles and the tent is up. The rain fly is also super easy to put over the tent. Took me under 10 minutes to fully assemble. I did order the 2 person tent in orange. The tent can fit 2 people if you are just using sleeping bags and not much additional gear. I bought the tent just for me and it fit one twin size air mattress blown up with room for my clothes bags and other items. You would not be able to fit 2 twin air mattresses or a queen mattress. My favorite feature is how compact the tent is when folded up and stored away. It folds down real small, which made packing the car that much easier. It comes with plenty of metal stakes as well to stake the tent into the ground. I also recommend bringing a tarp to put under the tent and hammer for the stakes.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: My son has been talking about camping for a while now so I decided to pick up some stuff to try out and see how he would do. Well I decided to get this and couldn't be more happy with it! Assembly took probably 5-10 minutes and disassembly was easy enough. Has plenty of ventilation for those hot summer nights. We had a great night despite it raining a bit in the early morning, we didn't get wet thanks to the cover. My favorite thing was that I could get it back into the travel bag without fighting with it for 20 minutes!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: This tent was awesome! Super quick and easy to set up. Literally it took less than 5 minutes. It was also super windy where we camped and we even had a super heavy freak rain strom and it held up beautifully! I would buy this tent again in a heartbeat. When it came time to take it down, it was equally as fast. My husband didn't think it would go back in the tiny bag, but it did easily!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: More camping in the future with this baby!!!
review_text: This is my second tent I owned, but this one is great!!! Very light weight, easy to carry. Cleaning it, great, dries quickly. It can be ensemble by one person only and it takes only 5-ish mins . You can put a queen inflatable mattress and still has room for your belongings . We loved this tent and more campings to come!!! I recommend this tent!!!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: I went to the northern part of Arizona for a weekend trip alone and did not want to bring anything large, I was surprised by the lightness of this tent and how effective it is weather resistant. I am 6 feet tall and the space inside was enough to be comfortable with all my gear inside her. That night the wind was wild, but it never felt cold or unsafe. I got there at night and still was able to assemble it easily. From now on I will always carry it with me and lighten the load while feeling safe not to be exposed.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: We bought several of these as gifts to the homeless of Central Ohio and haven't actually used them yet. We did erect one and found it very easy to put together and large enough for 4 adults and a small dog. The instructions are sewn to the inside of the bag that contains the tent and the rain fly, so losing them should never be a problem. The poles that support everything consist of fiberglass sections that are joined together magnetically making it simple to pack/unpack. Based on the materials that it is constructed of, I believe that with the rain fly attached it will repel water during a rain spell. I like the fact that it is roomy enough for a queen sized mattress, has screened windows for ventilation and has a pocket to put your electronic devices into to keep them above the ground. Plus it was available for an excellent price.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: i purchased the 4 person tent Moon Lence camping tent in June and have used it several times over the summer. it is very straightforward to set up and break down. it fit 2 twin size air mattress with enough space in between to walk into the tent and room for our bags. we didn’t have any problems with bugs getting inside and felt safe inside when our campsite got ransacked with raccoons. this tent is very well made and super lightweight as well. i can see it lasting through many more camping trips. i love my little tent and i look forward to using it again!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: Easy set up, great for warm weather, vibrant color
review_text: This is such a great lighter tent for warm weather camping. I get too hot at night usually, but this tent kept us dry while also avoiding the stuffiness I have experienced with most other tents. The color is so vibrant too which is what I wanted to make it easier to find my way back to the tent if I go hiking into the woods. It had plenty of space inside for my dad, me, and all of our gear. My fox hound couldve slept in it too, honestly. The set up was simple even in the dark. It is very intuitive.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: Decent little tent for the price
review_text: I’m giving this a tentative 5 stars. I really like it and love how easy it is to put up, however, one of the seams ripped on the third use. To be fair, there was a rather freakish wind storm but I didn’t expect it would tear. It took a couple of calls to Amazon to get it sorted out (the first attempt went frustratingly bad), but ultimately they did replace the tent. Time will tell if it holds up. I hope so because I really do like this little tent!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: Waterproof bottom and rain fly works good
review_text: Was a little skeptic if the bottom would be waterproof but it kept us dry all night. It was also a very dewy and wet night so the rain fly also helped keep the dampness away. Some light rain in the morning did not get through either. I could put it up in about 10 minutes by myself. Would recommend this for a couple but may be too narrow for friend camping. I’m 5’1 and I had plenty of room for bags and gear by my feet. Air vent at the bottom is a plus

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: We were looking for a car camping/summer camp tent for our back property. What we received was a tent ample enough to take backpacking, innovative enough to allow ventilation, and even an added hole for electrical extension cord or throwing shoes out of the tent. Although there is no vestibule, there is a third pole under the fly which creates enough roof to prevent drizzle and still allow for ventilation. It’s free standing and successfully shields rain without needing to be tied off. This is after opening up, setting up and sleeping in the tent in the rainy Seattle area. So far, so good!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: I bought this for a camp out at our pool with my 9 year old. Easy to rig up, conpact to carry & comes in a bag. I love that the instructions are stitched into the carrying bag instead of a paper that can be blown away. It's a bit taller than other brands for this smaller size. It was perfect for us! Although I can't speak to the waterproof quality, it did work great for bugs

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: So I was scared to buy cause of the possibilities of the wind destroying it and I took a chance sure enough high winds where at the highest and …. THIS BABY HELD UP !!! Given I used all of its accessories to the max (more using the bright green tie downs and going out of my way to buy extra and different steaks cause that’s what you do when you go camping go prepared.) all in all it held up and was super easy to put up and can fit a full mattress with room on the sides when it can also fit a queen with little room but still was an awesome tent wasn’t able to test water resistant but I’m sure ut will do fine make sure to put tarp under as you would for any tent . Oh and for the cherry on top this tent held up in the winds against 4 different big ass durable tents but don’t take my word for it try it out and take proper steps and pro-cations ! :)

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: I was amazed to unbox a briefcase size tent with handy sturdy carrying straps. It’s more lightweight than my purse. Sorry about the picture but I took it late at night after I set up and hadn’t made the bed. I got the four person tent and it was ideal for my deluxe twin air mattress and my bucket and two bags. Of course I had to fill the mattress inside but it was a double zip door with a half screen. It was cold and damp at night but had no moisture inside Nice roomy mesh pocket inside that held flashlight and keys and glasses. I hung my lantern above me. The designer must be a real camper because they were detail oriented. Nice ventilation and rain fly went on well I could lay and look up at the stars without it also. Easy to put up and I took it down quickly three times for this trip. No complaints about this at all

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: For less than 90 bucks, it gets 5 stars
review_text: First, let me state my truth, I thought I was buying a disposable tent for an overnight camping trip. Since the really expensive tents are 4-5 times more expensive, I thought I’d be getting a cheap tent that would at least help me get through an overnight outdoor adventure. I was wrong! This tent is great quality for the price. It kept us warm at night, is very spacious and above all — easy to assemble and disassemble. I purchased the 6-person tent to ensure it comfortably fir our family of four, and it did just that. If you’re looking for an inexpensive, quality tent, pick this one. Note: we did not get to test it in the rain.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_text: This tent is exactly what I was looking for. Great deal for your $$$. Inexpensive and lightweight, however sturdy and good quality. Very roomy. I bought for two persons, could have fit 3 or 4 in my opinion, also tall enough to stand up/change. Has mesh pocket for book, snack, etc, hook is handy for hanging lantern/light. Set up was a no-brainer, took less than a minute, now my 10 y.o. Love the color to match natural environment. Arrived as described. Definitely recommend!

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: Definitely water resistant but divide the number of people in half
review_text: Me and my wife used the 4 person tent during a short camping trip during which we experienced a heavy thunderstorm. The tent held up well and we did not get wet, but afterwards even with a tarp underneath, the floor was soaked through and there was about 5mm of water on the floor throughout. Rwgaedless, I really was impressed with this tent and would purchase it again. The setup process was somewhat difficult but it was our first time camping so I'll chalk that up to inexperience. I would hesitate to put electronics on the floor but other than that it worked just fine.

product_title: Moon Lence Camping Tent 2/4/6 Person Family Tent Double Layer Outdoor Tent Waterproof Windproof Anti-UV (4 Person Tent)
review_header: Easy to put together, take down and put in the bag.
