Target has similar one called snuggle me organic lounger which costs $99.99 and I don’t see the reason of spending that much on it if this lounger made by cotton material, soft and firm as a target’s.

product_title: EIH Baby Lounger, Baby Nest Portable Baby Bassinet Ultra Soft Breathable Newborn Lounger with Pillow Adjustable for Crib & Bassinet Mattress Perfect for Co-Sleeping Traveling and Shower Gift (Animal)
review_text: Update: Customer service contacted me and sent me their updated product. The ribbon problem is resolved! I am very impressed with customer service however. I never contacted them, and my original review gave them 4*’s. Yet they still initiated contact and requested we try their updated version. Let’s just say I couldn’t be happier. Original: Yes.... yes it does. It is a budget version of the name brand one which costs way more. It also works just the same. Our son slept just as well in this as he did when we held him. BUT! Be warned that the quality of the Ribbon they use to tighten the bed is trash. It began to fray and eventually fell apart. I made the mistake of pulling it out to put a new one in and that was a pain in the butt. We used a soft plastic coated wire hanger that we straightened out and looped ribbon onto. Then used that to thread the pillow. If you want to be proactive. But a nice length of string, tie it to the end of the ribbon and pull the ribbon out to thread the string in. If you get something like 550 (paracord) cord, you can melt the ends, and put them through one of those adjustable plastic pieces that you can use to loosen or tighten.

product_title: EIH Baby Lounger, Baby Nest Portable Baby Bassinet Ultra Soft Breathable Newborn Lounger with Pillow Adjustable for Crib & Bassinet Mattress Perfect for Co-Sleeping Traveling and Shower Gift (Animal)
review_text: This is my first time buying this item ,plus I’m a new mom ! When it came in it came all nice 😊 nothing damage whatsoever . I washed it with the baby bed items I brought for our crib . It washed really good plus dried good. I did get some tiny strings ,but like usual you can cut them off. I ended up going back here watching how to put it together bc the instructions was missing key things . One I couldn’t find the zipper,but the video had helped a lot . The only part that was making me nervous is putting the mattress in and zipping it back up ! Once you get the first part in it felt like I would had broke the zipper bc it cushion was so tight/fluffy . And the sheet felt stretchy just not enough . I did fold the mattress hotdog style an insert it in just to play it safe . Once it was in everything went fine . The product definitely soft as crap 💙✅.

product_title: EIH Baby Lounger, Baby Nest Portable Baby Bassinet Ultra Soft Breathable Newborn Lounger with Pillow Adjustable for Crib & Bassinet Mattress Perfect for Co-Sleeping Traveling and Shower Gift (Animal)
review_text: I washed the cover and pillow before putting it together and I think the material shrank a little. I used cold water for the washer and easy care (low heat) for the dryer. Everything fit but I struggled a bit with getting the bumper and pad in. It looked so much easier to put together in the video another reviewer posted. Maybe it's just me. Next time I'll use just air (no heat) on the dryer. Overall, the baby slept in it beautifully this morning for his nap.

product_title: EIH Baby Lounger, Baby Nest Portable Baby Bassinet Ultra Soft Breathable Newborn Lounger with Pillow Adjustable for Crib & Bassinet Mattress Perfect for Co-Sleeping Traveling and Shower Gift (Animal)
review_header: A must for any new mom!
review_text: Love the nest. I used it for my baby and I love giving it as a gift. The nest is so convenient for baby to nap or lay down. I kept it on the couch with me. Never had to worry about baby falling. Very safe. Good back support for baby. Easy to wash and assemble. After 6 months but baby in crib. She felt lost in such a big bed. So she slept in nest in crib until she got bigger. Its adjustable for growth. Great value compared to products that are similar but are 3 times the price.

product_title: HOUSEYUAN Baby Lounger Replaceable Cover Baby Nest Backup Cover 100% Cotton Breathable Machine Washable (White)
review_text: I love the theme and it fits perfectly fine. It didn’t come with pillow case but it is beautiful and soft

product_title: HOUSEYUAN Baby Lounger Replaceable Cover Baby Nest Backup Cover 100% Cotton Breathable Machine Washable (White)
review_text: This lounger comes in a small tote, but don't let that fool you: it's vacuum packed and will expand to full size right before your eyes. It feels very comfortable and supportive, and you can make in more snug or relaxed by tying or loosening the ties at the bottom. Both sides of the cover have gender neutral pattern, and the cover is machine washable if/when needed. Although the lounger is a bit bulky when expanded to full size, it's still very portable and the baby can have a safe and familiar place to take a nap wherever - on a parent's bed, in a living room, at grandma's house, etc. We actually purchased another one of these loungers to keep at grandma's house so we don't have to lug it around :) We use it as a co-sleeper and it works perfectly! This lounger also comes with a muslin swaddle blanket. It's very large, airy and lightweight, but warm and comfortable for the baby. I am not sure if the print varies, but we got one with mermaids and sea creatures (narwahls, turtles, etc). The tag with care instructions is in Chinese(?), but the laundry symbols are universal: wash on cold. do not bleach and use cool iron if needed.

product_title: HOUSEYUAN Baby Lounger Replaceable Cover Baby Nest Backup Cover 100% Cotton Breathable Machine Washable (White)
review_text: This is perfect for parking a baby and keeping them safe. I use this on the couch or in my bed. I don't have to worry about baby rolling off, or me rolling over onto baby. It is well made and works just as well as similar items at 4x the price.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: My hair is very thin and straight. It’s hard to add any waves or volume to it. But this curling iron makes it very easy to manage it. Curls are looking super natural not like a perm. I like how I can control temperature so it doesn’t burn my ends. Heats up fast and even. I feel like it cuts my time in half. Frizz control and volume are my two favorite features. After I curled my hair I just sprayed with hair spray and it lasted thru the night with humidity. It comes in fun pretty color and shipping was FAST. Highly recommended. Great value

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_header: I absolutely love it. Definitely worth it.
review_text: I love that it’s easy to use. If you do thinner sections it turns out really wavy and if you do thicker sections it’s a little more than a beach wavy until you brush through it but I don’t recommend doing really thick sections bc then like any curler or straightener it won’t do what it’s made for. But over all you have to play with it until you find out what’s right for you like the way you want your hair to look or how you want to hold the curler. I was going to upload a pic to show results but I didn’t see a place to.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: Love this curling iron! Made curling time way faster, creates nice loose curls and the iron itself is great quality! This is easily my new fav curling iron! Highly recommend!

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: I am genuinely surprised by this product. My hair does not hold curl well, so I even waited until the next day to write this review. Pros: Light indicates when it is on. 2 temp settings (both of which are hella hot; I used the “cooler” of the two) super easy to use and figure out. (I held for 5 seconds for each crimp) fast results holds a wide portion of hair in 1 go (about 1 inch thick sections, but you only need to do about 4 to go all the way around your head) Curls lasted all the way through a second day. Heats up quickly. Cons: Plastic-y smell when hot. the part you use to open the barrel is a little tall for my thumb, but overall manageable. no light indicator for when it is fully heated. overall, for the price, this is a great hair tool. the immediate hair texture gave me total flashbacks to 90s Britney and Mandy Moore, but it looks like really cute waves once it relaxed a little bit. Disclaimer: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: I usually curl my hair with a hair straightener because curling irons are hard for me to use, but this product has Changed the game for me. It’s super quick and easy to do (I parted my hair in 4 bunches). You have two settings to adjust temperature. I would recommend using a heat resistant glove if you have just to get used to using the product. I kept mine on the lower as I have really fine hair. Overall, I liked the curling iron, super easy and looks great

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: The iron works great on both shoulder length and long hair (we used it on mine and daughters hair). It is very easy to use and is pretty light weight. The only thing I would have liked differently was having more then 2 options for heat control, but that is because I like lightest heat possible. My daughter on the other hand doesn't mind this and the temperatures are perfect. She is the one that will use it most so overall we give this a 5 star rating.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_header: Skeptical at first, but pleasantly surprised and satisfied
review_text: I watched a youtube tutorial of a girl using this product vs a more expensive version of the product. After watching the video, it appeared that this product would do just as good of job as the more expensive brand. I was a little skeptical at first, but seeing the great reviews and after watching that video, I decided to try this product. The box the product came in seemed a little sketchy, so I was again a little skeptical. HOWEVER, once I figured out how to use this on my hair, I was pleasantly surprised and satisfied with the way my hair looks. The more I use it, the easier it is to use and it takes less time over all. I receive many compliments on how cute it is and I like the way it looks as well. My daughters call it mermaid hair. I have recommended this product to several friends and family, who have also purchased this same product. They have equally been as happy with the product.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: This tool is great for producing undone, beachy waves. Unlike a regular barrel curling iron, it does not produce a tight or ringlet-like curl, rather a gentle wave through your hair. It looks like you were blessed with perfectly wavy hair and you let it air dry. It heats up fast and was relatively easy to figure out. I like to use a little texturizing spray on my hair afterwards, and then fluff it up at the roots with my fingers. I would recommend this if you are looking for a new, easy to use hair tool for a more natural looking wave.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: Wow! First of all, this thing is fast. I did her whole head in 15 minutes while using it for the first time. I don't even like to use a normal curling iron because it takes me over an hour to do. It gets up to temp fast. We used the lower setting and it was still great. No need to wrap hair up like a normal iron, just crimp it down for a few seconds and done. If your hair is longer than the wand, then simply move the wand down and match up the waves to the barrels. The cord is pretty long so it was easy to use and move around. Really easy interface took out the guess work from using a curling iron. The waves are cute and can be played with easily. Like, honestly. The best thing ever.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: My hair has a bunch of coconut oil in it which is why it looks shiny at the front, so disregard that. This tool is so much easier than using a curling iron. Even though I'm 32, I've never been able to master the curling iron. I suck at doing my hair! I love this waver. Heats fast, only need to apply it to hair for several seconds. Highly recommend

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: I had always wanted to try one of these and I’m so glad I finally did. It’s easy to use, it has adjustable temperature, and works great on my long hair. After adding the waves, all I have to do is run my fingers through my hair and I have beautiful waves everywhere. I really love the ease and the fact that so much more of my hair gets the curl at one time versus a regular curling iron or heated curling brush. I highly recommend this! I’m telling all my friends to get this one.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: I wasn't expecting much. My hair is thick, coarse and very unmanageable. Recently, I've been wearing my locks in natural waves. I love the look but it looked frizzy and even more unkept. product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_header: Worked great on my frizzy curly hair ❤️
review_text: Used this two days in a row and loved it. I have curly c3 hair that is fine and tends to frizz easily. This worked perfectly for me. I was able to wear my hair curly and then use this to add some texture and calm the frizzes on the top layer. I also used it with my hair lightly straightened (one quick pass) to seal the frizzes and then sprayed a sugar salt texture spray on it and it made for perfect beach waves. I only have two suggestions. Switch up where you start your wave at on the hair because otherwise you end up with one wave all over and it doesn’t look near as natural or as effortless. Which is what I usually go for. Use a heat protection of some kind on your hair. With the two heat settings it’s harder to find one that works perfectly for your hair. So you either leave it on longer or use higher heat. Any heat can be damaging so make sure to take care of your locks. The tool itself heats up quickly. It has two heat settings. I had to use the highest but I left it on my hair less time. 4 seconds is usually what it took. The clamp lever is on the opposite side from what I’m use to so if you have that problem there is a slight learning curve but once you get use to that it’s easy. Not a hard change to make for me. It doesn’t come with a book of instructions or troubleshooting or anything just a paper with a short list of instructions. It didn’t bother me much but it’s worth knowing. If you have never used one there are some great YouTube videos out there.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: I have a thin straight hair so some times I want some volume and curly hair. I have always struggled with a curling iron because it takes me too long even just for simple wave look. But this is so good. It takes me like 15 minutes to do my whole head. It’s super easy to use and not time consuming. It heat up quickly.The best thing about this curling iron is even though it looks bulky but not heavy even for me who have small hands. I have no issues using it. I can maneuver it with one hand no problem. My secret is to hold each section up and out to the side so when it hangs down, it will look natural and add volume. Also do every wave in different directions and alternate my waves. I cannot attest to the durability of this curling iron yet since I just had it for couple weeks but I am very pleased with how it works with my hair. The only thing I think it would be great if they include a pair of glove so it will prevent my hand from getting hot.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: To begin with: I love this wave maker. I have very straight hair naturally and my hair does not hold curl more than a few hours. A few years ago, I bought the Bedhead wave maker and have loved this style ever since. I also get a lot of compliments whenever I use it. The Bedhead wave maker, however, makes very tight waves and I wanted a wave maker that makes looser waves, so I began searching for a tool that will make a loser wave. After a lot of research, I settled on this one. I will definitely use it over my Bedhead wave maker for these reasons: Pros: 1. The waves are loser, which is exactly the style I wanted. 2. I love the kick stand so the hot iron doesn't rest on the counter. 3. You can choose between two temperatures The Bedhead wave maker has none of these features. In addition, the Bedhead wave maker naturally stays open. It has a lock bottom to keep it closed, however after a few years of owning it, that bottom has broken and the only way to keep it locked is to wrap the cord around it. Overall, I highly recommend this wave maker for loose beach waves.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: I have stick straight hair and it always takes forever to curl it. I got my iron super fast! Which was nice to have something ship actually Prime. I also have really fine hair, so depending on how thick your hair is depends on the size of section you would do. I loved how easy it was to use, and the waves have lasted with no hair spray. Normally when I used a traditional curling iron I have to use hair spray. It heats up quickly, and the heat seems evenly dispersed. Looking forward to using this, this weekend when I go out. I would definitely recommend this to anyone, as it really makes curling your hair much faster! Love it, happy I bought it for sure.

product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)
review_text: What a fun styling tool and a major upgrade from the krimper I used back in the 90's! I would say the curls that result from this 3 barrel tool resembles a hybrid krimp and beach wave. product_title: Hair Crimper Large 3 Barrel Curling Iron 32mm (1.25'') Hair Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels Hair Waving Styling Tools（Pink)

It heats up quick, and my first small section curled like the rest of my hair on the first go around. Super happy about it! I use the higher heat setting as my hair can handle it, but it does have two heat settings for more fragile hair. I have super thick long hair, which makes regular curling wands take forever to do, and it's a nightmare, but this want glides through hair very easy, and you can do larger chunks of hair without having to sacrifice less curl for more hair. It's really easy to use. This is definitely a great purchase option for thick hair you need to curl in less time than regular curlers.

product_title: Yoocaa Baby Lounger, Baby Nest for Cosleeping - Portable Breathable Cotton Newborn Lounger Nest for Napping and Traveling (0-12 Months)
review_header: Update! Mold smell causing baby to smell like it.
review_text: Update 4/7 Customer service replied and stated this is a rare incident. They offered to replace the item or refund. However, I managed to get the smell out after multiple washes and the smell is gone! I am keeping the lounger! It's super comfy for my 2 month old and he sleeps really well in it! Despite the issue I had, which I'm sure it was rare because it doesn't seem like others had the same issue. I would recommend this lounger, especially for the price ! I really wanted to like this baby lounger. It is extremely comfortable for my one month baby and he absolutely loves it so far. However, there is a mold smell with the white cushion fabric that I could not get rid of. I washed the fabric, air dried, I even wipes with clorox wipes and the smell is still there. My son ends up smelling like the fabric which I don't feel safe leaving my son in the lounger. I tried contacting customer service to see what I can do and yet heard back. If it wasn't for the smell, I would give the product 5 stars.

review_text: We are still very early in the pregnancy but are so excited to use these products. The material is really good. It is cute and soft. Thus far it is looking great for our baby. I like how light it is for moving and if you need to take it with you. Once we use this more, we will update the review based on how well it wears.

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_header: Not just for babies and also animals
review_text: I actually ordered this for my cat, because there is a heat vent under a table that he has another little bed near since it's his favorite warm spot. However, the edges of the bed sort of block the heat from getting him, and when I saw this I knew it would be perfect since a side of it is open. It comes with a small removable pillow, and it is a really soft co-sleeper that seems to be well made. It is adjustable on one end as there are straps. When my son was a baby we co-slept because he had so many health issues and I needed to be next to him. I would have used something like this in the beginning, but not when he became too big and was able to move around too much. I love the tree pattern. So, if you use this for your child your animals might love it too just like mine. I never thought of using a co-sleeper for an animal bed, but when I saw it I immediately thought of my cat's favorite spot and how it fixed the heat blocking problem. Lol

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_header: Comfortable and beautiful lounger for baby!
review_text: This lounger works perfectly for a new-born baby. It gives parents a sense of relief that the baby is protected from the sides. The product is light-weight, which means that it can be used for travel. Very good purchase!

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_text: I absolutely love this!!! Perfect for our little baby

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_text: This lounger comes in a small tote, but don't let that fool you: it's vacuum packed and will expand to full size right before your eyes. It feels very comfortable and supportive, and you can make in more snug or relaxed by tying or loosening the ties at the bottom. Both sides of the cover have gender neutral pattern, and the cover is machine washable if/when needed. Although the lounger is a bit bulky when expanded to full size, it's still very portable and the baby can have a safe and familiar place to take a nap wherever - on a parent's bed, in a living room, at grandma's house, etc. We actually purchased another one of these loungers to keep at grandma's house so we don't have to lug it around :) We use it as a co-sleeper and it works perfectly!

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_text: Good quality and a great purchase but I do think it could be made a little longer, over all would buy again

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_text: This bassinet is thick and hefty. It come vacuum sealed helping keep dust out. I like it because it helps protect the baby when starting to turn during the first few months. It is best to put the baby on this bassinet in the bed vs on the bed without anything surrounding the baby.

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_text: Very nice baby nest! Fabric print is adorable and looks of good quality. My only complaint would be that it is a bit difficult to hold when transporting it as it only has one handle, wish it had two so it could be folded more easily. Still, a recommended purchase! P.S. If this review was good for you at all, please do hit the "helpful" button so I know that I'm not wasting my time writing this! Thanks in advance :)

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
author_badge: HALL OF FAME | TOP 50 REVIEWER | VINE VOICE
review_text: Truth be told, we’ve had a couple of wonderful human ones but this “nest” is for a wonderful stray tabby. He’ll soon be a house pet but has a couple of health issues he’s being treated for and must live in the garage for four long weeks. The baby nest is loved by our new Tomcat and if of course up to the task of relaxation for its intended “Wah-Wah” target audience, too. Tree style recommended highly whatever your species!

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)

I love the cute pattern and the durability I am really satisfied with this baby lounger! You can take it anywhere and have the perfect sleeping spot for your little one! Great high quality for a great price! Would make an excellent gift!!

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
