product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_text: This is similar to the dockatot only much much cheaper. I purchased it for my best friend who plans to use it to co sleep with her newborn son baby once he arrives. She put it together and said it fits perfectly between her and her husband in their king bed. She said the material is very soft and let the cushion sit out for 2 days to fully fluff. She is overall very happy with it! And her husband is very excited about the pattern/design on it :)

product_title: SMTTW Baby Nest, Baby Lounger Co Sleeping Bassinet for Baby Newborn Lounger 100% Soft Cotton Breathable with Baby Pillows for Sleeping, Portable Bassinet as Baby Shower Gifts(Elk)
review_text: This is a wonderful baby shower gift; thoughtful for baby’s naps on the move, and well worth the price. It comes in a nice little zippered storage bag and the feel of the material is very soft for the babies skin. I love the colors, they are on point in person, appearing exactly as they are online in the photos.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: If you are comparing this one to the Black & Decker, forget about it...
review_text: If you are comparing this one to the Black & Decker, forget about it, this is the toaster you want. B&D used to be good but now they produce horrendous crap that is inconceivable. This toaster however works well and browns evenly on both sides. I dunno what other folks are yammering about. - build quality is sturdy, mechanically it is sound It also lifts the toast well above the unit so the slices can be easily removed even with groggy morning hands. The bagel setting (like on every toaster) is useless, except for maybe frozen ones. I don't freeze bread..... The warning beep just before the pop is loud and clear, the 'warm' function is also nice and doesn't overcook.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Sturdy Stable Toaster for Wide Slices
review_text: I toast sourdough bread slices from a sourdough round loaf on a daily basis. The fresh slices sometimes have thicker edges and odd shapes. This toaster accommodates thick bread without it getting stuck. Note: I do not need a beeping sound when the toast is done, but some people might like that feature. The dial to set the length of time for toasting turns easily without locking so you will need to check it regularly to make sure that you are on your preferred setting.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: LOVE this toaster! (wish we'd bought it sooner!)
review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this! Can't believe we waited so long to just get a dang toaster (instead of our toaster oven). The ease of use and quickness of producing toast - yes! I love the different setting choices too (love the 'warmer'). We have no issues with beeping (as someone had made mention of) Among the great reviews, we had read a few tenuous ones but can't understand why because this machine is AWESOME! Yes, if you do one slice of bread it might be slightly uneven but you find where the sweet spot is to place it and then its a non-issue. Love how it looks, too. HIGHLY recommended.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: We really like this toaster. You do have to push the buttons after the toast cycle has started. It toasts bread very evenly. On the Bagel setting, it browns the inside and warms the outside. Would also be great for toasting a hamburger bun.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I was a little nervous after reading all the one and two start reviews but i'm glad i got this one. it works just fine. Toasts evenly. Buttons light up blue. it makes a beep sound when you start a toast cycle and it makes a beep to indicate and end to the toast cycle. I thought that was a cool feature. all and all i'm happy with it. Good toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I had a Breville $200+ toaster that never toasted evenly and I hated it. I was on vacation and had the opportunity to use this toaster in an airb&b. I was so impressed I ordered via phone and it was delivered the day after I got home. Strange as it sounds I love this little toaster. The keep warm feature ensures toast and eggs are bot hot at the same time. For the money you can't beat it.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: It has two wide metal bars separating each if the eight heating panels. This prevents it from toasting anything larger than standard sandwich bread. On wider slices it leaves them partially nu-toasted. Also it's extremely slow. Had to send it back.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I purchased a different brand toaster that lasted about 2 weeks. I found this one and decided to try it. It does a wonderful job and the retracting cord is a perk. I have yet to use the defrost mode but I am sure it will work equally well as the toaster itself.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: This is an awesome toaster! I really love it. It works super well and the "keep warm" option is a godsend for a mom of a toddler like me. I know many people in these reviews complain about the crumb tray coming out the back, but that's really such a small inconvenience. Reviews also complain about the cord coming out the front but if you look on the bottom, there's actually a little track where it's meant for the cord to wrap around and come out the back (there's a little opening along the bottom of the toaster for it to go out that way). I love this thing!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Yes, this model is a very reliable toaster, as the one it replaces gave me several years of faithful service (can't recall the exact number), so much so that my wife recently said "is about time we get us a new toaster", and next thing I know is that "my old and faithful bit the dust". Of course, you can go ahead and pay twice, three times or more... but you'll be paying exclusively for the looks of it, as the inside of all toasters is made the same.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I like that it has a button to keep toast warm and you can add lift to the handle by pressing up on it to get the toast to lift out of the toaster better. Very nice, easy to use.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Does what it is suppose to do, if you want lightly toasted it dose it, dark toast it does that too, you can fit 4 standard size bread slices in it and they all look the same toasted colors when finished. Artisan bread slices you can only fit two into this unit as they are just too wide too get 4 in to it but as it toasts rather quickly that is not a problem for me. Keep warm feature is especially nice for bagels. I recommend this toaster for the even toasting pattern. Some reviews stated that it throws the bread out, I have not seen that action on the one I have yet, so I'll see if it starts too happen, the beep when its starts and just before it finishes was at first a surprise but now I like it, 1 beep to start, 1 beep just for kicking up, nice.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: First of all, it's a toaster. Been around for over 100 years. Yes, Google it and you'll see the first electric toaster was invented in 1893. With that said, the basic concept has remained the same. And for the price, this will brown that two cent piece of bread evenly to my liking.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I've had this toaster for a week and it has been working great. I have to admit that I was a little worried when I read some of the negative reviews but my experience has been nothing but positive. I purchased the toaster to replace an old 2 slice toaster that died. I like artisan bread so I was always toasting half of the bread with my old toaster. I'd have to rotate the bread to get the whole slice toasted! This toaster allows the whole slice to fit without having to flip the bread around. I also love the defrost cycle. I can put frozen bread in the toaster and it defrosts and toasts in one cycle. With the old toaster I had to microwave the frozen bread then toast.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Works great for us and our dogs
review_text: We love the narrow design with wide slots that still fit big bagels. Numerous reviews complained about the beeping, we love it. Put our food in, walk away and do something else, and beep - we know to head back over. The beep is not annoying, it does not bother our dogs (they are not allowed in kitchen area tho) but if it did I would locate the spot where the sound comes out and cover it with duct tape. Another reviewer used super glue, either way you will muffle it or cut it out completely. Great little toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I wanted a small 2-slice toaster. We are a family of 2 and do not toast bread very often. This works great. The cancel feature is very nice as I occasionally like to toast something a little longer - hit the cancel button and it pops up. You are able to raise the bread high enough to grab the bread and pull it out without burning your fingers.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Love this toaster!! It is the perfect size for my tiny kitchen, I think it's great that it has a retractable cord as it sits on top of my microwave & the outlet is in front of it, it toasts bread to my preference at "3" & my son's preference between "4-5" The bagel setting prevents burns on the outside of bagels, the keep warm feature is wonderful!!! When my granddaughter makes her toast before the eggs are ready toast stays warm without ending up overdone. The outside stays cool to the touch throughout. Will definitely be looking for this same toaster the next time I or anyone I know needs one!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: compared to what I had before this is awesome. I like the feature that can warm toast, so if you have to step away from the toaster your toast will not be cold when it gets back. We have done toast, english muffins, and pop tarts and all have come out fine. When you have one toast only, one side of your toast will get much darker than the other side. It did warn about this in the instructions. If you do two you are good. I have not used the other features of this toaster enough to comment on those. If you do have little kids like I do beware fingerprints show up really easily on stainless steel. however, I like the look of it. The top will get very hot, but the edges and surrounding outside will stay cool. It does not have a cord that automatically withdrawls into the machine. There is a small area you can wrap the cord around the bottom. I feel the cord is adequate size, it is longer than our last one, which I prefer. Its probably about 2 1/2 feet but I can't be sure.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: It's a toaster that does the job
review_text: After almost 20 years my old one died. Picked this one up. Have had good luck with Hamilton Beach products, so got this one. Works great with toast (I found the "3" setting is perfect). Works great with bagels. Nothing fancy, no frills. It's a toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Solid, quick toasting toaster for a fair price.
review_text: Our old toaster oven was just slowly heating the bread, never really toasting it. We realized we never used the oven feature and just wanted a solid toaster. The 4 slice capacity allows for long breads and the warming feature makes it easy on Sunday mornings for breakfast for the whole family and not having to worry about "timing." Toasts very nicely and quickly. If you were really nitpicking, the evenness of the browning isn't picture perfect as it follows the pattern of the elements and bread holder. But for me that doesn't matter. Toasting adjustment dial works, I prefer my toast dark and the middle setting is plenty dark. Bagel feature is nice, but I personally like both sides of my bagel toasted so, after trying it, I don't use it. Solid, fairly priced toaster that does not get hot on the outside (so I can put it between my keurig and the wall with no heat issues.)

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I love the width and length of the openings in this toaster. I can slice a thick and long piece of focaccia and toast 2 pieces at a time. Bagels are easy to do as well, no matter how large they are. I highly recommend this toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I make a lot of bread, and it's great to be able to toast it without having to cut it in half. The first few uses, it was REALLY uneven toasting, but after a 'breaking in' period it toasts very evenly. I've had it for quite a while now, and purchased 2 others as housewarming gifts. Highly recommend!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Great value and easy to clean. Once you get the right setting you are good to go. I love the size because my counter space is limited and this fits on my counter very nicely. Love the features specially the wide slots. Bagels fit without a problem. I would recommend.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I love this toaster!!! I have not had one in years and I've been using a toaster oven instead for everything. My Grandson asked for it. So far it toasts everything evenly. I have no problem pushing it down. One time is enough. It's very beautiful to look at on my counter top. I love the way it toasts my frozen waffles. They come out perfectly. I even toast THIN Pepperidge Farm Stone Ground Wheat bread and it also comes out perfect. Thick or thin. I have not toasted bagels yet. I like the lighted buttons. I also have a Hamilton Beach high-end can opener for years now and I love that too. I highly recommend this toaster. Some other reviewers have had problems with it, if it is defective, as some products do have that problem, I would send it back. I feel confident knowing that I bought this from Amazon Prime and they always honor their products and I can return items and have them picked up at my home for no charge.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: it is just perfect. I read all the negative reviews before buying ...
review_text: it is just perfect. I read all the negative reviews before buying and based on the percentage of failed products find it within the norm. Considering most people leave reviews only when something goes wrong, their percent is usually bigger. About the toaster: Shiny, great quality, toasts from both sides (just confirming to cancel those negative reviews). Wide enough for bagels, and works fine for bread. Buttons are illuminated. The click sound is pleasant. The beep sound may be too loud and not needed for me but some might found it useful. On a side note, Hamilton Beach builds great products and I love their coffee bean grinder and coffee machine as well.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: This is a great toaster if you have limited width in your area for toasters. I love the fact that it has a keep warm button which I use every time I toast anything because I do not know how to time cooking eggs and toasting bread so that they both come out hot at the same time. The only issue I have is that the slots at the bottom for crumbs to fall onto the tray are a bit too narrow. Big chunks happen to get stuck in there sometimes, then they burn and stink.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Perfect. We eat a lot of bread/toast here, and we get a lot of bakery bread that slices into longer pieces and odd shapes. This toaster is great for those loaves that end up with slices that are long. With our old toaster we would have to toast 1/2 of the slice then flip it over to toast the other 1/2. This toaster is great for those loaves. It will also toast 4 pieces of regular sized bread, 4 waffles, or 2 sliced bagels nicely at the same time. It’s sleek and looks nice on the counter. Very pleased.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Hamilton Beach 22810 Toaster. A great value for the money.
review_text: I have been totally satisfied with the Hamilton Beach 22810 2 slice toaster. First off and most importantly it seems to make good toast that is even on both sides and properly done. I like a few of the extras that I paid little attention to when I ordered the toaster. The retractable cord for instance. I have to toaster sitting close to my outlet so I only have it extended about 12 inches (of the 33 inches possible). I don't have excess cord cluttering up my work space so that is a plus for me. I also like the warm mode which is a pretty simple set up but does keep the toast warm if I am not ready for it when it is done. All in all it is an excellent toaster.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Perfect for long sourdough bread slices!
review_text: Okay, so we were so excited about the arrival of this toaster from Amazon, that we went out and bought two loaves of sliced sourdough bread from the local bakery to try in it as soon as it got here. We LOVE sourdough bread and have never been able to fit it in a toaster, as it would always come out misshapen and hard. This amazing toaster had room to spare for the bread and toasted it to perfection on both sides. The warming feature is such a brilliant idea. It kept the slices warm until I was ready to butter them. We just had the best toast ever! I look forward to trying out the defrost feature for the muffins and gluten free bread (for my hubby) we keep frozen. The toaster is sexy looking and the buttons are easy to read. It doesn't take up much room. I can find no faults. Hamilton Beach did it again! They always put thought behind their products and build them to last. I have the world's greatest coffee machine by them (Hamilton Beach Single Serve Coffee Brewer and Full Pot Coffee Maker, 2-Way) that I bought over a year ago from Amazon and tell everyone about. This toaster matches that coffee pot, which is nice. I cannot believe I am excited over a toaster, but there it is.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: We rarely use a 4 slice toaster anymore and decided to replace it with this model. It is great. It toasts evenly, has enough settings to accommodate bagels, and larger breads fit fine. it has a low beep sound just prior to the cycle being completed so you know when it will pop up. It isn't the least bit annoying and I find it to be a gentle reminder to "get it while it's hot"! Happy with this selection!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: The slots have the width & length to accommodate any size breads. It produces a very even color on the extremities of the bread which makes it a bit slower than one might like but there are no charred spots that come with faster toasters. It has a full range of options to cook properly with the varieties of breads you might use. It likes to beap but that will keep you aware of what it's up to. I've never used a $100+ toaster but I really can't see what it would do better when you can fit anything in this one and it comes out the way you want it to. Give this one a try, you'll be glad you did.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: REALLY like this model. I never used the "warm" function on my old one because since I'm a man I don't read directions! :-) But this time I did and the function is REALLY nice. Good purchase. Will get another one when needed.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: It is an excellent toaster that does what a toaster does
review_text: Although I had to return the toaster I bought via Amazon due to damage, I was able to purchase it elsewhere. It is an excellent toaster that does what a toaster does; makes toast. I do like the "keep warm" option. If you press the button before you press the "toast" switch down, the toaster keeps your toast warm long enough to finish an egg. I also like the "beep" that the toaster makes when you push down the toaster button because then I know that my toast is on its way. The look of the toaster is also top notch. I did not want a cheap looking $15.00 toaster and I did not get a cheap looking $15.00 toaster. It goes well with my other appliances.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I love this toaster. It is able to keep your toast warm for a few minutes in case you aren’t quite ready for it. There is also some sound to let you know when the toast is done. Great product!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: This toast is easy to use, toast everything from bagels to pop tarts evenly and good to which seething number you use! The only thing is if a larger piece of bread, or pop tart, English muffin, bagel etc falls down into the toaster it’s nearly impossible to get it out because it doesn’t fall down into the bottom crumb catching rack it gets stuck into the toaster itself. But that’s not much considering it’s a pretty nice toaster and does it’s job!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Great toaster that gets the job done
review_text: I have been looking for a basic toaster to meet my needs when my original toaster stopped working. I was amazed and overwhelmed with the number choices I had when I started looking for a replacement. This Hamilton Beach toaster is a fairly basic toaster and has been easy to use. I like that it has wider slots that allow you to toast a thicker bagel or a simple piece of toast. One of the options that caught my eye while looking at several different options was the keep warm feature. This is a great feature that allows you to keep you toast warm without further toasting it. When it has finished toasting I provides a beep letting you know that it is complete which is great when you are trying to multi task. The fact that it was stainless steel was an added bonus and it matches the rest of the appliances that I have in my kitchen.This is a great toast for the price that it is listed at.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Long slim design with thick slots
review_text: I love the toaster overall, I’m not the type to complain about tiny problems and the beep actually does not bother me at all! I quite like being notified that my toast is done cause previously I’d not hear it pop and forget about it. Now I hear the beep and go get my breakfast! It has very nice long and thick slots, I guess I didn’t read the dimensions close enough because this is a veryyy long toaster!! I was looking for a slim compact design to take up minimal space, but still handle odd shaped bread. It sticks out quite far from the back wall, but I just put it in the corner to make it work. If you don’t have a lot of counter space make sure to measure first. Love it so far, had it for a week. I will update if any issues arise. Buy it, it’s a good looking toaster!!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: This is by far the best toaster we have ever owned. It roasts bread perfectly and then will keep it warm for 3 minutes! Where has it been all my life?! It looks really nice with it’s stainless steel finish and can be used for bagels, too. I highly recommend this product - and the price is excellent, too. There may be a better toaster out there, but I doubt that it’s in my price range! Go buy it! You can thank me later. 😉

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Amazons service was prompt and excellent.
review_text: We moved our old four slice toaster with the long and wide slots to our RV. We ordered this toaster to replace that one in our home. This toaster is actually nicer than our old one. We eat sour dough and rye bread that are larger than normal white bread so we prefer this type of toaster. If we are toasting standard white bread you can place two slices of bread in each slot. As usual, Amazons service was prompt and excellent.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Move over standard toaster, the Hamilton is here!
review_text: I purchased this in February 2016 and it has become an integral part of our family kitchen. It works well with all functions and we love the defrost and warming function so much, that our other standard toaster is rarely used. So I just ordered a second toaster to replace the standard one. Hopefully the competition to get to the Hamilton will be a thing of the past. A side note to those who put frozen baked goods in the toaster; we have learned to use a spray bottle filled with distilled water to mist each side of the frozen toast, bagel, English muffin, waffle, pancake & etc before toasting, as it replaces the moisture lost in the freezing process so it is not so dried out.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Best long slice toaster on market.
review_text: This is the best long slice toaster. I've tried 2 others. They both burnt one side and the other barely toasted. They also only toasted half way up the bread. I've used this one on multiple types of bread. It browns evenly on both sides, all the way to the top. Easy to clean. Also, very cool to touch on sides. The others got HOT. Would definitely recommend.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: "Keep warm" feature a must have now.
review_text: I don't know how I ever got along without a "keep warm" feature. Without it, by the time I finished buttering the first piece, the second piece was cold. Has all the standard features such as removable crumb tray, wide slots, and many extras. The brushed stainless steel finish is easy to clean and goes with any color scheme. It beeps to let you know the toast is done, and will not lock in the down position without electrical power.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I looked at a lot of toasters before buying this one. The last two we had lasted two to for years and never toasted evenly like the toasters from 30+ years ago. I finally bout this one, pleasant surprise the cord is pulled out of base as needed and retracted back. The toaster toasts EVENLY just like toasters used to!!! It toasts a little slower than the one we had before but so far everything has come out perfectly. It has the keep warm feature, I haven't tried it yet, it seems to me that you would be drying out whatever you are toasting by using that. Anyway, this is a great toaster that WORKS, and has a lot of nice features.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Nice BASIC Toaster for a great price
review_text: For the price, you cannot beat this Hamilton Beach Toaster. Plz read the manual before using it, since this Toaster has a few interesting features: such as....you have to push the slider button inwards if you want to manually pop the bread yourself. Anyhow, I like the fact this toaster has a DEFROST FEATURE, which I use a lot because I do freeze my sliced bread quite often. Also, I love the fact that you can retract the cord into the toaster, so that the cord does not stick out! This Toaster is a basic toaster (thus the price) and it will toast 2 slices of sliced bread nicely or two pieces of thin muffins.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Love the keep warm setting for my toast.
review_text: Love the keep warm setting for my toast. Don't have to worry about when the eggs and bacon are gonna be done, I know my toast will still be hot. Liked it so much, I ordered another one for my parents. One thing I found helpful was turning it on with no toast once or twice before using it. I don't know if this is recommended or not, but it "burned off" the new appliance smell so my first piece of toast didn't stink. It is a great toaster though and I highly recommend it.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Finally! A toaster that toasts evenly, top to bottom, both sides! We've been through many toasters in 45+ years of marriage and this is by far the best one we've ever had. And the beeps to let me know the toast is ready means i dont have to stand by waiting. If you want your bagle toasted on both sides, dont use the bagle button! Its not rocket science. If you spend more for your new toaster than this, its for your tender ego, not for better toast.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Only have been using for a couple of months but so far it works well. I like the keep warm feature - just a small tab on the handle that you push in after pressing the handle down to start the toaster. When the cycle is finished it shuts off, but keeps the toast down inside the toaster and the residual heat keeps the toast from cooling off too quickly.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: This toaster turned out to be too big for my small kitchen, so I gave it to a friend and he was very pleased with it.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I bought this to replace an old Black & Decker toaster that was failing. It would only toast one side of the slice, so I essentially had to toast each slice twice. Anyways, this is a great improvement over my previous toaster and I'm very happy with it. The missus likes that it has a crumb tray and that it can fit larger slices of bread just fine.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: To those who're wondering about all the beeping
review_text: The beeping seems gratuitous at first, and the toaster does beep a lot. But it's not without reason. For example, the product beeps three times just before releasing the bread after toasting. You'd think that's just stupid, right? I know that the toast is finished because of the sound the toaster makes when releasing it. No need for additional beeps? Well, you know how with most toasters the release can be kind of startling? There's this *shunk* sound that comes out of nowhere. You can't know it's coming. Some people even get anxious when they know it'll come soon but don't know when. With this toaster, you don't have that (admittedly minor) problem. You hear beep - beep - beep, and you know the next sound, in tempo, will be the (relatively quiet) shunk. Anyway, great product, especially for the money. Looks extremely nice in the kitchen. Makes good toasts and bagels. Doesn't startle you to death. Recommended.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Not only is this great toaster space saving, attractive & full of great features, it’s easy to use. First, I really appreciate that it doesn’t pop toast completely up when done, so you get your toast hot, also the keep warm function is available if needed! The toast lift feature is great when you’re ready to remove toast so you don’t risk burnt fingers having to mess around with toaster tongs. Turns out that this is my favorite feature/s. The thinner design is part of what attracted me to this toaster. It takes up less counter space than typical 4 slot toasters. Also, we like to toast artisan & rye breads which often have longer bread slices and fit easily in this toaster's slots. The beep when toast is ready is nice, though I could do without the beep when starting toaster. I’m not sure what purpose that serves. Defrost function is great for frozen waffles, bagels or bread & nice to have keep warm option. Easy to use, if using just one slot, it doesn’t matter which slot is used, unlike some toasters. Do be aware that even when not using bagel option, which toasts just one side, that one side of toast is darker than other. Never had thought about it before, but I actually find it preferable to have one side of toast crisp & the other side a little less crispy. Since relatively new, I can’t speak to longevity yet.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: A SUPERB TOASTER AFTER A SIMPLE FIX!
review_text: I purchased this 22811 toaster at Costco (they were giving them away for only $20 and may still be). It has all the latest features, plus you can BURN the hell out of yourself by touching the metal top after toasting (nice feature!). But, big surprise, every feature works as advertised! Can't say it's quick ... takes 3 minutes to toast one piece of nice whole wheat with a setting of 5. And it BEEPS ... a lot! It beeps once when it starts, and three times when it stops! And if you have KEEP WARM selected, it beeps every minute during warming and then beeps three times and pops up the toast after only 3 minutes of warming. Evidence that the designers were smoking some strong stuff is the fact that the CORD comes out IN FRONT! And the crumb tray is in the BACK! After all my tests I decided to keep this beast because it does a good job toasting, all the features work properly, and toast does NOT drop past the tray (an almost daily occurrence on my previous toasters when using thin, German flatbread ... maddening). I fixed the cord problem by using fine wire to attach the cord just below the crumb tray (it comes out the back at the point of the tray's finger cutout), so it works like a charm now. See photos for how I did it. I do wonder why it's so difficult to design a proper toaster though. Cord out the BACK ... NO BURN surfaces ... crumb tray in FRONT ... NO BEEPING ... no chance of toast FALLING BELOW the bread tray (the Ham Beach does very well in that department) ... buttons that WORK like they should (ditto) ... and FAST toasting ... is that too much to ask? Evidently it is. SIX MONTHS LATER: Surprised to say that this toaster has provided yeoman service and perfect toast since day one. The beeping isn't that loud (my microwave IS) and does provide notice that the toaster is ON and OFF, which is nice. My cord fix hasn't budged and works beautifully. If I could give an accurate score to this toaster now, it would be a 4.7 ... since I can't, I'm changing my score to a FIVE! Love this puppy!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: Sleek style, retractable cord, working fine so far
review_text: This toaster works great so far and I love all the features. For a toaster under $30, I’m very happy. It’s very easy to clean and I LOVE the retractable cord which ACTUALLY WORKS. You do have to hold the cord flat and retract it a little at a time but still, it only takes a few seconds. I like this toaster so much I ordered one for my daughter in England...she just received it on Jan 26th, a week early! I’m not sure why there are so many bad reviews but they seem to be about the silver colored toasters. Maybe this is a newer improved model?

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I've only used this toaster for a few weeks but I give it high marks!! I love the fact that it beeps when it begins and even better that it beeps when the toast comes up! While that may seem insignificant, I used that "beeping" the other day. I was making my eggs, coffee and forgot I had started the toaster. When it beeped, it reminded me that "Hey!" Toast's up! Better get it buttered while it's good and hot!" (Of course, it didn't SAY that! LOL! - but the beep did remind me it was time to pay attention to the toaster!). Most important is this the great, even toasting. The ability to toast 4 slices of bread at one time is also great. I love the sleek, slim design while giving me plenty of space to toast a bagel or muffin. I gave it only 4 stars for "Easty To Use" because the dial for the degree of toasting is at the very bottom of all the controls. That makes it difficult to see and dial in your selection. All in all I give this Hamilton Beach 4 Slice Toaster a big THUMBS UP!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
reviewed_product_attribute: Style: 4 Slice with Sure Toast Technology | Color: Stainless Steel
review_header: Finally! A Toaster That Does What It Is Supposed To Do!
review_text: A toaster is a toaster, right? Wrong! I had no idea how hard it would be to find a toaster that actually did what it is supposed to do without spending a fortune. When did toasters get so complicated? And when did toasters get so expensive? I saw some for close to $200! Well, I tried several toasters and even a toaster oven. Finally, this one is the one that did what it is supposed to do. It toasts evenly, it will hold long toast such as sourdough bread, it will toast bagels correctly by only toasting one side as God intended, it will even allow you to set for one slice. It is also easy to clean, but come on how often do we really clean our toasters? So, for the price, this does what it is supposed to do. No frills, no fluff, just a toaster that operates as it is intended. You can't go wrong with this one. Unless you're some sort of chef that needs one of those $200 ones, but even then I can't see where those do anything different or better than this one!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: I was a bit nervous buying this toaster because it had an overall 3.5 star review with the negative comments being that it does not toast evenly on both sides of the bread and that the cord is a problem with where it is attached underneath the toaster and that the beeping was annoying. Well, I am happy to say that this toaster works great and on setting 5 it produces the perfect toast. When I first got it I put the setting on level 7 and ran it thru 3 toasting cycles to burn off the chemical smell some mentioned in their review and that worked perfectly to get the smell gone. I also was concerned about the beeping as some said it was annoying. It beeps once to start and it beeps three times when finished. Nothing annoying and I actually like it as it tells me my toast is done as I am doing other things in the kitchen most mornings when I am making toast. The cord is not an issue. Even though I have not had this toaster for very long I am very please with it and would highly recommend buying it and saving money, as it is half the cost of the other long slot toasters being sold on Amazon!

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: I have correct my edit. It works fine..WHEN I PLUG IT IN. Sorry for the bad review. Lol
review_text: This is the exact toaster I wanted. It is a 4 slice toaster that can handle Bagels and even long bread. The openings are long and fat. There are many options 4 controls and a keep warm control. One of the added features is that the outside of the toaster stays cool to the touch. Since I didn't want it to take up a lot of space on my counter the way it's designed is long and slim not boxy and square like many of them. Suits me perfectly so glad I bought this one. Update. We don’t use our toaster very much so although I’ve had it for about 9 months it just now malfunctioned. While it was working it was exactly as it was advertised and we loved it. But today when I tried to use it the catch that holds the bread down didn’t work. In other words I can’t even attempt to toast the bread. It would click closed but not hold. It just popped up again. Is there someone to contact to get it fixed..? I’m sure it’s out of warranty.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: The day my Toaster was delivered, I had to see the DR, as I was sick. He recommended a soft food diet for a few days. I was anxious to try it out, so I put the last of a loaf of bread, 2 heels and a regular slice in it. Put it on #4, and waited. Of course, the main beep, then after a few moments 3 more beeps and the toast popped up. The edges of the heels were a little dark, but the regular slice was PERFECTLY toasted, on both sides. I also tried 2 slices of bread in a 'toaster bag', too see if they fit in one of the slots. I had no problem, there was room left over. Of course, I can't try the toaster bag out yet, but I'm looking forward to it. I'm also looking forward to using the 'keep warm' feature...when I put peanut butter on my toast before, I had to hurry while the toast was still warm. This will make it a lot easier. The cord is on the front of it, but the way my outlets are, it's no problem.

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_text: Our old toaster works fine, but it was absolutely impossible to clean and I am not into fires in my home. So for the past year I've researched toasters and found that it doesn't seem to matter how much you do or don't pay for one, they are pretty much the same (we bought one for $70 that popped our toast out so hard it flew across the room). So I decided to start cheaper this time. We just started using it, but so far we love it. Will amend review as necessary. - RETRACTABLE cord comes out the BACK (I was worried as so many people talk about cords out the front, which is stupid). - Crumb tray comes out the back (which is fine with me). - Small footprint. - Cool touch sides. - Buttons light up. - Great price. I pulled this info from the HB website: Keeps toast warm longer 2 extra-wide slots Your toast stays warm without overtoasting Retractable cord for easy storage Warm mode keeps toast in slot until you’re ready Cool-wall sides Bagel, defrost and cancel Toast Boost lifts food higher for easy removal Easy-push buttons illuminate for easy view Toast shade selector Dimensions (inches): 7.48 H x 7.48 W X 11.6 D

product_title: Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster with Long-Slots, Sure-Toast Technology, Bagel & Defrost Settings, Auto-Shutoff, Stainless Steel (24820)
review_header: It toasts. But, it toasts really well!
review_text: You cannot truly wax rhapsodic over a toaster. It toasts. It's not eloquent or elegant, and it isn't a thing of beauty. It's a toaster. It toasts. But, this one does a GREAT job of toasting. It has super wide slots that hold even the fattest of Texas Toast or Boston Bagels. It has a bagel setting, so only the guts get toasted. It's fast, it's settings are easy to figure out, and the wide array of times you can set it at will let you do everything from burned to toast-sushi and all stops between.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: We ordered this to use while taking our 2 month old to parks etc. It serves the purpose for that. We do not use anything other than the crib mattress in our crib. So cannot comment on how comfortable this would be for sleeping through the night. However, the padding is comfortable and our baby seems to like it.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: Love it! Soft, nice design, my baby sleeps much better since getting this. Definitely worth trying.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: I brought this for my grandson and I love it. It is safe and he is in it whenever he sleeping and just laying.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_header: Fussy baby that won't sleep unless he/she is your arms? This is your answer!
review_text: This baby best is phenomenal. Do yourself a favor and get it as soon as possible. I wanted to buy a crib but also needed the convenience of being able to care for our little one all night long. The baby nest is cheaper, good quality and did exactly what we were looking for!

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: The delivery was fast, the packaging was great, pretty pattern, super soft and comfy, the price was right, and it has a three year warranty. What else can I ask for. Our little man has been sleeping peacefully, which allows me to get some work done. I can easily move it from room to room. Just last week we used it in the park while picnicking and it was priceless. It’s really light weight and convenient. I can’t see spending more money for the expensive dock-a-tots, this is really the perfect partner for our baby.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: Es perfecta. Mi bebe duerme muy bien

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: By far one of the Best Buy’s for my little guy so far! He is way more comfortable in his bassinet and sleeps way longer! The print is so cute and the fabric is soft!

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: My baby loves this bed. I especially love it because I cosleep with my children. With my first child I didn’t use a bed at all but with this one I did because my other one sleeps in the bed with us. I love the soft sides because it is easy for me to lean over and breast-feed him at night and he still has his safety. The quality of this bed is really great, I would buy it for a friend And the price is fantastic.I’m so happy I didn’t have to buy an expensive dock a tot.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_header: Very soft and comfortable for babies
review_text: I really like this babynest. Its is very soft and very comfortable cotton material. Easy to clean. Will recommend this nest!!!

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: This is an adorable affordable safe baby lounger. I wanted a dockatot but refused to spend that kind of money. I believe this is better than that anyway. So fluffy and soft but firm enough for safe lounging.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_header: Best in quality with budget friendly price
review_text: Gifted this to one of the friends new born baby. Its light weight easy to handle and good made quality product.

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: We love this thing! My baby hated his Halo Bassinet, assumingly because the “pad” is so thin, therefore, he wasn’t comfortable. So we bought this and put it inside his bassinet and he slept so much better. We’ve since moved him to his crib and he still sleeps on this inside his crib. I love that it has a cotton side and a soft silky side. Great value for the money. Definitely would recommend!

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: This is very nice product; I loved the way it is designed. Thank You!

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
review_text: My baby absolutely loves this pillow! Better then the boppy !!!

product_title: Pillani Baby Lounger - Baby Nest for 0-12 Months, Breathable Co Sleeper for Baby, Newborn Lounger for Cosleeping in Bed - Toddler Sleep Portable Bassinet, Infant Pillow Cosleeper
