review_text: Soft, reversible, easy clean, and travel appropriate

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: This is such a fun tool! My hair is naturally just curly enough to be annoying so I have always straightened it every day. But then I tried this and love it! It gives just enough curl to enhance what I have but not to make things too crazy. I can even wash my hair the night before and sleep on it and still end up with results I like! I could never do that with a straightener. Plus it takes way less time than than straightening. It's nice to have an alternative on a day that I want something different or if I'm running low on time.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: Never thought of getting one of these but when I did. I thought I was going to return it. When I tried it out. WOW. I loved it and didn’t want to return. Kept using it and got compliments from a lot of people. Easy to use. Takes awhile for long hair especially when thick but so worth it at the end. Waves last so long!! It stayed for 3 days for me. Definitely worth the money! Getting myself another for a backup!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: I love this!!! Best purchase I have made for doing my hair!
review_text: Ok. This tool is solid and quality. I hold for 7 seconds on my hair shaft and as I move down to my ends I hold about 5 seconds and that’s at 210 degrees. It doesn’t damage my hair and the wave will hold until I wash my hair! I don’t have to put any products either, like hair spray or anything. These pics are day two and I worked outside all day in humidity. The waves hold. I love the mermaid hair look and this product does it for me. So happy with it. I get super excited to use it and get major complements on my hair when I go out. Buy this! Trust me you will love it.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I also own the Bed Head Wave Artist Ceramic Deep Hair Waver for Beachy Waves. I like this one better because sometimes the Bed Head makes crimp marks on my hair (probably my fault!) The Alure is easier to maneuver around my head. The Bed Head sometimes really heats up my neck and is uncomfortable to use close to my neck. The Bed Head does create deeper curls though so if you like your waves curlier that one is the better choice. The Alure curling iron creates soft waves. DO use heat protection on your hair. This step is very important so you don't burn your hair!!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Works great on long hair for nice waves
review_text: Love this! I have long hair and this is such an easy way to add volume and texture to my straight hair. The waves look great and lasted most of the day (I may just need to hold it on my hair longer) I was worried it would be too hard to use, but was amazingly easy. The digital display is nice to see what temperature it’s at so you don’t scorch your hair (but have to convert from Celsius). It is obviously heavier with the 3 barrels, but the soft grip on the handle makes it comfortable to hold.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I’m so excited about this waver! I was never able to use a curling iron, so someone suggested this to me and I seriously cannot believe how good it works and how easy it is! This will be great when it gets really humid in the summer because I can never keep my hair straight. I was very skeptical because I’ve purchased so many hair tools and I can never get them to work. Some reviews say that it breaks or shuts off while you’re doing your hair, but two of my cousins have this for at least a year and it has held up very good. If you suck at doing your hair, I highly suggest this product.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: Reason I prefer this over my Bed Head waver 1. Less bulky. My BH waver is harder to maneuver when I'm doing the back of my head and I end up burning my neck. 2. This waver gives smaller softer waves. To be fair, I think BH offers a smaller size than the one I have. The size of this particular waver is perfect and doesn't shrink my hair up too much 3. DIGITAL TEMPERATURE GAUGE!!!! I am visually impaired and have a hard time reading the rolling dials most curlers and flat irons use, including BH. This one has a well lit digital screen so I never struggle to read what setting I'm on. My hair is over processed and can fry in an instant on a setting that it too hot. Overall, I like this product and it has become my primary styling tool. I've used it steadily for three weeks and have had no issue.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: The first thing I noticed is how large it is but that was expected and allows you to style more hair at once. Also the temp is shown in Celsius and I use Fahrenheit so that's something to note. Some reviews said it didn't get very hot but idk how that would happen. I have hair almost to my butt and used this on the lowest heat setting and it worked perfectly, even with only holding it clamped for 3-5 seconds at a time. The waves also lasted until my next wash. One complaint would be the location of the buttons makes it easy to accidently switch the tool off while using it.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: After reading several reviews I decided to give this iron a try. I am beyond glad I did. I have spent $150 on a beachwaver that doesn’t give me nearly the desired effect that this does. I love it. I took the advice of a fellow reviewer and alternated the position of the iron every other section of hair, horizontal and then vertical. This picture is right after I took it out of the box and tried it for about 2 minutes. I can’t wait to do my whole head.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I have very fine, flyaway hair and just got a cut that is shorter than I'd like with too-choppy layers. I was looking for something that would give me some wave without losing any length (curling irons make it look shorter) and this is absolutely perfect! Gives a nice beautiful wave that blends my layers in - it looks nice and neat, and no length at all is lost. I love this!!!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Love my three barrel curling iron
review_text: Love my three barrel curling iron. I'm one of those that cannot for the life of me figure out how to curl my hair with a single barrel or a straightener. My hand just does not want to cooperate or maybe my brain is overthinking it, anyway, the three barrel curling iron is a game changer for me. I have super straight hair, so straight that air dried is a suitable style for me. I've always wanted to be able to curl my hair and Alure has made that possible! My waves are beachy just like they promise and I've received tons of compliments from friends, coworkers, etc. And for those that have difficulties with other forms of curling, the three barrel is super easy to use. However, it takes me closer to 45 minutes to do all of my hair. I'm probably just slow and figuring it out and/or I have a lot of hair.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: Plugged it in right out of the box to give it a try and it is such an easy hair tool to use! This was my first attempt at a few strands. I have somewhat fine hair and it’s very long! This was so quick and simple. Can’t wait to try on my whole head! Tool gets very hot but has a nice stand and temperature adjustment buttons. I’m not good at using curling irons or anything or the sort, but my first impressive of this is that it’s very easy to use!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Better design than old version, waves for days!
review_text: Ok I almost never write reviews but I feel this time I had to! I really love this three barrel waver. I did a comparison of when I first did my hair in the morning time on Friday before the day began and then another picture 11pm on Saturday showing how it held up in FL heat/humidity at a theme park and me pulling it up in ponytails off and on during the day. Yes it fell some but for it to not have frizzed and to have held in so much of the wave was really impressive to me! I hated this tool when I was younger but the tool I used to have had a design different to this and I don’t have a better way to explain it other than to state that they have the design flipped now and there are curved edges so the waves are seamless without leaving creases in the hair. Got a lot of compliments on my hair when I did this and definitely one of my new favorite hair tools!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Beautiful, easy to use, with amazing results!
review_text: I just purchased this item, I have only used it once, cant speak for the longevity part of it yet, but I'm completely satisfied. I will admit I was worried after reading some reviews that it was too bulky or heavy. But it is not heavy! It's gorgeous! And of course an item like this is a little bulky but that is too be expected. Came in a lovely box, everything was in perfect condition, heated up right away, though I was confused for a moment with the temperature but soon realizes it reads in Celsius not degrees, but that's fine :) heats up to desired temperature and made my long (already wavy hair) look even more beautiful with more volume. Love it! Can't wait to get out of the house and show off my new hair when possible! Would recommend this product 100% no doubts.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: Great hot tool at an affordable price! I’ve gotten so many compliments on the curls it makes. It was a little tricky getting the hang of since it’s a large tool and I’m used to a curling wand but after a couple of days I now find it easy. It is a little more involved and time consuming but worth it. Curls last days!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: DON’T EVEN THINK JUST BUY. GOD SENT
review_text: OK LADIES AND GENTLEMAN THIS IS GOD SENT. I have straight thin hair, and really am not good at styling my hair. I took this out of the box and gave it a whirl WHILE PUTTING MY KIDS TO BED. And LOOORD. It took me 3 minutes to get a full beautiful head of wavy beach curls that used to take me an hour and would never hold. My son looked at me and told me my hair looks like my sisters and you know kids don’t lie. (She was blessed with full, wavy hair) I’m telling all my friends and called my mom. Get this. Ive literally never been so happy with a product in my life.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: First of all this hair curler is really well made. I was very impressed with the quality of the curler. Secondly, it's easy to use. And lastly, It gave me really beautiful and beachy waves!!!! I love this curler and will be using it lots from now on. I used it in our family photos and will upload some when I get them back so people can see how amazing this make your hair look!!!! I definitely recommend this for special occasions, family photos, or just for making your hair look nice and fun for work or school!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Leaves your hair silky and wavy!!!
review_text: I was amazed at how quick this curling iron heats up! Its really easy to use and does the job very quickly. Its like using a flat iron but you don’t put much work into it and you dont have to press to hard so your hands don't get tired easily. One thing I notice is that my hair looked and felt very soft and silky after which I wasn't expecting at all. It also doesn’t cause demage to your hair and the curls stay for a very long time. The cord is extremely long so you are not stuck in one spot the whole time your working on your hair. I think its excellent and would highly recommended it to others.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Looking👀 for beach waves?🏖 🌊 Get this!😍
review_text: If your like me...This is PERFECT for you! YES you can get beach waves,Even if you don’t know how to use a curler or straightener! I bought this because I don’t know🤷🏼‍♀️how to curl my hair with a straightener OR curler. I’ve watched DIY videos on YouTube but I can never get my curls to go in the right direction. I’ve also tried recreating beach waves with a straighter,from YouTube vids.👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 None of which have worked for me. I then searched YouTube videos on how to use this 3 barrel wand and was impressed with how easy it is to use. I purchased this item and am extremely happy with it! I am IN LOVE 😍 with my beach waves! Beach waves 🌊 that I have never been able to accomplish via straighteners or curlers☹️ TIP: it took me a small 18mins to get a full head of beautiful beach waves! 🕰 😃😃 Temperature control is decent, it has clear large numbers that show you the temperature. It’s super easy to use!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Make natural looking waves that last all day! Love this product!
review_text: LOVE this!!! Was so easy to use and made my hair SUPER wavy. The curls lasted for a couple days even! The pic I show is from at the end of the day and it's STILL very wavy!!! I have partially wavy hair on the underneath part of my hair but the rest is straight bc of hormone changes (my hair stylist said this is normal with multiple children) so I wanted to find an item that could compliment my other wavy hairs. This did a phenomenal job! It reaches a temperature of 210 degrees. Stayed pretty hot throughout the entire curling process. I have a LOT of hair (see my pic) and I never once had to stop and let it heat back up. I did notice if I held it a little too long, about 30-40 seconds it would make my hair smell somewhat that nasty burning smell. I want to clarify It didn't ruin my hair but just gave it that smell. So I stuck with about 20 seconds for each section and that worked great! You do have the option to turn the heat down which I'm gonna try next time just to see. Overall, 10/10 for price, product being sturdy, temp control, and curls/waves that it makes. Took me about 20 minutes to do all of my hair and again I have THICK hair!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I got this for my teen because "messy" hair is the thing right now. It didn't take long at all for her to figure out the best temperature to use. It does get hot very quickly but haven't burned our hair, thankfully. It is funny that as others have mentioned, the temperature is only in C. The cord is long and swivels perfectly!!!! I haven't had a hair appliance with such perfection in length and ease of swivel before. These are things that usually frustrate me and I end up not using an appliance. This checks the boxes for me and is one of my favorite hair purchases right now!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Well made and. Makes great waves
review_text: This waving iron is perfect! I had one over 15 years ago and I loved it but it was clunky and difficult to use. This iron is very easy to use. The clamp is sturdy and it has a digital temperature reading so you know exactly what heat it is at. I also love that it has a stand so it won’t damage your counter tops. I used Thai iron to wave my hair and I received compliments all day long. Another plus, the waves lasted til day 3 and still looked great! If you’re looking for a soul toon to wave your hair, look ok further this waving iron is legit!!! Oh did I mention the pink color is super cute too ;)

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: It’s a good product. Does it’s job. The only compliant I have is that when it’s been heating for like 15 minutes or so, it turns off on its own. So I leave it preheating as I’m doing my makeup and when I’m ready to do it, it’s off. Then I have to turn it on again. But it heats up really fast so I can manage with that. The plus side of that is that at least it has that feature because when your rushing out the door you will know it will turn off on it’s on. Down side, is that when your in the middle of doing your hair, you have to check to make sure it’s on after 15 min or so. I have long hair and it takes practice to go fast but my second try using it, it was easier than my first. Got a lot of compliments. Good value for the money. I recommend.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I have been searching for a way to make waves in my hair and this gadget is perfect. It heats up super quick, less than a minute to get up to max temp. And all it takes is a few seconds clamped down on the hair to make the waves. I got through my whole head in less than 15 min. I slept on it last night and didn't have any hair product in, and it is still wavy today. It's fairly easy to use, and the swivel cord is nice for not getting the cord tangled up while in use. It's heavier than a single barrel curling iron but not too heavy. I would definitely recommend this for anyone wanting a wavy look for their hair.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: There will be a "short" learning curve & worth it
review_text: Because of my current situation, doing my hair perfectly every day isn't happening. Fortunately I now have this three barrel curling iron. My hair has not been cut for over a year and is quite thick and straight as a pencil. I did have to practice a lil bit, but now I can buzz right through my head. The secret is start at the bottom underneath and work your way up in sections. Initially it seemed tedious but I was learning. I also like to flip it the opposite way as I prefer my hair coming in towards my face. This has allowed this pink ribbon girl who desperately needs a haircut feel petty again. When I missed a few pieces, I just grabbed those pieces, opened three barrel and wrapped those pieces around only one of the 3 barrels. If you do this (wrapping around one barrel while holding it in the open position), be careful as I did burn myself, but learned quickly! THIS is THE perfect iron to bring on that trip for beach blown hair into the night! It's especially great for someone who just doesn't have the crazy time you need to make your hair look nice. I went from over an hour to well under a half an hour using this triple barrel curling iron! It's my ribbon color too! Very happy! 💚

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: My wife wanted a new look for Christmas and New Years and this gadget helped her accomplish that. It didn’t burned her hair and she looked sexy. She has long hair and she curled her hair in less than 30 minutes. It came well packaged and fast delivery. The curling iron looks like is really good quality. Is a good price compared to other name brand irons in the market. After using it several times now, she said this gadget will be her best friend in the spring/summer to create those beach waves that she loves so much. She will definitely purchase again from this seller.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Wife is very happy with how well it works and the display is helpful.
review_text: My wife loves this thing for what it does and the wavy style is apparently making a comeback. But my favorite part about it is the lighted display that tells you if it is on/off. Her other curing irons only have an on/off switch and she forgets to turn it off all the time. Yes, she also has a bad habit of not unplugging it, so this helps me know if its hot when I go to unplug it and put it away for her.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: If you want a true wavy look, this is the product to get!!
review_text: The 3 barrel curling iron was super easy to use. It took a little patience to do my entire head of hair but was totally worth it. I loved the way my hair did not stick to the iron even using hair spray; it just slid right off. My hair is very hard to curl but the temp control got it just right without burning my hair. Wish other curling irons had that option. I would totally recommend this to anyone cause you can’t get that look with an ordinary curling iron or flat iron!!!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: Very easy to do Quick curling Quality Gets hot quick 100% better then the Bed Head crimper

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I absolutely love this curling wand. My hair is very straight and no matter how much hair spray I use I have a hard time getting curls to stay in my hair. I bought this wand with the hopes that it would be quicker and easier to style my hair and that the curls would stay. I have to say that this wand met all of my expectations! It’s so easy to use and my hair turns out beautiful each and every time. I have young children and its hard-finding time to do my hair or spend time on my appearance. This curling wand has cut the time to style my hair in half and makes it much easier for me to feel confident in my appearance. If you are looking for an easy to use styling tool that gets the job done this curling wand is for you!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Adds some fun to my boring hair
review_text: I bought this thinking it would be fun once in a while to use. But seriously, within the first week of having it I used it almost every day!! It was so much fun! My husband, who likes my hair straight, even liked the results! Wow! I used it on my 5 year old daughter as well and I personally loved the results, and I think she did too, but it was too hot and she didn't like how hot it was so close to her head, so she hasn't let me do it again. I love the volume it adds as well and the beachy type waves. I would suggest looking up some youtube videos to get an idea of different techniques to use, but then play around with it! Try starting close to your scalp, or try starting farther down. I personally prefer using it upside down, with the clipped side down, but try it both ways! I feel like there's several different ways to use it. It is kind of large and tricky to position, but that gets easier with time. Now that my kids are back in school I am excited to use it more often!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: TIPS in review. LOVE. Worth the price.
review_text: ▪️Use bigger chunks of hair. ▪️Change the direction of wand. Some strand vertical. Some horizontal to give a more natural look to the wave. ▪️To avoid a kink start 3-4 inches from root and tilt the edge of the iron away from underneath the section of hair. Not up into the hair. ▪️Use high heat to set all day. ▪️Use heat protectant spray before or 1-2 drops of hair oil (or light cream) after to retain moisture and control frizz or fly sways. I’d been following INH but didn’t want to commit $70 to an iron. Bought this one and glad I did. At first it took forever cause I was doing smaller sections (and I need high high heat). Then I was in a rush and did 5-6 big chunks of hair and this was the result! Highly recommend. It is a little tricky to get used to with small hands.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: This heated up quickly, was easy to hold and grip, and created the waves that I expected to see. I have thin wavy hair that looks very unruly most of the time and this created uniform waves I love! Gave it 5 stars because there’s nothing at all wrong with it, but the iron itself does nothing for frizz. If you have frizzy hair naturally, like me, use a product. My first attempt wasn’t great but with a frizz gel it was awesome!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Where have you been all my life
review_text: I am incapable of using a wand with the glove and the finesse, just can’t. So my beach waves have really always relied on wearing braids for a couple days and dry shampooing them back to life. My hair is normally wavy with no curl pattern, incredibly thick, and can frizz easily. Using this 3 barrel was not only FAST for someone with a ton of hair but gave me the look that I want my natural hair to have but never does. All the tutorials I watched were people with really shiny, thin hair and I wasn’t sure how mine would look. It’s full for sure, going from blow dried frizz ball to this, but add some Moroccan oil after styling and I am v thankful to have found this tool! Will also try it with my hair pre straightened for a day 2 or 3 straight hair look.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I absolutely love this wave iron!!! I’ve searched a long time and so thankful I got this one!! It’s very easy to use, gets hot quickly, and the curls really hold!! I can section my hair 3 times (bottom, middle, and top) and that does the trick. I have fine textured hair and it hits my chest in length. Typically, when curling my hair the curls end up completely gone by the end of the day. Not the case with this wave iron, the waves will still be there even the NEXT DAY which is awesome!! Overall, I’m really happy with this purchase!! Also, this is an honest review and it’s not affiliated with any promotion.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I absolutely loooove this curling iron. It works great, is easy to use, the temp control is clear, and it’s just $30! Honestly, the first time I used it, I got soooo many compliments. I don’t have to use extra hair product or anything (just heat protectant) and it lasts for days. It is the perfect thing to add it a few waves (if you air dried and have some natural texture) or use on your entire head. I do straighten my ends before using it to give a more modern/messy look. The only thing I don’t love is that the temp is in Celsius, so you may have to convert to Fahrenheit (no biggie) and the cord is shorter than I prefer. But it still gets 5 ⭐️ because the price is so good and none of them are going to be perfect.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I bought this to share with my daughter. She has long, thick hair and this works perfectly for her! I wanted to see how long the curls/waves would last on her hair, so I curled it on a weekend. She didn't wash her hair for three days and it still looked freshly styled. I have long, fine hair and the waves looked good the first day but I needed to freshen up the next day. Overall, we are happy with it!

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: I love this! I have curly hair so I bought this intending it for my daughter, she has long straight hair. I haven’t tried it on her yet. But I was having a bad hair day and decided to try it out this morning, it did a fantastic job! I’ll be using this a lot and can’t wait to try on my daughters hair now.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_header: Stayed in for a reasonable amount of time
review_text: Daughter received this curling iron for Christmas. Was excited to try it bc she has VERY long thick hair that can never keep a curl/wave. She has tried hot rollers, single wavers, single curling irons, etc without luck in keeping a curl in for longer than an hr or two. This curling iron produced more like beach-type waves, but since that’s whats “in” right now. She was happy with the results! We knew we would need to curl her straight, long thick hair in small increments to even have a chance. This pic is how the waves look after doing her whole head. (Took abt 30 mins) This was about noon. When she went to bed, her hair looked the same. When she woke up and brushed it the next morning, a slight wave was still noticeable but looked more like she just had naturally wavy hair, if that makes any sense. Overall a good buy and she will use it again when she wants the beach wave look.

product_title: Alure Three Barrel Curling Iron Wand with LCD Temperature Display - 1 Inch Ceramic Tourmaline Triple Barrels, Dual Voltage Crimp (White-Pink)
review_text: Heats up quickly to 230 degrees and waves hair super easy! I used it on by mine and my daughters hair with ease! Her hair is naturally curly so I did end up straightening first then waving it. Tyically curls do not last in her hair but it stayed after a good nights sleep. It was my first time using something like this so ud imagine with time I can make our more beautiful and natural looking. Very happy with this product!
